Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Fas-fas isya: Rum Ayedi nari snir iḇe rum-nadi. Ḇape mkokada mkofrur iḇe nas snonkaku ḇemamun."
Rarirya ḇepraf sya ma manis sya srama faroi ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma ḇyuk pararei faro si.
Ḇape rofyor mananir imam-imam ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi smam aḇyair kanandor ifrur na ma romawa-romawa ḇebras ro Allah Rum ḇyedi sya: "Aski faro Rumkun Daud!"
Sisnesna namsor, ma sikofen faroi: "Wamnaf romawa sine roi sikofen na?" Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yamnaf; mkowasya ḇaimke: Ro sḇadon romawa makḇoi ma romawa ḇeyinem sus fasos kwar sanandik?"
Raimnai ibur si ma isasyar ro mnu ya fa ryaḇe Betania ma denef ro dia.
Ro arwori ro maran kyaḇer wer ḇe Yerusalem, Yesus ibiser.

Fanam nyanya Yesus myam ara knam oso inja imbran yoḇi fa syewar bon roi, ḇape ismai royo ḇa derer fyabairam monda. Inja Yesus ikofen faro ai knam ani: "Wapok wamarem wer ḇa isof fyoro-fyoro!" Ma ro fafisu ani beri ara knam ani myas.
Manfamyan ḇyesi smam roi ḇeḇesya ani sikandor, ma sikofen: "Rariso isof ara knam ani myas fasaw beri?"

Yesus kyarem faro si: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri rofyor mkokyar ma mkoḇe ḇirḇarḇa, nari mkofrur roi ḇeraris yafrur faro ara knam ani, dererḇa ḇoi rofyor mkokofen faro bon ine: Wakḇaken ma rwop randa wamsawer ro soren! nari ndarirya.
Ma rosairya wer mkor ro nadi kuker kakyar, nari mkosmai na."

Raimnai Yesus syun ḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma fafisu fyarkor ro dia, mananir imam-imam kuker ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara er Yahudi srama faroi, ma sifuken: "Kuker papoik rosaiso bukfrur roi ḇera dine na? Ma manseiso ḇeḇuk papoik ani faro Au?"
Yesus kyarem faro si: "Aya kako nari yaḇuk fakfuken oso faro mko ma rofyor mkokarem i faro Aya, nari Aya kako yakkofen faro mko kuker papoik rosaiso yaḇuki ifrur roi annane kam ya.

Ḇakḇuk masi sren Yohanes ryama kero? Ryaker boiyaswake roḇa ryaker snonkakuke?" Sawos yae faro si, ma sikofen: "Rofyor kokofen: Ryamaker boiyaswa, nari ikofen faro ko: Rarirya ido, snaro mkokyar faro i ḇa?
Ḇape rofyor kokofen, ḇo koḇo: Ryamaker snonkaku, komkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar sikam skara Yohanes ani nabi rirya."
Raimnai skarem faro Yesus: "Inko fawiḇa." Inja Yesus ikofen faro si: "Rarirya ido, Aya kako yakkofen faro mkoḇa kuker papoik rosaiso yaḇuki ifrur roi annane kam ya."
"Ḇape mko kara rariso: Snon oso ḇena romawa risuru. Rya faro romawa rak ya ma ikofen: Romawa jedi ras ine rwa wafararur ro yaf anggur.
Romawa ani kyarem: Mḇoi, mami. Ḇape rya ḇa.
Inja sinan ani ryawer faro romawa ḇeḇesuru ya ma ikofen rarirya kako. Ma romawa ani kyarem bo doḇe! Yamewer. Ḇape ḇarpurya fyafko ma rya.

Mansei ro fandu romawa ansu ya ḇeḇeuser kmari marisen ḇyedi?" Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Romawa ḇeḇesuru ya." Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri ḇeyor som ma bin ḇefrur farḇuk nari spon mko fa ssun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
Snar Yohanes ryama fa fyasnai nyan ḇenapes faro mko, ḇape mko kyar i ḇa. Ḇape ḇeyor som ma bin-bin ḇefrur farḇakḇuk sikada sikyar faroi. Ḇape mkomam i ḇesyaḇo mkofafko ḇa ma mkokyar faro i ḇa kako."

"Mkomnaf sarḇer oso ḇese wer. Snon ḇena saprop oso dom yaf anggur raimnai kyeri ḇo dar werek i. Raimnai ḇyai der moḇ ḇekafos anggur ma ḇyawes kaderen ḇekaki fa sḇukwaren yaf ani. Raimnai ḇyeasas yaf ani faro ḇeḇuk sasureffa sifararur ro yaf ani ḇoi ryaḇe sup ḇese.
Fafisu afufanggur ya fyanam, iwan manfamyan ḇyesi faro ḇefararur ro yaf ani fa ssun rarwas ḇyedi ro anggur bon anna.
Ḇape ḇefararur ro yaf ani sfor manfamyan ḇyesi: siprer sia, smun sia ma sso sia kuker karui.
Ḇarpur ya tuan ani iwan manfamyan ono ḇese wer, sibor syadi ro ḇepon ansi, ḇape si kako sifrur si raris min sesi.
Ḇarpurya iwan romawa ḇyedi faro si, ḇo ikofen: Roma ḇyedi nari sararyof i.
Ḇape rofyor ḇefararur ro yaf ansi smam rumkun ḇyani, sawos yae faro si: Roma ine iso nari ḇeḇewaris yaf ine, mkorama komun i, insa kona waris ḇyedi.
Inja sfori ma sisawen i ḇe yaf ya ḇandiri posa smun i.
Rofyor tuan ḇena yaf ani ryama, rosaiso nari ifrur faro ḇefararur ro yaf ani?"
Sikofen faro i: "Nari myun snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ansi ma yaf anggur ani nari ḇyuki faro ḇeḇuk sasuref ono ḇese, sikada nari ssḇuk bon ro yaf ani faroi ro fafisu afuf ya."

Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkowasya ḇaimke fas-fas ro Refo: Ḇefawi nananem ḇaḇawes rum, karui sisawen ya iso ḇeḇe karui dopir: roi ḇeḇesya ine ryama ro Manseren mun ḇyedi, roi ḇefrur kanandor ro ḇarpon komkasna.
Rarirya yakofen faro mko, nari Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ḇye ḇeyun bur mko ma nari ḇye ḇeḇuk faro er oso ḇeḇuk bon faro Ḇaḇesasoser ani. [
Mansesi ḇesapi ro karui ani, nari sekis-kis ma mansesi karui ani ḇyarek epen sya nari semnuk-mnuk.]"
Fafisu mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi ansi simnaf sarḇer Yesus ḇyani, sifawi siso Yesus syarḇer si.
Inja ssewar nyan insa sfori, ḇape simkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar kawasa ḇeḇor ansi karkara sena I nabi rirya.
Raimnai Yesus dawos wer kuker sarḇer faro si:
"Ḇaḇesasoser ro Boiyaswa imnis raris wairek oso, ḇefrur munara fakawawin faro rumkun ḇyedi.
Iwan manfamyan ḇyesi fa sra sor snonkaku dor kwar fa ḇeso munara fakawawin ani, ḇape simewer sramari.

Iwan manfamyan ono ḇese wer, kuker ananun: Mko kofen faro snonkaku yor ansi: Kaku ḇeri, roḇean ayena yafasos na kwar, sapi snoman ma rofanfan yesi seḇekaruk kwar; nakam neḇefasos kwar, inja mkorama ḇemunara fakawawin ine.
Ḇape snonkaku dor ansi sefandun iba; ono sraḇe yaf sena, ono sraḇe sasewar sena,
ma ono wer sfor manfamyan ansi, sḇewayam ma smun si.
Rarirya wairek ani imsor, ma iwan sarar ḇyesi fa sra smun ḇemamun ansi ma sikun mnu sedi.
Posa kwar ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: Munara fakawawin ya ḇyeḇefasos kwar, ḇape snonkaku yor ansi sisyusḇa.
Inja mkora wer ḇenyan farsam nakam ma mkor snonkaku mkosrow ro diwa sya, mkun si faro munara fakawawin ine.
Rarirya manfyan ansi sra siryur snonkaku kam sisrow ro nyan diḇo, snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ma snonkaku ḇepyum, isof sim munara fakawawin ani ifo kuker dakam ansi.
Fafisu wairek ani syun fa isrow dakam ansi, myam snon oso daksansun sansun munara ḇa,
inja ikofen faroi: Ne, naek, snaro swun ro dine ḇoi waksansun sansun munara ḇa?
Ḇape snon ani ḇyefasis monda. Inja wairek ani ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: Mkofes wemin ma ḇramin ḇyesya ma mkosawen snon ani ḇemoḇ ḇepampan syadi, ro diwa kankanes ma arkfafais nakor naisya.
Snar sibor seḇeyor, ḇape skinfir sya sibor ḇa."
Ḇarpurya snon farisi ono sra sna awi fa ssewar nyan rariso sifrowes Yesus kuker fakfuken oso.

Siwan manfamyan sesi fnoḇek snon Herodian ono fa sifuken I: "Guru, inkofawi, Au snonkaku ḇenapes ma kuker napnapes ḇuk farkarkor ro Allah nyan ḇyena ma Au wamkak ḇa faro mansei rya wer, snar au swewar snonsnon ḇa.
Wakofen faro nko karkara bedi: Inja koḇak som faro Kaisarke roḇa?"
Ḇape Yesus ifawi sne ḇeḇarḇor sena inja, ikofen: "Snaro mkofrowes Aya, ne snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor?
Mkofasnai faro Aya pipi faro som ani." Inja ssun faroi dinar oser.
Ma ifuken faro si: "Kakop ma fas-fas mansei ḇyedi sine?"
Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Kakop ma fas-fas Kaisar." Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkoḇuk faro Kaisar rosai Kaisar dor ro mko ma mkoḇuk faro Allah rosai Allah dor ro mko."
Simnaf rarirya sikandor ma sisusu bur Yesus ma sibur beri.
Ro ras ani Saduki ono sra faro Yesus, ḇena karkara, aḇiḇer ya isya ḇa.
Sifuken faro I: "Guru, Moses ikofen, rofyor snon oso imar bur swari ḇoi suna romawaḇa, ḇedar ḇyedi ḇyuk bin ani insa ssuyaḇen romawa oso sadwer naek ḇyedi ḇemar ani.
Rarirya ro fandu inko mambekanaek rifik sisya. Ḇepon ya fyakawin, ḇape nya romawa osoḇa ḇo imar. Inja naek ḇyedi fyakawin bin ani insa ssuyaḇen sadwer naek ḇyedi ḇemar ani.
Rarirya kako ḇeḇesuru ma ḇeḇekior ya isof ḇeḇefik ya.
Ḇarpur ya sikam simar, ma bin ani kako dakmar.
Inja mansei ro fandu mambekanaek rifik ansi nari befakawin bin ani ro fafisu aḇiḇer ya? Snar sikam sfakawin kuker bin ani kwar."
Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkosasar bos, snar mkofawi Refo ḇa, ma rarirya kako Allah papoik ḇyena!
Snar ro fafisu aḇiḇer ya snonkaku sfakawin ḇa, ḇoi sikenem imnis malaikat ro boiyaswa.
Ḇape ro mnuk aḇiḇer fandu ḇemar si mkowasya ḇake rosai Allah ikofen, radine:
Aya ine Allah Abraham, Allah Ishak ma Allah Yakub? Snar I Allah faro snonkaku ḇemar sya ḇa, ḇoi I Allah faro snonkaku ḇekenem sya."
Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇemnaf ansi sikandor farkarkor ḇyena.
Fafisu snon Farisi sya simnaf, Yesus isisen wark snon Saduki sya sisḇasna, inja siryur
ma oso ro si, isoine snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi, ifuken sas Yesus:
"Ne, Guru, sasoser rosaiso ḇeba syadi ro sasoser Refo Yahudi?"
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Waswar Manseren, Allah ḇedi, kuker snembri ḇesiper ma kuker rur bedi ḇesiper ma kuker karkara ḇena ḇesiper.
Ine sasoser ḇepon ma ḇeba syadi.
Ma sasoser ḇeḇesuru ḇemnis kuker sasoser ḇepon ani iso ine: Waswar min besi imnis waswar mankundaw.
Sasoser ansuine suiso ḇeḇeknam sasoser nakam ro Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi."
Fafisu snon Farisi ono sisya siryur, Yesus ifuken faro si, doḇo:
"Rariso karkara mkoḇena ro Wairek? Mansei rumkun ḇyedi rya?" Sikofen faro I: "Daud rumkun ḇyedi rya."
Yesus ikofen faro si: "Rofyor rarirya ido, snaro Daud ikofen kuker sḇayoi Rur ya ma dap iḇe Manseren ḇyedi, ro fafisu ikofen:
Manseren ikofen kwar faro Manseren yedi: kwainkada ro ḇar raku Yedi, isof Yarir mbroḇ besi fa waref epen si.
Inja rofyor Daud dapiḇe Manseren ḇyedi, rariso dapi ḇe rumkun ḇyedi wer?"
Snonkaku osoḇa kyarem faro I, ma randak ro ras ani snonkaku osoḇa beri ḇemku fa ḇefakfuken roi ono faro I.
Ma Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ma faro manfamyan ḇyesya, doḇo:
"Ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi skain kwar ro karapesa Moses.
Inja mkoso ma mkoḇeuser roi ḇeḇor sfarkor faro mko, ḇoi mkoso awer fararur sena, snar sfarkor na ḇape sifrur naba.
Sfes kamnam ḇemarḇak, raimnai srir na ro kawasa sya erdai sena, ḇape mankunsi ḇardi sakḇyunekro naba.
Fararur sifrur nakam, simarisen monda insa snonkaku smam na; imnis raris kaḇrai nadi ḇeḇam ma syatu sena pusyom ḇekwan na;
simarisen skain ro moḇ ḇekaki ro munara ma ro ḇarpon rum nadi;
simarisen sisma syom ro pasar ma simarisen sor siḇe Rabi.
Ḇape mko kada, sap awer mkoḇe Rabi; snar mkosma Rabi oser monda ma mko kam mkoḇe mambekanaek.
Ma mkap awer mansei ryakaker ḇe kma ro supswan ine, snar Kma oser monda faro mko, isoine Allah ro boiyaswa.
Sap awer mko kako ḇemanfarkin, snar Manfarkin oser monda faro mko, isoine Wairek.
Mansei ḇeba syadi ro fandu mko, iḇye wer duf farmyan mko.
Ma mansei ḇekanow mankundi, nari ḇyeḇepandun ma mansei ḇerun mankundi, nari ḇyeḇekanow.

Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkosisen kedwai Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa ro ḇarpon snonkaku. Snar mankun mko mkosun ḇa ma mko dadwarek ḇeḇesewar fa ḇesun sya. [

Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkoren kabom-kabom sya rum sena ma mkosisen wark mamam snonkaku kuker nadi ḇekwan mkoḇena. Inja nari mkosmai samamyai ḇemarḇak syadi.]

Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkokaḇor soren ma mko mbranuk sup, fa mkun snonkaku oser monda insa daksun ro agama mkoḇedi ma syun kwar, mkofrur iḇe romawa for ḇemḇrerḇa, ḇeḇarḇor syadi ḇe suru ro mankun mko.
Mkoroë, ne, manfarkin ḇepraf, ḇekofen: Soar imnis raris Rum Ari Ḇesren, soar ani dau roi oso ḇa; ḇape soar imnis raris brawen ro Rum Ari Ḇesren, soar ani iyaḇek.
Ne, mko snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa ma snonkaku ḇepraf, rosaiso ḇeḇefandun syadi, brawen roḇa Rum Ari Ḇesren ḇefasren brawen ansi?
Soar imnis raris rokef farsarser, soar ani daw roi oso ḇa; ḇape soar imnis raris farsarser ḇero rokef ya, soar ani iyaḇek.
Ne, mko snonkaku ḇepraf, rosai ḇeḇefandun syadi, farsarser roḇa rokef farsarser ḇefasren farsarser anna?
Inja mansei ḇesowar imnis raris rokef farsarser syowar imnis raris rokef farsarser ma kako imnis raris roi ḇeḇor kam ḇerir ro bori na.
Ma mansei ḇesowar imnis raris Rum Ari Ḇesren, syowar imnis raris Rum Ari Ḇesren ma kako imnis raris I, ḇekain ro rum ani.
Ma mansei ḇesowar imnis raris Boiyaswa, syowar imnis raris karapesa Allah ma kako imnis raris I, ḇekain ro karapesa ani.

Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro marisan, ampui ma konsop mkoḇak na, ḇape roi ḇeḇefandun syadi ro sasoser Refo Yahudi mkamdwerna, isoine: napnapes ma sawarwar ma ḇaḇeuser. Inja kofrur oser ma kopok kamdwer ḇese na ḇa.
Ne, mko manfarkin ḇepraf, papanursya mkoryan sibur aninem mkoḇena, ḇape onta ḇero aninem na mkoren si.
Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar skaninem ma ben ḇeyanan mkoḇan sren ḇandisi, ḇape donsi kada sifo kuker fasyar ma rmomen.
Ne, snon farisi ḇepraf, mkoḇan sren ḇepon sek aninem ya dori resari, rarirya nari ḇandiri kako daksren.

Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkomnis raris russauf kuker kamara ḇepyoper, ipyumra ḇandiri ro mamam, ḇape ro dori ifo kuker ḇemar kor ma buramek.
Rarirya kako mko, ro mamam snonkaku ro ḇandi mkonapes, ḇape ro mkodom na nafo kuker ḇarḇor ma sasar.
Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkoḇawes aḇerpapor ro nabi-nabi ma mkofamankor kakop rusro snonkaku ḇesren sya ma mkokofen:
Rofyor nko kenem ro awar kpu nkoḇesi kada nari nkakso si ḇa ro mamun smun nabi sya.
Ḇape rarirya ido mankun mko ḇardi mkoḇe saksi, mḇoi mkoḇe kpu ro ḇemun nabi ansi.
Inja, mkofamfon sasar ro kpu mkoḇesi!
Ne, mko ikak, ne, ikak ḇeknampu kpu ḇyesi! Rariso nari mkoper mankun mko ro samamyai for ḇembrer ḇa?

Inja, mkomam, Aya yawan faro mko nabi-nabi, ma snon ḇefawinananem ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi: ono ro si nari mkomun si ma mkopai si ro aprop, ono wer nari mko prer si ro rum-rum ari mkoḇena ma mkoḇewayam si ro mnu ḇe mnu.
Insa mko kamar rik ḇesbawer ro snonkaku ḇesasar ḇa, randak ro Habel snon ḇenapes ani, isof ro Zakharia Berekhya mandaḇendi, mkomun ro fandu moḇ ḇesren ma rokef farsarser.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri roi ḇeḇor nane kam nari syosbabo ine siso ḇeḇar na!"

"Yerusalem, Yerusalem, au ḇemun nabi-nabi ma ḇeso si kuker karui snonkaku siwan yoḇ au sya! Rarwan nabor kwar yaswar kuf fa yafanjur romawa besi, imnis mankoko sinan ḇeryur mkun sesi ro prer ḇyesi baḇsi, ḇape mko mewer.
Mkomam rum mkoḇanine nari ḇyeḇebur ma ḇyeusḇa.
Ma Yakofen faro mko: Randak ro knikine nari mkomam Aya wer ḇa, isof mko kofen: Sanandik faro I ḇerama kuker Snonsnon Manseren!"
Raimnai Yesus isasyar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma rya. Manfamyan ḇyesi srama ma sfasnai payamyum ro Allah Rum ḇyedi.
Ikofen faro si: "Mkomam roi ḇeḇor anna kam? Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri nari karui oso ro dine ḇyeḇemam monda ḇa ḇo ḇyarek ro oso bori; nakam nari neḇekakok."

Fafisu Yesus kyain ro urek Zaitun bori, manfamyan ḇyesi srafaroi insa sawawos ro mankunsi kuker I. Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Wakofen maro nko, fafisu rosaiso roi anna ne nari ndamuma ya ma aḇyair rosaiso ḇefasnai raramuma bedi ma aḇyair ḇefasna papupes supswan ya?"
Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkepen mko insa snonkaku ono sfarkor ninyan awer mko!
Snar snonkaku sibor srama sap snori ma sikofen: Aya ine Wairek, ma nari sfarkor ninyan kawasa sibor.
Nari mkomnaf rakrok mbroḇ ma ḇaryas embroḇ. Rariryano mkepen mko, ma mkokarsosen awer; snar roi nane kam nari ndarirya resari, ḇape papupes ya ryama ḇaim.
Snar er nari sikḇawes sisampum er ḇese, ma ḇaḇesasoser sisampum ḇaḇesasoser ḇese na. Nari basbiser isya ma rim ḇeba nmun ro moḇ nabor.
Ḇape nakam insape kandera ḇemun randak ḇeyunḇe awar babo ya.
Rofyor ani nari ssḇuk mko fa sewayam ma smun mko ma nari er ḇeḇor kam sayin mko snar snonsnon Ayedi,
ma snonkaku sibor nari siwarki ma sḇoḇ yae si ma sayin yae si.
Nabi sararer sibor nari sikḇawes fa sfarkor ninyan kawasa sibor.
Ma snar sasar na, naba syadadi inja saswari ro snonkaku sibor ndoë.
Ḇape mansei ḇemku epen isof ḇarpur ya kada nari isma aski.
Ma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser ine nari ḇye ḇeḇaryas ro supswan ḇesiper fa ḇyesaksi faro er sya kam, raimnai insape awar papupes ya."
"Inja rofyor mkomam ḇarḇor ḇeḇyeḇa ndo moḇ ḇesren, raris Nabi Daniel ikofen kwar -- ḇeḇewasya mkokara pyum --
rarirya kawasa ro sup Yudea iḇye syadi sifrar sibur ḇe bon na.
Snonkaku ḇeyun wam ro kaderen ro rum ya bori ido awer fa dun roi oso ro rum ḇyedi,
ma snonkaku ḇero yaf kyaḇer awer fa dun sansun ḇyena.
Ara faḇye faro bin-bin ḇemoḇesḇa ma ḇesus romawa ro fafisu ani.
Mkoḇe nadi, insa rofyor mkofrar mkobur ya isrow awer fafisu prim ya ma isrow awer ro ras Mananai Yahudi ya.
Snar ro fafisu ani nari wayam ḇefnak ḇa nmun, roi ḇeradine nmun ḇaim ro awar madero isof babo ine ma nari napok nmun wer ḇa.
Ma rofyor ya Allah ḇyuk fafisu ya fa iknampuḇa kada, nari roi ḇekenem nakam oso isma askiḇa; ḇape snar snonkaku Allah kyimfir sya, eḇedari fafisu ani ḇyei fa iknampuri.
Rofyor ani snonkaku ono sikofen faro mko: Mkomame, Wairek isya ro dine, roḇaido Wairek isya ro diwa, mkokyar awer si.
Snar Wairek-Wairek sararer ma nabi-nabi sararer nari sikḇawes ma nari sifrur aḇyair ḇeba syadi ma aḇyair kanandor, isof sfarkor ninyan snonkaku Allah kyinfir kwar sya kako.
Mkoswarepen naḇye, Yakofen na ḇepon kwar faro mko.
Inja, rofyor ono sikofen faro mko: Mkomame, Isya ro sup ḇeursḇa, mkoramura awer; roḇaido: Mkomame, Isya ro sim ya dori, mkokyar awer.
Snar imnis raris samar ḇearḇeḇer ro ḇar wamurem ḇe ḇar wambarek, rarirya kuker raramuma ro Rumkun Snonkaku.
Ro moḇ rosai ḇepsursya sisya, ro dia mankankan spanjuḇer."
"Fafisu wayam ani isyof fasaw bur, ori nari pyampan ma paik ya isnaiḇa ma mak sya nari sfarsapi ro nanki ma papoik-papoik ro nanki nari namarmer.
Rofyor ani nari aḇyair Rumkun Snonkaku fyasnai ro nanki ma kawasa kam ro supswan ine nari skanes ma nari smam Rumkun Snonkaku ryama ro mandif ro nanki kuker papoik ma payamyum ḇyena.
Ma nari Iwan malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi fa sisasyar ma siwuf sonker berok naba kaku ma nari siryur snonkaku Allah kyimfir kwar sya ro supswan ḇesiper.
Mkun farkarkor ro sarḇer ara knam: Rofyor snau-snau ḇyena nakpirew ma nkakyei randak, mkofawi fyor ryas ya fyanam kwar.
Rarirya kako rofyor mkomam roi ḇeḇor nane kam, mkofawi beri, mḇoi fafisu ḇyedi fyanam kaku kwar, ro kedwai ya ḇarpondi.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri syos ine, nari ryo ḇaim, roi ḇeḇor nane ndarirya resari.
Nanki ma supswan ine nari ndo, ḇape wos Ayedi kada nari ryoḇa.
Ḇape ras ma fafisu ani snonkaku oso ipok ifawiḇa beri, ma malaikat-malaikat ro boiyaswa kako roḇa, ma Rumkun ya kako roḇa, derer Mami mankundi."
"Snar imnis raris roi ḇeḇesya ro awar Nuh, rarirya kako nari roi ḇeḇesya anna ndarirya kako ro raramuma ro Rumkun Snonkaku ya.
Snar imnis raris kawasa ro awar faḇruḇ ya ḇaim, sanan ma sinem, sekawin ma sfakawin si, isof ro ras Nuh syun ro wai ya,
ma sifawi royoḇa beri ḇepon ro faḇruḇ ya ryama myun sikam, rarirya kako nari roi ḇerarirya ndama ro fafisu rarama Rumkun Snonkaku ya.
Rofyor ani snonkaku risuru suisya ro yaf, nari oso ḇyeḇeyun ma sumin ya ḇyeḇebur;
rofyor bin risuru suso fas, sumindi ḇyeḇeyun ma sumindi ḇyeḇebur.
Inja iḇye mkepen mko, snar mkofawiḇa ras rosai Manseren mkoḇedi ryama ya.
Ḇape mkofawi mnuk ine: Ro fafisu tuan ḇena rum ya ifawi ḇepon fafisu rosai ḇekaraw sya srama ro roḇ ya, nari iwaren ma ipok myam monda rum ḇyedi ḇo sfasyari ḇa.
Rarirya mko kako mkofasos, snar Rumkun Snonkaku ryama ro fafisu mkokaraḇa."
"Manfamyan mansei ḇeḇesyowi ma ḇefawi nananem, ikada tuan ḇyedi ikanow i fa myamwarek snonkaku ḇyesi ma ḇyuk nanan faro si ro fafisu ya?
Aski faro manfamyan, rofyor tuan ḇyedi isrow isya ifararur ro fararur ḇyedi ro fafisu tuan ḇyedi ryama.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari tuan ḇyedi ikanow i fa myamwarek roi ḇeḇor ḇyena kam.
Ḇape rofyor manfamyan ani iḇarḇor ma ikofen ro sneri:
Tuan ayedi nari ryakaki muma ḇa, inja irandak iprer manfamyan ḇese sya, ma dan dinem kuker ḇemasaser sya,
rarirya tuan ḇyani nari ryama ro fafisu kyara ḇaḇeri, ma ifawi ḇa,
ma nari myun i ma ifrur faroi imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor. Ro diwa kada nari ismai kankanes ma arkfafais nakor."
"Rofyor ani Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis inkbor samfur, ḇeyun parambrom sena ma sra sisrow manfakawinya.
Rim ro fandu si sifawi royoḇa mḇoi rim ḇese sya sifawi nananem.
Inkbor ḇefawi royoḇa ssun parambrom sena, ḇape ssun mani ḇa,
mḇoi inkbor ririm ḇefawinananem ansi ssun parambrom sena ma mani kako ro botol sena.
Ḇape snon manfakawin ani ryama fasauḇa isof enef ya myun si inja senef kam.
Rofyor romfawru simnaf mkaren ḇeyor: Manfakawin ryama! Mkosrow i!
Inkbor ansi sikbok kam ma sfasasos parambrom sena.
Inkbor ḇefawi royoḇa ansi sikofen faro inkbor ḇefawinananem ansi: Mkoḇuk mani mkoḇena ono ḇeinko, snar parambrom nkoḇena fanam nambrer.
Ḇape inkbor ḇefawinananem ansi sikofen: Roḇa, nari namnis faro nkoḇa ma faro mkoḇa kako. Ipyum syadi mkora faro ḇeḇoḇ mani ma mkokoḇes ro diwa.
Ḇape rofyor sramura fa skoḇes mani ya, manfakawin ani ryama ma ḇefasos kwar ansi siyaker i ma ssun kuker i ro sim munara fakawin ani, posa kedwai ya ḇyeḇesisen.
Ḇarpur ya inkbor ḇese ansi srama ma sikofen: Tuano, tuano, bas kedwai ya ma ḇe inko!
Ḇape kyarem: Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri yamam ḇaḇir mkoḇa.
Rarirya, mkowaren, snar mkofawiḇa ras ma fafisu ya."
"Snar Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis raris snon ḇemarisen ḇesasyar ḇe mnu ḇese, inja dor manfamyan ḇyesi ma ḇyuk nana ḇyena faro si, kuker kakyar insa sifararur kuker na.
Rarirya ḇyuk faro oso talenta ririm, faro oso wer suru ma faro oso wer ḇyuk oser, sisma raris samambraḇ sena, raimnai rya.
Manfamyan ḇena talenta ririm ani rya fasau. Ifararur kuker pipi ansi ma isma syadi talenta ririm wer.
Manfamyan ḇesma talenta risuru ani kako dakfararur rarirya ma isma syadi talenta risuru wer.
Ḇape manfamyan ḇena talenta oser ani kada rya ma ḇyai saprop ya ma derak tuan ḇyedi pipi ḇyani.
Fyoro kwar manfamyan ansi tuan sedi iburma ma ifrur karkor kuker manfamyan ḇyansi.
Manfamyan ḇena talenta ririm ani ryama ma dun syadi talenta ririm, ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: Tuan, talenta ririm iso wakyar ḇe aya; mame yasma syadi talenta ririm wer.
Inja tuan ḇyani ikofen faroi: Fararur bedi ipyum kaku, ne, manfamyan ḇeḇye ma ḇeḇesyowi yedi; fasnai kwar ḇesyowi roi kasun, nari yaḇuk fa mamwarek roi ḇeba. Swun ma wakun aski ro tuan bedi.
Raimnai manfamyan ḇesma talenta risuru ani dakrama, ma ikofen: Tuan, talenta risuru suiso wakyarma ḇe aya; mame yasma syadi talenta risuru wer.
Inja tuan ḇyani ikofen faroi: Fararur bedi ipyum kaku, ne, manfamyan ḇeḇye ma ḇeḇesyowi yedi; fasnai kwar ḇesyowi roi kasun, nari yaḇuk fa mamwarek roi ḇeba. Swun ma wakun aski ro tuan bedi.
Insape manfamyan ḇena talenta oser ani dakrama ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: Tuan, yafawi au snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ḇeyuf ro moḇ kwekef ro ḇa ma ḇesrai ro moḇ rosai kwer ro ḇa.
Rarirya yamkak ḇo yara yerak talenta ḇani ro saprop ya dori: Talenta bani isoine! Tuan wuni!
Inja tuan ani kyarem: Ne, au, manfamyan ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇemyarenḇa, wafawi, yuf ro moḇ yakekef roḇa ma yasrai ro moḇ rosai yaker ro ḇa?
Rarirya ipyum syadi pipi yesi buksi faro snonkaku ḇefarḇaḇyan sya, insa yasiḇer ido yun pipi yesi kuker pampen ḇyesi.
Rarirya mkun talenta ani buri ma mkobuki faro ḇesma samfur ani.
Snar snonkaku mansei ḇena ya nari ssḇuk faroi wer fa nya nabor syadi wer. Ḇape mansei ḇenaḇa, nari rosai nya na nari neḇeyun bur i.
Ma manfamyan ḇeḇefainda ḇa ani mkosawen i ḇe ḇondi, ḇe moḇ ḇepampan syadi. Ro diwa nari ismai kankanes ma arkfafais nakor."
"Rofyor Rumkun Snonkaku ryama kuker payamyum Ḇyedi ma malaikatsya kam siyaker I, ma nari kyain ro karapasa nasan Ḇyadi.
Raimnai er sya kam nari seḇefanjur ro ḇarpon Ḇyedi ma nari kyinfir si oser ḇe oser, raris ḇefarandosya kyinfir domba sya bur kambing sya,
ma nari domba sya ḇyesi fa snara ḇar raku ḇyedi ma kambing sya snara ḇar rasar ḇyedi.
Ma nari ikofen faro ḇenara ḇar raku ḇyedi: Mkorama, ne, besma ḇok ro Kma Yedi, mkakna Ḇaḇesasoser ḇefasos kwar faro mko ro fafisu supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ya.
Snar rofyor yabiser mkofan Aya; rofyor yambrow mkoḇe war fa yinem; rofyor yaḇe snon dakam mkoḇe moḇ fa yaḇeryar ro;
rofyor yaḇaḇer mkoḇuk ḇe Aya mar fa yafmar; rofyor yaduf, mkofaduru Aya; rofyor yasma ro bui, mkora kaki Aya.
Rarirya snonkaku ḇenapes ansi nari skarem faro I, ḇo sikofen: Manseren, fyor rosaiso nkomam wabiser ma nkofan Au, roḇa wambrow ma nkoḇuk war fa winem?
Fyor rosaiso nkomam Au ḇe snon dakam, ma nkoḇuk moḇ ryar faro Au, roḇa baḇer ḇo nkoḇuk mar faro Au?
Fyor saiso nkomam waduf roḇa wasmai ro bui ma nkora kaki Au?
Ma Wairek ani nari kyarem faro si: Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri roi ḇeḇor kam mkofrur faro oser ro fandu naek Ayesi ḇeḇenyawa ḇa sine, irya mkofrur kwar maḇe Aya.
Ma nari ikofen kako faro ḇeyores ro ḇar rasar Ḇyedi: Ne, mkobur ḇarpon Ayedi, ne, snonkaku ḇesma fras, mkosun ro for ḇembrer ḇa ḇefasos kwar faro Ibiris kuker malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi.
Snar fyor Yabiser, mkofan Aya ḇa; fyor Yambrow mkoḇuk war fa Yinemba;
fyor yaḇe snon dakam, mkoḇuk moḇ fa Yaḇe ryar ro ḇa; rofyor Yaḇaḇer, mkoḇuk mar faro Aya ḇa; rofyor Yaduf ma Yasmai ro bui, mkora kaki Aya ḇa.
Ma nari sikaem skarem faro I, ma sikofen: Manseren, fyor saiso nkomam wabiser, roḇa wambrow, roḇa besnon dakam, roḇa baḇer roḇa waduf, roḇa wer wasmai ro bui ḇape nkuf farmyan Au ḇa?
Ma nari kyarem faro si: Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri roi ḇeḇor rosai mkofrur ḇa faro naek Ayesi ḇeḇenyawa ḇa sine, rarirya kako mkakfrur na faro Aya ḇa.
Ma snonkaku sine nari ssun ḇe moḇ wayam ḇekain fyoro, ḇape snonkaku ḇenapes sya ssun ro kankenem ḇemnaiḇa ya."
Yesus imnai kwar kuker farkarkor ḇeḇor ḇyena, ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi:
"Mkofawi, ras risuru wer nari semunara Paskah, ma nari Rumkun Snonkaku ḇyeḇeḇoḇ fa spai I ro Aprop."
Ma ro fafisu ani mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara er Yahudi siryur ro Imam Ḇeba ḇenir Kayafas rum ḇyedi,
ma saw aw oso insa sfor Yesus kuker nyan ankar fa smun I.
Rarirya sikofen: "Roi ḇeḇesya ani ḇyeḇefrur awer ro fafisu munara, imbude mbrus isya ro fandu kawasa sya ri."
Fafisu Yesus isya ro Betania, ro Simon ḇeḇe pado rum ḇyedi,
bin oso ryama faro Yesus, dun botol ḇeser mani ḇespum ḇediref pyum kaku ma ḇekakur. Mani ani isbawer i ro Yesus ḇruri, ro fafisu kyain danan.
Manfamyan ansi smam rarirya sisonek Yesus ḇo sikofen: "Fainda rosai kofnak mani ine?
Snar mani ine kyakur inja koḇoḇ i kada ma pipi sya koḇuk si faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sya."
Ḇape Yesus ifawi swaruser sena inja ikofen: "Snaro mkosonek bin ine? Snar ikada ifrur fararur ḇepyum oso faro Aya.
Snar snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sya sisya ḇesya kwar ro fandu mko, ḇape Aya kada nari yakain nus mko ḇesya kwarḇa.
Snar isḇawer mani ani ro ḇaken Ayedi, ifrur fasasos oso faro ḇaḇe kardir Ayedi.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri ro moḇsai ryawer sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya ro supswan ḇesiper, rosai ifrur ine nari sakfayai kako fa sikswarepen i."
Raimnai oso ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi, ḇenir Yudas Iskariot, rya faro mananir imam-imam.
Ma ikofen: "Rosai mkomarisen mkoḇuk faro aya, insa yaḇoḇi faro mko?" Sḇak faro i kumpan sarak samfur rikior.
Ma rofyor ani syewar fafisu ḇepyum insa ḇyuk Yesus faro si.
Ro ras ḇepon ro ras munara Mamami Ḇepisen Ḇa Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi srama faro I ma sikofen: "Inja moḇ rosaiso wamarisen insa inkofasos roḇeyan Paskah faro Au?"
Yesus kyarem: "Mkora ḇe mnu faro snon oso ma mkokofen faroi: Guru doḇo: fafisu Yedi fyanam kwar; inja ro rum bedi Yamarisen yafrur munara Paskah kuker manfamyan Ayesi."
Rarirya manfamyan ḇyesi sifararur imnis moḇ sai Yesus ḇyuk faro si ma sfasos Paskah ani.
Ma roḇ kwar, Yesus kyain danan fnoḇek manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi.
Ma fafisu sanan, Ikofen: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri nari oso ro fandu mko nari ḇyoḇ Aya."
Ma kuker sne ḇefafardun oser-oser ikofen faro Yesus: "Aya ḇake, o Manseren?"
Kyarem: "Ḇefnoḇek Aya ḇo ḇesowen mamami ro ben ine, iso nari ḇeḇoḇ Aya.
Kaku ḇaboi Rumkun Snonkaku nari ibur rarirya imnis sfas kwar fa ḇekur I, ḇape raro faro mansei ḇeḇoḇ Rumkun Snonkaku ya. Ipyum syadi snon ani ḇyeḇeyaḇen awer."
Yudas, ḇemarisen ḇeḇoḇ I kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Aya iryake, o Rabi?" Yesus ikofen faroi: "Raris moḇ wakofen rai."
Ma fafisu skain sanan, Yesus dun mamami, ikofen kasumasa posa, pyanasnis i raimnai ḇyukḇaboḇ manfamyan ḇyesi ḇo ikofen: "Mkun ma mkan na, inenido ḇaken Ayedi rya."
Raimnai dun sek aninem, ikofen kasumasa posa ḇyuki faro si ma ikofen: "Mkinem kam ro sek aninem ine.
Snar inenido rik Ayenai rya, rik ḇeḇeasas sisbawer faro kawasa sibor fa ḇeḇuk payasyos ro sasar.
Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Randak ro knikine nari yapok yinem wer ḇa ro bon anggur knam ine isof ro ras yinem i wer, isoine yinem babo fnoḇek mko ro Mami Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi."
Sidisen dow sanandik posa kwar, Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sra ḇe urek Zaitun.
Ma Yesus ikofen farosi: "Roḇ ine kakyar mkoḇena kam nari neḇirḇar snar Aya. Snar fas-fas ya isya: Nari Yamun ḇefarandosya ḇoi domba nai ansi nari sibur ḇesisye.
Ḇape rofyor yiḇer Aya kwar, nari yapon mko ḇe Galilea."
Petrus kyarem faro I: "Min ayesine kakyar sena neḇirḇar faro Au rariryano, ḇape aya ma roḇa kaku."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Yakofen faro au, kaku ḇeri roḇ ine, mankoko sya sor ḇaim famyun Aya ḇe kior kwar."
Petrus ikofen faro I: "Isof ro yamar fnoḇek Au, yapok yafamyun Au ḇa." Manfamyan ḇese ansi kam sakkofen rarirya kako.
Ma Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sraro moḇ oso ḇenir ḇe Getsemani. Raimnai ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mkokain ro dine, ḇoi Yara fasaw knik ḇediwara fa yanadi."
Ma dun Petrus kuker Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesu fnoḇek I. Rarirya rofyor ani sneri fyafardun ma ryadadai,
inja ikofen faro si: "Sneri fyafardun fafayaḇa, imnis yaḇe yamar kaḇor. Mkokain ro dine ma mkowaren fnoḇek Aya."
Raimnai imbran pak ḇur sko, posa ḇyansuba ma ḇyenadi, ma Ikofen: "O Mami, rofyor wamarisen kada, iḇye wun sek aninem ine bur Aya, ḇape raris marisen Ayedi awer, ḇoi raris marisen bedi."
Raimnai kyaḇer faro manfamyan ḇyesi ma isrow sisya senef. Inja ikofen faro Petrus: "Mkopok mkowaren ḇake kuker Aya ro oras oser?
Mkowaren ma mkoḇenadi, insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowes ya: rur ya kada imyaren user, ḇape kraf ya ma ipok ḇa."
Raimnai ryaḇe ḇe ḇesuru ya wer ma ḇyenadi, ikofen: "O Mami, rofyor sek aninem ine Wamarisen fa wuni bur Ayaḇa, ḇoi rofyor Wamarisen fa yinem inido, marisen ḇena ndarirya mura!"
Ma rofyor kyaḇer wer, isrow skenef, snar enef ya myun sko mankenem.
Rarirya myam monda sko ro moḇ ani ḇoi kyaḇer wer ma ḇyenadi ḇe rarwan ḇeḇekior ma ḇyenadi, nadi insanja wer.
Raimnai kyaḇer wer faro manfamyan ḇyansi ma ikofen faro si: "Insape mkenef mura ma mkomnaisu mko. Mkomam fafisu ya ryama kwar, nari Rumkun Snonkaku ḇye ḇeḇoḇ faro snonkaku ḇesasar sya siḇrasna.
Mkokḇok, mkorama kora. Ḇeḇoḇ Aya ani fyanam kwar."
Rofyor Yesus isya dawawos kaker, Yudas oso ro manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi, ryama fnoḇek kawasa dandonek ḇeba ḇeyun sumber ma karbere, rak mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara Yahudi siwan sirya.
Snonkaku ḇeḇoḇ Yesus ani ikofen ḇair aḇyair ine kwar faro si: "Snonkaku nari yasyum ya ido, Iria, inja mkofor I."
Ma imbran fasaw fa isrow Yesus ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Aroo Rabi," ma isyum I.
Ḇape Yesus ikofen faroi: "Ne, bati, rosai rwama kuker ya?" Rarirya kawasa ansi srama siser Yesus ma sfor I.
Ḇape snon oso ro ḇeso Yesus pyas sumber ḇyedi ma pyerem manfamyan imam ḇeba ya knaram ḇyedi fa imuk.
Inja Yesus ikofen faroi: "Swower sumber ani, snar mansei ḇefnak kuker sumber nari ryo kuker sumber.
Roḇaido kwarai, mḇoi yapok ḇake fa yor ro Mami, insa fyarem fasaw sarar malaikat isyadi ro samfur seser risuru fa sifnoḇek Aya?
Rofyor rarirya ido, rariso nari ḇaḇemnis fas-fas ro Refo, berok ḇo ḇeyoḇo, mnuk ine nari ryarirya?"

Rofyor ani Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi: "Mkowarki Ayaḇe ḇeḇarḇorke, isof mkorama kuker fasasos sumber ma karbere fa mkofor Aya? Ḇape ras-ras Ayaisya yakain yafarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma mkofor Aya ḇa.
Ḇape nakam nari ndarirya insa fas-fas ro nabi-nabi namnis." Ro fafisu ani manfamyan ansi sifrar sibur I.
Sfor Yesus kwar, ssun iḇe ḇarpon Imam Ḇeba Kayafas. Ro dia ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara sya sisya sfanjur kwar.
Ma Petrus iyom ro ḇarpur isof ro buḇes Imam Ḇeba ya, ma rofyor syun randum kwar, kyain fandu ḇewaren sya insa dakmam papupes ro wawos anna.
Mananir Imam-Imam, fnoḇek Kankain Karkara Agama ansi ssewar ḇaḇesaksi sararer faro Yesus, insa isma samamyai marmar,
ḇape sismai onoḇa, ro saksi sararer ḇeḇor ansi. Ḇape ḇarpurya snon risuru, suyores ma sukofen, ḇo suyoḇo:
"Snon ine ikofen: Nari yakakok Allah Rum ḇyedi raimnai yaḇawes i wer ro ras rikior."
Raimnai Imam Ḇeba ya iyori ma ikofen faro I, ḇo doḇo: "Rariso kwarem wos oso ḇa faro saksi-saksi ḇeḇuksof Au sine?"
Ḇape Yesus ḇyefasis monda. Raimnai Imam Ḇeba ani ikofen faro I, ḇo doḇo: "Kuker snonsnon Allah ḇekenem, wakofen faro nko, Auryake Wairek, Rumkun Allah iso Auke roḇa."
Yesus kyarem: "Iso wakofen kwar ya. Ḇape yakofen faro Au, randak ro knikine nari mkomam Rumkun Snonkaku ya kyain ro ḇar raku Ḇepok syadi ma ryama ro mandif ro nanki."
Inja Imam Ḇeba ya pyansawek mar ḇyena ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Donef Allah. Fainda rosai kosewar saksi kaker? Knikine mkomnaf kam anonef ḇyena.
Rariso karkara mkoḇena?" Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Ikada isma samamyai marmar!"
Raimnai saninef ro mkasi ma skuki; ḇese sya siprer I,
ma sikofen: "Indo insas wakofen faro nko, ne Wairek, manseiso ḇeprer Au ya?"
Ro fafisu ani Petrus kyain ro buḇes ya ro ḇondi. Kniko infyan bin oso ryama faroi, ma ikofen: "Au kako wakso fnoḇek kuker Yesus, snon Galilea ani."
Ḇape fyamyun ro ḇarpon snonkaku ansi kam, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawiḇa, rosai wakofen ya."
Ro fafisu ryaḇe kedwai ḇeba ya, infyan oso ḇese myami ma ikofen faro snonkaku ḇero dia sya: "Snon ine dakfnoḇek Yesus snon Nazaret ani."
Ma fyamyun wer ḇo fyores: "Yafawi snon aniḇa beri."
Fyoroḇa ro fafisu ani, snonkaku ḇero dia sya sra faro Petrus ma sikofen: "Kaku ḇeri au oso ro fandu si, snar komnaf ro wos ḇedi."
Inja Petrus ani ifras ma fyores: "Yamam ḇaḇir snon aniḇa." Ma ro fafisu ani mankoko sya sor randak.
Rarirya Petrus iswarepen rosai Yesus ikofen faroi kwar: "Mankoko sya sor ḇaim, famyun epen Aya ḇe kyor kwar." Rarirya isasyar ḇe ḇondi ma kyanes kuker sne ḇefafardun.
Fafisu isnai kwar, mananir imamsya ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara er Yahudi siryur ma sna wosi fa smun Yesus.
Sai wanka ro ḇrasi, raimnai ssuni ma ssḇuki faro Pilatus, gubernur Roma ro mnu ani.
Rofyor Yudas, ḇeḇoḇ Yesus ani, myam, Ismai samamyai mar-mar kwar, fyafko. Inja kyaḇer pipi sarak samfur rikior ansi faro mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara sya, ḇo ikofen doḇo:
"Aya ine yasasar kwar snar yaḇoḇ rik snonkaku ḇesasarḇa ine." Ḇape skarem faroi: "Inko fandunrosai? Kwara ro mankundaw!"
Rarirya syo pipi sarak ansi ḇe Rum Ḇesren ya dori, raimnai ibur moḇ ani fa rya fyes mankundi.
Mananir Imam-Imam ssun pipi sarak ansi ma sikofen: "Pipi ansi kopok kosun siḇa ro ḇurua farsarser, snar pipi rik sirya."
Sawos yae faro si posa ssḇuk pipi ansi skoḇes saprop sapḇe Saprop Ḇefawi ḇefrur uren saprop, fa sifrur ḇe rus faro dakam sya.
Iso eḇedari isof ras ine sor iḇe Saprop Rik.
Rarirya Nabi Yermia wos ikofen ya imnis: "Sna pipi sarak samfur rikior, isoine maeja sawos namuk kwar faro snon oser imnis karkara ro fandu er Yahudi,
ma ssḇuk pipi ansi faro ḇaḇyak ḇefawi ḇefrur uren saprop ani, saprop ḇyedi, raris Manseren danun faro aya."
Raimnai ssun Yesus ḇeḇarpon gubernur Pilatus. Ma gubernur ani ifuken I: "Au ryake wairek kawasa Yahudi?" Yesus kyarem: "Iso mankundaw wakofen ya."
Ḇape raris safsof mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara sya sḇuksof I, kyarem wos oso ḇaḇeri.
Inja Pilatus ikofen faro I: "Inja wamnafḇake safsof ḇeḇor saksi-saksi sine sawos faro Au?"
Ḇape kyarem royo ḇaḇeri, isof gubernur ani ikmom kaku.
Biasa ro ras-ras munara ḇeba gubernur fyaspar snonkaku besmai oso imnis kankinfir ro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
Ma rofyor ani snon ḇeḇarḇor kaku oso isya ismai ro bui snonsnon ḇyedi Barabas.
Snar sfanjur kwar ro dia, inja Pilatus ikofen faro si: "Mansei mkomarisen yafaspar faro mko, Barabas roba Yesus, sapḇe Kristus?"
Pilatus ifawi kwar, mḇoi ssun Yesus ma ssḇuki faroi snar sayin I.
Ro fafisu Pilatus kyain ro karapesa karkara ḇenapes ya, swari fyarem anun faroi: "Wafrur roi osoḇa beri faro snon ḇenapes ani, snar snon ine ifnaiḇo roḇandi yasma wayam ro mafu."
Ḇape snar dafdif mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara sya, kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simarisen kam insa sor fa Barabas ḇyeḇefaspar ma Yesus kada isma samamyai marmar.
Gubernur kyarem faro si ma ikofen: "Mansei ro fandu snon ansuine mkomarisen yafaspar faro mko?" Sikofen: "Barabas."
Pilatus ikofen wer faro si: "Rarirya ido rosaiso nari yafrur kuker Yesus, sapḇe Kristus ani?" Sikam ssibras: "Ikada ḇyeḇepai epen ro aprop!"
Ikofen wer: "Ḇape sasar rosaiso ifrur kwar ya?" Ḇape ssibras naba syadi wer: "Ikada ḇyeḇepai ro aprop!"

Fafisu Pilatus myam nyan ḇyena kam nefromo, isyadi wer siḇe sifrur mbrus inja dun war fa ḇyukḇan ḇramin ḇyesi ro ḇarpon kawasa ansi ma ikofen: "Aya, yaḇe sasarḇa faro rik snon ine; Irya mankun mkokarem!"
Ma kawasa ansi kam skarem: "Mḇoi rik ḇyena nek inko ma romawa nkoḇesi!"
Raimnai fyaspar Barabas faro si, ḇape Yesus kada siprer I raimnai ḇyeifa spai ro aprop.
Ḇarpur ya gubernur sordade ḇyesi ssun Yesus ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes, raimnai sor sordade ḇese sya kam fa sfanjur ḇo sores yar Yesus.
Sper sansun ḇyena ma ssansun I kuker syatu ḇefuk.

Siyanem wower ro kaḇrai borek ma sriri ro Yesus ḇruri, raimnai ssḇuk amboḇer ḇaken oso fa dufepen ro ḇrasi ḇar raku ya. Posa ssḇansuba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma skoryae I, ḇo soḇo: "Aroo, ne Wairek kawasa Yahudi!"
Saninef I ma ssun amboḇer ani fa ssḇuki dos ro ḇruri.
Sonef I raposa sper sansun syatu ḇefuk ani buri ma ssansuni wer kuker sansun ḇyena. Raimnai ssuni ḇo sisasyar bur mnu ya, fa spai I ro aprop.
Fafisu sisasyar bur mnu ya, sisrow snon Kirene oso snori Simon. Snon ani sedafdifer i fa ḇyar pyan Yesus aprop ḇyedi.
Ma sra ro moḇ ḇenirḇe Golgota, isoine: Moḇ Ḇukor bei.
Raimnai ssḇuk anggur ḇefmnai kuker pus fa dinem. Ryepen anggur ansi kwar, imewer dinem sindi.
Spai I kwar posa serarwas sansun ḇyena kuker kinsor mansei ḇena nanya.
Raimnai skain ma siwaren I ro dia.
Ro ḇruri bori ro aprop pum ya sfas ḇair knam rosai ḇefnai fa isma samamyai ya: "Ine Yesus Wairek Yahudi."
Spai fnoḇek I snon mamun risuru, oso ro ḇar raku ma oso ro ḇar rasar ḇyedi.
Snonkaku ḇeyunuk ro dia sonef I ma skakiker siḇrusna ḇo sikokofen, ḇo soḇo:
"Ne, Au ḇeyoḇo ḇekakok Allah Rum Ḇesren ḇyedi ma ḇeḇawes i wer ro ras rikior, faspar mankundaw rofyor Allah Rumkun ḇyediso Au, wado bur aprop ya!"
Rarirya kako mananir imam-imam sifnoḇek ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma ḇeḇarara sya skoryae I ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo:
"Snonkaku ḇese fyaspar si, ḇape mankundi kada ipok fa fyaspar I ḇa! I kada Wairek Israel? Ipyum syadi wado bur aprop iyasi ma nari nkokyar Au.
Ryir kakyar ḇyedi faro Allah: ipyum syadi Allah fyaspar I, rofyor Allah imarisen kuker I! Snar ikofen kwar: Aya ine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi."
Rarirya snon mamun spai fnoḇek I suyakkoryae I kako.
Randak ro oras samfur seser risuru orkok isof ro oras kior mandira, pampan ya ikawef sup ya fyor ani.
Indokada oras kior ya Yesus dor kuker mkaren ḇeba: "Eli, Eli, lama sabakhtani?" Isoine: Allah Yedi, Allah Yedi, snaro Wabur Aya?
Kawasa ḇeyores ro dia simnaf rarirya, sikofen: "Dor Elia."
Ma snonkaku oso ro si ryama fasaw; dun bunek, fa syowen i ro anggur ḇemnir, raimnai kyuki ro amboḇer oso ḇo isui fa Yesus dinem.
Ḇape snonkaku ḇese sya sikofen: "Mkoḇuk awer, insa komam pan imbude Elia ryama fa fyaspar Indi."
Yesus dar naba wer raimnai ryir nyawa ḇyedi.
Ma mkomam, eruk kroben ro Rum Ḇesren ya imsap ra ḇyesuru ro ḇo isof ro sop ma ḇyerim ḇeba, ma urek karu na nakpef,
ma rus na nḇas, ḇo snonkaku ḇesren ḇemar kwar sya sibor siḇer si.
Ḇarpur ro Yesus aḇiḇer ḇyedi, sikam sisasyar ro rus, ma ssun ro mnu ḇesren ya fa sfasnai mankunsi faro kawasa ḇeḇor.
Mananir sarar ma sordade ḇyesi ḇewaren Yesus ansi simkak fafayaḇa ro fafisu smam rim ma roi ḇeḇesya anna, inja sikofen: "Kaku ḇeri, ine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi."
Ma ro dia bin ono sibor sores ḇinkwan ḇo smam, isoine bin-bin ḇeso Yesus ker Galilea fa ḇeyuf farmyan I.
Ro fandu si kosmai Maria Magdalena, ma Maria Yakobus ma Yusuf sna suḇedi, ma Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesi sna sedi.
Mandira kwar snon ḇenana oso snori Yusuf ḇyeknam ro Arimatea, ikako dakḇe manfamyan faro Yesus kwar.
Rya faro Pilatus ma dor Yesus ḇaken ḇyedi. Pilatus ḇyuk sasoser insa ssḇuki faroi.
Inja Yusuf dun ḇaken ani, ma pyarek i kuker kruḇen ḇepyoper,
raimnai ikrir I ro rus ḇebabo ḇyedi, pyaikir ro urk karui, ma ikris kwar karui ḇeba oso ḇe kedwai rus ani, raimnai ibur.
Ma Maria Magdalena kuker Maria ḇese ani sukain ro dia ro ḇarpon rus ani.
Meserdi, isoine ras fasasos ya isyonde, mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi sikam srama ro ḇarpon Pilatus,
ma sikofen: "Tuan, inko swarepen, snon ḇefarkor ninyan ani fafisu ikenem ya ikofen: Ras rikior nasyof kwar nari Yiḇer Aya.

Inja buk sasoser insa siwaren rusya isof ras ḇeḇekior ya; imbude manfamyan ḇyesi kofawiḇa ḇo srama skaraw indi, raimnai sikofen faro kawasa sya, ḇo soḇo: Diḇri kwar ro fandu ḇemar sya, isof farkarkor ninyan ḇepur ya ipyum ḇa syadi ro ḇepon ya."
Pilatus ikofen faro si: "Sine manwadwaren faro mko, mkora ma mkowaren rus ani pyum kaku."
Rarirya srama kuker fafnoḇek ro manwadwaren ansi sematerai rus ani ma siwareni.
Ras Mananai Yahudi isyonde kwar, ro arwo prim kaku ro ras ḇepon ro usbu ani, Maria Magdalena ma Maria ḇese ani sura sumam kaki rus ani.
Kniko ḇama rim ḇebayo myun snar Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso dado ker nanki ryama ḇe karui ani ma ikrisi ma kyain ro bori.
Ḇarpon ḇyedi isnaper ma sansun ḇyena napyoper imnis manwaref bur.
Ma manwadwaren ansi simkak ra sradadai simnis kaku snonkaku ḇepsur.
Ḇape malaikat ani ikofen faro bin ansu ya, ḇo doḇo: "Mumkak awer; snar yafawi musewar Yesus spai ro aprop ani.
Isya ro dineḇa, snar diḇri kwar, imnis raris moḇ ikofen kwar raya. Murama, mumam moḇ ḇyarek ro ine.
Ma mura fasaw fa muḇaryas faro manfamyan ḇyesi mḇoi diḇri kwar ro fandu ḇemar sya. Iswara pyon mko ḇe Galilea; ro diwa nari mkomam I. Kaku ḇeri yaḇaryas faro mko kwar."
Subur fasau rus ani, kuker makakak fnoḇek raryaḇ ḇeba ma sufrar fasau fa sukofen ḇayir faro manfamyan Yesus.
Kniko ḇama Yesus isrow su ma ikofen: "Aroo faro mu." Sufanam I ma sufor wemin ḇyesu ya ma suban suba faro I.
Rarirya Yesus ikofen faro su: "Mumkak awer. Mura mukofen faro naek Ayesi, insa sra ḇe Galilea, ma ro diwa nari smam Aya."
Fafisu sui sya ro nyan ya faduri, manwadwaren ansi ono sra kwar ḇemnu ya ma sikofen ḇadir roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya anna kam faro mananir imam-imam.
Ma sna wosi kuker ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara ansi kwar, sawos namuk fa ssḇuk pipi sibor faro sordade ansi
ḇo sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Nari mkofen radine, manfamyan ḇyesi srama ro roḇ ya ma skaraw I ro fafisu nkenef ya.
Ma rofyor roi ḇeḇesya ine gubernur dakmnafi, nari nkawos kuker i, fa nkofadiren mko."
Sismai pipi ansi ma sifrur raris moḇ sisma ananun rai. Ma farfyar ine imbran ro fandu kawasa Yahudisya isof ras ine.
Ma manfamyan samfur seser oser ansi sraḇe Galilea, ḇe urek rosai Yesus fyasnai kwar faro si.
Fafisu smam I sḇansuba faro I, ḇape ono seḇirḇar.
Yesus isnefer si ma ikofen: "Papoik nakam ro boiyaswa ma supswan ine ne ḇeḇuk kwar maro Aya.
Inja mkora mura, mkofarkor er sya kam ḇe manfamyan Ayesi ma mkoḇuk masi sren faro si kuker snonsnon Kma ya ma Rumkun ya ma Rur Ḇesren ya,
ma mkofarkor si fa sifrur roi ḇeḇor kam raris yaḇeasas kwar faro mko. Ma mkofawi, Aya ine nari yarous mko besya kwar isof awar ḇepupes."
Ine kada Ankankinem Ḇeḇye randak kaku ḇekur Yesus Kristus Rumkun Allah.
Imnis fas-fas ḇero surat Nabi Yesaya, Manseren ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mame, nari Yawan manfamyan Ayedi 'fa pyon Au, iso nari ḇefasos nyan ḇe Au;
mkarem snonkaku oso isya ḇye ruran ro sup ḇeursḇa: Fasos nyan ḇemkei ma ḇeaḇyoḇer faro Manseren."
Rarirya Yohanes Ḇemasi rya ḇe sup ḇeursḇa fa ḇyaryas: "Mkombror ḇo mkosma masi sren insama Allah ipyos sasar mkoḇena."
Inja kawasa ḇero sup Yudea ḇesiper ma ḇero Yerusalemsya kam srama ro i, ma skaram sasar sena ma sisma masasisren ro war Yordan.
Yohanes syatu ḇyena ro onta bur, ḇeḇoḇek ḇyedi ro aiwan kif ma anan ḇyena kampam ma umber sup.
Wos ikofen na ndok ra dine: "Ro ḇarpur ayedi ḇepok syadi aya nari isyama, yakunem fa yaper kaḇrai roḇesower-wesisya monda, yasyus ḇa.
Aya ma yamasi mko kuker war monda ḇape i, nari imasi mko kuker RurḆesren."
Ro fafisu ya Yesus ryaker Nazaret ro sup Galilea, ma Yohanes ḇyuk masasisren faro I ro war Yordan.
Rofyor isasyar bur war ya, Myam nanki ḇyas, ma Rurḇesren ya isaḇu ro i imnis manjawa.
Ma mkarem oso ryok ro nanki mumfes, ḇo doḇe: "Au kada Rumkun saswar ayedi, faro Au yamarisen."
Fyor o ḇa Rur ya fyarkin Yesus ḇe sup ḇeursḇa.
Ḇyarek ras samfur rifiak ro sup ḇeursḇa anya, ma biris ifrowes i. Ikenem ro fandu aiwan ḇeḇarḇor sya ma malaikatsya suf farmyan i.
Sfor Yohanes raimnai Yesus rya ḇe Galilea ma Ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah,
Doḇe: "Fafisu ya imnis kwar; Ḇaḇesasoser Allah fyanam kwar. Mkombror ma mkokyar faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya."
Rofyor Yesus imbran ro yendisare ḇero danosen Galilea, myam Simon ma naekri Andreas. Suisya ssunap pam ro danosen ani snar mandaswan suirya.
Yesus ikofen faro su ḇo doḇe: "Ne, murama muso aya, ma nari Yana mu ḇe mandaswan snonkaku."
Inja fyor ya beri subur pam suḇedi ma suso i.
Ma ro marandan ḇyani fyoro ḇa wer Yesus myam Yakobus, Sebedeus mandaḇendi, ma naekri Yohanes, suyanem pam ya ro wai ya dori.
Yesus dor su beri ḇo subur sinan kma suḇe Sebedeus kuker snon ḇeyan ḇaḇyak ḇyesi, ma suso i.
Skosun ro Kapernaum; ras Mananai Yahudi ya syeḇen mura, Yesus Syun beri ro rum Ari ya dori ma Ḇyuk farkarkor faro kawasa sya.
Kawasa sikandor rofyor simnaf farkarkor Ḇyena snar fyarkor si imnis snonkaku ḇena papoik; ḇo imnis kuker snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya ḇa.
Ro fafisu ani snon rur-ḇemaḇak sisawoḇer oso isya ro rum Ari ya dori. Snon ani dar naba ḇo doḇe:
"Rosai waḇe wafrur kuker inko, Yesus snon Nazaret? Waḇe rwama fa mun inko kwar ya isoine ke? Yafawi au kwar: Ḇesaranden ḇeramuma ker Allah."
Ḇape Yesus Ḇye wef i ḇo doḇe: "Be fasis, wasasyar buri!"
Rur-ḇemaḇak anya kyiker farma snon ani, posa dar naba ḇo isasyar buri.
Kawasa ansya kame sikandor kaku, isof sifuken yae ro mankun si ḇo soḇe: "Rosaisoine? Farkarkor ḇebabo ke? Dawawos kuker papoik, ma rur-ḇemaḇak syano dawos epen si, ma siso user wos Ḇyena."
Fyorya abar ḇyedi ifrar yar sup Galilea ḇesiper.
Sisasyar ro rum Ari anya, Yesus kuker Yakobus ma Yohanes skora ḇe Simon ma Andreas rum suḇedi.
Simon imbanyori ḇyis ḇo ḇyarek. Skokofen ḇadir beri dafduf ani faro Yesus.
Inja Yesus rya myam bin ani, i kin ḇrasi ma Ḇyausi. fyor ya beri ḇasḇis anya ibur i. Ma posa bin anine duf farmyan sko.
Ro mandira ya, rofyor ori syun kwar, sun snonkaku ḇeduf ma snonkaku rur-ḇemaḇak sisawoḇer sya kam faro Yesus.
Inja kawasa ḇero mnuḇeba anya sya kame, siryur ro rum ya rawendi.
Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇesma dafduf ḇeḇor ansi, ma rur-ḇemaḇak sya iyaw sibor kaku; imewer ḇyuk fa rur-ḇemaḇak ansya sawosri, snar sifawi I kwar.
Ḇyarḇir meser ro arwo prim ya, Yesus ikḇok ma isasyar ḇe moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa oso ma ḇye nadi ro diwa.
Ḇape Simon kuker min ḇyesi siyaw user I.
Rofyor sisrowi, sikofen ḇei ḇo soḇe: "Kawasa sya kame, ssewar au!"
Inja Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorama, kora ḇe moḇ ḇese, ḇe mnu-mnu ḇeba ḇefanam nane, insa Yakḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine kako ro diwa, snar si ḇeḇewar Yarama ya!"
Ma Yesus rya ḇe sup Galilea ḇesiper, ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye anya ro rum Ari sena, ma iyaw rur-ḇemaḇak sya.
Snon ḇeduf pado oso ryama faro Yesus i, ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon Ḇyedi ma dor fafnoḇek ro I ḇo doḇe: "Sye, Wamarisen ido Buk pararei ḇe aya!"
Yesus sneri iswar kufi, inja isawar ra pyan ro snon anya ma ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Yamarisen. Waprei ro dafduf bedi!"
Rofyor ya beri dafduf pado anya isyof buri, ma iprei.
Yesus iwan ifa ibur, ḇo danun pakrek faroi ḇo doḇe:

"Waswarepen, wapok fa baḇdas awer parare bedine faro manseirya kaker, imboi rwa fasna mankundau faro imamsya, ma buk farsarser ḇekar parare ḇedi, imnis sasoser Musa ḇyani insa ḇye fasasnai-kaku faro si."
Ḇape snon anya ibur ma ḇyaḇdas parare ḇyanya ḇe moḇ-moḇ na kam, isof Yesus ipok fa syun fababa wer ro mnu ḇeba ani ḇa. Ḇyarek ro moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa na, ḇape kawasa siswek i ḇesya kwar beraker moḇ nakam.
Ras ri ḇeso nawase, Yesus Kyaḇer wer ḇe Kapernaum, ma abar nakofen ḇadir isya ro rum.
Mura kawasa sya srama spanjuḇer rao moḇ anna nafyos, ma kedwaya ḇarpondi kako. Rofyor ḇyaryas wos ya faro kawasa ansi,
snonkaku ono sisya sun snon ḇeapaper oso faro i; ma snon rifiak skoḇar i kuker waryar oso.
Ḇape sisma nya no ḇa fa suni faro Yesus, snar donek ya iba, mura skek kukeri ma skoḇas rum ya bori imnis kaku murḇaḇ ro moḇ Yesus Kyon ro ya, posa skokyui ro ḇarpon Ḇyedi.
Rofyor myam kakyar skoḇena, ikofen faro snon ḇeapaper anya ḇo Doḇe: "Ne rumkun Yedi, wasma payasyos ro sasar ḇena kwar!"
Ḇape ro moḇ anya snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya ono sisya kako, inja skara fasis ro sisnes na ḇo soḇe:
"Rosai ḇefnai fa snonkaku ine dawos rarirya? Donef Allah. Mansei nari ḇepok fa ḇeḇuk ampun ro sasar, nkofawi monda Allah mankundi.?"
Ḇape Yesus myamkir swaruser ma karkara sena, inja ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkokara ro mkosnemna rarirya, snaro?
Rosai ḇepyan syadi ya, Yakofen ḇe snon ḇeapaper ine ḇo yoḇe: Wasma payasyos ro sasar ḇena kwar roḇa i do: wakḇoke, wakanow yar ḇena ma wambran.
Ḇape insama mkofawi ro supswan ine Rumkun Snonkakuya ipok ipyos sasarna." Ma ikofen kaku faro snon ḇeapaper anya ḇo doḇe:
"Yakofen kaku faro au, wakḇoke, wakanow yar ḇena ḇo wabur ḇe rum bedi!"
Ma snon ḇeapaper anya ikḇoke, ikanow yar ḇyena ma isasyar ro fandu kawasa ansya, isof sikandor kam ma sisandik Allah ḇo soḇe: "Roi ḇera dine, nkomam ono ḇaim!"
Raimnai Yesus rya wer ḇe danosen andir ya, ma kawasa sya kam sra yoḇ i inja fyarkor si.
Posa, rofyor imbran uk ro moḇ anya, myam Lewi Alfius mandaḇendi kyain ro rum ḇeyor som ya, inja ikofen ḇe i ḇo doḇe: "Waso Aya!" Mura Lewi dores ma isoi.
Raimnai rofyor Yesus inanus Lewi rorum ḇyedi, snon ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasar sibor saknan warpu i kuker manfamyan ḇyesi, snar kawasa ḇeso i sya sibor kaku.

Rofyor snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ro ḇar Farisi sya smam Yesus inan fnoḇek snon ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasarsya inja sifuken faro manfamyan ḇyesi ḇo soḇo: "Snaro Yesus danan us ḇeyor som ma kawasa ḇesasarsya?"
Yesus imnaf wos anya ma ikofen yoḇ si ḇo doḇe: "Snonkaku ḇepre syama sefandun dokter ḇa, imboi ḇeduf sya kada. Yarama ine, yaḇe yor snonkaku ḇenapes ḇa, imboi kawasa ḇesasar!"

Ro fafisu oso, rofyor Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesi ma kawasa Farisi sfarfor, snonkaku ono srama ro Yesus ma sifuken ḇo soḇe: "Snaro Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesya ma snon Farisi manfamyan sesya sfarfor ḇoi, manfamyan ḇesya sakfarfor ḇa?"
Yesus Kyarem ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Jadi fa manfakawin ya bati ḇyesya sfarfor rofyor isya kuker si? Rofyor manfakawin anya isya kaker ro fandu si, nari sipok fa sfarfor ḇa.
Ḇape nari fafisu ya isyama manfakawin anya ssun i bur si, ma rofyor anya insape sakfarfor.
Snonkakuyo ḇyuk kruḇen ker ḇebabo yo syokop marwai yo ḇaim, snar rarirya ido nari kruḇen ker ḇebabo ya syawek fanuk marwai ani, imuk naba syadi wer.

Rarirya kako, snonkaku yo nari isar swan ḇebabo yo ro kibon ḇeḇerereyo ḇa, snar rarirya ido, swan ansya nari sisai pef kibon ḇeḇerere ani, ma swan kuker kibon sudawer kame. Inja swan ḇeḇabo ya, ipyum syadi ḇyeḇeser ro kibon ḇebabo kako!"
Ro ras Mananai Yahudi oso Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya simbran uk ro yaf gandum oso, ma ro fyor simbran anya manfamyan ansya spanuk gandum yorem ono.
Inja snon Farisi sya sikofen faro i ḇo soḇe: "Mam kada! Snaro manfamyan ḇesya sifrur roi kopok fa kofrur ḇaḇeri ro ras Mananai Yahudi?"
Yesus Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkowasya roi Daud ifrurna ḇaim ke? Rofyor i ma ḇeso i sya sananjar ma sibiser,
rariya syun ro rum Allah, rofyor Abyatar ḇye imam ḇeba ya, dan mamami farsarser-snonkaku ḇese sakan ḇa derer imainsya kada ma ḇyuk kako faro ḇeso isya."
Ma Yesus ikofen ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Ras Mananai Yahudi ḇyeḇefrur faro snonkaku sya, ḇoi snonkaku sya seḇefrur faro ras Mananai Yahudi yaba,
inja Rumkun Snonkaku Ya kako Ḇye Manseren faro ras Mananai Yahudi ya."
Ḇarpur Yesus syun wer ḇe rum nadi. Ro diya snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar oso daksun.
Snon Farisi ono sisya ssḇair, imbude Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snon anya ro ras Mananai Yahudi yandi, insama rarirya ido ssḇuk sasar ḇe Yesus.
Yesus ikofen faro snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar anya ḇo doḇe: "Rwama wores ro fa-du!"
Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Ne, rosai ssḇuk fa kofrur ro ras Mananai Yahudi yani, ḇaḇe naḇye ya ke, frur fanor i, kofanaḇak kankenem snonkaku ke komun si?" Ḇape ssḇe fasis monda.
Yesus Fyafayaf snar ḇaḇe marares sena ma kuker masasor myam yar si ḇo Ikofen faro snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar anya ḇo doḇe: "Fos ḇramsi!" Ma snon anya fyos ḇrasi ma iprei.
Ro diya snon Farisi nansya si sasyar ma se sne oser kuker snon Herodiani sya fa soḇe ssmun Yesus.
Ḇarpur Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesi sisusu bur ḇe danosen ya, ma kawasa Galilea siḇor sisoi.
Siya sibor kako sra ker Yudea, Yerusalem, Idumea, war Yordan ḇar iwara, Tirus ma Sidon, srama faroi, snar simnaf Yesus fararur ḇyena.
Yesus iwan manfamyan ḇyesya fa ssfasos wai ya faroi snar imkak donek ya sifyosepen indi.
Snar snonkaku ḇeduf ifrur fa ḇeprei sibore, ro diya ḇeḇeroro ro dafduf sibor sra yoḇ i ma sifyos apepeni imfa siḇe sspan roi.
Rofyor rur ḇemaḇak sya smam i, sisapi ma sḇansuba faroi ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma sar naba: "Au ine Rumkun Allah."
Ḇape Yesus ḇyewef si snar imewer kaku ssḇaryas indi.
Imnai ro diya Yesus dek ro urek oso. Dor snon imarisen sya ma srama yoḇi.
Kyinfir snon samfur seser risuru fa sifnoḇek i, insa nya si ḇe manfamyan fa ssḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya,
ma ḇyuk papoik faro si fa ssḇukyau rur ḇemaḇak sya.
Snon samfur seser risuru isiḇer ansya sisosine: Simon, nyir i kako ḇe Petrus,
Yakobus Zebedeus mandaḇendi ma Yohanes Yakobus ḇedardi, snon suine nyir su ḇe Boanerges isoine romawa karadu,
ḇefnoḇek kako sya sisosine Andreas, Pilipus, Bartolomeus, Matius, Tomas, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, Tadeus, Simon snon Selot,
ma Yudas Iskariot, na ḇeḇoḇ Yesus.
Ḇarpur wer Yesus syun ro rum oso. Kawasa sibor kaku ssfanjur wer isof skoḇe skonano jadi ḇa.
Fyor ya Yesus naek ḇyesya simnaf moḇ ine, ssrama ssiḇe ssun i, snar soḇe swar user ḇyena namnis ḇa kwar.
Rofyor ya kako ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ḇera ker Yerusalemsya sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Rodur Ḇeelzeḇul syouri, ma: 'Kuker snopor mananir rur ḇemaḇak iyau rur ḇemaḇak sya.' "
Ro diya Yesus dor si ma fyarkor si kuker wos sarḇer, ḇo doḇe: "Rariso ro kakara mkoḇena ibiris iyau ibirisya?
Ḇaḇesasoser oso fyarmafmef ido na isonem ḇa,
ma sim oso kina byena sun besisya, sim ani ipok isonemba kako.
Rarirya kako rur ḇemaḇak ya, ḇye mbroḇ mankundi isof irarwas ido na ipok fa isonem ḇa, imnis ra fafisu ḇyeja iḇro kwar.
Rarirya snon oso ipok syun fa fyasyar snon ḇesambraḇ oso arasa ḇyena ro rum ḇyedi ḇa rofyor snon ḇesambraḇ ani ḇyeḇefes ḇaim. Rofyor snon ḇesambraḇ ani siyaḇeki kwar in sape arasa ḇyena sfasyarna.
Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko: Sasar ma anonef ḇeḇor romawa snonkaku sya sena kam nari nasma ampun.
Ḇape oso doḇe donef Rur-ḇesren ya ido, ima na isma ampun ḇa fyoro-fyoro, mboi syasar snar ifrur sasar ḇekain fyoro-fyoro."
Yesus ikofen rarirya snar soḇe rur ḇemaḇak ya syouri.
Yesus snari ma naek ḇyesya sra yoḇi. Sores ro ḇandi ḇo siwan ono ḇese fa sor Yesusi.
Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇekain yar-yar Yesus sya sikofen faroi ḇo soḇe: "Ne, mam kada snami ma naek Bansi ḇeyores ro ḇandi siwa, ssewar fa siḇe sisrow Au."
Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mansei Yana ḇe sna ma naek?"
Myam yoḇ kawasa ḇekain yar-yar i ansya raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Sine sna ma naek srar Ayesi rya.
Mansei ḇeḇeuser Allah marisen ḇyena, sirya naek snon ma srar bin ma sna Ayesi rya."
Rofyor oso Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor wer ro danosen andir ya. Ma kawasa donek ḇefnak ḇa siryur yar i, inja dek ro wai ḇepyar na iya fa kyain ro wai anya ḇoi kawasa ansya ssna ro ḇonde ro danosen andir ya.
Ma ḇyuk farkarkor faro si roi nabor kuker sarḇer. Ro farkarkor ḇyena ikofen faro si ḇo Doḇe:
"Ne mkorower! Snon ḇekekef mor oso isasyar fa kyekef mor.
Rofyor daḇuḇer mor ono sisapi ro nyan andir, ma man sya san si ra siḇro.
Mor ono sisapi ro moḇ ḇeḇe karui, ḇeḇe saprop ḇekpor ḇa, inja mor anna nasur fasau snar saprop ya isrepek.
Fama rofyor oridek ma isam nakam nnmaryoi snar ne rares ḇa.
Mor ono wer sisapi ro moḇ ḇeḇe kaḇraiborek, ma kaḇraiborek anna naduḇ epen si isof simar, inja ssḇuk bon ḇa.
Mor ono kada sisapi ro saprop ḇepyum ma sisur pyum kaku ḇo simarem, bon nna ono ne samfur rikior ono ne samfur riwonem ma ono wer ne utin oser."
Ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mansei ḇeḇe kna fa imnaf ido imnaf naḇye!"
Fafisu Yesus derer ro mankundi, ḇeso i sya ma manfamyan snon samfur seser risuru ḇyansya sifuken i ro sarḇer ani.
Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Kankunes Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇyeḇeḇair kwar faro mko, ḇape faro snonkaku ḇese roi ḇeḇor anna neḇefarkor ḇe si kuker sarḇer,
insa: Se mka fa smam ḇape skara na ḇa, se kna fa simnaf ḇape sifawi kankunes ḇyeja ḇa, imbude simbror ḇo sisma ampun di."
Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Inja mkofawi sarḇer ine kankunes ḇyeja ḇake? Rarirya ido nari mkofawi sarḇer ḇese na kankunes nena rariso?
Ḇekekef mor anya kyekef wos ya.
Snonkaku ro nyan andir ro moḇ wos ya ḇyeḇekekef ro nanya, isoine ḇemnaf wos ya, raimnai biris ya ryama pyoser wos insandi simnaf anna bur si.
Rarirya kako mor ḇeḇeḇekekef ro moḇ ḇeḇe karui isoine, snonkaku ḇemnaf ma ḇeryaḇ fasau wos anna fa sna na.
Fama wos anya ḇye rares ḇa inja kyain kawan ḇa. Rofyor kandera ma marindi nkur si snar siso wos refo ya inja sisusu beri.
Ma mor ḇese ḇesapi ro mbron kaḇrai borek, isoine ḇemnaf wos ya,
raimnai makakak faro supswan ma faraurowes nana ma raryaḇ faro roi ḇese nsun ma nposer wos anya isof ḇye bon ḇa.
Ḇarpur kaku mor ḇesapi ro saprop ḇepyum, isoine snonkaku ḇemnaf ma ḇekram wos anya isof wos anya ḇye bon, ono ne bon samfur rikior, ono ne bon samfur riwonem ma ono wer ne bon utin oser."
Ma Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snonkaku spam padamara fa srir i ro bade ya baḇdi ḇa roḇaido kamboi anenef ro ya baḇdi ḇa, ḇoi sriri ro kadadu ḇyedi.
Snar roi oso ipok iyokef ḇa ḇoi na kam nnbair ro sananai ya, ma roi oso ḇye ḇefamyun ḇa snar na kaem nnfababa.
Mansei ḇeḇe kna fa imnaf ido imnaf naḇye!"
Raimnai ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Mkokara roi mkomnaf na! Warnkyara mkoḇukkara naek mkoḇesi nari ssḇuki dakkara au kako ma nari isyadi wer faro au.
Snar mansei ḇesma roi ono ido nari ssḇuk faroi wer, imboi mansei ḇesma roi ono ḇa, rosai wer isma na nari ssun na buri."
Raimnai Yesus doḇe: "Ḇaḇesasoser Allah moḇ ryaya isoine: imnis raris snon beḇuḇer mor ro saprop,
posa roḇ-meser denef ma ikḇok, imboi mor ḇyuḇer ansya sikpireu, sisur ma sikaki, ḇeker anya fyaun warek si ḇa.
Sup ro saprop ya do i so ḇeḇuk bon, randak ya ne yof, ne yorem, ḇarpur ne bon posa nakraf.
Rofyor bon anna nnmas kwar snon ḇeker anya kyaruk na snar fafisu afuf ya imnis kwar."
Yesus ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Kuker rosai koḇuk karkara mura ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ya, oroḇaido kuker wos sarḇer rosai koḇuki ikofen fasnai ya?
Ḇaḇesasoser anya imnis raris sasawi mor ssḇuḇer ro saprop ya ḇo. Sasawi mor ya iso ḇebaḇa syadi mor rokaker ḇese kam ḇero sup ya bori.
Ḇape rofyor ssḇuḇeri isur ma iba syadi rofaran ḇese na kam ma ḇye snau ḇeba, isof man ḇero farsyos sya ssmun narem ro kadaun ḇyena."
Kuker wos sarḇer ḇeḇor ḇera dine Yesus fyarkor wos ya faro si imnis raris fawawi sena,
rarirya Yesus fyarkor kawasa ansya kuker sarḇer monda, ḇape faro manfamyan ḇyesi kada fyasna ḇair kankunes ro sarḇer anna kame.
Ro ras anya mun mandira ya Yesus ikofen ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorama kokaḇor ḇe ḇar iwara."
Skobur kawasa ḇeḇor ansya ḇo skokaḇor ma wai ḇese kako nakso Yesus.
Fyoro ḇa wam doḇer ma bak na nek ro waiya ra fanam imsar.
Fafisu ya Yesus denef ḇo fyak noraya ro waiya urndi. Ma manfamyan ḇyansya ssḇani ḇo sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mankorari yo, au ma ḇefandun ko ḇa ḇo na koro!"
Yesus ikḇok ma myunwarek wam ya ma ikofen faro danosen ya: "Wamnai! Wa-brin!" Ma wam anya imnai beri ḇo danosen anya iḇrin dam.
Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snaro mko mkak mankenem rarirya?"
Simkak kaku ḇo sawos yae ro mankun si: "Inja snon saisoine, isof wam ma danosen ya kako nakso wos ḇyena?"
Ma skofyafer ro danosen ya ḇar iwara ro sup kawasa Gerasa sya sedi.
Yesus dado bur waiya rande beri, snon rur ḇemaḇak sisower oso rya ker kubir na muma fa isrou Yesus.
Snon anya ikenem ro kubir anna snar snonkaku yo syambraḇ fa iyaḇek i ḇa, snar siyaḇek i kwar kuker wanka,
apyaur fama pyauk ma imerdawdiwer na, isof snonkaku yo syambraḇ fa fyadurui ḇa.
Ras roḇ imbran ḇyediwai ro kubir ma urek na ḇo ḇoi fyararar ma ikoḇ mankundi kuker karui.
Yesus ḇyinkwan kaker ḇesya ḇo myam raroi, inja ifrar fa isroui ma ḇyan suba faro Yesus,
ma dar naba ḇo doḇe: "Nyaki rosai ḇekur au ma aya, ne Yesus Manfun Allah ḇekaki syadi? Kuker snonsnon Allah Wafrur susa awer aya!"
Snar rofyor Yesus ikofen kwar faro i ḇo doḇe: "Ne, au rur ḇemaḇak, wasasyar bur snon ine!"
Raimnai ifuken snon ani: "Snombri so?" Kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Snonsnon ayeja isoine syaran-syaran snar inkobore."
Snon rur ḇemaḇak sya ssour anya dor samsom insa Yesus iyaw awer rur ḇemaḇak ansya bur sup ani.
Ro diya randip nai yo simbran ssewar nanan ro urek fuwar oso,
inja rur ḇemaḇak ansya ssor faro Yesus ḇo soḇe: "Wawan inko fa inkosun ro randip siwa!"

Yesus ḇyuk raris fararyor seja ma rur ḇemaḇak ansya sisasyar bur snon anya fa ssun ro randip ansi. Randip nai anya soper ro fofen ya ma simsar kam ro danosen ya ma simar: barbor seja fanam syaran risuru.
Raimnai ḇewaren warek randip ansya sifrar ḇe mnu ḇeḇa ma mnu-mnu mawa fa sḇaryas inja kawasa ansi sisasyar fa sakmam rosai ḇeḇe jadi kwar ya.
Srama faro Yesus ma smam snon rur ḇemaḇak sya ssour anya kyain, syansun i ma iknon dam, ḇape simkak.
Snonkaku ḇemam roi ḇeḇe jadi anna sfarfyar faro ḇerama babo ansya rosai ḇeḇe jadi kuker snon rur ḇemaḇak sya ssower anya ma randip ansi.
Simnaf rarirya sor faro Yesus insa ibur sup sedi.
Rofyor Yesus dek wer ro waiya snon insanja rur ḇemaḇak ssour anya dor faro Yesus insa imarisen ido iso I.

Yesus iso marisen ḇyedi ḇaḇoi ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Wabur ḇe rum bedi ma kawasa ḇero mnu bedi ma ḇaryas faro si roi ḇeḇor Manseren Allah ifrur kwar faro au ma rariso Allah fyasna saswar ḇyedi faro au."
Snon anya ibur ma fyawar ro sup Dekapolis roi ḇeḇor Yesus ifrur kwar faro i ma si kam sikandor.
Yesus skokaḇer ker Gerasa skofyafer ro Kapernaum wer kawasa sibor srama sisrou i. Isya kaker ro danosen andir ya.
Mananir rum nadi oso ryama, snonsnon ḇyedi isoine Yairus. Fyor myam Yesus, ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi,
ma dor faro i ḇo doḇe: "Inai iyeja iduf marḇak ma fyanam imar, rwama kada insa pan ro i fa iprei ma ikenem wer."
Inja Yesus iso snon ani. Kawasa donek ḇefnak ḇa sakso i, ma sifyos epen Yesus.
Ro fandu kawasa ansya bin oso isya iduf dafduf rik taun samfur seser risuru kwar,
rarwan nabor kwar ifrauk dokter sibor fa ssḇuk aryawin ro dafduf ḇyedi isof nana ḇyena naḇro fama iprei ḇa ḇoi dafduf anya iba syadi wer ro randak ya.
Imnaf abar kwar ro naek ḇyesi ro Yesus fararur ḇyena inja ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansya ryama fyanam Yesus kruri ma pyan ro sansun syatu Yesus ḇyena,
snar kyara ḇo doḇe: "Rofyor yapan monda ro sansun ḇyena nari yaprei."
Fafisu ya beri dafduf ḇyeja imnai ma ḇyaḇir baken ḇyeja iprei kwar.
Ro fafisu ya beri Yesus ḇyaḇir samambraḇ ono nasasyar bur i, inja isiḇer fa myam sewar ro fandu kawasa ansya ma ifuken: "Mansei ḇepan ro sansun syatu ayena?"
Manfamyan ḇyesya sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mam kawasa ḇeḇor sine sifyos apepen au ḇesya ḇo: wafuken mansei ḇepan ro aya?"
Ḇape Yesus myam yar-yar fa fyawi manseiso ḇepan ro i nya.
Bin anya imkak snar ifawi rosai ḇeḇe jadi kwar ro i, inja ḇyan suba ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi ma kuker napnapes ikofen ḇadir faro Yesus.
Yesus ikofen faro bin anya ḇo doḇe: "Ne, inai Yedi, kakyar beja ḇyuk aski faro au. Wabur kuker aski ma waprei ro dafduf bedi!"
Rofyor Yesus dawawos kaker, snonkaku ono kina mananir rum nadi anya ḇyansya srama sikofen ḇadir ḇo soḇe: "Inai banya imar kwar inja wafrur susa awer mankorari I."
Ḇape Yesus ḇyefandun wos sena ḇa ḇoi ikofen faro mananir rum Ari anya ḇo doḇe: "Wamkak awer, wakyar monda!"
Raimnai Yesus damrer ono siso indi, ḇoi derer kuker Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes Yakobus ḇedari ḇyedi.
Skorama ro mananir rum nadi anya rum ḇyedi ma Yesus myam kawasa sya sembrus, skanes kuker mkarem ḇeba.
Yesus syun ro rum anya ma ikofen faro kawasa ansya ḇo doḇe: "Snaro mkoḇe mbrus ma mkokanes? Inai ine imar ḇa ḇoi denef!"
Ḇape simbrif i. Ma iyaw kawasa ansya raimnai dun inai anya snari ma kmari ma suiso ḇeso i randum ro sim inai anya ḇyedi.
Ma Yesus kyin inai anya ḇrasi ḇo ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Talita kum," isoine: "Ne inai aune, yakofen faro au, wakḇoke!"
Fyor ya beri inai anya ikḇok fa dores ma imbrane, snar ḇye umur taun samfur seser risuru kwar. Kawasa ḇero diya nansya kam sikandor fafaya ḇa.
Yesus danun pakrek kaku faro si insa oso ifawi awer roi nane ma iwan fa sfan inai ani.
Ḇarpur Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesya ssraḇe mnu marin ḇyedi.

Ro ras Mananai Yahudi, Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum Ari ḇero Nazaret ma kawasa Jemaat ḇeba anya sikandor snar simnaf farkarkor ḇyena, inja sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Moḇ saiso isma roi ḇeradine ro ya? Fawawi sanaiso ssḇuk faroi? Isof ifrur aḇyair ḇefrur kanandor ḇera dine kuker ḇramin ḇye suine?
Ko kam kofawi i ḇe sukan ai, Maria romawa ḇyedi, naek ḇyesi so Yakobus, Yoses, Yudas ma Simon? Ma kofawi kako srar ḇyesya sisya ro fadu ko?" Ro diya snar siwarki i mura siyaw i.
Inja Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Nabi oso se mafi ro moḇ na kam, ḇoi ro mnu ḇyedi ma fandu kawasa ḇyesi ma rum ḇyedi, sefandun mankuni ḇa."
Yesus Imewer ifrur aḇyair kanandor oso ro diya ri, imboi ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf ri ḇeso monda kuker pyan ro si.
(6a) Yesus Kyara si ma ikandor snar kakyar ḇa sena. (6b) Raimnai Yesus Imbran yar mnu ḇe mnu fa ḇyuk farkarkor.
Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansya ma iwan si fa se suru-suru. Ḇyuk samambraḇ faro si fa ssḇuki yau rur ḇemaḇak sya,
ma danun faro si insa ssun awer roino ro marandan sedi, ankyon na manda, mboi ssun awer mamami, ssun awer roi ḇeḇaryam, ssun awer kako pipi ma ḇeḇoḇek sena.
Mkowemna kada mkosower na mboi mkun sansun risuru ḇa.
Yesus dawos pdef faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorafa ro moḇ oso ra simarisen fa mkosun ro rum oso ido mkokain ro dia isof mkosasyar bur wer ro moḇ ani.
Imboi ro moḇ oso simarisen mko ḇa ma simewer srower mko ido ro moḇ anya mkokokef fafen ḇero mkowemna fa ne aḇyair faro si."
Inja sra ma ssḇaḇdas faro kawasa sya fa simbror,
ma siyaw rur ḇemaḇak sibor ma ssrem ḇeduf sibor kuker mani ma ssḇuk pararei faro si.
Wairek Herodes i kako dakmnaf Yesus snar Ḇye snonsnon ma kawasa sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Yohanes Ḇemasi diḇri ro fandu ḇemar sya ḇefnai samambraḇ-samambraḇ na nafararur roi."
Ono soḇe: "Elia i ri!" Ḇese sya wer soḇe: "Nabi sya oso irya ke imnis raris nabi ro ḇepon iwara."
Rofyor Herodes imnaf rarirya ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Roḇa, Yohanes yaperem uk sasukor anya irya, i so ḇeyiḇer wer i."
Snar kaku Herodes i ḇewan fa sfor Yohanes fa se wanka i ḇo ismai ro bui snar dun Herodias ḇedar ḇyeja Filipus swar i, fa fyakawini.
Snar fafisu oso Yohanes fyarkor Herodes ḇo doḇe: "Swasar snar wun ḇedar beja swa ḇyedi!"
Knam ḇeḇedar fa Herodias imsor famyun Yohanes ro sneri ḇo syewar nyan fa iḇe myun i fama jadi ḇa,
snar Herodes ḇyemaf Yohanes i snar ifawi Yohanes snonkaku ḇenapes ma ḇesren inja fyadiren i. Ḇape rofyor imnaf sap Yohanes sneri ḇyefisfyas, rarirya no imarisen imnaf i.
Herodias insape isma fafisu ḇepyum ya rofyor Herodes ifrur munara ya warek ras ḇyeja faro ḇebarara ḇyesi, mambri sya ma snonkaku ḇeḇe snonsnon ro sup Galilea sya.
Ro munara anya Herodias inai dojaru ḇyedi Salome ryarpon ifyer ro ḇebarara ansya ḇarpon sedi. Wairek ikofen faro inai anya ḇo doḇe: "Wor rosai wamarisen ya ro aya imba na yaḇuk na ḇe au!"
Ma ḇye syasi faro inai ḇyanya ḇo doḇe: "Rosai waḇe wor kaker ro aya, nari yaḇuk i faro au, ḇaḇesasoser ayeja ḇar ya iryano yaḇuk i kako!"
Inja inai anya rya ifuken snari ḇo doḇe: "Rosai nari yor ḇesyani?" Snari doḇe: "Wor Yohanes Ḇemasi ḇruri!"
Rarirya fasau kaku inai anya rya faro wairek ma dor ḇo doḇe: "Yamarisen insa ro knikine beri buk Yohanes Ḇemasi ḇruri ro ben oso ḇe aya!"
Fafisu anya wairek sneri ḇye susa namsin ḇa, ḇape snar syasi ḇyedi, ma snar ḇebarara sya fyadwer fararyor anya ḇa.
Wairek iwan fasau snon-mamun ya ḇe bui, kuker sasoser insa rya pyerem uk Yohanes ḇruri. Snon anya rya pyerem uk Yohanes ḇruri ro bui.
Snon anya dun Yohanes ḇruri ro ben ya ma ḇyuk i faro inai ani, ma inai anya dakun i faro snar i.
Rofyor Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesya simnaf marmar ḇyeja srama ssun baken ḇyeja fa serak i ro kubir.
Fyoro ḇa manfamyan Yesus ḇyansya sisiḇer ma siryur kuker Yesus wer ma sfarfyar faro i roi ḇeḇor sifrur ma sfarkor na.
Inja ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorama kosewar moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa insa kemir ma komnaisu ko resari!" Snar snonkaku ḇeramuma ma ḇeramura sibor kaku isof skosma fafisu ḇa kako fa skonan.
Inja skek wai ya ḇo skora ḇe moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa oso.
Ḇape ro fyor skek wai ya kawasa sibor smam sko, ma sifawi moḇ skora yoḇ ya. Inja simbran ro nyan bera ḇande ya ma fasaw monda kawasa ḇera ker mnu ḇeba sibor spon sko raro moḇ skoḇe skora yoḇ ani.
Ro fyor Yesus isabu ro wai ya munde, myam kawasa dandonek ḇefnak ḇa ansya inja iswar si, ḇyuk simnis domba ḇena manfakwak ḇa. Inja fyarkor si ro roi nabor.
Snar fanam roḇ kwar manfamyan ḇyansya sra faro i ma sifuken ḇo soḇe: "Moḇ ine ḇyeursḇa ma fanam roḇ kwar.
Inja wawan si fa sibur insa sskoḇes roḇeyan ḇesi ro mnu-mnu ḇefanam-nam nane."
Ḇape Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkoiso nari ḇeḇuk nanan faro si!" Sikofen faro i ḇo soḇe: "Donek ḇeḇa ḇera dine koḇoḇ dinar utin risuru wer kako fa kofan si nari imnis ḇa kako."
Ḇape ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mamami rifisi mkun ya? Indo mkomam pan!" Rofyor smam kwar sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mamami ririm ma in risuru."
Rarirya Yesus iwan fa kawasa ansya skain fa se uk-ukem ro aḇris sya bonsi.
Ma uk-ukem anna ono ne utin oser ono wer ne samfur ririm.

Ma Yesus dun mamami ririm ma in risuru kwar, iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma isawar dofen roḇean anna posa, pyanasnis na ma ḇyuk na faro manfamyan ḇyansi, insa sirarwas na faro kawasa ansya kam; rarirya kako in risuru ansui.
Kawasa ansya sanan kam isof sarbor.
Raimnai siryur roḇeyan ḇedawer na ma sisma inawen samfur seser risuru nafo, in sya ḇeso.
Kawasa snon ḇeyan mamami ro ras anya sya si kam se syaran ririm.
Posa kwar Yesus iwan fasaw manfamyan Ḇyesya fa sek ro wai ḇo spon i ḇe danosen ya ḇar iwara ḇe Betsaida, ma iwan kawasa ḇeḇor ansya fa sibur.
Rofyor sibur ḇesisye kwar, Yesus dek urek ya fa ḇye nadi.
Roḇ kwar wa anya isya ro danosen ya faduri, ḇoi Yesus demir ro ḇande.
Rofyor ya myam doḇer ya myun manfamyan ḇyansi, simbrar ḇe moḇo ḇa snar wam ya iso ro wai rawer, ma indokada oras kior, imbran ro war ya bori fa rya warek si.
Snar imbran ro war ya bori, soḇeda faknik riri, inja simkak ḇo sar naba kam.
Snar smam kami eḇedari sikandor. Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkoknon! Ayairya, mkomkak awer!"
Rarirya dek ro wai ya fa isrow si ma wam anya iḇrin bos beri. Sisnesna ne fesfyas ma sikmom.
Snar nanan mamami ḇefrur kanandor anya isya ḇye karkara kaker faro si ma siwarki ro sisnesna.
Skofyafer kwar Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skorande skopyar ro Genesaret.
Fafisu ya skado bur wai ya, kawasa ansya smam bir Yesus I.
Inja sifrar sikofen ḇair faro kawasa sya kam ro sup ani, ma sun ḇeduf sesya ro waryar faro Yesus ro moḇ simnaf Yesus isya ryo ya.
Moḇ rya yoḇ na kam ḇe mnu-mnu ma mnuḇeba-mnuḇeba kawasa srir ḇeduf sesya ro nyan andir ma sor samsom faroi, insa imarisen fa span monda ro syatu Ḇyeja pusyom na. Ma kawasa kam ḇepan roi siprei.
Fyor oso snon Farisi ono ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ono ḇera ker Yerusalem srama faro Yesus.
Smam Yesus manfamyan ḇyesya ono sanan kuker ḇramin bemamas, isoine sḇan ssibras na ḇa.
Snar Yahudi Farisi ansya simnis Yahudi ḇesesya, sanan ḇa ro fyor sḇan ssibras na ḇaim, snar se user rari up sesi ro ḇepon.
Ma rofyor skaḇer ker pasar sipok sanan ḇa kako snar simasisren si ḇaim. Rari ḇeḇe waris ḇera dine nabor kaker, ḇeraris ḇan-ḇan sek, fyom, ma rosaser sifrur ro kansai.
Naiso ḇeḇe knam fa Farisi ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi sifuken Yesus ḇo soḇe: "Snaro manfamyan ḇesya sakḇe user kpu koḇesya rari sena ḇa, ḇoi sinan kuker ḇramin ḇemamas?"

Yesus Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Kaku ra moḇ Nabi Yesaya ḇyardi mko ra ya, snonkaku ḇarḇor ḇekenem kuker rari ḇekaku ḇa! Snar fas-fas oso ryok ḇo doḇe: Kawasa sine ssom aya kuker sḇardip monda, ḇape sisnesna nnḇinkwan bur aya.
Fainda oso ḇa sḇe ari faro aya, snar farkarkor sḇukna sasoser snonkaku nairi.
Allah sasoser ḇyena mkoḇe rer na, ḇoi mkuf rari snonkaku."
Yesus ikofen faro si wer ḇo doḇe: "Mkofawi nananem kaku isof mkosaun Allah sasoser Ḇyena insa mkofaduru rari mankun mkoḇena."
Snar Moses dakkofen kako ḇo doḇe: "Be maf kmami ma snami! Imboi: mansei ḇefras kmari roḇa snari kada na imar.
Ḇape mkokofen ḇo mkoḇe: Rofyor oso ikofen faro kmari roḇa snari: rosai yana fa yaḇuki fyaduru mu, yaḇuk na nnfarser isoine samsom faro Allah,
imboi mkorir si ḇaḇeri fa sifrur roi oso faro kma sesi roba sna sesi.
Rariya Allah wos ḇye mkofarkor ya mkoso i ḇa, snar mkoso syadi rari mkoḇena. Ma roi ḇerarirya kaker naiso mkofrur na."
Raimnai Yesus dor kawasa ansya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko kam mkomnaf faro aya, ma mkokram pyum wos Yakofen nane.
Rosai rya wer ḇero ḇondi, ma ḇesun ro snonkaku sya oso, napok nafrur mamas si ḇa, ḇoi roi ḇesasyar ro snonkaku sya naiso ḇefrur mamas na. [
Mansei ḇeḇe knaram fa ḇyukrower iḇye ryower pyum!]"
Ro fyor Yesus syun ro rum oso fa ryir kawasa ḇeḇor ansya, manfamyan ḇyesya srama fa sifuken kankunes ḇero wos sarḇer ani.
Rarirya Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Inja mko kako mkakfawi kankunes ḇyeja ḇa ke? Mkofawi roi ḇeḇor ḇero ḇandi fa ḇesun ro snonkaku sya napok nafrur mamas snonkaku sya ḇa.
Snar roi ḇesun anna nnsun ro kakara sena ḇa ḇoi nnsun ro sasop sena posa sisawen na ro akyek!" Rarirya Yesus fyasna roḇean nakam nasren.
Ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Rosai ḇesasyar ro snonkaku sya na kada nafrur mamas si.
snar roi ḇero sne snonkaku nasasyar ro swaruser ḇarḇor, nafsu kraf, karau, mamun,
farḇakḇuk, rmomen, ḇarḇor, ankarkar, nafsu kraf, masasor anonef, kafkofen, marares, ḇaḇe dip.
Roi ḇeḇyeḇa ḇera dine nek ro sne karkara ma naiso ḇefrur mamas snonkaku sya."
Raimnai Yesus imbran ro dia ma ryaḇe sup Tirus. Rya ro Tirus syun ro rum oso ro mnu ifyafer ro ya kuker kankunes, insa kawasa sya sifawi awer raramuma Ḇyedi.
Imboi bin oso inai ḇyeja rur ḇemaḇak ya isawoḇer i, imnaf Yesus ryama, mura ryama ḇyansuba ro wessu.
Bin anya bin Yunani er Siria-Fenisia. Bin anya dor samsom faro Yesus insa Iyau rur ḇemaḇak ḇesawoḇer inai ḇyedi.
Ma Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Ipyum syadi romawa ḇena roḇean na sya sarbor resari, snar roḇean ḇefasos faro romawa sya kopok kosawen na faro naf sya ḇa."
Ḇape bin anya kyarem faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Kaku ḇaḇoi Manseren, ḇape naf ḇero meja ya baḇdi sya kako sakan roḇean mom romawa sya san ḇo ḇesapi na."
Inja Yesus ikofen faro bin anya ḇo doḇe: "Snar wos ḇena, rwamura beri, inari rur ḇemaḇak anya isasyar kwar bur inai bani."
Bin anya ibur ḇe rum ḇyedi, ma isrow inai ḇyeja ḇyarek ro anenef ḇyedi ḇoi rur ḇemaḇak ya ibur i kwar.
Raimnai Yesus ibur sup Tirus imbran uk Sidon fa ryaḇe danosen Galilea, dun uk sup Dekapolis faduri.
Ro diya kawasa sya ssun snon ḇepro ma ḇewos kir ḇa faro Yesus ma sor faro Yesus insa Isawar dofen snon ani.
Ma rofyor Yesus dun snon anya fa subur kawasa ḇeḇor ansya raimnai isu ḇrampinsi ro snon anya knaram ḇyeja ma daninef ro ḇrasi posa pyan ro ramar ḇyedi.
Raimnai Yesus myam ḇe nanki ma imnai ḇe do ma ikofen faro snon anya ḇo doḇe: "Efata!" isoine: Base!
Rofyor anya beri knasi ḇyas ma ramar ḇyeja kako imarmer ma dawos pyum.
Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇero moḇ ya insa sfarfyar awer faro manseirya wer kako. Ḇape rofyor Yesus myun warek si insape sḇaryas syadi wer.
Sikandor ma sikmom ma sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Ifrur roi ḇeḇor nakam napyum kaku, ḇepro sya srower, awer sya ḇyuk fa sawos wer."
Rofyor anya kawasa sya sibor kaku sisya ro moḇ ani, ma snar sisma nanan ḇa inja Yesus dor manfamyan ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe:
"Sneri iswar kuf kawasa ḇeḇor ansine. Ras rikior siso farma aya ḇape sisma nanan ḇa.
Ma rofyor Yawan fa sibur ḇe rum sena kuker basbiser ido nari ono sisapi snar ono sra ker moḇ ḇeḇinkwan."
Manfamyan ḇyesya skarem faro i ḇo soḇe: "Rariso ro moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa ine nari kofan si kuker mamami isof sarbor kam?"
Yesus ifuken faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkosma mamami rifis?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Mamami rifik."
Raimnai iwan kawasa ansya fa skain kame. Posa dun mamami rifik anna ma ḇye nadi kuker na ra posa pyanasnis na ḇo ḇyuk na faro manfamyan ḇyesya fa ssḇuk ḇerwas kawasa ansi.
Sisma kako in ono ma ssḇuk si faro Yesus fa ḇye nadi kuker si ra posa sirarwas si faro kawasa ansi.
Ma san kam isof sarbor. Posa siryur mamami ḇedawer na sisma inoken rifik nafo.
Kawasa ansya kam fanam syaran rifiak. Insape Yesus iwan si fa sibur.
Yesus dek fasau ro wai kuker manfamyan ḇyansya fa skoraḇe sup Dalmanuta.
Fafisu ya Farisi ono sra faro Yesus fa sifuken sye i. Mnuk ḇeḇe knam fakfuken sye ine faro Yesus, simarisen sor ro Yesus aḇyair oso ro nanki.
Inja ro fafisu anya fiafayaf ro sneri ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Snaro syos ine mkor aḇyair? Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko, faro syos ine jadi fa mkosma aḇyairo ḇa."
Posa Ibur si; dek ḇe wai anya wer ma sskobur ḇe danosen ya ḇar iwara.
Ro fafisu anya Yesus manfamyan ḇyesya se pro ssun mamami faro nanan sena. Smam rosaser seja mamami oser baken monda ro wai ya.
Yesus ḇyuk swarapepen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkowaren ma mkepen mko roi yar roi ḇefrurpis kawasa Farisi ma roi ḇefrurpis Herodes."
Inja skara ma sikofen yae faro si ḇo soḇe: "Dawos rarirya snar koḇe pro kokoḇes mamami faro ko."
Rofyor Yesus ifawi rosai ḇeḇe knam sawos yae ro mankun si, ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snaro mkawos yae mko ro mnuk mamami ḇa? Inja mkofawi ḇaim kaker ke? Mkosnemna napakrek kaker?
Mkoḇe mkamor ḇape mkomam ḇa, mkoḇe knaram fama mko mnaf ḇa kaker?
Mkoswar epen fafisu yapanasnis mamami ririm faro snonkaku syaran ririm ya ḇake, mkoryur ḇedawer na inawen riḇeso skofo?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Inawen samfur seser risuru."
"Ma rofyor mamami rifik faro snonkaku syaran rifiak, ḇedawer na mkoryur inawen rifis?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Inawen rifik."
Ma Yesus Ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Inja mkofawi ḇaim kaker?"
Ḇarpur Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skorama ro Betsaida. Ro Betsaida kawasasya ssun snon ḇepraf oso faro Yesus ma sor faro Yesus insa pyan ro i.
Yesus ikfin snon ḇepraf anya ḇo duni ḇe mnuya ḇondi. Surandi kwar Yesus daninef ro snon anya mkasi posa ryir ḇrasi ro snon anya ḇo ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Inja mam roino kwar ke?"
Snon anya myam ḇe ḇarpon ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Yamam snonkaku sya simbran farma, ḇape sisnai imnis aiknam bembran farma."
Yesus ryir ḇrasi wer ro snon anya mkasi ma myam bos beri ma iprei isof myam ḇaḇir roi ḇeḇor na kam.
Raimnai Yesus iwan i fa ibur ḇe rum ḇyedi ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Swun ḇe mnu ya awer!"
Raimnai Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skora wer ḇe mnu ḇefanam sup Kaisarea Filipi. Ro marandan anya Yesus ifuken manfamyan Ḇyesya ḇo doḇe: "Kawasa sya soḇe manseiso aya ine?"
Skarem faroi ḇo soḇe: "Ono soḇe Yohanes Ḇemasi, ono wer soḇe: Elia, ono wer kako soḇe: oso ro fandu nabi-nabisya."
Yesus ifuken wer faro si ḇo doḇe: "Imboi mko ido rosai mkakkofen ro aya?" Inja Petrus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Au ido Wairek!"
Raimnai Yesus myun warek si insa sikofen ḇair awer faro mansei rya wer.
Raimnai Yesus fyarkor randak faro si, nari Rumkun Snonkaku ya isma marindi nabor ro ḇebarara sya ma mananir Imam ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya simeweri ma smuni, ḇape nari diḇri ro ras ḇeḇe kiorya.
Marindi nari ḇekur i na ikofen bos na. Inja Petrus ismer Yesus ḇe ḇondi ma imsor I.
Raimnai Yesus iknenef fa myam yoḇ manfamyan Ḇyesya ma Imsor Petrus i ḇo doḇe: "Ne, Biris wabur aya, kwara roi Allah Kyara na ḇa ḇoi kwara karkara snonkaku."
Raimnai Yesus dor kawasa ḇeḇor ansya ma manfamyan Ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snonkaku mansei ḇemarisen ḇeso aya iḇye kada ḇye pro mankundi ḇo ḇyar aprop ḇyedi ma duser aya.
Snar mansei ḇeyoḇe ḇefaspar kankenem ḇyedi nari kankenem ḇyedi ryo buri; ḇoi mansei kankenem ḇyeja ryo bur i snar aya ma snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya, nari isma kankenem ḇyedi.
Fainda rosai snonkaku oso nya ḇesiper supswan ḇoi, kankenem ḇyeja ryo buri?
Ma nari rosai isma fa ḇyuk farwe kankenem ḇyedi?

Snar mansei ḇemai aya ma wos ayena ro fandu syos babo ḇesapurnak ma ḇesasar mko ine, Rumkun Snonkaku ya kako nari dakmai snas rofyor ifyafer kuker payamyum Kmari ḇyena ma malaikat ḇesren sya siyakeri muma ya."
Ikofen wer faro si ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko, ro fandu snonkaku ḇeryur sine ono nari simar ḇa isof sakmam Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇerama kuker papok kwar."
