Ras riwonem nawas ido Yesus dun Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes sko ḇo skek bon ḇekaki oso. Ro moḇ anya skerer monda. Rofyor anya Yesus Fyadwer mankundi ro ḇarpon mamam skoḇena,
ma syatu Ḇyena napioper bos ma nasnaper. Bepapap sansun ro supswan ine oso fa nari pyap saranden rarirya ḇa.
Skomam wer Elia ma Moses suyawawos kuker Yesus.
Petrus ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Raḇi, marisen ḇefnak ḇa koro moḇ ine. Iḇye kada nkofrur aḇdares rikior, oso ḇe au, oso ḇe Elia ma oso ḇe Moses."
Ikofen rarirya, snar ikmom rosaiso iḇe ikofenya, snar skomkak mankenem.
Fyor anya mandep oso ryama isawoḇ sko ma mkarem oso ryok ro mandep anya ḇo doḇe: "Ine ma Manfun saswar ayedirya, mkomnaf I."
Fyoro ḇa skomam snonkaku ono sisya sifnoḇek sko ḇa ḇoi Yesus derer.
Rofyor skado bur bon ani, Yesus ḇyeasas insa skofar awer faro snonkaku oso ro roi ḇeḇor skomam anna isof Rumkun Snonkaku diḇri ro kubir ro fandu ḇemar sya resari.
Skoswarepen asas ani ma skofuken yae sko ro rosai Yesus ikofen ḇe "aḇiḇer ro fandu ḇemar sya."
Inja skofuken Yesus ḇo skoḇe: "Snaro snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi sikofen ḇo soḇe, nari Nabi Elia pyonma resari?"
Yesus Kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Imboi Elia nari pyonma fa ḇye user roi ḇeḇor na kam resari. Imboi rariso kuker rakrok fasfas ḇekur Rumkun Snonkaku ḇeyoḇe: Nari Yesus isma marindi nabor ma sonefi?
Ḇape Yakofen ḇe mko: kaku Elia pyon ma kwar, ḇoi snonkaku sya sifrur marisen sena faro i raris moḇ nabisya ssfas kwar fa ḇekuri."
Ro fafisu Yesus, Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes skokaḇer faro manfamyan ḇese ansi, skomam kawasasya sibor siyaryar manfamyan ansya ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ono sisya sfamfaḇri roi oso kuker si.
Fyor kawasa ansya smam Yesus, sikandor ma srama sisrow I.
Ma Yesus ifuken si ḇo doḇe: "Rosai mkawos faro si?"
Snon oso ro fandu kawasa ansya ikofen faroi ḇo doḇe: "Mankor ari ye, yun romawa yedine faro au, snar rur ḇemaḇak ya isawoḇeri.
Ma rofyor rur anya isawoḇeri ipyas i ro saprop ya bori ma sbari kyaḇaḇus, darek fafais nasi ma ipadadorem. Yor kwar faro manfamyan Besya, fa siyau rur anya fama sipok ḇa."
Ma Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesya ḇo doḇe: "Ne syos ḇekyar ḇa mko ine, fafisu rosai nari yarous kaker mko? Fafisu rosai kaker yakbab mko? Mkun romawa anya muma!"
Ma ssun romawa anya faro Yesus. Rofyor rur ḇemaḇak anya myam Yesus, isasas romawani, ipyas i ro saprop ya bori ma isuwayafer ḇo ḇyai kaḇaḇus.
Raimnai Yesus Ifuken faro romawa anya kmari ḇo doḇe: "Inja iduf fyoro kwar ke?" Romawani kmari kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Ro fyor ibaḇa ya.
Indo rur ḇemaḇak ya ismeri fa ikuni ro for, isaweni ro war fa iḇe myuni. Inja au ma Wapok fa Wafrur roi ḇeḇorna kam, yor fa wafnoḇeki ma Waswar inko."
Yesus Kyarem faro i ḇo doḇe: "Inja woḇe: na wapok ido? Faro snonkaku ḇekyar sya roi ḇeḇor na kam nari ndarirya."
Romawa ani kmari dar naba ḇo doḇe: "Yakyare. Wafnoḇek snonkaku ḇekyar ḇa aya ine!"

Rofyor Yesus myam kawasa sya sibor siryur yoḇ sko, iyau rur ḇemaḇak ani: "Ne, au rur ḇemaḇak ḇefrur fa snonkaku sya seawer ma siproi, Yayau au wasasyar bur romawa ine, wapok wawer wer fa swun ro i ḇa!"
Ma rur ḇemaḇak anya isasyar ma dar naba ḇo kyakiker romawa ani namsin ḇaḇeri. Romawa ani isnai imnis ḇemar, inja kawasa sya sibor soḇe: "Imar kwar."
Ḇape Yesus kyin romawa anya ḇrasi ma ikḇok ro mankundi.
Rofyor Yesus syun ro rum oso, ma derer kuker manfamyan Ḇyesi, sifuken i ḇo soḇe: "Rosai ḇeḇe wari nkopok nkoyau rur ḇemaḇak anya ḇa ya?"
Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rur ḇeḇesneya koyaui kuker nyan ḇese ḇa, ḇoi kuker nadi monda."
Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya simbran ro dia ma ssunuk Galilea ma imewer oso ifawi marandan skoḇedine;
snar imarisen fyarkor manfamyan Ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rumkun Snonkaku nari sḇoḇi faro snonkaku sya fa smun i ma ro ras rikior nawas nari diḇri."
Sikmom roi Yesus ikofen ya, fama simkak sifuken faroi.
Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skorama wer ro Kapernaum. Ro fyor syun kwar ro rum oso, ifuken faro manfamyan Ḇyesya: "Rosaiso insandi mkofamfabri ro nyan ya?"
Ḇape sefasis snar insandi ro marandan seja sfamfabri mansei ḇeba syadi ro si.
Inja Yesus kyain ma dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko no doḇe fyabri fa iso ḇepon ya, iḇye syadi iso ḇepur kaku ya fa duf farmyan ḇese sya kam."
Raimnai Yesus dun romawa kasun oso fa dores fandu si, posa fyorepen romawa anya ma ikofen ḇo doḇe:
"Mansei ḇefaduru romawa ḇera dine snar snonsnon ayedi, i kada dakfaduru aya. Ma mansei ḇefaduru aya ido, ayaiso fyaduru ya ḇa ḇoi bewan ayanya iso fyaduru ya."
Yohanes ikofen faro Yesus I ḇo doḇe: "Mankorari ye, nkomam snon oso ḇeyakso ko ḇa ḇape iyaw rur ḇemaḇak kuker snonsnon ḇedi, inja nkomun warek i snar dakso ko ḇa."
Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkomun warek awer i! Snar snonkaku oso ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor kuker snonsnon ayedi, ipok donef aya ro fafisu ya ḇa.
Mansei ḇesampum ko ḇa ikada ifnoḇek ko.
Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko, mansei ḇeḇuk war aninem sek oser faro mko snar mkuser faku Kristus i nari isma ḇaḇyak."
"Mansei ḇefarkor ninyan oso ro fandu romawa kasun ḇekyar aya sine, ipyum syadi sfes karui ḇeba ro sasuri ḇo simsaweri ro soren.
Ma ḇramin ḇe suiya oso daw ninyan au ido kwaruki, snar iḇye wer swun ro kankenem ya kuker ḇaramuk, imbude sisawen au rofor ḇembrer ḇa kuker ḇramin ḇesiper. [
Ro moḇ anya karom sya simar ḇa ma for anya ipok imbrer ḇa.]
Ma rofyor wemin besu suyau ninyan au kwaruk su, snar iḇye wer swun ro kankenem ya kuker wemuk, ipyum syadi ro sisawen au rofor ḇembrer ḇa kuker wemin besu; [
rofor anya karom sya sinanem ḇa ma for anya ipok imbrer ḇa.]
Ma rofyor mkamsu suyau ninyan au, wer oso, snar iḇye swun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah kuker mka oser ipyum syadi sisawen au ro for ḇembrer ḇa kuker mkamsu.
Ro moḇ anya karom sya simar ḇa ma for anya ipok imbrer ḇa.
Snar snonkaku oser-oser nari sḇuḇrei kuker karumasen for.
Fainda ro karumasen ipyum kaku ḇape rofyor ḇyuar, kuker rosai mkofruri fa miasen wer? Iḇye syadi mkomasmasen ma mkokenem kuker aski fandu min mkoḇesi."
Ro dia Yesus skora ḇe sup Yudea ma war Yordan ḇar iwara ma ro dia kako kawasa sibor srama spanjuḇer I, ma raris fararur Ḇyedi Yesus fyarkor si wer.
Snon Farisi ono sra faro Yesus fa sifrowes bir i ḇo soḇe: "Jadi fa snon oso fyaspar bur swari ke?"
Inja Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rariso kuker Moses sasoser ḇyena faro mko?"
Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Moses ḇyuk kwar fa ḇyeḇefaspar kuker syap ḇepampum."
Inja Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Imboi snar sne ḇepakrek mkoḇena ḇeḇewar Moses fyas sasoser ḇera dine.
Snar ro awar supswan Allah ifrur snonkaku snon ma bin,
inja snon oso nari ibur kmari ma snari su ma ḇye oser kuker swari,
isof suḇe kraf oser. Rarirya suḇe baken risuru wer ḇa ḇoi suḇe oser.
Inja rosai Allah fyesepen kwar, snonkaku sya sipok sfaspar awer."
Ro fafisu skorandum ro rum oso manfamyan ḇyensya sifuken Yesus ro yar ine.
Ma Yesus ikofen ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Mansei ḇefaspar swar i, raimnai dun bin ḇese, irya ifrur far-ḇaḇuk faro swa ḇepon byedi.
Rarirya kako bin oso fyaspar swari ma fyakawin snon ḇese, i kako ifrur farḇuk."
Ma kawasa sya ssun romawa kapira ono faro Yesus insa ḇye barakas si, ḇape manfamyan ḇyesya sisonek kawasa ansi.
Rofyor Yesus myam rarirya, imsor ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorir romawa ansya fa sra yoḇ aya, imboi mkomunwarek awer si, snar snonkaku ḇera dine sya siso ḇenai Ḇaḇesasoser Allah.
Yakofen kaku ḇe mko: Mansei ro mko imarisen daknai Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇape dakmnis romawa kapira ḇa na daksun ro i ḇa."
Raimnai fyoraḇen romawa kasun ansya ma pyan rosi ḇo ḇye barakas si.
Rofyor Yesus imbran pdef ro marandan ḇyedi, snon oso ifrar yoḇi ma ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ifukeni ḇo doḇe: "Mankorari ḇeḇye, na rosai yafrur fa yaksma kankenem ḇemnai ḇa ya?"
Yesus kyarem faroi ḇo doḇe: "Snaro wor ayaḇe ḇeḇye? Oso ro fandu snonkaku iḇye syadi Allah ḇa, Allah demir.

Wafawi Allah sasoser ḇeḇor ḇyena kwar: Nari mamun awer, nari wafrur farḇakḇuk awer, nari kwarau awer, nari be saksi ankarkar awer, nari wayaḇyoḇer snonkaku nana sena awer, ma ḇe maf kmami ma snami su!"
Ma snon anya ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Mankorari yo, roi wakofen nane kam yaḇe user na rofyor yaba ḇa ya."

Ḇape Yesus myam yoḇi ma sneri iswari mura ikofen faroi ḇo doḇe: "Imboi roi oser wer iso ḇemnis ḇaim ro au; wabur mura, boḇ kayan ḇena, bukna faro kawasa ḇesaḇarar sya, snar nari wasma kayan ro nanki, raimnai rwama waso aya."
Imnaf wos anna fyafayaf ḇo ibur kuker sne ḇefafardun snar kayan ḇyena nabor kaku.
Raimnai Yesus myam manfamyan ḇye ḇeyores yar i ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Syamswen kaku faro snon ḇenana sya saksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
Manfamyan ḇyesya sikmom rofyor simnaf wos ḇyena. Ma Yesus Ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Romawa yena mko, kosun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ya syamswen fafaya ḇa.
Onta oso syun ro wairus mkir ya ipyan ro snon benana oso daksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
Sikmom syadadi wer ma sawos yae ro mankun si ḇo soḇe: "Rarirya ido nari mansei ḇesma koreri ya?"
Yesus myam yoḇ si ḇo doḇe: "Faro snonkaku roi ḇera dine ndarirya ḇa, ḇape rarirya ḇa faro Allah. Snar roi nane ndarirya faro Allah."
Ḇarpur wer Petrus ikofen faro Yesus i ḇo doḇe: "Nkoine nkobur pres nana nkoḇena snar nkoso Au!"
Yesus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen kaku faro au, snonkaku oser-oser ḇebur rum ḇyedi, naek srar, sna roḇa ido kma, kina ḇyena roḇa ido yaf ḇyena snar aya ma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya,
snonkaku anya ro fafisu ine kako nari isma sadwer syadi ḇe utin, rum, naek srar, sna, kina ma yaf marindi ḇemun fnoḇek na, ma ro ras ḇarpur iyama isma kenem ḇemnai ḇa ya.
Imboi kawasa ḇeḇor ḇepon ansya nari spur ḇoi ḇepur ansya nari sakpon wer."

Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya sisya ro marandan ḇera ḇe Yerusalem ma Yesus pyon si. Manfamyan ansya se fesfyas ma kawasa ḇeso skonsya simkak. Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru Ḇyansya ma Ikofen fababa rosai nari ḇekur i ḇo doḇe:
"Insape kora ḇe Yerusalem ma Rumkun Snonkaku nari ssḇuki faro mananir imam-imam ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma nari se ukum i fa imar. Ma nari ssḇuki faro er-er ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya,
ma nari iser anonef, aninef, ayos ma smun, ḇape ro ras ḇeḇekior ya nari diḇri ro kubir."
Sebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesu Yakobus ma Yohanes susnefer Yesus ma sukofen faro i ḇo suyoḇe: "Mankorari yo, nukyar insama Kwarem fararyor nuḇedine!"
Yesus ifuken ḇo doḇe: "Rosaiso muyoḇe Yafrur faro mu?"
Inja sukofen ḇo suyoḇe: "Wamarisen kada nari ras kokain ro payamyum Bedi numindi nyaro ḇar raku Bedi ma numindi wer nyaro ḇar rasar Bedi."
Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro su ḇo doḇe: "Mufawi ro muyor ya ḇa. Jadi fa muyakinem ro sek aninem Yaḇe Yinem ma muyakmasi masasi Yaḇe Yamasi ya ke?"
Sukarem ḇo suyoḇe: "Numarisen." Yesus ikofen faro su ḇo doḇe: "Imboi na muyakinem ro sek aninem Yaḇe Yinem ya ma nari muyakmasi masasi Yaḇe Yamasi ya.
Ḇoi mnuk kankain ro ḇar raku ma ḇar rasar yeja, mankun daya Yapok fa Yaḇuk i ḇa. Mnuk anya nari ḇyeḇe ḇuk faro snonkaku mansei Allah fyasos kwar sya."
Manfamyan samfur ḇese ansya simnaf rarirya simsor Yakobus ma Yohanes su.

Ḇape Yesus dor si ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkofawi, mansei sap ḇe ḇeḇe prenta er-er ḇeḇor sya, siso ḇeḇe prenta kawasa sesya kuker ḇramin mankarmomen, ma ḇebarara sesya prenta sena nambran kuker pakakrek faro kawasa sesi.
Mkoma rarirya ḇa. Mansei ḇemarisen ḇeba ro fandu mko ido i kada nari ḇye manfyan ḇe mko,
mansei ḇemarisen ḇeba syadi kaku ro fandu mko ido i kada ḇye manfyan ḇe mko kam.
Snar Rumkun Snonkaku kako ryama insa suf farmyan i ḇa, ḇoi insa duf farmyan ma ḇyuk nyawa ḇyedi fa ḇyak namuk snonkaku ḇeḇor sya kam."

Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesya srama ro Yeriko. Ma ro fafisu Yesus isasyar kuker manfamyan ḇyesya ro Yeriko, fnoḇek kawasa ḇeḇor kaku, snon ḇesaḇarar ma ḇepraf isoine Timeus mandaḇen ḇye ḇenir ḇe Bartimeus kyain ro nyan andir ya.
Rofyor imnaf Yesus snon Nazaret anya irya, dor naba ḇo doḇe: "Yesus Daud mandaḇen ḇyedi au, waswar aya!"
Kawasa sibor se wef i insa ḇye fasis, ḇape dor naba syadi wer ḇo doḇe: "Daud mandaḇen ḇyedi au waswar aya!"
Ma Yesus imnai ḇo ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkori ma!" Sor snon ḇepraf anya ma sikofen faroi ḇo soḇe: "Wepen snembri, ma wayor au, snar Yesus dor au."
Inja doḇes syatu ḇyeja ma iyori beri fa rya isrow Yesus.
Yesus Ifuken i ḇo doḇe: "Rosai wamarisen fa insa yafrur faro au?" Snon ḇepraf anya kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Rabuni, yor fa insa yakmam e!"
Inja Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Rwa mura, kakyar beja ḇyuk aski faro au!" Ro fafisu ya kako myam beri, ma iso Yesus ro marandan Ḇyedi.
Rofyor Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skofanam kwar ḇe mnu ḇeba Yerusalem, fanam mnu Betfage ma Betania ḇekain ro Urek Zaitun, Yesus Iwan manfamyan risuru rosi.
Kuker ananun ḇo doḇe: "Mura ḇe mnu ḇero ḇarpon muḇedi. Rofyor musun ro dia, nari musrow keledai babo oso isya sfesepen i, snonkaku sek i ro ras o ḇaim. Muperi ḇo muyuni muma.
Ma rofyor ono sifuken faro mu ḇo soḇe: snaro mufrur rarirya, mukofen faro si ḇo muyoḇe: Manseren ḇye fanduni. Nari Kyaḇer fasaui muma wer."
Inja sura mura beri, ma susrow keledai babo oso sfesepen i ro kedwai ḇero barpon ya ḇandi ro nyan andirya inja superi beri.
Ma snonkaku ono sifuken su ḇo soḇe: "Ne, muper keledai ya faro?"
Inja sukarem raris moḇ Yesus ikofen faro su rai. Inja snonkaku ansya smam monda su.
Ma suyun keledai anya faro Yesus ma sḇor dokor ya kuker sansun sena, raimnai Yesus dek roi.
Kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sḇor sansun sena ro nyanya, ma ono wer skek ai ram ssun ro yaf na.
Snonkaku ḇembran ro ḇarpon ma ḇeyuser ro ḇarpursya ssibras ḇo soḇe: "Hosana! Yesus ḇerama ro snonsnon Manseren, isma barakas,
Ḇaḇesasoser beramayan isma barakas, Ḇaḇesasoser kma koḇedi Daud, Hosana ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi!"
Sra kwar ro mnu ḇeba Yerusalem Yesus syun ro Rum Allah. Ro dia myam user na kam, ḇape snar fanam roḇ kwar Yesus kuker manfamyan samfur seser risuru Ḇyesya sisayar ḇe Betania.
Meserdi Yesus ma manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansya sskobur mnu Betania kwar, Yesus ibiser.
Skobinkwan kaker ḇo myam ara knam oso ḇye ram kwar. Inja imbran yoḇ i fa Myam pan ḇye bon ri. Ḇape rofyor isya ro fuar ya kwar myam fama ḇye bon ḇa ḇoi ḇye ram monda, snar mamarem ḇyedi sya ḇa.
Inja ifras ara knam anya ḇo doḇe: "Na isof fyoro-fyoro snonkaku oso dan bon ḇena wer ḇa!" Ma manfamyan Ḇyesya sakmnaf fras ani.

Raimnai Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skorama ro mnu ḇeba Yerusalem. Rofyor Yesus syun kwar ro Rum Allah, iḇyaḇer snonkaku ḇefarḇaḇyan sya bur buḇes Rum Allah. Meja ssḇuk sadadwer pipi ma banku ḇeḇaḇoḇ manjawa sya sena pyambar na,
ma ḇyuk ḇa beri fa snonkaku ḇeyun papus simbranuk ro buḇes Rum Allah.
Raimnai fyarkor si ḇo doḇe: "Mkofawi fas-fas ḇerok ḇo ḇeyoḇe: Rum ayedi na snir i ḇe rum Ari faro ersya kam? Ḇape mkoine mkofruri ḇe nas faro kawasa ḇeḇarḇor!"
Mananir imam-imamsya ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya simnaf roi ḇeḇe jadi ani, mura ssewar nyan fa siḇe smun i, snar smam kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sikandor farkarkor Ḇyena.
Fanam roḇ mura Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skosasyar bur mnu beba ani.
Ro arwo babo ya rofyor Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skombranuk wer ro moḇ ara knam ani, ssmam ara knam anya myas ro ḇidwom isof ro rares ḇyena.
Ro diya Petrus iswar epen roi ḇeḇe jadi kwar anya, inja ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Rabi ye, wakmam kada, ara knam wafras anya myas kwar."
Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkokyar faro Allah!
Yakofen faro mko: Oso ḇye kaku fa ikofen faro bon ine: Wakḇaken ma rwop randa wamsawer ro soren! Oso ḇe ḇirḇar ḇa ḇoi wakyar nako ido nari roi wakofen na nejadi rarirya.
Inja Yakofen ḇe mko: Rosairya wer mkor ma mkonadi wark na, mkokyar imnis raris mkosma na kwar, ma nari Allah Ḇyuk na faro mko.
Ma rofyor mkofasos fa mkoḇe nadi mkoswarepen insa mkoḇuk ampon faro snonkaku mkomsor sya ro mkosnemna resari, insa Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa dakḇuk ampon faro mko ro sasar mkoḇena. [
Mboi mkoḇuk ampon ḇa ido, Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa dakḇuk ampon ḇa kako ro sasar mkoḇena.]"

Raimnai Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesya sra wer ma ro mnu ḇeba Yerusalem. Rofyor Yesus imbran ro Rum Allah ya buḇes ya, mananir imam-imamsya ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma snon ḇebarara sya, srama sifuken Yesus ḇo soḇe:
"Kuker snopor rosai bukfrur roi ḇeḇor nane? Ma mansei ḇeḇuk snopor anya faro au, isof wafrur roi ḇeḇor nane?"
Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Na Yaḇuk fakfuken oser faro mko. Mkokarem ḇeponi ḇe aya insape na Yakofen ḇadir snopor saiso yakfrur roi nane kam ya faro mko.
Masisren Yohanes ryamuma ro boiyaswa ke snonkaku? Indo mkokarem ḇe aya pan!"
Sawos yae ro mankun si ḇo soḇe: "Na kokofen ḇo koḇe masi sren Yohanes ryama ker boiyaswa, na ikofen ḇo doḇe: rarirya ido snaro mkokyari ḇa?
Ḇape rariso na kokofen ḇo koḇe: Ryama ro snonkaku!" Snar simkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar snonkaku sya kam siwasen ḇo soḇe Yohanes nabi rirya kaku inja simkaki.
Mura skarem faro Yesus ḇo soḇe: "Nkofawi ḇa." Inja Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rarirya ido aya kako nari Yakkofen ḇair snopor saiso Yakfrur roi ḇeḇor nane faro mko ḇa."

Raimnai Yesus dawawos faro si kuker wos sarḇer ḇo doḇe: "Snon oso dom yaf anggur ya, posa dar warek i. Raimnai ḇyai ner ssḇuk kafos anggur ya, ma ifrur kako kaderen moḇ ssḇukwaren warek yaf ya. Neḇe fasos kam kwar ido ḇye asas yaf anya faro snonkaku ḇesma sasuref fa ḇewaren warek ma ḇefararur ḇoi ryaḇe sup ḇese.
Ma ro fafisu mamarem ya, iwan manfamyan ḇyesya oso faro ḇewaren ma ḇefararur ro yaf ani, insa dun rarwas ḇyeja ro si.
Ḇape sfor manfamyan anya ma siprer i, posa siyaw i fa ibur beidi.
Ḇarpur wer iwan manfamyan ḇyesya oso ḇese wer faro si. Manfamyan anya siprer kir ḇruri ma sonefi.
Ḇape iwan manfamyan ḇyesya oso ḇese wer, ma manfamyan anya smuni. Ma iwan snonkaku sibor syadi mura wer, ḇape siprer ono ma smun ono.
Snonkaku oser isya kaker, isoine Rumkun iswar kuf ya. Papupes ya iwani faro si, snar kyara ḇo doḇe: Romawa ayedine nari se maf i.
Ḇape snonkaku ḇewaren yaf ya ansya sikofen yae ḇe si ḇo soḇe: i ḇeḇe warisi, mkorama komuni, insa kona waris ḇyedi.
Rarirya sfori, ma smuni, ma sisaweni ro yaf ya ḇandi ri.
Inja nari rosai ḇena yafya ifrur faro si? Nari ryama myun snonkaku ḇewaren warek ma ḇye asas yaf anya faro kawasa ḇese.
Mkowasya mnuk ine ḇaim ke? Karui sukan ḇeḇawes rum sisawen ya iso ḇeḇe jadi karui dopir ro rum ya:
Roi ḇera dine ne jadi ro ḇar Manseren ya Ḇyedi, fararur ḇefrur kanandor faro snonkaku ko."
Rarirya esewar nyan fa sfor Yesus, snar sifawi, si Yesus Syarḇer yar sya. Ḇape simkak faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansya, inja sibur ḇesisyei.
Ḇarpur wer siwan snon Farisi ma Herodian ono faro Yesus kuker fakfuken wos peper oso.

Snonkaku ansi sra faro Yesus ma sifuken ḇo soḇe: "Mankor ari ye, nkofawi au snonkaku ḇenapes, ma wamkak mansei ḇa kaker, snar swewar snonsnon ḇa, ḇoi farkor napnapes Allah nyan Ḇyena. Jadi fa sḇak som faro kaisar ke roḇa? Inja nkakḇak ke roḇa?"
Ḇape Yesus ifawi ḇarḇor sena inja ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rosai ḇefnai fa mkoḇe mkofrowes ḇir aya? Mkun pipi dinar oso ma Yakmam!"
Inja ssḇuk pipi dinar ya faroi. Mura ifuken si ḇo doḇe: "Fanir ma fas-fas manseiso ine?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Fanir ma fas-fas kaisar."
Ro dia Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rarirya mkoḇak faro kaisar rosai mkoḇuk faro kaisar ma faro Allah rosai mkoḇuk faro Allah!" Fyor simnaf kankarem Ḇyedine sikandor fafaya ḇa.
Saduki ono sra faro Yesus fa sifuken i ro yar aḇiḇerya, snar sima sikyar aḇiḇerya ḇa. Sifuken Yesus I ḇo soḇe:
"Mankor ari ye, Moses fyas prenta ine faro inko: Rofyor snon oso imar bur swari ma suna romawaba, inja naek ḇyedi fyakawin i insa nya rumawa oso fa syadweri.
Mambekanaek rifik. Ḇeponya fyakawin bin oso ma ssuna romawa ḇa ḇo imar bur i.
Ḇeḇe suru ya dakfakawin bin anya wer, ssuna romawa ḇa ḇoi dakmar. Rarirya kako kuker snon ḇeḇe kiorya.
Rarirya kuker snon rifik ansya sfakawin kam bin ani, ḇape nya romawa oso fa syadwer skomindi ḇa. Ḇarpur bin anya dakmar kako.
Ro ras aḇiḇerya, mansei ro fandu mambekanaek ansya ḇeḇe swa faro bin ani? Snar skoḇuk kam bin anya kwar."
Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko ma mkoḇor bos beri, snar mkofawi wos ḇero refo ya ma papoik Allah ya ḇa.
Snar rofyor snonkaku sya siḇer si ro fandu ḇemar sya, nari sfakawin wer ḇa, imboi sikenem imnis malaikat ro boiyaswa.
Ma kako ro aḇiḇer ḇemar sya, mkowasya surat Moses ḇa ke, ḇekur farfyar aikus, rariso moḇ Allah dawos faro i ḇo doḇe: Aya ine Allah Abraham, Allah Isak ma Allah Yakup?
Manseren Allah ima ḇye Allah faro snonkaku ḇemar sya ḇa, ḇoi Allah faro snonkaku ḇekenem. Mkoḇor bos beri!"
Ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi oso, ḇeyakmnaf snon Saduki ḇefuken sye Yesus ma ḇefawi kako Yesus kyarem mnis kaku faro si, inja rya faro Yesus ma ifuken ḇo doḇe: "Sasoser saiso ḇeba syadadi ya?"
Yesus Kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Sasoser ḇeba syadadi isoine: Ne, kawasa Israel mkomnaf Allah mkoḇedi, i Manseren Mankundi.
Waswar Manseren Allah ḇedi kuker sne ḇesiper ma rur bedi ḇesiper ma karkara ḇena ḇesiper ma samambraḇ bena kam.
Ma sasoser ḇeḇe suru isoine: waswar snonkaku min besi imnis waswar mankundau. Sasoser ḇese oso iba syadi ro sasoser suine ḇa."
Raimnai snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi anya ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Imnis kaku ḇeri, Mankor ari, wos Bedi kyaku, Manseren Mankundi derer baken, oso ḇese ḇa ḇo derer Manseren Allah.

Kaku ḇeri koswar Manseren kuker sne ḇesiper ma kuker fawawi ḇesiper ma kuker samambraḇ ḇesiper ma koswar snonkaku min koḇesi imnis koswar mankun ko, iba syadadi farsarser ḇekun faro Allah ma farsarser aiwan bekaruk."
Yesus myam fawawi ḇero kankarem byana, inja ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Au kada binkwan bur Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇa!" Ma oso ḇye kir fa ifakfuken roi ḇese faro Yesus ḇa.
Ro fafisu oso rofyor Yesus Ḇyuk farkarkor ro Rum Allah, ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Rosai ḇeḇedari snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sikofen ḇo soḇe: Daud rumkun ḇyediso Wairek?
Daud mankundi ikofen kuker sḇayo rur ḇesren: Manseren ikofen kwar faro Manseren yedi: Kwainkada ro ḇar raku Yedi, isof Yaḇe fa mbroḇ besya kam sḇar wemsu.
Daud mankundi dap Yesus ḇe Manseren, snaro dap ḇe rumkun ḇyedi wer?" Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansya simarisen simnaf Yesus.
Ro farkarkor Yesus Ḇyena ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkoḇe sasor mko ḇur snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi, ḇemarisen ḇembran kuker syatu ḇekwan ma ḇemarisen ḇesma samsom ro pasar,
ma ḇemarisen ḇekain ro ḇarpon kaku ro rum ari, ma moḇ ḇepyum ro munara na,
ma ḇeyoren kabom sya rum sena, ma ḇemun warek mamam snonkaku kuker nadi ḇekwan sena. Si ma nari sisma samamyai ḇemarḇak syadi."
Ro ras oso Yesus kyain fanam burua farsarser ma myamepen kawasasya rariso ro rarir pipi sena ro burua ani. Ma myam snon kayan ono ssḇuk pipi sya sibor kaku.
Myam kako bin kabom ḇesaḇarar oso ryama dakrir remis risuru, isoine sen oser.
Inja Yesus dor manfamyan Ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen faro mko, bin kabom ḇesaḇarar ine ḇyuk sibor syadi ro kawasa ḇerir pipi ro burua farsarser ine.
Snar si kam ssḇuk ro kayan sena, ḇape kabom ine ma ḇyuk ro ḇaḇe saḇarar ḇyedi, nana ma an ḇyena kam."
Fyor Yesus isasyar bur Rum Allah, manfamyan Ḇyesya oso ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Mankor ari ye, wakmam kada karui nane nadoser bos beri ma rum anna napduk fafaya ḇa!"
Inja Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Wakmam rum-rum ḇepduk nane? Na karui nane oso ḇyeḇe mam monda fa isyos ro oso bori ḇa, na kam nari skakok na."
Ro fafisu Yesus kyain ro urek Zaitun bori ḇo myam ḇe Rum Allah, Petrus, Yakobus, Yohanes ma Andreas skofuken fasis faro i ḇo skoḇe:
"Wakofen ḇair fafisu saiso roi ḇeḇor nane nari ne jadi ya faro inko, ma aḇyair saiso nari ḇefasna nakam ndama ro ras fawar ya."
Inja Yesus dawos faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkepen mko insa snonkaku ono sfarkor ninyan awer mko!
Snar nari snonkaku sibor srama kuker snori ma soḇe: Aya ine Yesus, ma nari sfarkor ninyan snonkaku sibor.
Ma ro fyor mkorower ruran mbroḇ roḇa abar ro mbroḇ, mkokoḇer awer. Nakam nari ndarirya, ḇape ras fawar isya ḇaim.
Snar nari er nefamfaḇri kuker er ma ḇaḇesasoser na nefamfaḇri kuker ḇaḇesasoser. Nari rim ḇeba na nmun ro moḇ-moḇ ono ma nari basbiser ya myun. Nakam nfasna randak marindi kam ḇeyun ḇe awar babo.
Ḇape mko ine mkepen pyum mko! Snar nari ssḇuk mko faro fananjur agama ma nari siprer mko ro rum ari, ma ssun mko ḇe ḇarpon besma papok wairek sya snar aya, insa ne saksi faro si.
Ḇape Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya kada nari ḇyeḇe ḇaryas faro er sya kam.
Ma ro fyor ssun mko ma sḇoḇ mko, mkokarsosen awer rosai nari mkokofen na ḇape mkokofen rosai Rur-ḇesren ya ikofen faro mko ro fafisu anya kako, snar mkoi ḇeyawawos ya ḇa, ḇoi Rur-ḇesren ya.
Naek oso nari ḇyoḇ naekri fa smuni ma rarirya kako kma oso kuker romawa ḇyedi, ma romawa sya nari srakrok kuker sinan sesi ma nari smun si.
Nari snonkaku sya kam sfafardun mko snar snonsnon ayedi. Ḇape mansei befarmku nako isof ro ras fawar ya i kada nari isma koreri."
"Rofyor mkomam fafardun ḇeyun raro ya dores ro moḇ napnapes ya iḇye kada ḇeḇe wasya mkoya mkokara naḇye --rarirya kawasa ro Yudea iḇye syadi sifrar sibur ḇe bon na.
Snonkaku ḇeyun wam ro rum ya bori iḇye isabu awer fa dun roi oso ro rum ḇyedi.
Mansei ḇero yaf ya na kyaḇer fa dun sansun ḇyena ḇa.
Susa marindi faro bin ḇemoḇes ḇa roḇaido ḇesasus sya ro fafisu ya.
Inja mkoḇe nadi insa susa marindi nakam na nanyanem awer rofyor pnunek ya myun.
Snar ro fafisu anya nari susa marindi myun, roi ḇera dine nmun ro ras no ḇaim ro randak Allah ifrur supswan ine isof babo ine ma nari ḇye jadi wer ḇa.
Ma Manseren Ḇyuk fa fafisu ya iknampu ḇa kada, nari roi ḇekenem nakam oso isma aski ḇa; ḇape snar snonkaku kyinfir kwarsya Manseren Ḇyuk fafisu ḇeknampu.
Ro fafisu anya oso ikofen faro mko ḇo doḇe: Mam kada Wairek isya ro dine, roba ido: Mam kada Wairek isya ro diwa, mkokyar awer.
Snar Wairek ḇekaku ḇa ma nabi ḇekaku ḇa sya nari sikḇawes ma sifrur aḇyair ḇefrur kanandor kuker karkara ya isoine imba kada se ḇirḇar snonkaku Allah Kyinfir sya.
Mkepen mko! Snar Yakofen ḇadir ḇepon roi nane kam faro mko kwar."
"Ḇape rofyor anya ḇarpur ro susa marindi, ori nari pyampan ma paiki isnai ḇa
ma mak sya kam nari skapaf bur nanki ma kuasa nanki na nari namarmer.
Ro fafisu anya nari kawasasya smam Rumkun Snonkaku ryama ro mandep kuker kuasa ḇeḇor kam ma payamyum Ḇyedi.
Ma ro fafisu anya kako nari iwan malaikat Ḇyesya fa sisasyar ma nari siryur snonkaku kankinfir Ḇyesi ro ḇar wambarek wamurem-wambraw ma wambrur ro dunya pember isof nanki pember.
Mkun farkarkor ro sarḇer ara knam. Rofyor snau-snau na nakpirew ma nkakyei randak mkofawi fafisu ryas ya fyanam kwar.
Rarirya kako rofyor mkomam roi ḇeḇor nane ne jadi mkofawi bos beri fafisu ḇyedi fyanam kaku kwar ro kedwa ya ḇarpondi.
Yakofen faro mko: Syos ine nari isyof ḇaim ḇoi nari roi nane kam ne jadi kaku ḇeri.
Nanki ma supya nari nasyof ḇape wos ayeja nari kyon fyoro.
Ḇape ras anya roḇa ido fafisu anya snonkaku yo ifawi ḇa, malaikat ḇero boiyaswa sya sifawi ḇa ma Rumkun ya kako roḇa, Sinan Kma ya derer monda."
"Mkosasor mko ma mkwaren! Snar mkofawi fafisu ya ryama nya ḇa.
Moḇ ine imnis bos kaku snon ḇewadwa, ḇebur rum ḇyedi ma ḇeḇe asas manfamyan ḇyesya oser-oser kuker fararur ḇyeja ma ḇeyanun faro ḇewaren kedwaya insa iwaren.
Rarirya mkowadwaren snar mkofawi fafisu rosai ḇena rum ya kyaberya ḇa, ifyafer ro mandira babo ke roḇa ido romfauru ke, roḇa ido ḇyarḇir meser muryas ke roḇa ido arwo babo,
inja rofyor ryama kanandor mko isrou awer mkoisya mkenef.
Rosai yakofen faro mko, yakofen na faro kawasa kam: Insa mkowaren!"

Ras ḇeḇa munara Paskah ma ras ḇeḇa Mamami ḇeḇe roi ḇefrurpis ḇa, ras risuru kaker insape sifrur su. Mananir imam-imamsya ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sesewar insa sfor ma smun Yesus kuker nyan ankar,
snar sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Ro fafisu munara awer, insa kawasa sya sifrur mbrus awer."

Ro fafisu Yesus isya ro Betania, ro rum Simon ḇeḇe pado ḇyedi ma sisya skain sanan, bin oso ryama faro Yesus dun paranai oso ḇese mani spum bekakur kaku. Ikob kar paranai anya kwar, isbawer mani anya ma ḇyukrem Yesus ḇruri.
Snonkaku ono simsor ma sikofen yae faro si ḇo soḇe: "Snar mani spum ine ḇyeḇe fnak fromo monda?
Snar mani ine sḇoḇi kada maeja ḇyedi dinar utin rikior isyadi ma pipi ansya koḇuk si faro kawasa ḇesaḇarar sya." Raimnai simsor bin ani.
Ḇape Yesus ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkomam mondai. Snaro mkosnuki? Ifrur fararur ḇepyum oso faro aya kwar.
Snar snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sisya faswef kuker mko ma mkofnoḇek si rofyor mkomarisen, ḇape aya ma nari Yabesya faswef kuker mko ḇa.
Ifrur roi jadi fa ifrur kwar. Baken ayeja ryemi kwar imnis fasasos faro kardir ayedi.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri moḇ rosai Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya ssḇaḇdas i ro supswan ḇesiper, rosai ifrur ine nari sakapi kako fa ssḇukswarepen i."
Raimnai Yudas Iskariot oso ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi rya faro mananir imam-imamsya kuker kakara fa ḇyoḇ Yesus faro si.
Simarisen namsin baḇeri rofyor simnafi inja se asas ḇei nai ssḇuk pipi faro i. Ḇarpur Yudas syawar fafisu ḇepyum oso fa ḇyoḇ Yesus.
Ro ras randak ras ḇeba munara Mamami ḇepisen ḇa fafisu skaruk domba Paskah, Yesus manfamyan Ḇyesya sikofen faro i ḇo soḇe: "Moḇ sai Wawarisen nkora nkofasos meja sren Paskah ḇe au?"
Inja iwan manfamyan risuru ma danun faro su ḇo doḇe: "Mura ḇe mnu ḇeba iwa, ro diwa nari musrou snon ḇeyun war ro fyom Muso i.
Ma mukofen faro ḇena rum syun ro ya ḇo muyoḇe: Mankor ari danun: sim rosai fasos kwar faro aya insa Yan Paskah fnoḇek kuker manfamyan ayesi?
Ma snon anya nari fyasnai sim ḇeba oso ḇe mu ro ḇo ḇefasos kwar. Mufasos meja sren Paskah ḇe ko ro dia!"
Inja manfamyan ansuya sura ro mnu ḇeba ani, susrou rosai Yesus ikofen faro su anna. Ro diya sufasos Paskah ani.
Roḇ kwar ido Yesus ryama kuker manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansi.
Ro fafisu skokon skonan Yesus ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri ro fandu mko nari oso ḇyoḇ aya, isoine ḇeyanan kuker aya."
Inja se susa ma oser-oser ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Aya rya ke roḇa, sye Manseren?"
Yesus ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Snon anya isoine oso ro fandu mko samfur seser risuru ine, iso besowen mamami ro ben oser kuker aya.
Rumkun Snonkaku nari rya imnis kuker fas-fas ḇekur i, ḇape susa ḇefnak ḇa faro snonkaku ḇeḇoḇ Rumkun Snonkaku ani. Ipyum syadi snon anya ḇyeḇeyaḇen awer kada."
Ro fafisu Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skonan, Yesus dun mamami, ḇye barakas na raimnai pyanasnis na ma ḇyuk na faro si ḇo ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkun ma mkan, ine baken ayedirya."
Raimnai dun sek aninem ya, ma ikofen kasumasa raimnai Ḇyuki faro si, ma si kam sinem ro sek aninem ani.
Ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Ine rik ayedi, rik ḇeḇe asas esbawer faro kawasa kam.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari yinem wer ro anggur bon ḇa isof ro ras yinem wer ya, isoine ro anggur babo, ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
Raimnai skodisen dow sanandik ra posa, skora ḇe urek Zaitun.
Ma Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko kam nari mkoḇe ḇirḇar ro kakyar mkoḇena. Snar fas-fas oso isya ro refo: Nari yaprer manfarandous ya ma domba sya skakek.
Ḇape nari yiber aya kwar ido, nari Yapon mko ḇe Galilea."
Petrus ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Naek ansine ma nari se ḇirḇar ro rakyar sena ḇoi aya ma oroḇa."
Inja Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen faro au, kaku ḇeri ro roḇ ine beri nari mankoko sya sor ḇe suru baim, famyun epen aya ḇe kior kwar."
Ḇape Petrus fyaḇri syadi we ḇo doḇe: "Ne, nari yamar warpu au, yapok yafamyun au ḇa." Bese sya kako sakkofen rarirya.
Raimnai Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skora ro moḇ ḇenir ḇe Getsemani. Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesya ḇo doḇe: "Mkokon ro dine, insa Yara Yaḇe nadi."
Ma dun Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes fa skoso i. Fafisu anya Yesus imkak ra ryadadai,
inja ikofen faro sko ḇo doḇe: "Sneri iswar fafaya ḇa, Yaḇaḇir imnis ra Yaḇe yamar. Mkokon ro dine ḇo mkowaren."
Imbran ḇe barpon knik ḇyan suba ro saprop ya bori ma Ḇye nadi insa jadi kada fafisu eḇesyanya isyonde bur i.
Ikofen b_o doḇe: "Sye Kamamo roi nakam naisya ro kwasa ḇedi, wun sek aninem ine bur Aya, ḇape jadi awer imnis marisen Ayedi imboi raris marisen ḇedi."
Raimnai kyaḇer ma, isrou manfamyan rikior ansko ya skenef. Ma Ikofen faro Petrus i ḇo doḇe: "Ne Simon, wenef ke? Jadifa mkowaren oras oser ḇa ke?
Mkowaren ma mkoḇe nadi, insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowes; rur iso user ḇape kraf ya ma ipok ḇa."
Raimnai rya wer ma inadi nadi insandi anya wer.
Ma rofyor kyaḇer wer isrou skenef wer snar skomkasna napok ḇa ma skofawi rosai skoḇe skokarem faro Yesus.
Ḇarpur kyaḇer ḇe ḇeḇekiorya ma ikofen faro sko ḇo doḇe: "Mkenef mura fa mkomnai su mko. Imnis kwar. Fafisuya ryama kwar, mkomam kada, sḇoḇ Rumkun Snonkaku ya faro snonkaku ḇesasar.
Mkokḇok e, mkorama kora. Ḇeḇoḇ aya nya fyanam kwar."

Ro fafisu Yesus dawos kaker, Yudas ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru Yesus ḇyansya, ryama kuker rak ḇeyun sumber ma karbere ḇesma wawan ro mananir imam-imamsya, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya, ma snon ḇebarara.
Snon ḇeḇoḇ Yesus ḇyuk aḇyair faro si kwar, isoine: "Snon nari yasyum ya, irya, mkofori ma mkuni kuker ḇaḇye."
Ma rofyor ryama kwar ro dia, pyon fa isrou Yesus ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Rabi", raimnai isyumi.
Ro dia siserepen Yesus ma sfori.
Snon oso ro fandu sko ro moḇ anya, pyas sumber ḇyeja ma pyerem Imam Ḇeba ya manfamyan ḇyeja knasi fa imuk.
Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkoḇe snon mamun ri aya ke, inja mkorama kuker sumber ma karbere fa mkofor aya?
Rasras na kam aya sya ro fandu mko ma Yaḇuk farkarkor ro rum Ari, ḇesya ḇo mkofor Aya ḇa. Ḇape rarirya kwar insa namnis fas-fas ḇero refo ya."
Ro dia manfamyan ansya sifrar siburi kam.
Ro fafisu ya snon kbor oso isya syabusuni kuker kruḇen ḇepioperya iso Yesus. Siḇe sfor i,
ḇape pyupes kruḇen anya ma ifrar ibur ḇaḇer.
Ḇarpur wer ssun Yesus I ḇe ḇarpon Imam Ḇeba sya. Ma mananir imam-imamsya, snon ḇebarara sya ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sfanjur kam.
Ma Petrus dakso Yesus ro ḇarpur kaku, isof dakrandum ro buḇes Imam Ḇeba ya ma kyon fandu ḇewaren sya ḇo dakdapen forya.
Mananir imam-imamsya, isyadi wer Kankain Kakara Agama ansya sesewar saksi ro sasar Yesus, insa nari smuni fa imar, ḇape sisma sasar oso ro i ḇa.
Snonkaku sya sibor sikofen saksi ankar ro Yesus, ḇape ḇaḇesaksi ro Yesus wos sena namnis ḇa snar nun ḇesisye.
Inja snonkaku ri ḇeso sek saksi fa se karak Yesus, kuker saksi ankar ḇera dine:
"Nkomnaf snon ine ikofen kwar ḇo doḇe: Nari Yakakok Rum Ḇesren snonkaku sya sifrur ine ma nari yaḇausi ro ras rikior wer, ḇyeḇe frur ro ḇramin snonkaku ḇa."
Ro yar ine kako ḇeḇesaksi sya wos sena namnis ḇa kaker.
Inja Imam Ḇeba ya dores ro fandu kankain anya ma ifuken Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Jadi fa kwarem roi oso ro saksi ḇeḇe karak Au sine ḇa ke?"
Ḇape ḇye fasis monda ma kyarem woso ḇa. Imam Ḇeba ya ifuken wer ḇo doḇe: "Wairek i so au ke, Rumkun Allah ḇesma sanandikya?"
Yesus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Ayai rya ḇaḇoi, ma nari mkomam Rumkun Snonkaku kyain ro ḇar raku Allah ḇepoik syadi ma ḇerama ker mandep ro nanki."
Mura Imam Ḇeḇa ani pyansawsawek mar ḇyena ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Fainda rosai kosewar saksi kaker ya?
Mkorower donef Allah kwar. Inja mkokara rariso?" Rarirya sawos namuk kuker mkarem oser, insa se ukumi fa Imar.
Randak ro dia beri ḇo snon ono saninefi, span warek mkasi skuki ma sikofen faroi ḇo soḇe: "Ne nabi, indo wakofen ḇaii pan!" Ma snon ḇewaren warek sya sakḇaseri kako.
Ro fafisu anya Petrus isya ro sop ro buḇes. Ma Imam Ḇeḇa infyan ḇyesya ia ryama,
ma rofyor infyan anya myam Petrus dakdapen for ya myam bos i, ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Au kako ḇeso sawawek Yesus, snon Nazaret ani."
Ḇape fyamyunepen ḇo doḇe: "Aya ine yafawi ḇa, ma yaḇor fnom roi wakofeni." Raimnai ryaḇe rum ya ḇarpondi [ma mankoko sya sor].
Rofyor infyan anya myam Petrus wer ikofen faro snonkaku ḇero diansya ḇo doḇe: "Snon ine oso ro fandu si."
Ḇape Petrus fyamyun epen wer. Fyoro ḇa wer kawasa ḇero diansya sikofen faro Petrus ḇo soḇe: "Kaku ḇeri au ine snon oso ro fandu si, snar snon Galilea ri sau!"
Fyor anya Petrus ifras ma fyores ḇo doḇe: "Yafawi snon mkokofen ine ḇa kaku!"
Ma rofyor ya mankoko sya sor ḇe suru. Insape Petrus iswar epen ro Yesus Ikofen kwar faroi ḇo doḇe: "Mankoko sya sor ḇe suru ḇaim, fyamyunepen aya ḇe kior kwar." Mura Petrus kyanes.
Arwo prim kaku mananir imam-imamsya fnoḇek sinan ḇeḇarara ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya ma Kankain Karkara Agama sya sna wos oser kam kwar. Se wanka Yesus raimnai ssuni ma ssḇuki faro Pilatus.
Pilatus ifuken Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Au ido wairek kawasa Yahudi ke?" Yesus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Imnis wos bedi."
Ma mananir imam-imamsya se karak Yesus kuker roi nabor.
Pilatus ifuken wer faroi ḇo doḇe: "Kwarem ḇa? Wamnaf kada karak sena nabor kaku nkur au!"
Ḇape Yesus kyarem ḇa beri isof Pilatus ikandor.
Ro ras ḇeba na indo ssfaspar snonkaku ḇesmai sya oser raris fararyor kawasasya.
Ro fafisu anya snon oso snori Barabas ismai fnoḇek min ḇye ḇemamun ma ḇefrur mbrus.
Inja kawasa ḇeḇor ansya srama ma sor, insa sfaspar ḇesma oso imnis ḇepon kwar.
Pilatus kyarem ḇe si ma ifuken ḇo doḇe: "Mkomarisen fa yafaspar wairek kawasa Yahudi ine ke?"
Ifawi kwar mananir imam-imamsya sḇoḇ Yesus snar simsori.
Ḇape mananir imam-imamsya sfarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sor fa Barabas ḇyeḇe faspar faro si.
Pilatus kyarem wer ma ifuken faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rarirya ido rosai mkomarisen yafrur faro snon mkor ḇe wairek Yahudi ine?"
Inja siyiw naba wer ḇo soḇe: "Ḇyeḇe pai ro aprop!"
Raimnai Pilatus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Ḇape sasar rosai ifrur kwar?" Ḇape ssibras naba syadi ḇo soḇe: "Ḇyeḇe pai ro aprop!"
Snar Pilatus iḇe ifrur sneprei kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sisnes na, inja fyaspar Barabas faro si. Ḇape Yesus sipreri, ma Pilatus ḇyuki fa spai i ro aprop.
Ḇarpur wer snonmamun sya ssun Yesus ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes, ma sor snonmamun ḇese sya kam fa sfanjur.
Ssansun i kuker syatu ḇefuk ma siyanem wower ḇeḇe borek ma srir i ro ḇruri.
Raimnai insape ssḇansuba faroi ḇo soḇe: "Jow suba, wairek kawasa Yahudi!"
Siprer ḇruri kuker doker fyor, ma saninefi ḇo sḇan suba ma ssomi.
(20a) Sonefi raimnai sper ssansun syatu ḇefuk anya buri ma ssansuni wer kuker sansun Ḇyena. (20b) Ḇarpur kaku ssun Yesus randi spai i ro aprop ya.
Fafisu ya snon oso snori Simon, snon Kirene Alexander ma Rufus suyor ḇe kma ḇebur ker yaf imbran uk, ma sidif snon anya fa ḇyar Yesus aporop Ḇyedi.
Ssun Yesus ḇe moḇ ḇenir ḇe Golgota, isoine: Moḇ ḇukor ḇei.
Raimnai ssḇuk anggur sfaunai kuker roi ḇefrurpis mamami faroi, ḇape imewer si.
Posa spai i ro aprop ma sirarwas sansun Ḇyena kuker sisawen onde fa sifawi oser-oser rarwas ḇyedi.
Ras anya oras siw arwo spai i ro aprop.
Ma sfas ḇair knam eḇedar se ukum i ro aprop ya pum ya isoine: "Wairek kawasa Yahudi."
Spai snonmamun risuru fnoḇek Yesus, oser ro ḇar raku Ḇyedi ma oser ro ḇar rasar Ḇyedi. [
Rarirya isrou bos rakrok refo isoine: "Nari skori ro fandu snonkaku ḇarḇor."]
Snonkaku ḇeyunuk ro diwa sya sonefi ma skakiker siḇrusna ma sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Ye, au ḇeyoḇe ḇekakok rum ḇesren ma nari Bawesi wer ro ras rikior,
faspar mankundau bur aprop ya ma Wasabu!"
Rarirya kako mananir imam-imamsya fnoḇek ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sonefi ro mankun si ḇo sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Fyaspar snonkaku ḇese sya, ḇape ipok fa Fyaspar mankundi ḇa!
Wairek, Wairek Israel iya iḇye kada isabu bur aprop insa nkomam ma nkokyar e." Ma snon risuru spai ro aprop fnoḇeki ansu ya suyakkofen kako.
Ro oras samfur seser suru orkok, pampan ya ikawef sup ya mnuk ani, isof oras kior.
Ma ro oras kior ya Yesus dor naba ḇo doḇe: "Eloi, Eloi lama sabakhtani?" isoine: Allah Yedi, Allah Yedi, snaro wabur Aya?
Simnaf rarirya snon diḇeso ḇeyores ro moḇ anya sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mkomam kada, dor Elia."
Ma snon oso dun bunek ya ma syoweni ro anggur ḇemnir posa kyuki ro doker baken ya ma ḇye fa Yesus dinem ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Indo kowaf ma komampan Elia ryama isabu i."
Raimnai Yesus dor kuker mkarem ḇeba ma ryir nyawa Ḇyedi.
Ro fafisu ya eruk kruḇen ro rum ḇesren ya imsap ra ḇye suru ro ḇo isof ro sop.
Fyor mananir snonmamun ḇeyores ro Yesus ḇarpondi myam marmar Yesus Ḇyeja riarirya, ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Kaku ḇeri snon ine Rumkun Allah!"
Bin ono sisya sakmam ro swaf ḇeḇinkwan, ro fandu si Maria Magdalena, Maria snonkbor Yakobus i ma Yoses sna suḇedi, kuker Salome.
Si kam siso farma Yesus ma suf farmyani rofyor isya ro Galilea. Ma ro dia bin ḇerama kwar ro Yerusalem ḇembran so Yesus sibor kaku.
Ro fafisu anya fanam roḇ, ma ras anya ras fasasos isoine ras ḇeyuser mufa ro ras Mananai ya.
Eḇedari Yusuf, snon Arimatea, snon ḇebarara ro Kankain Karkara Agama, ḇewaf kako Ḇaḇesasoser Allah, imku fa rya dor Yesus baken Ḇyeja ro Pilatus.
Pilatus ikandor rofyor imnaf Yesus imar kwar. Inja dor mananir snonmamun ma ifuken faroi, kaku Yesus imar kwar ke?
Rofyor imnaf wos mananir snonmamunya ḇyena kwar, insape ḇyuk fa Yusuf dun Yesus baken Ḇyedi.

Inja Yusuf kyoḇes kruḇen bepioper ya raimnai, isabu Yesus baken Ḇyeja bur aprop ya, ma ryuren I kuker kruḇen ḇepioper ani. Posa bye kubiri ro ureren byai ro urek karui oso raimnai ikris karui oso fa isisen kubir ya kedwa i.
Maria Magdalena ma Maria Yoses snari, sumamepen moḇ se kubir Yesus ro ya.
Ras Mananai Yahudi isyonde kwar, Maria Magdalena ma Maria Yakobus snari, kuker Salome skokoḇes kefi-kefi insa skora ḇe kubir fa skoḇuk isfu Yesus.
Ma arwo babo kaku ro ras Ari ani ori dek kwar ido skora ḇe kubir.
Skokofen yae faro sko ḇo skoḇe: "Mansei nari ḇekris karui ḇeba anya bur kubir ya?"
Ḇape fyor skofanam ido skomam karui ḇeba ani ikris kwar.
Inja skosun randum ro kubir ya dori ma skomam snonkbor oso syansun syatu ḇepioper ḇo kyain ro ḇar raku. Skokandor fafaya ḇaḇeri,
ḇape snonkbor anya ikofen faro sko ḇo doḇe: "Mkomkak awer! Mkosewar Yesus snon Nazaret, spai ro aprop anya. Diḇri kwar. Isya ro dine ḇa. Mkomam e! Mob srir i fa Ḇyarek ro ya isoine.
Inja mkora mkokofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesya ma faro Petrus: Pyon mko ḇe Galilea; ro diwa nari mkomami, imnis ikofen faro mko kwar."
Raimnai skosasyar ma skofrar bur kubir, snar radadai ma kanandor ya isawob sko. Skokofen roi oso ḇa faro mansei rya kaker, snar skomkak.
Rofyor Yesus diḇri ro arwo babo ras Ari anya, fyasna mankundi bepon faro Maria Magdalena. Bin ine Yesus iyaw rur ḇemaḇak rifik buri kwar.
Raimnai bin anya rya, ma ikofen ḇair faro ḇeso sawawek Yesus ansi snar ro fafisu anya sisya ro mandak ma skanes.
Ḇape rofyor simnaf Yesus ikenem ma fyasnai i kwar faro bin ine sikyar ḇa.
Raimnai Yesus fyasnai mankundi wer kuker sananai ḇese faro skomin risuru ro marandan besasyar bur mnu ḇeba ya.
Inja sukaḇer wer fa sukofen ḇair faro min ḇese suḇesi ḇape sikyar su ḇa kako.
Ḇarpur ya fyasna mankundi faro snon samfur seser oser ansya ro fafisu sanan, ma Ikofen ḇaḇe kakyar ḇa ma sne ḇepakrek sena faro si, snar sikyar faro snonkaku ḇemam i kwar ro ḇarpur aḇiḇer Ḇyeja ḇa.
Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkora ḇe supswan ḇesiper, mkoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya faro roi ḇekenem sya kam.
Mansei ḇekyar ma ḇesma masi sren nari isma koreri, ḇape mansei ḇekyar ḇa nari ismai ukum.
Aḇyair nane nari nafnoḇek snonkaku ḇekyar sya: nari siyau rur ḇemaḇak sya kuker Snori, ma nari sawos ro wos-wos ḇeḇaḇo faro si,
ma nari suf ikak ma sinem roi ḇeyinem mamur ḇeyun ḇe marmar ya, ḇape nari simar ḇa; nari sirir ssibras na ro ḇeduf sya ma nari siprei."
Fyor Yesus dawos rarirya yoḇ si raimnai, diryor ḇe boiyaswa ma Kyain ro Allah ḇar raku Ḇyedi.
Si kako sra sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro moḇ na kam, ma Manseren ifararur fnoḇek si ma syoser wos ya kuker aḇyair ḇefnoḇek si.
Teofilus ḇesmai syowi, Snonkaku sibor sḇesewar kwar fa sfasasuser ḇaryas oso ro roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar ro fanduko.
Imnis raris sḇaryas kwar maroko, ro randakya ro snonkaku ḇemam kuker mkamor ma ḇeyuffarmyan Wosya.
Eḇedari, yakukeḇ naḇye kaku roi ḇeḇesya anna kam kwar ro randak kakuya, rarirya yun karkara namuk fa yafrurna ḇesyap fa namnis faro au,
insa wafawi, roi ḇeḇor sḇukfarkor au na nkaku rarirya.
Ro awar Herodes, koranu fiak ro sup Yudea, imam oso isya snori Zakharia ro rarwas imam-imam Abia. Swari kako ḇyeknam ro kpu Harun, snori Elisabet.
Imbeswa suine sukenem nasren, ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ma sukenem kuker ḇaḇeuser sasoser nakam raris Manseren moḇ ḇyukraya ma suḇeyuk royoḇa.
Ḇape sukada suna romawaḇa, snar Elisabet pyansnasem ma suḇe insar mansar kwar.
Rofyor oso, ro fafisu rarwas skofararurya syuḇer Zakharia ifrur fararur ḇaḇeimam ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Snar fafisu skinsor, imnis rari sedi, insa kinsorya fyasnai imam ḇefararur ya, iso sfasnai fa ḇesun ro Rum Ḇesrenya ma ḇekun mamboḇo ro dia.
Ro fafisu ani kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sfanjur ro ḇuḇes ma senadi. Rofyor anikada fyor kankun mamboḇo.
Zakharia myam Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso dores ro ḇar raku rokef kankun mamboḇo.
Myam roi ḇeḇesya ani ikandor ma imkak.
Ḇape malaikat ani ikofen faroi: "Ne, Zakharia, wamkak awer, snar nadi ḇena nasmai kankarem kwar ma swambri, Elisabet, nari daḇen romawa snon oso faro au ma nari nwir iḇe Yohanes.
Nari wamarisen ma waryaḇ, rarirya kawasa ḇeḇor nari sakmarisen snar ḇaḇeḇeyaḇen ḇyedi.
Snar nari iba ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ma nari dinem anggur roḇa aninem ḇeparek ḇa ma nari ifo kuker Rur Ḇesrenya randak ro snari sneuser ḇyena;
nari ikfin kawasa Israel sibor fa skaḇer faro Manseren, Allah sedi,

Ma nari imbran ḇepon Manseren kuker Rur ma papoik Elia fa dun kaḇer sinansya sisnesna faro romawa sesi ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor sisnesna faro karkara snonkaku ḇenapes ma rarirya fyasos sasrai ḇepyum oso faro Manseren."
Raimnai Zakharia ikofen faro malaikat ani: "Rariso nari yafawi, roi ḇeḇor nane moḇ ndamumaraya? Snar yaḇe mansar kwar ma swayedi kako dakḇe insar kwar."
Malaikat ani kyarem faroi: "Aya ine Gabriel ḇeyuf farmyan Allah ma Allah iwan aya kwar insa yawawos kuker au ma yun ankankinem ḇeḇye ine faro au.
Kaku ḇeri snar wakyar wos ayenaḇa, nari ḇeawer ma wawosḇa isof ro ras rosai, roi ḇeḇor nane kam ndarirya."
Rofyor ani kawasa ḇeḇor ansi siwaf Zakharia. Sikam sikmom, snar ḇyeuryar ro Rum Ḇesrenya dori.
Ro fafisu isasyar, iwawos kuker siḇa ma sifawi, mboi isya myam mamam oso ro Rum Ḇesren ani. Raimnai ḇyoi ḇramin ḇyedi farosi, snar ḇyeawer.
Ro fafisu fararur ḇyedi imnai kwar, ibur ḇerum ḇyedi.
Raimnai fyoroḇa swari Elisabet, imoḇesḇa paik ririm ma iyokef ḇinkundi, ḇo ikofen:
"Inekada, fararur oso ro Manseren maḇeaya, ma knikine imarisen ipyos mamyai ayena ro ḇarpon snonkaku."
Ro paik ḇeḇewonemya, Allah iwan malaikat Gabriel ifa ryaḇe mnu oso ro sup Galilea snoriso Nazaret,
faro inkbor oso snoriso Maria; inkbor ani ssḇuki dapsasor snonkbor oso snoriso Yusuf, ro kina Daud;
Rofyor malaikat ani syunro Maria rum ḇyedi, ikofen: "Aroo faro au, inkbor ḇesma fakamaman; Manseren ryous au."
Maria imnaf wos ani, ikandor ma kyara ro sneri, wos samsom ani knam ḇyedi moḇ ryaya.
Malaikat ani ikofenwer faroi: "Ne, Maria, wamkak awer! Snar wasma saswar ma fakamaman ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Kaku ḇeri, nari wamoḇesḇa, ma nari waḇen rumkun snon oso, ma nwiriḇe Yesus.
Nari romawa ani iba ma nari sapiḇe Rumkun Allah ḇekaki syadi. Ma Manseren Allah nari ḇyuk faroi, karapesa nasan Daud, kpu ḇyedi,
ma nari ḇye wairek faro Yakub kpu ḇyesi, isof fyoro-fyoro, ma nasan ḇyedi ipok imnaiḇa."
Maria ikofen faro malaikat ani, "Roi wakofen ine nari ryamuma rariso, snar ayaine yafakawin ḇaim?"
Malaikat ani kyarem: "Rur ḇesrenya nari isabu faro au, ma papoik Allah ḇekaki syadi nari kyadiren au, inja Rumkun waḇen ani sapiḇe Rumkun Allah ḇesren.
Ma kaku ḇeri Elisabet, napirman bani soḇo ḇepasnanasem ani ma ḇeḇeinsar kwar, ikako imoḇesḇa kuker romawa snon oso, ḇye paikri wonem kwar.
Snar Allah isma papoik ro roiḇeḇor nakam."
Maria ikofen: "Kaku ḇeri, ayaine Manseren infamyan ḇyedi; roi wakofen anna ndarirya mura." Raimnai malaikat ani ipromes buri.
Fafisu ono nasyonde kwar, Maria imbranḇeri ḇebon, ipdefḇe mnu oso ro sup Yehuda.
Fyor ryakwar ro mnu ani, syun ro Zakharia rum ḇyedi, ma ikofen aroo faro Elisabet.
Ma rofyor Elisabet imnaf Maria aroo ḇyena, romawa dores ani dapoper ro sneyuser ḇyena, ma Elisabet ifo kuker Rur Ḇesren.
Rarirya ibras naba: "Au ḇesmai ḇokro fandu binsyakam, ma sneuser bedi ismai ḇok kako.
Manseiso ayaine, isof Manseren yedi snari ryakaki aya?
Snar kaku ḇeri, rofyor yamnaf aroo bena, romawa ḇekain ro sneuser yedi iryaḇ ma dapoper.
Ma aski faroi, snar rosai sikofen faroi ro Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi, ikyar nari ndarirya."
Raimnai Maria ikofen: "Ruryedi isandik Allah,
ma sneri iryaḇ snar Allah, knam korer ayedi,
snar myamepen kwar, ranrun snero manfamyan ḇyedi. Kaku ḇeri, randakro knikine er-er syakam nari sap ayaḇe bin ḇeḇe aski,
Snar Allah Ḇepoik syadi, ifrur kwar fararur ḇebasyadi faro aya, ma snonsnon ḇyediso besren.
Ma ḇaḇe naḇye ḇyedi kyonro syosḇe syos, faro snonkaku ḇemkak ḇeyararyofi.
Fyasnai papoik kuker ḇraurḇyena, ma dun ḇesisye snonkaku sneḇeḇemararessya;
Pyandun snonkaku ḇepoksyafa sisaburo karapesa nasan sena, ma ikanow snonkaku ḇerun snesya;
Ḇyuk faro snonkaku ḇebisersya, roi ḇeborkam, kuker farsbawer, ma iwan snonkaku ḇenanasyafa sibur beidi.
Ifnoḇek Israel, manfamyan ḇyedi, snar iswarepen ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyena,
imnis ḇyeasas kwar faro up koḇesi, faro Abraham ma syos-syos ḇepur ḇyesi isof fyoro-fyoro."
Ma Maria ryows Elisabet indokada paik rikior, raimnai ibur wer ḇerum ḇyedi.
Ḇarpurya Elisabet rasḇyena namnis inja daḇen romawa snon oso.
Rofyor snonkaku ḇero mnu ḇyedi ma naek srar ḇyesi simnaf, Manseren fyasnai ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi ḇeḇa kaku faroi, sikam simarisen kuker i.
Ma ras ḇeḇewarya srama fa sifrur sofakfuk faro romawa ani ma simarisen sniriḇe Zakharia imnis kmari snonsnon ḇyedi,
ḇape snari ikofen: "Roḇa, mkonir iḇe Yohanes."
Sikofen faroi: "Oso ro fandu naek besi daknir rarirya ḇa."
Raimnai spankai kmari fa sifuken snonsnon rosai imarisen ḇyuk faro romawa ḇyedi.
Dor karu fas oso, raimnai fyas: "Snonsnon ḇyedi isoine Yohanes." Ma sikam sikandor.
Ma ro fafisu ani beri sḇari ḇyas ma ramar ḇyedi pyer wer, ma iwawos ḇo isandik Allah.
Rarirya snonkaku ḇekain yar-yar i sya simkak kam, ma roi ḇeḇesya anna kam nefarfyar pampyam ro bran Yudea ḇesiper.
Ma snonkakusya kam, ḇemnaf nasya skara na ma sikofen: "Nari rosai ḇeḇesya kuker romawa ine?" Snar Manseren ryous i.
Ma Zakharia, romawa ani kmari, Rur ḇesrenya kyanosni ma ḇyardi ḇo doḇo:
"Sanandik faro Manseren, Allah Israel, snar ryakaki er ḇyesi, ma dun fasaspar farosi.
Ḇyuk aḇyair papoik oso kwar, ḇeḇuk koreri maḇeko, ro manfamyan ḇyedi Daud, kpu ḇyesi;
-- raris moḇ ikofenkwar ro awar madero, kuker sḇayoi nabi-nabi ḇesren ḇyesi --
insa fyaspar kobur mbroḇ koḇesi ma roḇramin snonkakukam ḇeyayin konsya,
fa fyasnai ḇaḇe naḇye ḇyena faro Up koḇesi ma swarapepen faro asas ḇesren ḇyena,
isoine soar ikofen kwar faro Abraham, kpu ḇepon koḇedi mboi ḇyuk fakamaman maḇeko,
insa kosma fasasparbur mbroḇ koḇesi ma kuker kakyar, koḇenadi faroi kuker makakakḇa,
kuker saranden ma napnapes ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ro kankenem koḇena ḇesiper.
Ma au, romawayedi, nari sap auḇe nabi Allah, Ḇekaki Syadi; snar auso nari ḇepon Manserenfa ḇefasos nyan faroi,
insa ḇyuk fawawi faro kawasa ḇyesi mboi nari sismai korer ḇekakuya, rofyor Allah ipyos nyaki sasar sena kwar,
snar ḇaḇenaḇye ma saswar ro Allah koḇedi, ma kuker nyan rosai ḇyuki ryakakiko, imnis ori ḇeyekro arwo,
fa isnai kawasa ḇekainro pampan, ma kadaun marmarsya, fa ikfin kowesna faro nyan ḇeḇeaski."
Ma romawa ani isur ma iba ma rur ḇyedi syambraḇ. Ma ikenem ro sup ḇeursḇa isof ro ras fyasnai mankundi faro er Israel.
Rofyor ani Kaisar Agustus ḇyuk sasoser oso, ḇewan fa sfasepen snonkakusya kam ro supswan ine.
Ine fas-fas sifrur randak kaku ro fafisu Kirenius ḇye gubernur ro mnu Siria.
Rarirya kawasa ansi kam sraḇe mnu marin sena oser-oser fa sfasepen si.
Rarirya kako Yusuf isasyar ro mnu Nazaret ro sup Galilea ḇesup Yudea, mnu Daud ḇenirḇe Betlehem, -- snar ḇyeknam ro keret ma up Daud --
insa ḇyeḇefasepen kuker Maria, bin sḇukapsasori ma ḇemoḇesḇa ro fafisu ani.
Ro fafisu sura kwar ro diwa Maria ras ḇyena namnis fa kyain,
ma daḇen romawa snon oso, roma rak ḇyedi, posa ḇyeḇepankun kuker kruḇen kinak ma ḇyeifa ḇyarek ro sayer dombasya sananroya, snar skosma moḇo ḇa ro rum seryar roya.
Ro supya fyor ani manfarandows ono sisya skain siwaren rofanfan sesi ro maper ro roḇ ani.
Knikoḇama Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso fyanamsi ma Manseren sasnai ḇyedi isnaiyar si isof simkak kaku.
Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen farosi: "Mkomkak awer, snar kaku ḇeri yaḇaryas faro mko marisen ḇeba faro ersyakam:
Ras ine Knam koreri ḇyeḇeaḇen kwar faro mko, isoine Kristus, Manseren, ro mnu Daud.
Ma aḇyairya isoine faro mko: Nari mkosrow wombrek oso ḇyeḇepankun kuker kruḇen kinak ma ḇyarek ro sayer rofanfansya sanan roya."
Ma knikoḇama smam fnoḇek malaikat ani, malaikat kankramo ro Boiyas sisandik Allahḇo soḇo:
"Sanandik faro Allah ro Boiyaswa, ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi! Ma askiro supswan, faro snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allahsya."
Malaikat ansi sibur kwar ma skaḇerḇe boiyas, ḇefarandows ansi sikofen yae farosi: "Mkorama koraḇe Betlehemfa komam rosai ḇeḇesya kwar ro diwa, imnis raris rosai Manseren ikofen maroko."
Rarirya srafasau kaku, ma sisrow Maria ma Yusuf ma wombrek ani ḇyarekro moḇ rofamfansya sanan roya.
Ma rofafisu smami, ma sikofen ḇadir rosai simnafkwarfa ḇekur wombrek ani.
Ma snonkaku ḇemnaf ansikam sikandor snar roiḇeḇor manfarandows ansi sikofen farosi anna.
Ḇape Maria ikram wos annaro sneri ma kyara asuserna.
Rarirya manfarandows ansi sibur kaḇer, ma sisandik Allah snar roi ḇeborkam simnaf ma smam anna, nakam namnis raris rosai sikofen kwar farosi.
Ma rofafisu wombrek ani ḇye rasri war kwar, sifrur sofakuk ḇyedi, ma sniriḇe Yesus, imnis snonsnon malaikatya ikofen kwar, rofyor snari fyadoresi ḇaim.
Ma fafisu fasasrenya imnis kwar, raris sasoser Refo Yahudi Moses ḇyena, suniḇe Yerusalemfa ssḇuki faro Manseren,
raris fas-fas ro Manseren sasoser ḇyena: "Romawa rakḇeḇe snonsyakam, nari sfasrensi faro Allah,"
ma ssḇuk farsarser kako, imnis wos Manseren ikofenro asas ḇyedi, isoine waimon mandu oser roḇaido manjawa manduoser.
Ro mnu Yerusalem, snon oso isya snori Simeon. I snonkaku ḇekyar faro Allah ma ḇenapes, ma ḇewaf Ḇeḇuk sneprei faro Israelsya.
Rur Ḇesrenya isyaroi, ma isma fasasnaikwar ro Rur Ḇesrenya, mboi nari imarḇa rao isof dakmam Wairek, isoine i ḇesma ramrem kwar ro Manseren.
Rur Ḇesrenya ḇyedifer i fa ryaḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi. Ro fafisu Yesus, Romawa ani, sinan ḇyesuya susun kuker i fa sifrur asuser faroi ro roi sikofen kwar ro sasoser Refo Yahudi,
dun Romawa ani ma fyoraḇen i ḇo isandik Allah, ḇo doḇo:
"Knikine, Manseren, iḇye manfamyan bedi imar mura kuker aski imnis raris wos bedi,
snar yamam kwar koreri ḇeramuma ro Au,
koreri fasos kwar faro ersya kam,
isoine isnai ḇesnaiser faro er ḇese ma payamyum faro er besi, Israel."
Ma snari kuker kmari sukandor kaku snar roi ḇeḇor kam ikofen fa ḇekur i.
Raimnai Simeon ḇyeḇok sko ma ikofen faro Maria, Romawa ani snari: "Kaku ḇeri Romawa ine ḇyebefasnai fa nari pyampum roḇa ḇyawes kawasa sibor ro Israel ma ḇyeaḇyair ḇefnai rakrakrok --
ma nari fafardunya imnis sumber esar ḇekukkir snembri, --insa fyasnai ḇair kawasa ḇeḇor karkara sena."
Ro moḇ ani Hana isya kako, nabi bin oso Fanuel ḇindaḇendi ro keret Asyer. Ḇyeinsar kwar. Fyakawin kwar ma ikenem kuker swari ḇewampasi wambarek rifik,
ma ro fafisuya ḇyekabom ma ikenem wampasi wambarek samfur riwar seser rifiak. Ma syun ḇesya kwar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, roḇ meser ikyar faro Allah ma ḇyenadi ḇo fyarfor.
Ma rofyor ani kako ryama ro dia ma ikofen kasumasa faro Allah ma dawawos ro Romawa ani faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇewaf ḇaḇefaspar faro Yerusalem.
Rarirya seasuser roi ḇeḇor kam ḇekur Manseren sasoser ḇyena posa kwar sisiḇerḇe mnu sedi, isoine Nazaret ro Galilea.
Romawa ani isur fasaw ma syambraḇ, ifo kuker fawawi nananem ma saswar fakamaman Allah naisya roi.
Ro wampasi wambarek nakam Yesus sinan ḇyesu suraḇe Yerusalem ro ras munara Paskah.
Fafisu Yesus ḇyewampasi wambarek samfur seser risuru skoraḇe Yerusalem imnis raris rari sedi ro ras munara ani.
Posa kwar ro ras-ras munara ani, fafisu sibur, Yesus kada kyain ro Yerusalem ḇoi sinan ḇyesuya sufawiḇa.
Snar sukara ḇo suyoḇo iso maran ḇepon na, inja skombran ras ḇesiper oser, insape susewar i ro fandu naek ma min suḇesi.
Snar susma iḇa, inja sukaḇerḇe Yerusalem fa susewar pdef i.
Ro ras ḇeḇekiorya insape susrow i ro Allah Rum ḇyedi; isya kyain fandu guru-guru agama Yahudi ḇeḇuk farkarkorsya fa dakrower si ma ḇyuk fakfuken faro si.
Ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇemnaf i sya kam sikandor kaku snar fawawi ḇyena ma kankarem ḇyukna kam.
Ma rofyor sinan ḇyesuya sumam i, sukandor raimnai snari ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Romawa yedi, snaro wafrur rarirya faro nu? Aya ma kmami nusewar Aw kuker sne ḇekarsosen."
Kyarem faro su: "Snaro musewar Aya? Mufawiḇake, ayaisya ro Mami Rum ḇyedi dori?"
Ḇape sufawiḇa rosaiso ikofen faro su.
Raimnai ibur fnoḇek su ḇe Nazaret; ma iso user fadaduru suḇena. Snari kada ikram roi ḇeḇor anna kam ro sne ḇyedi.
Ma Yesus imakma iba fasaw ma ifawi nanemkaku, inja Allah ma snonkaku sya siswar I.

Ro wampasi wambarek samfur seser ri rim ro Kaisar Tiberius ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, fafisu Pontius Pilatus ḇye gubernur ro sup Yudea, ma Herodes ḇyekoranu fiak ro sup Galilea, ma naek ḇyedi Filipus, ḇyekoranu fiak ro sup Iturea ma Trakhonitis, ma Lisanias ḇyekoranu fiak ro sup Abilene,
ro fafisu Hanas ma Kayafas suḇe Imam Ḇeba, Allah ikofen faro Yohanes, Zakharia mandaḇendi ro sup ḇeursba.
Inja Yohanes ryama ro supya mnuk Yordan ḇesiper ma ḇyaryas, ḇo doḇo: "Mkombror ma mkor masi sren ma nari Allah ipyos nyaki sasar mkoḇena kam,
Imnis fas-fas ro syap nabi Yesaya ḇardi ḇyena: Mkaren snonkaku oso isya ḇekaru ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa: Mkofasos nyan faro Manseren, mkofrur nyan ḇeaḇyoḇer faro i.
Dwas nakam nari neḇekupoi rarirya bon ma urkna nari neḇekar pyom, ḇekaparawer na neḇesye aḇyoḇer, ḇeḇe row-row na neḇekar pyom,
ma kawasa kam nari smam koreri ḇeramuma ro Manseren."
Raimnai ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ḇerama faroi fa ḇesma masi sren, ḇo doḇo: "Ne, ikak beknampu kpu ḇyena mko! Mansei ḇekofen faro mko fa mko frarbur masasor nari ḇeramuma ya?
Inja mko ḇuk bon-bon ḇemnis kuker marandor. Ma mkopok mkokara ḇaḇeri ro mkosnemna: Abraham kma nkoḇe dirya! Snar yakofen faro mko: Allah ipok kaku fa ifrur karui nane fa neromawa faro Abraham!
Mkanya fyasos kwar ro aya fuarya ma ai knam ḇemarem bon ḇepyun ba, nari ḇyeḇeroḇen ma ḇyeḇekun ro for."
Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sifuken faroi: "Rofyor rariryanido, rosaiso nari nkofrurya?"
Kyarem farosi: "Mansei ḇena sansun risuru, irwas faro ḇeyaknaḇaya, ma mansei ḇena roḇean, dakfur rarirya kako."
Ḇeyor som ono kako, srama sorfa saksma masi sren ma sifuken faroi: "Guruyo, rosai nari nkofrurya?"
Yohanes kyarem: "Mkor syadi awer ro rosai sḇe asaskwar faro mko."
Ma sordade-sordadesya sifuken kako faroi: "Ma nkonido rosai nari nkakfrurya?" Yohanes kyarem farosi: "Mkofasyar ma mkoḇewayam awer snonkaku, mboi mkokenem mnis monda kuker ḇaḇyak mkoḇena."
Ḇape snar kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sifawi kuker kakyar, ma skara ḇo soḇo imbude Yohanes irya Wairek siwaf anike,

ḇape Yohanes kyarem faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam: "Ayakada yaḇuk masasisren faro mko kuker war monda, ḇape ḇepoik syadiro aya, nari ryama, ma yasyusḇafa yaper kaḇrai ḇefes roi ḇesowerḇyesi. Ikada nari ḇyuk masi sren faro mko, kuker Rur Ḇesren ma for.
Badeiḇerasya isyakwar ro ḇramin ḇyesuyafa ḇyuk ifrur sren sayar aḇrui ḇyesi ma iryur aḇrui ḇyesiro kron ḇyedi, ma pissya kada seḇekunro for ḇembrerḇa."
Kuker wos anun ḇese, Yohanes ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
Ḇape snar isonek Herodes ḇeḇe koranu fiak ro sup Galilea, snar fyakawin kuker Naek ḇyedi Herodias, ma snar ḇarḇor ḇese ifrur kakona,
koranu fiak ani ifrur syadi wer ro ḇarḇor ḇyena, kuker nyan ḇyuk samamyai faro Yohanes ro bui.
Ro fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sisma masi sren kwar ma ro fafisu Yesus kako isma masi sren ma Ḇyenadi, rofyor ani nanki ḇyas
ma Rur Ḇesrenya dado imnis manjawa faro i. Ma mkaren oso ryok ro nanki: "Aukada Romawa Yaswar kaku, Yaḇeḇare faro Au."
Fafisu Yesus irandak ifararurya indokada ḇyewampasi wambarek samfur rikior ma kawasa skarai ikada romawa ro Yusuf, ma kpuḇyesi siso sine: Eli,
Matat, Lewi, Malkhi, Yanai, Yusuf,
Matitya, Amos, Nahum, Hesli, Nagai,
Maat, Matitya, Simei, Yosekh, Yoda,
Yohanan, Resa, Zerubabel, Sealtiel, Neri,
Malkhi, Adi, Kosam, Elmadam, Er,
Yesua, Eliezer, Yorim, Matat, Lewi,
Simeon, Yehuda, Yusuf, Yonam, Elyakim,
Melea, Mina, Matata, Natan, Daud,
Isai, Obed, Boas, Salmon, Nahason,
Aminadap, Admin, Arni, Hesron, Peres, Yahuda,
Yakub, Isak, Abraham, Terah, Nahor,
Serug, Rehu, Peleg, Eber, Salmon,
Kenan, Arpaksad, Sem, Nuh, Lamekh,
Metusalah, Henokh, Yeret, Mahalaleel, Kenan,
Enos, Zet, Adam, Allah.
Yesus, ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren, kyaḇer ro war Yordan, raimnai Rur Ḇesrenya duniḇe sup ḇeḇeursḇa.
Kyain ro dia ras samfur rifiak ma Ibirisya ifrowes i. Fyor kyain ro dia dan royoḇa ma posa ro ras samfur rifiak ibiser.
Inja Ibiris ikofen faroi: "Kaku au Rumkun Allah, ido wawan fa karui nane nemamami."
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Fas-fas isya: Snonkaku sikenem kuker mamamiya dererḇa."
Ḇarpurya Ibiris dun Yesus ḇemoḇ ḇekaki oso ma kniko monda fyasnai faro i ḇaḇesasoser-ḇaḇesasoser kam ro supswan ine.
Ibiris ikofen faro i: "Papoik ḇeḇor nakam kuker payamyum ḇyena nari yaḇuk na faro Au, snar nakam neḇeḇuk kwar maro aya ma yakḇuk na faro manseirya wer yamarisen sya.
Inja rofyor bansuba ḇeaya, nakam nari nwana."
Ḇape Yesus ikofen faroi: "Fas-fas isya ryok: Aukada bansuba faro Manseren, Allah bedi, ma Demir monda iso wanadi faroi!"
Ḇarpurya wer dun Yesusbe Yerusalem ma ryir i ro Allah Rum ḇyedi bunemya, ma ikofen faro i: "Kaku au Rumkun Allah ido, wasawen mankundaw,
snar fas-fas isya: Ḇekur au, ikada nari ḇyuk sasoser faro malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi fa skansin
ma siser Au insa wemsi kyarkar awer ro karui."
Yesus kyarem ma ikofen: "Wos isya: Wafrowes Manseren, Allah bedi awer!"
Ibiris fafrowes ḇyena posa kwar isusu bur i ma iwaf fafisu ḇepyum faroi.
Kuker papoik Rurya Yesus kyaḇerḇe Galilea. Ma ḇyesno ro sup ani ḇesiper.
Ro fafisu ani ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum nadi ro dia ma snonkakusya kam sisandik i.
Ryama ro Nazaret moḇ sfaduru ma ibaroya, ma imnis rari ḇyedi ro ras Mananai Yahudi syun ḇerum nadi, raimnai iyori fa ḇyewasya Refo.
Ssḇuk faroi syap nabi Yesaya ma rofyor ḇyasi kwar, isma mnuk, ro moḇ sfas ḇo soḇo:
"Rur Manseren isya ryows aya, snar ikada ryem aya kwar, insa yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar; ma iwan aya kwar
fa yaḇaryas ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku ḇeḇemanfyansya, ma mamam faro ḇeprafsya, ma ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku sewayamsya insa yaḇaryas wampasi wambarek Manseren ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyena ḇerama kwar."
Raimnai isisen syap ani, ḇyuk kaḇeri faro ḇefararur, raimnai kyain; ma snonkaku sya kam ro rum nadi ani smamjoḇ i.
Raimnai irandak ḇyuk farkarkor faro si, ḇo ikofen: "Ro ras ine mnuk mkomnaf ine imnis."
Ma snonkaku ansi kam ssḇuk kaku roi ma sikandor snar wos ḇepyum dawosna, inja sikofen: "Inenido Yusuf romawa ḇyaniryake?"

Inja ikofen faro si: "Mboi nari mkokofen wos sarḇer ine maro aya: Ne, snon ḇena mon, buk pararei faro mankundaw. Wafrur kako ro dine, ro mankundaw mnu bedi, roi ḇeḇor nkomnaf wafrur kwar ro Kapernaum!"
Ma ikofen wer: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri nabi oso sesyowi i ro mnu ḇyedi ḇa.
Ma yakofen faro mko, ma wos Ayenane nkaku: Ro fafisu Elia kosmai bin kabom sibor ro Israel rofyor nanki isisen ḇewampasi wambarek rikior ma paik ri wonem ma rofyor andoḇa ḇeba myun sup ani ḇesiper.
Ḇape Elia ḇyeḇewan faro oso ro siḇa, mboi faro kabom oso ro Sarfat, ro sup Sidon.
Ma ro awar Nabi Elisa ḇeduf pado sibor ro Israel ma oso ro si isma fasasren ḇaḇeri, mboi Naaman derer ro sup Siria."
Simnaf kam rarirya kawasa kam ḇero rum nadi ani simsorbos kaku.
Siyorsi, raimnai sfori ḇo suni ḇemnuya ḇondiri ḇebon moḇ mnuya kyain roya, insa sisawen i ro fofen ani.
Ḇape Yesus imbran uk ro fadu sedi ma ibur si.
Posa kwar Yesus ryaḇe Kapernaum, mnu oso ro Galilea, fa ḇyuk farkarkor ro dia ro ras-ras Mananai Yahudi.
Simnaf farkarkor ḇyena sikandor kaku, snar wos ḇyena nafo kuker papoik.
Ro rum nadi ani snon rur ḇemaḇaksyower oso ma snon ani dar naba:
"Ne, au Yesus snon Nazaret, rosai wafrur kuker inko? Rwama insa mun inko? Yafawi manseiso aw: au Saranden ro Allah."
Ḇape Yesus ḇyewefi, ḇo ikofen: "Befasis, wasasyarburi!" Ma rur ḇemaḇak ani ipyasbos snon ani ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, raimnai isasyarbur snon ani ma ifrur dafdufi ḇaḇeri.
Ma snonkakusya kam sikandor, ma sikofen yae faro si, ḇo soḇo: "Rosaisoine? Snar ifo kuker baba ma papoikya ma ḇyuk sasoser faro rur-rur ḇemaḇaksya fa sisasyar."
Ma snonsnon ḇyedi ḇyesno ḇemoḇ nakam ro supya fyor ani.
Posa isasyarbur rum nadi ani ma ryaḇe Simon rum ḇyedi. Ro fafisu ani Simon imbanyori isam fafayaḇa ma sor faro Yesus insa ifnoḇek i.
Rarirya dores fanam bin ani, raimnai iyaw sam-sam ani, ma dafduf ani iburi. Bin ani ikḇok ḇeri ma duffarmyan si.
Ro fafisu ori isyun, kawasa ansi sun ḇeduf sesi faro Yesus, ḇeduf dafduf ḇeḇor kam. Ma isawardofen si ma ḇyuk pararei faro si.
Ro snonkaku sibor kako rur ḇemaḇaksya sisasyarbur si ma sfararar, ḇo soḇo: "Rumkun Allah risaw." Raimnai idwarek pakrek si ma imewerbos kaku sawawosri, snar sifawi ikada Wairek dirya.
Fafisu isnai kwar, Yesus imbran fa ryaḇe moḇ ḇeḇeusḇa oso. Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ssewar I, ma sisrow I ma soḇo skarwarek i insa ibur awer si.
Ḇape ikofen faro si: "Ro mnu-mnu ḇese kako yamarisen yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah snar i ḇeḇedari yaḇeḇewan muma."
Ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ro rum nadina ro sup Yudea.
Ro fafisu oso Yesus dores ro danosen andir Genesaret, ma kawasa sibor spanjuḇer i fa simnaf Allah wos ḇyena.
Myam wai risuru ro danosen andir ani. Mandaswan sya sido kwar fa sḇan pam sena.
Dek ro wai oso isoine Simon wai ḇyedi, ma iwan fa sri wai ani ḇeḇanda knik ḇyinkwan bur danosen andirya. Raimnai kyain ro waya ma ḇyuk farkarkor faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
Ḇyuk farkarkor posa kwar, ikofen faro Simon: "Mkoḇores ḇemoḇ ḇedok ma mkonap pam mkoḇena fa mkoḇukmun in."
Simon kyarem, doḇo: "Guru, roḇ ḇesiper nkoraswan kwar ḇape nkosmai inoḇa ḇeri, ḇape snar wawanja, nari yanap pamya mura."
Ma fyor skonap pamya posa, skomun in nai ḇebayo isof pam skoḇena namuk.
Inja skorar min skoḇesi ro wai ḇese ani insa srama sakfnoḇek sko. Ma srama sakfnoḇekḇo inkoser in ro wai ansuya rao fanam sumsar.
Ro fafisu Simon myam roi ḇeḇesya ani kyainwepur ma ḇyansuba ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi, ḇo ikofen: "Manseren, wasusubur aya, snar ayaine snonkaku ḇesasar."
Snar i ma snonkaku ḇefnoḇek sya sikandor snar in ḇeḇor skofor ansi;
rarirya kako Yakobus ma Yohanes Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyansui ḇefnoḇek Simon. Yesus ikofen faro Simon: "Wamkak awer, randak ro knikine nari bemandaswan snonkaku."
Ma skosu wai skoḇena kwar, sskobur roi ḇeborna kam fa skoso Yesus.
Ro fafisu oso Yesus isya ro mnu oso. Ro dia snon oso iduf dafduf pado. Ro fafisu myam Yesus, kyainwepur ḇo syom, ḇo doḇo: "Tuan, wamarisen kada nari fasren aya."
Inja Yesus isawar ma pyan ro snon ani, ma ikofen: "Yamarisen insa wasren." Ro fafisu aniḇeri dafduf pado ani iburi beri.

Yesus idwarek snon ani insa ḇyaryas awer pararei ḇyani faro manseiryawer ma ikofen: "Rwa, fasnai mankundaw faro imam ma buk farsarser ro pararei bedi, farsarser ḇeraris Moses syoser kwar ḇefasasnai faro si."
Ḇape Yesus ḇyeḇeḇaryas ma ḇyesno ḇinkwan ma kawasa sibor semarani ma srayoḇ i, insa simnaf farkarkor ḇyena ma sisma pararei ro dafduf sena.
Ḇape Yesus isusu ḇemoḇ ḇeḇeusḇa fa ḇyenadi.

Ro ras oso fafisu Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor, snon Farisi ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ono skain sakrower i. Srama ker mnu-mnu nakam ro Galilea ma Yudea ma ro Yerusalem. Manseren papoik ḇyedi ifnoḇek i, isof ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf si.
Kniko snonkaku ono sḇar snon ḇepapipen oso kuker waryar ḇyedi; ma sḇesewar fa ssun kuker i insa srir i ro ḇarpon Yesus.

Snar sisma nyan osoḇa fa sun kuker i snar kawasa sya sibor mankenem ro dia, inja skek kuker i ḇerumya bori, ma skoḇas osna, ma skokyu snon ani kuker waryar ḇyedi rofandu kawasa ansi imnis bos ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Ro fafisu Yesus myam kakyar sena, ikofen: "Ne, naeko, sasar bena neḇeampun kwar."
Ḇape ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi skara ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku mansei ḇeyonef Allah ine? Mansei nari ḇebuk ampun ro sasar imbude Allah derer?"
Ḇape Yesus ifawi swaruser sena, inja ikofen faro si: "Rosai mkokara ro mkosnemna?
Rosai ḇepyan syadiya, yakofen: Sasar bena neḇeampun kwar, roḇaido yakofen: Wakḇok, ma wambran?

Ḇape insa mkofawi, ro supswan ine Rumkun Snonkaku isma papoik fa ḇyuk ampun ro sasarna" -- raimnai ikofen faro snon ḇepapipen ani --: "Yakofen faro au, wakḇok, wakanow waryar bedi ma waburḇe rum bedi!"
Ma ro fafisu ani beri ikḇok, ro ḇarpon sedi, raimnai ikanow waryar ḇyedi ma iburḇe rum byedi ḇo sisandik Allah.
Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sikandor, ma sisandik Allah, ma simkak kaku, ma sikofen: "Ras ine nkomam kwar roi ḇefrur kanandor ḇeba."
Ḇarpurya, ro fafisu Yesus isasyar, myam snon ḇeyor som oso, snori Lewi, isya kyain ro rum ḇeyor som. Yesus ikofen faroi: "Waso Aya!"
Rarirya Lewi iyori beri fa ibur roi ḇeḇor nakam, ma iso Yesus.
Ma Lewi ifrur munara ḇeba faro Yesus ro rum ḇyedi ma ḇeyor som sibor ma snonkaku ḇese sakanan fnoḇek i.
Snon Farisi ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi surem Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi, ḇo soḇo: "Snaro mkanan fnoḇek snonkaku ḇeyor som ma kawasa sasar?"
Rarirya Yesus kyarem faro si ma ikofen: "Snonkaku ḇeprei sya sefandun ḇena monsya ḇa, mboi ḇedof sya kada;
Yaramuma insa yor snonkaku ḇenapes sya ḇa, mboi snonkaku ḇesasar, insa simbror."
Snon Farisi ansi sikofen faro Yesus wer, ḇo soḇo: "Manfamyan Yohanes ḇyesi nabor sfarfor ma sḇenadi, rarirya kako manfamyan Farisi sya sesi, ḇape manfamyan besi kada sanan ma sinem."
Yesus kyarem faro si: "Inja snon manfakawin ya ḇati ḇyesi nari kowansi fa sfarfor, rofyor manfakawin ani isya kaker fnoḇek si?
Mboi fafisuya nari ryama, rofyor manfakawinya ḇyeḇeyun bur si, ro fafisu ani kada insape sakḇe farfor."

Ikofen kako wos peper oso faro si: "Snonkaku osoḇa nari pyansawek kruḇen ker ro sansun ḇebabo fa ḇyuki syokop sansun wai oso. Rofyor rarirya ido, sansun ḇebabo ani nari imuk, rosai wer kuker kruḇen ḇesokop sun ro sansun ḇebabo ani nari imnisḇa kuker sansun ḇekwar ani.
Rarirya kako snonkaku osoḇa fa nari iser swan ḇebabo ro kibonḇeḇerere, snar rofyor rarirya ido, swan ḇeḇabo ansi nari sisaipef kibon ḇeḇerere ani ma swan sya sisbawer ma kibon ani kako imbriwer.
Inja swan ḇebabo sya ipyum syadi seḇeser ro kibon ḇebabo kako.
Ma snonkaku osoḇa ḇeyinem sawawek swan ḇekwar kwar nari imarisen ḇa fa dinem swan ḇebabo, snar nari ikofen: Swan ḇekwarya kada ipyumkaku."
Ro ras Mananai Yahudi oso, fafisu Yesus imbran ro yaf fasibu oso, manfamyan ḇyesi sinek fasibu yorem ono siswir diwer si kuker siḇrasna ma san si.
Ḇape snon Farisi ono sikofen: "Snaro mkofrur roi kopok kofrurḇa ro ras Mananai Yahudi?"
Rarirya Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkowasya ḇake ro rosai Daud ifrur, ro fafisu i ma ḇesoisya sibiser,
eḇedari syun ro Rum Allah ma dun mamami farsarser, fa dan ma ḇyuk kako faro ḇesoisya, mamami rosai snonkaku ḇese sipok sakanḇa derer monda imam-imamsya?"
Yesus ikofen wer faro si: "Rumkun Snonkaku irya Manseren faro ras Mananai Yahudi."
Ro ras Mananai Yahudi ḇese wer, Yesus syunḇe Rum nadi, fa ḇyuk farkarkor. Ro dia snon ḇramin ḇar raku ḇemar oso isya.
Ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi sḇair Yesus, fa smampan imbude Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snon ani ro ras Mananai Yahudi, insa sisma knam fa ssḇuk sasar faroi.
Ḇape ifawi swaruser sena, inja ikofen faro snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar ani: "Wayor au ma wores ro faduine!" Inja snon ani iyori fa dores.
Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yafuken faro mko: Rosaiso sefakofrur ro ras Mananai Yahudi, kofrur roi ḇeḇyeke roḇaido kofrur ḇarḇor, kofnoḇek nyawa snonkaku roḇaido komun si?"
Raimnai myam yar-yar sikam, ma ikofen faro snon ḇeduf ani: "Fos ḇramin bedi!" Snon ani ifrur rarirya ma ḇramin ḇyedi iprei beri.
Inja masasor sena nasber, inja sawos yae faro si, rosaiso nari sifrur faro Yesus.
Ro fafisu ani Yesus ryaḇe urek fa ḇyenadi ma ro roḇ ḇesiper ani ḇyenadi faro Allah.
Fafisu meser kwar, ma dor manfamyan ḇyesi fa srama faroi ma kyinfir ro fandu si snon samfur seser risuru, siso dapḇe manwawan:
Snonsnon sena naiso nane, Simon nyiriḇe Petrus, ma Andreas Simon ḇedar ḇyedi, Yakobus ma Yohanes, Filipus ma Bartolomeus,
Matius ma Tomas, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, ma Simon sapḇe snon Zelot,
Yudas Yakobus mandaḇendi, ma Yudas Iskariot iso ḇarpurya ḇeḇoḇ Yesus.

Raimnai isabu kuker si ma simnai ro moḇ ḇepyom oso: ro dia manfamyan ḇyesi sibor kaku siryur ma snonkaku ḇese kako ḇerama ker Yudea ḇesiper ma ro Yerusalem ma ḇerama ker supya mnuk swanandir Tirus ma Sidon.
Srama insa simnaf farkarkor ḇyena ma insa ḇyuk pararei ro dafduf sena; ma kako rur ḇemaḇak siswoḇer sya.
Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam sesewar fa span roi, snar papoik ḇesasyar roi ma kawasa ansi kam ḇyuk pararei faro si.
Raimnai Yesus myam faro manfamyan ḇyesi ma ikofen: "Askifaro, ne, ḇesaḇararmkoya, snar mkokada nari mko na Ḇaḇesasoser Allah,
Aski faro, ne, knikine ḇeḇisermkoya, snar mkokada nari mkosyopen. Aski faro, ne, ḇekanes mkoya, snar mkokada nari mkombrif.
Aski faro, mko rofyor snonkaku sya sayin mko ma simewer mko, skoryae mko ma rofyor spampum snonsnon mkoḇena imnis roi ḇeḇarḇor oso, snar Rumkun Snonkaku.
Mkoryaḇ ma mko marisen ro fafisu ani, snar kaku ḇeri, ḇaḇyak mkoḇedi iba ro boiyas; snar kpu sesi sifrur rarirya kako faro nabi sya.
Ḇape nari mkoroë, ne, ḇenana mkoya, snar ro nana mkoḇena mkosma kwar sneprei mkoḇena.
Nari mkoroë, snonkaku ḇeyarbor ro knikine mkoya, snar nari mkobiser. Nari mkoroë, snonkaku knike ḇembrif mkoya, snar nari mkoḇe kandera ma mko kanes.
Nari mkoroë, rofyor snonkaku sya sisandik mko; snar kpu mkoḇesi sifrur rarirya kako kwar faro nabi sararer sya."
"Ḇape faro mko, ḇemnaf aya, Yakofen: Mkoswar mbroḇ mkoḇesi, mkofrur pyum faro snonkaku ḇeyain mko sya;
mkor ḇok faro snonkaku befras mko; mkonadi warek snonkaku ḇeyonef mko.
Mansei ḇeḇaser fofer besya oso, buk fofer besi ḇarya wer, ma mansei ḇeyun syatu bedi, buk sansun baken bedi fa dun iwer kako.
Buk faro snonkaku mansei ḇeor faro au; ma wor siḇer awer faro snonkaku ḇeyun roi nwana.
Ma raris wamarisen insa snonkaku sifrur faro au, wakfrur rarirya kako faro si.
Ma rofyor mkoswar snonkaku ḇeswar mko, rosai fainda faro au? Snar snonkaku ḇesasar sya kako sakswar faro snonkaku ḇeswar si sya.
Snar rofyor mkofrur pyum faro snonkaku ḇefrur pyum faro mko sya, rosai fainda faro mko? Snonkaku ḇesasar sya kako sakfrur rarirya.

Ma rofyor mkor resari roi oso faro snonkaku oso, snar mkokyar nari mkosma kaḇer roi oso roi, fainda rosai faro au? Snonkaku ḇesasar sya kako sakḇuk resari faro snonkaku ḇesasar sya, insa sisma munsu nabor namnis.

Ḇape mko kada, mkoswar mbroḇ mkoḇesi ma mkofrur pyum faro si ma mkoḇuk resari ma mkokyar awer nari mkosma munsu, rarirya ḇaḇyak mkoḇedi nari iba ma nari mkoḇeromawa Allah Ḇekaki Syadi, snar ikada ipyum faro snonkaku ḇekofen kasumasa ḇa ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor sya.
Iḇyekada mkoḇesnemura, imnis raris Kma mkoḇedi kako ḇyesnemura."
"Mkoḇe mankara awer, rarirya mko kako nari sakḇemankara mkoḇa. Ma mkoḇuk samamyai awer, rarirya mko kako nari sakḇuk samamyai faro mkoḇa; mkoḇuk ampun rarirya mko kako nari sḇeampun mko.

Mkoḇuk kada nari smunsu faro mko: warnkyara ḇeḇye oso, skukira ifyos, ma sisas i isof isbawer ma ḇesbawer anna nari sisbawer na ro farandan bedi. Snar warnkyara mkoḇuki kyaraya, nari ssḇuki kyara mko kako."
Yesus ikofen wos peper oso wer faro si: "Rariso snon ḇepraf oso ikfin snon ḇepraf ḇeseya? Mkofawiḇake nari sukam susapi ro der?
Romawa farkor oso nari isyadi ro guru ḇyediḇa, ḇape rofyor fyarkor posa kwar ro farkarkor ḇyena nari imnis guru ḇyedi.
Snaro mam faro papoi ḇero naek bedi mkamor ḇyesuya, ḇoi ai fyor ḇeba ḇeḇeayuḇ ro mkamor besuya wafawiḇake?

Rariso nari wakofen faro naek bedi: Naeko iḇye yapyos papoi ḇero mkamor besuya, mboi ai baken ḇeba ḇeḇeayuḇ ro mkamor besuya kada mam i ḇake? Ne, snonkaku ḇeankarkar, wasasyar ḇepon ai baken ḇeba ḇeḇeayuḇ ro mkamor besuya resari insape mam pyum fa wapyos papoi-papoi anna ro naek bedi mkamor ḇyesu ya."
"Snar ai knam ḇeḇye oso nari imarem bon ḇeḇyeḇayo ḇa, ma rarirya kako ai knam ḇeḇyeḇa oso nari imarem bon ḇepyumo ḇa.
Snar ai knam oser-oser ḇyeḇemambir ro bon ḇyena. Snar korokem ara bonḇa ro aikus borek ma anggur bon ro kaḇrai borekḇa.
Snonkaku ḇeḇye ifrur roi ḇeḇye ro sne karambram ḇeḇye ḇyedi ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor ro sne karamḇram ḇeḇarḇor ḇyedi. Snar roi ikofen na nakḇairo sne ḇyedi."
"Snaro mkor aya: Manseren, Manseren, mboi mkofrur roi yakofen naḇa?
Mansesi ḇerama faro aya ma ḇemnaf wos ayena ḇo ḇefruruser na -- nari yafasnai faro i kuker mansei yaḇuki imnisya, --
imnis raris snon oso ḇeḇawes rum: Snon ani ḇyai woni ḇekaki ma ryir araref ḇyedi ro karuna bo. Ro fafisu faḇruḇ ma dafya myun rum ani, rum ani imararerḇa, snar rum ani sifrur i fa idworen.
Ḇape mansei ḇemnaf wos ayena, mboi ḇefrur userna ḇa, imnis raris snon oso ḇefrur rumro saprop ḇeḇeararef ḇa. Rofyor dafya myun i, rum ani fasaw kaku kyarḇaken ma imkokbos beri."
Rofyor Yesus dawawosra posa kwar ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi, ryasyun ro Kapernaum.
Rodia, snon mambri Roma oso ro Kapernaum manfyan ḇyesi oso iduf marḇak ma fanam imar kwar isof iswari kaku.
Rofyor mambri ani imnaf Yesus, iwan ḇebarara Yahudi onofa sor Yesus, insa ryama ḇyuk pararei faro manfyan ḇyani.
Rofyor sisrow Yesus kwar, sor famfnoḇek ro Yesus ma sikofen: "Wafnoḇek snon ine,
snar ikada iswar er koḇesi ma iso ḇeḇawes rum ari nkoḇedi."
Inja Yesus isosi ma srakam. Fafisu sfanam mambri ani rum ḇyedi, iwan bati ḇyesi onofa sikofen faro Yesus: "Tuan, bekandera awer snar aya ine yasyusḇa fa swun ro rum ayedi;
knam ine eḇedarfa mankundaya yaramufa ḇe auḇa. Ḇape wakofen monda wos oser, nari manfyan ayani iprei.

Snar ayaine ḇardi yaro baḇ, ma robaḇ ayedi kako sordade sisya. Rofyor yakofen faro sordade oso: Rwa, ma nari rya, ma faro oso wer: Rwama ma nari ryama, oroḇa ido faro manfyan ayedi: Wafrur roi ine ma nari ifruri."
Rofyor Yesus imnaf wos ani, ikandori, ma iknenef faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇesoisya, ma ikofen: "Yakofen faro mko, rofandu kawasa Israel syakam, yasma kakyar ḇebayo rya dine ḇaim!"
Ma rofyor snonkaku iwan ansi skaḇer ḇe rum, sisma manfyan ani iprei kwar.
Ḇarpurya Yesus ryaḇe mnu oso ḇenirḇe Nain. Manfamyan ḇyesi sifnoḇek i, ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ono semarani bo saksoi.
Rofyor fyanam kedwai ḇeba ro mnu ani, sḇar snonkaku ḇemar oso ḇo sisasyar ro mnuya, romawa snon, kabom oso romawa ḇyedi ma kawasa sibor ro mnu ani sakfnoḇek kabom ani.
Ma rofyor Manseren Yesus myam kabom ani, saswarya dek ro sne ḇyedi, ma ikofen faroi: "Kwanes awer!"
Raimnai fyanam waryar ani ma pyan roi, inja ḇeḇar waryar ansi sores, ma Yesus ikofen: "Ne, snonkbor yakofen faro aw, wiḇer aw!"
Ma snonkbor ani ikḇok ma kyain ma irandak dawawos, ma Yesus ḇyuki faro snari.
Snonkaku ansikam simkak ma sisandik Allah, ma sikofen: "Nabi ḇeba oso syaye rofandu koḇedi," ma "Allah ryakaki kawasa ḇyesi."
Rarirya Yesus ḇyeabar yar sup Yudea ḇesiper ma supya mnuk ani kam.
Rofyor Yohanes imnaf roi ḇeḇor anna kam ro manfamyan ḇyesi,
inja dor rofandusi snon risuru fa sufuken Manseren: "Inja aw nari ḇeramayake, roḇa nari nkowaf snonkakuyo ḇeseke?"
Rofyor manfamyan ansuya sura faro Yesus kwar, sukofen: "Yohanes Ḇemasi iwan numa nufuken au: Inja aw nari ḇeramayake, roḇa nari nkowaf snonkakuyo ḇeseke?"
Rofyor ani Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku sibor ro dafduf ma kandera sena kam ma iyaw rurḇemaḇak, ma ḇyuk mamam faro ḇepraf sya.

Ma Yesus kyarem faro su: "Mura ma mukofen faro Yohanes rosai mumam ma mumnaf: Snonkaku ḇepraf smam, snonkaku ḇepapipen simbran, snon ḇeduf pado seḇefasren, snon ḇepro simnaf, snon ḇemar sḇeḇeḇawes, ma snon ḇesaḇarar sisma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye.
Ma aski faro snonkaku ḇefafayaf ma ḇepampum ayaḇa."
Yohanes wawan ḇyansuya sura kwar, Yesus irandak dawawos faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ro Yohanes: "Rosai ḇeḇewar mkora ḇe sup ḇeursḇa? Mkomam doker wamya iso ḇo ḇewai mura muma?
Roḇaido fandun rosai mkoraya? Mkomam snonkaku ḇesansun sansun ḇepyumke? Snonkaku ḇesansun sansun ḇepyum ma ḇekenem manminsya, moḇ sena naisya ro rum wairek.
Inja fandun rosai mkoraya? Mkomam nabike? Kuker kaku, yakofen faro mko, mboi isyadi ro nabi.
Snar sfas ḇadiri kwar: Mam, yawan wawan ayedi fa pyon au, nari fyasos nyan bedi ro ḇarpon bedi.
Yakofen faro mko: Rofandu snonkaku saḇensya, oso iba syadi Yohanes ḇa, mboi ḇebaḇa ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah iso ḇeba syadi roi."
Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇemnaf wos ḇyena, ma ḇeyor som, ssḇuk kaku ro ḇaḇenapnapes Allah, snar Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren farosi kwar.
Ḇape snon Farisi ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi spampum Allah kakara ḇyena faro si, snar simewer Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren faro si.
Yesus ikofen: "Kuker rosai nari yaḇuk karai syos ine ma kuker rosai yaḇuk imnis si?
Snar simnis romawa ḇekain ro buḇes ma ḇeyor yae: Nkowuf sonker faro mko, ḇape mkomas ḇa, nkodisen dow-ḇarop, ḇape mkokanes ḇa.
Snar Yohanes Ḇemasi ryama ma dan mamami ḇa ma dinem anggur ḇa, ma mkokofen: Rur ḇemaḇak isawoḇi.
Ḇarpurya Rumkun Snonkaku ryama, danan ma dinem, mkokofen ḇo mkoḇo: Mkomam, ima snon oso ḇenambri ma ḇefarandinem, bati ro ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasar.
Ḇape fawawi Allah ya snonkaku ḇesouser ssḇuk kaku roi."
Snon Farisi oso dor Yesus fa ryama dakanan ro rum ḇyedi. Yesus ryama ro rum Farisi ani, ma kyain danan.
