Raimnai imbran swaf bursi, posa kyain wepur ma ḇyenadi, doḇo:
"O Mami, rofyor wamarisen ido, kandera ḇekur aya ine wuni bur aya, ḇape Mami waso marisen ayedi awer, mboi marisen bedi ryarirya mura."
Ma malaikat oso ro nanki fyasnai faro Yesus ma ḇyuk samambraḇ faroi.
Imkak mankenem inja ḇyenadi kuker sneri ḇesiper. Sayan ḇyena namnis rik paporem ma nadaf ḇesaprop.
Ḇyenadi posa kwar iyori ma kyaḇer faro manfamyan ḇyesi, ḇape isrow sisya senef snar siswar mankenem Yesus.
Ikofen farosi: "Mkenef snaro? Mkokḇoke ma mkoḇenadi, insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowesya."
Rofyor Yesus dawawos kaker rak oso ryama, ma manfamyan ḇyesi ḇenir ḇe Yudas, oso rofandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansi pyon rak ani. Yudas isnefer Yesus fa isyumi.
Ma Yesus ikofen faroi: "Yudas, boḇ Rumkun Snonkakuya kuker syumke?"
Rofyor ḇeso Yesus insya, smam rosai nari ḇeḇesyanya ma sikofen: "Manseren, iḇye komunsi kuker sumberke?"
Ma oso rosi doper ma pyapekbas Imam Ḇeba manfyan ḇyesi oso knaram ḇar raku kuker sumber.
Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Iḇye kwar mura." Raimnai duf snon ani knaram ḇyani ma pyom iwer.

Ma Yesus ikofen faro mananir-mananir imam ma mananir ḇewaren Allah Rum ḇyedi ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara Yahudi ḇerama ḇeforisya, doḇo: "Kakara mkoḇena aya ine yaḇarḇorke, indiriso mkorama kuker sumber ma karbere fa mkofor aya?
Mboi mkofawi ras-ras nakam ayaisya rofandu mkoḇena ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, mboi mkofor ayaḇa. Ḇape ine fafisu mkoḇeirya, ma ineido papoik ro pampanya."
Raimnai Yesus ḇyeḇefor ma suni ro moḇ ani ma siyakeri ḇe Imam Ḇebaya rum ḇyedi. Ma Petrus iyomuser ro ḇarpur.
Ro buḇes ro rum ani snonkaku sikaḇen for ma skain yar-yari. Petrus ikako kyain fandusi.
Infyan oso myam Petrus kyain fanam forya; iknoweri raimnai ikofen: "Snon ine kako dakfnoḇeki."
Ḇape Petrus fyamyun ḇo ikofen: "Roḇa, aya ine yafawi snon ani ḇa!"
Fyoro werḇa snonkaku oso ḇese myami ma ikofen: "Au kako oso rosi!" Ḇape Petrus ikofen: "Roḇa, ayama roḇa!"
Ma indokada oras ḇesiper oser posa, snon oso ḇese ikofenbos faroi: "Kaku ḇeri, snon ine kako dakfnoḇeki, snar ikako snon Galilea."
Ḇape Petrus ikofen: "Roḇa, aya ine yafawi roi wakofenya ḇa." Rofafisu ani kako, rofyor isya dawos kaker, mankoko rawersya sore.
Raimnai Yesus iknenef ma myam Petrus. Inja Petrus iswarepen snar Manseren ikofen faroi: "Rofyor mankoko rawersya sor ḇaim ro ras ine famyun epen aya ḇekior kwar."
Raimnai syaye randi ma kyanes fafayaḇa.
Ma snonkaku ḇefor Yesus ansi, skoryayei ma sipreri.
Sisisen warek mka ḇyesya ma sifuken: "Indo wakofen mansei ḇeprer awya?"
Ma wos anonef sikofen faroi nabor.
Ma rofyor meser kwar ḇebarara-ḇebarara er Yahudi ma mananir-mananir imamsya ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi skara posa kwar, sun Yesus ḇeḇarpon mankukeḇ Agama sedi,
ma sikofen: "Rofyor aw Wairek, wakofen maro nko." Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen kako ḇe mko wero, nari mkokyarḇa;
ma rofyor yafuken roi oso faro mko, nari mkopok fa mkokaremi ḇa.
Randak ro knikine Rumkun Snonkaku kyain kwar ro ḇar raku Allah ḇepok syadiya."
Sikofen kam: "Rarirya ido, awne Rumkun Allahke?" Yesus kyarem: "Iso mankun mkokofenya, mboi aya ine Rumkun Allah."
Raimnai sikofen: "Fainda rosai kosewar ḇaḇesaksi wer? Koine komnaf kwar ro mankundi sḇadon ḇyedi."
Raimnai kina mankukeḇ ansi siyorsi fa sun Yesus ḇeḇarpon Pilatus.

Ro dia sirandak ssḇuk safsof, ḇo soḇo: "Isna kwar maro nko, mboi snon ine fyarkor ninyan er nkoḇesi fa siḇor, ma myun warek nkoḇak som faro Kaisar, ma mankundi ḇardi ikofen ḇo doḇo, mboi ikada Kristus isoine Wairek."
Pilatus ifuken faroi: "Aukada wairek kawasa Yahudike?" Yesus kyarem: "Iso mankundaw wakofenya."
Pilatus ikofen faro mananir-mananir imamsya ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansya kam: "Yasma sasar oso ḇaḇeri ro snonkaku ine."
Ḇape seyayu besya kwar, ḇo soḇo: "Fyarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor kuker farkarkor ḇyena ro Yudea ḇesiper, ḇyerandak ro Galilea ma ryama kwar kako rodine."
Rofyor Pilatus ryower rarirya ifuken, inja snon ine snon Galilea riryake?
Ma rofafisu Pilatus ifawi, mboi Yesus snonkaku ḇero sup mnuk Herodes, fyaremi fa suni ḇeḇarpon Herodes, snar ro fafisu ani isya kako ro Yerusalem.
Rofyor Herodes myam Yesus, Herodes iryaḇ kaku. Snar fyoro kwar imarisen dakmam Yesus, snar fyoro kwar imnaf roi ono ro Yesus, ma ikyar nari Yesus ifrur aḇyair kanandor oso fa dakmam.
Ḇyuk fakfuken nabor faro Yesus, ḇape Yesus kyarem royoḇaḇeri.
Rofafisu mananir-mananir imam ḇeḇeḇukorsya ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi srarpon ma ssḇuk safsof ḇemarḇak faroi.
Fafisu ani Herodes kuker sarar ḇyesi sefarfnak ma skoryayei, skosansuni kuker syatu nasan raimnai skofarem kaḇeri wer faro Pilatus.
Ma ro ras ani beri, Herodes ma Pilatus, ḇeḇembroḇ ansuya suḇe bati wer.
Raimnai Pilatus fyanjur mananir-mananir imamsya ma manfarkin-manfarkin fnoḇek kawasasya,
ma ikofen farosi: "Mkun snonkaku ine maro aya imnis snonkaku ḇefarkor ninyan kawasa. Mankun mkomam mboi yakukeḇi kwar, ma sasar rosai mkoḇuksof i na yasma ono roiḇa.
Ma Herodes ikako isma sasar oso roiḇa, inja fyarem kaḇeri maro nko. Kaku ḇeri ifrur sasar roḇa fa ḇemnis kuker samamyai marmari.
Inja nari yapreri raimnai yafaspari." [
Snar ro ras munara Paskah, Pilatus fyaspar snonkaku besmai oso faro kawasasya.]
Ḇape sibras kam: "Ḇyeḇemun! Faspar Barabas maḇe nko!"
Barabas ine ḇyeḇesun ro bui snar skofrur mbriwer ḇeba ro mnu ḇebaya, ma snar myamun.
Pilatus ikofen wer kuker mkaren ḇeba farosi, snar imarisen fa fyaspar Yesus.
Ḇape sibras wer, ḇo soḇo: "Ḇyeḇepai ro aprop! Ḇyeḇepai ro aprop!"
Pilatus dawos wer ḇerarwan ḇeḇekiorya farosi: "Inja ḇarḇor rosai snonkaku ine ifrur kwarya? Yasma sasar oso roi ḇaḇeri, bemnis kuker samamyai marmari. Inja nari yapreri ma yafaspari."
Ḇape sibras naba ḇo sedafdifer ḇesya kwar insa ḇyeḇepai ro aprop ma papupesya sefainda.
Pilatus iwai rasi. Raimnai dawos namuk insa fararyor sedi ḇyeḇeḇuk farosi.
Ma fyaspar snonkaku ḇesun ro bui snar ḇefrur mbriwer mamun ani imnis raris fararyor sedi, mboi ḇyuk Yesus farosi fa sifrur faroi imnis marisen sedi.
Rofyor Yesus ḇyeḇeyun ani, siserepen snon oso ḇenirḇe Simon ḇeraker Kireni, ḇeḇe ḇesun ḇe Yerusalem, srir apropya ro erda ḇyesuya, fa ḇyari ḇo iso Yesus.
Kawasa sibor kaku siso Yesus; rofandu si binsya sibor skanesi.
Yesus iknenef farosi ma ikofen: "Bin-bin Yerusalem mkoyane, mkokanes awer aya, mboi mkokanes ḇinkun mko, ma romawa mkoḇesi!
Snar mkomame, nari fafisuya ryama ma sikofen: Aski faro bin ḇepansnasem sya ma ḇeyaḇen romawaḇa ma ḇeyaksasusḇa sya.
Ma snonkakusya nari sikofen faro bon na; kwamsiser epen inko! ma faro bon na: Kwupoi inko!
Snar rofyor sifrur rarirya faro ai ḇepek, rosai wer kuker ai ḇemas?"
Ma sun kako snon ḇese risuru wer, isoine snon ḇarḇor fa susma samamyai marmar fnoḇek Yesus.
Fafisu srakwar ro moḇ ḇenirḇe Ḇukorbei (Golgota), spai Yesus ro moḇ ani fnoḇek snon ḇarḇor risuru ansu, oso ro ḇar raku ḇyedi ma suminya ro ḇar rasar ḇyedi.
Yesus ikofen: "O, Mami, buk ampun farosi, snar sifawi rosai sifrur ineḇa." Ma skinsor fa sḇerarwas sansun ḇyena.

Kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sores rodia ma smam nakam. Manfarkin-manfarkin sya skoryayei, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku ḇesesya fyasparsi, mboi knikine komampan fyaspar mankundiri, rofyor i Wairek ḇekaku Allah kyinfir kwar."
Rarirya kako sordade-sordadesya skoryayei, ssḇuk anggur ḇemnir faroi
ma sikofen: "Yahudisya wairek sedi awido, faspar mankundaw!"
Sfas ro apropya pumya radine: "Ine Yahudisya wairek sedirya."
Snon ḇarḇor oso spai fnoḇek Yesus, dakonefi, doḇo: "Kristus iso awke? Rarirya ido faspar mankundaw ma nu kako!"
Ḇape suminya isonek i, ḇo doḇo: "Inja wamkak faro Allah ḇake, mboi kokam kosma samamyai marmari?
Kukada kusma samamyai snar sasar kufrur na, ḇape snon ine dakfrur sasarḇa."
Raimnai ikofen: "Yesus, nari waswarepen aya, rofyor wafyafer imnis wairek."
Yesus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Yakofen kaku faro aw, kaku ḇeri ras ine nari awsya kuker aya ro Firdaus."
Fafisu ro ras ani indokada oras samfur seser risuru orkok pandaf, ma pampanya ikawef supya fyor ani ḇesiper isof oras kior mandira,
snar ori isnaiḇa. Ma kruḇen eruk Sim Ḇesren imsawekra ḇyesuru.
Ma Yesus dor naba: "O, Mami, ro ḇramsu yarir rur ayedi." Ma ikofen rarirya posa, insape imar.
Rofyor mambri sararya myam roi ḇeḇesya anna, isandik Allah, doḇo: "Kaku, snon ine irya snon ḇenapes!"
Ma posa kwar ro kawasa ḇeḇor ḇepanjuḇer rodia fa ḇeyakmami, smam rosai ḇeḇesya anna, sibur sfafko mankunsi.
Snonkakusya kam ḇefawi Yesus fanam sya, ma kako bin-bin ḇesoi ker Galilea, sores ḇinkwan ma smam roi ḇeḇesya anna kam.
Snon oso snonsnon ḇyedi Yusuf. Snon anine ḇyekina ro Kankain Karkara Ḇeba, kako snon ḇeḇye ma ḇenapes rirya.
Ḇyesne oserḇa kuker fararur Kankain Karkara sawos namukya. I snon Arimatea ro mnu Yahudi oso ma ikako dakwaf-waf Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
Rya faro Pilatus ma dor Yesus baken ḇyedi.
Ma isabu baken ani kwar pyankuni kuker kruḇen mansek (lenan), raimnai ikriri ro ureren spaikir ro urek karui, ro moḇ sikrir ḇemar osoro ḇaim.
Ras ani ras jumaat, ras Mananai Yahudi fyanam kwar.
Ma bin-bin ḇeso Yesus ro Galilea mumansya, sakso kako fa sakmam ureren ani fa sifawi moḇ rosai Yesus baken ḇyedi sikriri roya.
(56a) Ma rofyor sibur kwar, sfasos kefi-kefi ma mani ḇespum. (56b) Ma ras Mananai Yahudi sikam simnai snar sasoser Refo Yahudi,
ḇape ro ras ari arwo prim kakuya bin ansi sun kefi-kefi sfasos kwar na ḇo sraḇe rus Yesus ḇyani.
Ma sisma karui ḇesisen rus ani ikris kwar,
ma ssun kwar ro ureren ani ḇape sisrow Yesus baken ḇyediḇa.
Fafisu sores sikmom snar roi ḇeḇesya ani, kniko beri snon risuru susansun-sansun ḇesnaper ma suyores fandusi.
Simkak kaku ma skankunem, ḇape snonkaku ansuya sukofen farosi, ḇo suyoḇo: "Snaro mkosewar ḇekenemya rofandu ḇemarsya?
Isya ro dineḇa, diḇri kwar. Mkoswarepen rosai ikofen faro mko, rofafisu isya kaker ro Galilea,
isoine Rumkun Snonkakuya nari sḇoḇi faro snonkaku ḇesasar ma spai ro aprop, ḇape nari diḇri ro ras ḇeḇekiorya."
Inja siswarepen Yesus wos ikofen ani.
Ma skaḇer kwar ro rus, sfar nakam faro manfamyan sanfur seser oser ansi ma faro naek ḇesesya kam.
Bin-bin ansi sisosine Maria, ḇerama ro Magdala, ma Yohana, ma Maria Yakobus snari. Ma bin-bin ḇese ono kako ḇeyaksosi, sḇaryas faro manwawan ansi.
Ḇape faro manwawan ansi soḇo bin ansi seḇindawsi ma sikyar wos senaḇa.
Rarirya inja Petrus iyori ma ifrar fasaw ḇerus ani. Fafisu kyankunem ma ikiki mundum, myam kruḇen ḇepankun monda. Raimnai ibur ma iwasen ro sne ḇyedi rosai ḇeḇesya kwarya.
Ro ras ani kako snon risuru ro Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi suraḇe mnu ḇenirḇe Emaus, swafya indokada mil rifik ro Yerusalem,
ma sufarfyar ro roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar anna.
Fafisu suisya suyawawos ma sufuken yayesu, Yesus mankundi ryama isnefer su, ma imbran fnoḇek su.
Ḇape roi oso isya idwarek sumkasna, isof supok sumamḇaḇir iba.
Yesus ikofen farosu ḇo doḇo: "Rosai mumbran muyawosya?" Inja sumnai kuker sne ḇefafardun.
Oso ro su snonsnon ḇyedi Kleopas, kyarem faroi, doḇo: "Awne werer snonkaku amber ḇeramuma babo ḇe Yerusalemke, indiri wakfawi rosai ḇeḇesya rodia ro ras ḇepupes naneḇa?"
Ifuken su ḇo doḇo: "Rosai ḇeḇesyaya?" Sukarem: "Rosai ḇeḇesya kuker Yesus snon Nazaret. Ima nabi rirya, ḇepoik ro fararur ma wos ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ro ḇarpon er nkoḇesi kam.
Ḇape mananir-mananir imam ma manfarkin-manfarkin nkoḇesi sḇoḇi fa smuni, isoine spai kwar ro aprop isof imar.
Mboi ro randakya nkokyar iso nari ḇerama fa ḇefaspar er Israel. Ḇape ras rikior nawas kwar, fafisuya roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya.
Mboi bin ono rofandu nko sifrur kanandor nko: Isnai karkir sraḇe rus ma sisrow Yesus baken ḇyediḇa.
Raimnai skaḇer ma sikofen ḇo soḇo, mboi smam kwar malaikat ono sikofen farosi, mboi ikenem.
Ma min nkoḇesi ono sra kwar ḇerus ani, ma sisma kaku raris wos binsya sikofen na, ḇape sakmami ḇa."
Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro su: "Ne, mko snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, rariso mkosnemna npakrek, isof mkokyar ḇaḇeri roi ḇeḇor kam nabisya sikofen kwar na!
Mboi Wairek nari ḇyekandera nabor resari insape syun ro payamyum ḇyedi?"
Raimnai ikofen fasna faro su rosai sfas kwar ro Refoya, randak ro syap Moses isof syap nabi-nabi syakam.
Skofanam mnu skorayoḇ ani ma iḇe imbran pdef mararan ḇyedi.
Ḇape suyembuki, ḇo suyoḇo: "Kwainus nu, snar mandira kwar ma ori fyanam syun." Inja kyainus su.
Rofyor kyain dananus su, dun mamami ma ikofen kasumasa, raimnai pyefi ma ḇyukna faro su.
Rofafisu ani sumkasna nbas ma sumam ḇaḇiri, ḇape ipromes bur su.
Sufuken yaye su: "Mboi kusnesna naryaḇ kaku rofafisu iwawos kuker ku ro nyanya faduri ma rofyor ikofen fasna Refoya maro ku?"
Inja suyor su ma sukaḇer beri ḇe Yerusalem. Ro diwa susrow manfamyan samfur seser oser ansi. Sisya siryur kam kuker minmin sesi.
Sikofen: "Kaku ḇeri Manseren diḇri kwar ma fyasna mankundi kwar faro Simon."
Raimnai snon ansuya kako suyakfarfyar rosai ḇeḇesya kuker su ro nyanya faduri ma rariso sumam ḇaḇiri rofyor pyef mamamiya.
Ma rofyor sawawos roi ḇeḇesya ani, knikoḇama Yesus dores rofandu sedi ma ikofen farosi: "Aski faro mko!"
Sikandor ma simkak snar siwarki, soḇo smam rodur oso.
Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Snaro mkomkak ma rosai eḇedari mkokormararu ro mkosnemna?
Mkomam ro ḇramin ayesuine ma wemin ayesuine: Mankundayairi; mkopan ro aya insa mkofawi, imnis mkomam ro aya ine, snar rodurya ḇyekraf ma korḇa."
Ikofen rarirya, ma fyasna ḇramin ḇyesuya ma wemin ḇyesuya farosi.
Ma fafisu sikyar ḇakaker snar raryaḇ ma kanandor sedi, ikofen farosi: "Roḇean ono naisyake?"
Inja ssḇuk faroi in ḇesorep ker oser.
Duni ma dani ḇo smam kam.
Ikofen farosi: "Ine wos ayedi, yakofen kwar faro mko rofafisu ayaisya fnoḇek mko, isoine mboi roi ḇekur aya na nari namnis kam raris fasfas syap Moses ma syap nabi-nabi ma syap mazmur."
Raimnai ḇyas swaruser sena, isof sifawi wos Refoya.
Ikofen farosi: "Fasfas isya radine: Wairek nari ḇyekandera ma nari diḇri fandu ḇemarsya ro ras ḇekiorya.
Ma kuker snonsnon ḇyedi ḇaryas ḇekur marmar ma ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar nari sḇaryas na faro er-ersya kam, randak ro Yerusalem ine.
Mko ḇeḇesaksi roi ḇeḇor nane kam.
Ma nari yafarem faro mko rosai Mami ḇyeasas kwar faro aya. Ḇape nari mko kain waf ro mnu ine isof mkoḇe ḇefasos kuker papoik ro Allah."
Raimnai Yesus dunsi ḇe mnuya ḇandiri isof sfanam Betania, rodia ḇyeḇoksi.
Ma fafisu ḇyeḇoksi, ḇyeḇekanow ḇe boiyaswa ma ibursi.
Skankunem ma sḇansuba faroi, raimnai sibur ḇe Yerusalem kuker raryaḇ ḇeba kaku.
Sisya ḇesya kwar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma sisandiki.
Wosya isya ro randakya; Wos ani isya kuker Allah ma Wos ani Allah dirya.
Wos ani isya kuker Allah ro randakya.
Roi ḇeḇor nakam i ḇefrur nanya ma rofyor isyaḇa, roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar anna kam napok ndariryaḇa kako.
Ro i kankenemya isya ma kankenemya ḇyesasna snonkaku.
Sasna ani isnai ro pampanya, ma pampanya ipokiḇa.
Allah iwan snonkaku oso fa ryama, snonsnon ḇyedi Yohanes;
Yohanes ryama imnis saksi fa ḇyesaksi sasna ani, insa snonkakusya kam sikyar.
Yohanes iso ḇeḇe isnaiyaḇa, ḇape ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ro sasna ani.
Sasna kakuya, iso ḇeḇeisnai snonkaku oser-oser, ryama ḇe supswan ine.
Isya kwar ro supswan ine ma iso ḇefrur supswan ine, ḇape supswan ine ssmambaḇiriḇa.
Ryama faro kawasa ḇyesi, ḇape kawasa ḇyesi simeweri.
Ḇape snonkaku ḇemarisen ma ḇekyari syakam ḇyuk papoik farosi, insa seromawa Allah ḇyesi.
Seḇeyaḇen kuker ḇaḇesnonkakuḇa, snar kankenem ḇebaboya ryamuma ro Allah.
Wosya ḇyesnonkaku kwar, ma ikenem fandu ko, ma komam baba ḇyedi, isoine baba ssḇuk faroi imnis Kmaya Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi, ifo kuker saswar fakamaman ma napnapes.
Yohanes ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur i ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Snon ine iso yakofen ḇadir ḇo yoḇo: Ḇarpurya ro aya nari oso ryama, ḇape ryama ḇepon kwar ro aya, snar isya kwar rofyor ayaisya ḇaimya."
Snar ifo kuker saswarya, ma saswar ḇyedi imnaiḇa ma ḇyeḇok ko.
Snar sasoser Refo Yahudi Moses iso ḇeḇuk nani, ḇape saswar fakamaman ma napnapes ndama ro Yesus Kristus.
Snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa ḇemam Allah kwar; ḇape Allah Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi, ḇemnis kuker kmari ma ḇeroyusi ḇesya kwar, iso ḇefasna Kmaya maḇeko.
Ma ine ḇaḇesaksi ro Yohanes, fafisu snon Yahudisya ro Yerusalem siwan imam ma snon Lewi ono faroi ma sifukeni: "Manseiso aw?"
Kyarem ma fyamyun epenḇa, ḇo doḇo: "Aya ine Wairek ḇa."
Raimnai sifuken faroi: "Au rya ke nabi beramaya?" Kyarem: "Roba!"
Inja sikofen faroi: "Manseiso aw? Snar nari nkoḇuk kankarem faro ḇewan inkosya. Rosai wakofen fa ḇekur mankundwaya?"
Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Aya iso nabi Yesaya ikofen kwarya, snonkaku ḇekaru ro sup ḇeursḇa: Mkokarpyom nyan faro Manseren!"
Ma rofandu snonkaku siwan ansi, snon Farisi ono sisya.
Sifuken faroi ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor wairek ḇeḇuk koreriya iso awḇa, Elia iso awḇa, ma nabi risawḇa ido, snaro buk masi sren?"
Yohanes kyarem farosi ḇo doḇo: "Yaḇuk masasi kuker war; ḇape rofandu mko snon oso isya dores ḇo mkofawiḇa,
isoine i, ḇerapapur ro aya. Yaper kaḇrai ḇefes roi ḇesower ḇyesi, yasyusḇa.
Roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya ro Betania, ro Yordan, ḇar wamurem moḇ Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren roya.
Ro meserdi Yohanes myam Yesus ryayoḇi ma ikofen: "Mkomam kada Allah Domba Mkun ḇyedi, ḇepyos sasar supswan ine.
Iso yakofen ani: Nari ḇerapapur aya, ikada pyon aya kwar snar isya kwar rofyor ayaisya ḇaim.
Ma ayaḇardi randakya yamam ḇaḇiriḇa, ḇape snar i ḇeḇedari yarama yaḇuk masasi kuker war, insa ḇyeḇeḇadir faro Israel."
Ma Yohanes ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇo doḇo: "Yamam kwar Rurya dado ro nanki imnis manjawa, ma kyain roi.
Ma aya ine kako yamam ḇaḇiriḇa, ḇape i ḇewan aya fa yaḇuk masi sren kuker war, dawos kwar faro aya: Rofyor mam Rurya dado faro snon oso ma kyain roi, irya nari ḇeḇuk masi sren kuker Rur Ḇesrenya.
Ma yamami kwar ma yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi: Inekada Allah Rumkun ḇyedirya."
Ro meserdi Yohanes dores wer rodia kuker manfamyan risuru ḇyesui.
Ma fafisu myam Yesus dunuk, ikofen: "Mkomamkada Allah domba Mkun ḇyedi!"
Manfamyan ansuya sumnaf rosai ikofen kwar, inja sura suso Yesus.
Ḇape Yesus iknenef ḇe ḇarpur, myam susoi inja ikofen faro su, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai musewarya?" Sukofen faroi: "Rabi (isoine guru), moḇ rosai kwain roya?"
Ikofen faro su: "Muramuma nari mankun mumame." Susoi ma suyakmam moḇ rosai kyon roya, ma ro ras ani sukain fnoḇeki; fafisu ani indokada oras fiak mandira.
Oso rofandu su ḇemnaf Yohanes wos ḇyedi ma ḇeso Yesus snonsnon ḇyedi Andreas, Simon Petrus ḇedar ḇyedirya.
Andreas isrow Simon, naek ḇyedi ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Nkosrow kwar Wairek ḇeyun koreri." (Wairek) isoine Kristus.
Duni faro Yesus, Yesus myami ma ikofen: "Au Simon, Yohanes romawa ḇyedi, nari snir awḇe Kefas (isoine Petrus = Karui bosen)."
Ro meserdi, Yesus kyara namuk fa ryaḇe Galilea, isrow kuker Filipus ma ikofen faroi: "Waso aya!"
Filipus mnu ḇyedi Betsaida, Andreas ma Petrus mnu suḇedi.
Filipus isrow Natanael ma ikofen faroi: "Nkosrow i kwar, Moses ikofen ro Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi ansya isoine Yesus, Yusuf romawa ḇyedi ro Nazaret."
Natanael ikofen faroi: "Inja roi ḇeḇye oso nari ryama ro Nazaretke?"
Filipus ikofen faroi: "Rwama ma wakmam!" Yesus myam Natanael ryamuma yoḇi, inja ikofen: "Mkomam inekada snon Israel kraf oso, kosma ankarkar roiḇa!"
Natanael ikofen faroi: "Mambaḇir aya rariso?" Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor Filipus dor aw ḇaim, yamam kwain ro ara knamya baḇdi."
Natanael ikofen faroi: "Guru, Allah Rumkun ḇyedi iso au, ma kawasa Israel wairek sediso au!"
Yesus kyarem: "Snar yakofen faro au; yamam aw ro ara knamya fuarya eḇedari wakyar ya? Nari mam roi ḇeḇor ḇesyadi wer ro ine."
Raimnai Yesus ikofen wer faroi: "Yakofen faro aw, kaku ḇeri nari mam nanki ḇyas ma Allah malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi sado sek faro Rumkun Snonkakuya."
Ro ras ḇeḇekiorya munara fakawiwin oso isya ḇyeḇefrur ro mnu Kana sup Galilea, ma Yesus snari isya rodia;
Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sakposi kako ro munara fakawawin ani.
Rofyor anggur sesi siḇro, Yesus snari ikofen faroi: "Anggur sesya siḇro."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Awine rosai wamarisen ro aya? Fafisu yedi ryama ḇaim."
Inja snari ikofen faro ḇeyuffarmyansya: "Rosai ikofen faro mko, mko frurna!"
Rodia babewu riwonem naisya sfasos na faro ḇanḇan imnis rari kawasa Yahudi, oser-oser iser fyom risuru oroḇa kior.
Yesus ikofen faro ḇeyuffarmyan ansi: "Mkoser babewu nane rao nafo kuker war." Ma siser narao nafo.
Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Knikine mko nawna ma mkun faro manfarkin munaraya."
Manfarkin munara ani ryepen war ani kwar, ḇefawnai kwar ḇe anggur ani ma ifawiḇa anggur ansi srama kero, ḇape ḇeyuffarmyan, ḇenaw war ani, ḇefawiya dor manfakawin snonya,
ma ikofen faroi: "Imnis raris rari Yahudi, snonkakusya ssḇuk anggur ḇeḇye resari isof kawasasya sinem rao sisyopen, insape ssḇuk anggur ḇeḇye mankunba; ḇape wakram anggur ḇeḇesya isof knikine."
Ine aḇyair kanandor ḇepon Yesus ifrur ro Kana sup Galilea, ma kuker aḇyair ine fyasna baba ḇyedi. Inja manfamyan ḇyesi sikyar faroi.
Raimnai Yesus ryaḇe Kapernaum fnoḇek snari ma naek ḇyesi ma manfamyan ḇyesi, ma skain rodia ḇe ras riḇeso monda.
Fafisu ras munara Paskah kawasa Yahudi fyanam kwar, Yesus dekḇe Yerusalem.
Ro Allah Rum ḇyedi manfarḇyan sapi, kambing, domba ma manjawa, ma ḇesadwer pipi skain rodia.
Inja pyar kaḇrai baken osoḇe ayos, raimnai ḇyuki iyaw sikam ro Allah Rum ḇyedi kuker kambing-domba ma sapi sesi; pipi ḇesadwer isbawer si ḇo pyambar meja-meja sena.
Faro manfarḇyan manjawasya ikofen: "Mkun roi ḇeḇor nanekam bur moḇ ine, mkofrur Mami rum ḇyedi awer ḇe moḇ ḇefarḇyan."
Inja manfamyan ḇyesi siswar smai fasfas ḇeyoḇo: "Saswar ayedi faro rum bedi, O Allah, ifrur dosam imnis for ḇekun."
Kawasa Yahudi sisampum Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Aḇyair rosai fasna maro nko, mboi wasma papoik fa wafrur rarirya?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mkokakok Allah Rum ḇyedine kada, ma ro ras rikior nari yaḇawes i wer."
Raimnai kawasa Yahudi sikofen faroi: "Wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak seser riwonem Allah Rum ḇyedine snonkaku sḇawesi ma au nari ḇeḇawesi ro ras rikioryake?"
Ḇape roi dawos sarḇer kuker Allah Rum ḇyedi, isoine mankundi baken ḇyedi.
Ḇarpurya, rofafisu diḇri ro fandu ḇemarsya, insape manfamyan ḇyesi siswarepen roi ḇeḇesya ani ikofeni kwar, ma sikyar fasfas Refo ma Yesus wos ikofen ani kwar.
Ma fafisu isya ro Yerusalem, fyor munara ḇeba Paskahya, kawasa sibor sikyar faroi snar smam aḇyair ifrur kwar na.
Ḇape Yesus mankundi ikyar siḇa, snar myamkir sikam,
ma fandun fa snonkaku oso ikofen faroi, ro manseirya wer kako snar myamkir rosai isya ro snonkaku sisnes na.
Snon farisi oso snonsnon ḇyedi Nikodemus, snon manfarkin ro agama Yahudi.
Roḇ oso ryama faro Yesus ma ikofen: "Rabi, nkofawi, mboi rwama imnis Guru Allah wawan ḇyedi; snar snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa ifrur aḇyair-aḇyair wafrur nane, rofyor Allah ifnoḇeki ḇa."
Yesus kyarem, doḇo: "Yakofen faro aw, kaku ḇeri rofyor snonkakuyo ḇyeḇeyaḇen kaḇer werḇa, ipok myam Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyediḇa."
Nikodemus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Rariso nari saḇen snon oso, rofyor ḇyemansar kwar? Inja, nari syun wer ro snari sneyuser ḇyena ma ḇyeḇeyaḇen werke?"
Yesus kyarem: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro au, rofyor snon oso ḇyeḇeyaḇen kuker war ma Rurya ḇa ipok daksun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyediḇa.
Rosai saḇen ro krafya, kraf rirya, ma rosai saḇen ro Rurya, Rur rirya.
Wakandor awer, snar yakofen faro aw: Nari mkoḇe ḇeyaḇen wer.
Wamya iso ḇemoḇ imarisen, ma wamnaf rakrokya, ḇape wafawi moḇ ryamuma royaḇa, roḇaido moḇ iḇe isoyoḇya ḇa. Rarirya kuker snonkaku ḇeyaḇen ro Allah Rur ḇyedi."
Nikodemus kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Rariso nari roi ḇeḇesya ani ryarirya?"
Yesus kyarem, doḇo: "Aw guru ro Israel, insape woḇe wafawiḇa?
Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro aw, nkowawos ro roi inkofawi ma nkoḇe saksi ro roi nkomam, ḇape mkomewer ḇaḇesaksi nkoḇena.
Mkokyarḇa, rofyor yawawos kuker mko ro roi ḇero supswan ine, rariso nari mkokyar, rofyor yawawos kuker mko ro roi ḇero boiyaswa?
Snon oso ḇaḇeri ḇeyek kwar ḇe boiyaswa, mboi i ḇeyado kwar ro boiyaswa, isoine Rumkun Snonkakuya.
Ma imnis kuker Moses kyaf ikak kansai ro ai oso ro sup ḇeursḇa, rarirya kako Rumkun Snonkakuya nari skafi ro apropya,
insa snonkaku ḇekyar faroi sisma koreri ḇekain fyoroya.
Snar Allah saswar ḇyedi ibabos faro supswan ine, isof ḇyuk kwar Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi, insa snonkaku ḇekyar faroi sya sroḇa, mboi sisma koreri.
Snar Allah iwan Rumkun ḇyedi fa ḇyuk samamyai faro supswan ineḇa, mboi insa fyaspari.
Mansei ḇekyar faroi, nari sisma samamyaiḇa; ḇape mansei ḇekyarḇa, isya ro samamyaiya kwar, snar ikyar faro Allah Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi snonsnon ḇyediḇa.
Ma samamyaiya isoine: Isnaya ryafes kwar ḇe supswan ine, ḇape snonkakusya simarisen syadi pampanya ro isnaya, snar fararur sena naḇarḇor.
Snar mansei ḇefrur ḇarḇor, dayin isna ani ma rya faro isnai aniḇa, insa fararur ḇarḇor ḇyena nbayir awer;
ḇape mansei ḇefrur roi ḇenapes, rya faro isnaya, insa ḇyeḇefasna ḇayir, mboi rosai ifrur na namnis kuker Allah marisen ḇyedi."
Raimnai Yesus rya kuker manfamyan ḇyesi ḇe sup Yudea ma kyain rodiwa fnoḇeksi ma ḇyuk masi sren.
Ḇape Yohanes kako dakḇuk masi sren ro Ainon, fanam Salim, snar rodia war na nabor, ma snonkaku sibor sisrow ro dia fa ḇyuk masi sren farosi,
snar rofyor ani Yohanes ḇyeḇesun ro bui ḇaim.
Mboi rofafisu ani Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesi sfamfaḇri kuker snon Yahudi oso kuker mnuk fasasren.
Inja sra faro Yohanes ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rabi, snon ḇefnoḇek kuker aw ro war Yordan ḇariwara ma faroi buk ḇaḇesaksi kwar, dakḇuk masi sren kako ma kawasa syakam sra faroi."
Yohanes kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ḇeyun faro mankundi, rofyor neḇeḇuk faroi ro boiyaswaḇa.
Mankun mko mkoḇesaksi, mboi yakofen kwar: Aya ine Wairek ḇa, ḇape siwan aya fa yaponi.
Ḇena ḇinfakawinya, isoine manfakawinya; ḇape manfakawinya bati ḇyesi ḇeyores fanami ma ḇemnafi, siryaḇ fafayaḇa, snar simnaf mkaren ro manfakawin ani. Irya raryaḇ ayedi iba.
Ikada nari iba syadi, ḇape ayakada nari yabaḇa syadi.
Mansei ḇeraker boiyaswa isyadi ro nakam; mansei ḇeḇe knam ro supswan ine, i snonkaku ro supswan ine ma dawawos ro wos supswan. Mansei ḇeraker boiyaswa, ikada isyadi ro nakam.
Ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ro roi myam na ma roi imnaf na, ḇape snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri ikyar ḇaḇesaksi ḇyena.
Mansei ḇekyar ḇaḇesaksi ḇyena, ikada kyarem, mboi Allah inapes.
Snar mansei Allah iwan ani, iso ḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, snar Allah ḇyuk Rur ḇyedi ḇesiper faroi.
Kmaya iswar Rumkunya ma ḇyuk roi ḇeḇor nakam faroi kwar.
Mansei ḇekyar faro Rumkunya, isma kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, ḇape mansei ḇeḇeuser Rumkunya ḇa, ipok isma koreriḇa, mboi Allah masasor ḇyedi kyuri ḇesya kwar."
Rofyor Manseren Yesus ifawi, snon Farisisya simnaf kwar, mboi Yesus isma ma ḇyuk masi sren faro manfamyan sibor syadi wer ro Yohanes --
mboi Yesus mankundi ḇeḇuk masi sren yaḇa, mboi manfamyan ḇyesi, --
Inja ibur Yudea ma kyaḇer ḇe Galilea.
Nari iḇe dunuk ro sup Samaria.
Ma ryama ro mnu oso ro Samaria, ḇenirḇe Sikhar fanam saprop ḇepon iwara Yakub ḇyuk faro romawa ḇyedi, Yusuf.
War ḇeyer Yakub isya rodia. Yesus imor kaku ro mararan ani, inja kyain ro war ḇeyer ani andiirya. Ras ani indokada oras samfur seser risuru.
Snar manfamyan ḇyesi sra kwar ḇe mnuya fa skoḇes roḇean.
Ḇarpurya bin Samaria oso ryama dukeḇ war. Yesus ikofen faroi: "Buk waroma yinem kada."
Ma bin Samaria ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Inja aw, snon Yahudi, ḇesyaḇo wor war ro aya, bin Samaria?" (snar kawasa Yahudi sikenemso Samariasya ḇa.)
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor wafawi Allah fakamama ḇyedi ma mansei ḇeyor faro aw: Buk waroma yinem! Nari wor kwar roi fa ḇyuk kwar faro aw war ḇekenemya."
Bin ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, wasma papos osoḇa ma war ḇeyer ine ikakibos; ro moḇ rosai wasma war ḇekenemya roya?
Inja waba syadi ro kma nkoḇedi Yakub, ḇeḇuk war ḇeyer ine maro nko ma mankundi dakinem roi kako, kuker romawa ḇyesi ma rofanfan ḇyesi?"
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Mansei ḇeyinem war ine, nari imbrow wer,
ḇape mansei ḇeyinem ro war nari yaḇuk faroi, ipok imbrow wer ḇa isof fyoro. Isyadi wer war nari yaḇuk faroi, nari ḇyewar ḇeryuḇer ro kankenem ḇyedi, ma isof kankenem ḇekain fyoroya."
Bin ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, bukma ḇe aya war ani, insa yambrow werḇa ma yarama yukeḇ war ro dine werḇa."
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rwamura, wor swambri ḇo mukaḇer muma rodine."
Bin ani ikofen faroi ḇo doḇo: "Ayama yana swa osoḇa." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wos bedi kyakubos beri, mboi wasma swayoḇa,
snar nwa swari rim kwar ma ḇeroyus aw ro baboine, ikada swabediryaḇa."
Bin ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, insape yafawi aw nabi oso.
Kpu nkoḇesi sisyom Allah ro bon ine bori, ḇape er besi sikofen ḇo soḇo, kosyom Allah monda ro Yerusalem."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Bin awne wakyar faro aya, fafisuya nari ryama, mboi nari mkosyom Allah ro bon ineḇa, ma ro Yerusalemḇa kako.
Mkosyom rosai mkomam ḇaḇirḇa, nkokada nkosyom rosai nkomam ḇaḇir, snar korerya ryama ro er Yahudi.
Ḇape fafisuya nari ryama ma ryama kwar, mboi ḇesyom kuker napnapes nari siyom Kmaya kuker Rur ma napnapes; snar Kmaya imarisen samsyom ḇerarirya.
Allah Rur rirya ma mansei ḇesyomi nari, sisyomi kuker Rur ma napnapes."
Bin ani kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawi, nari Wairek ryama, sniri kako ḇe Kristus; rofyor ryama kwar, nari ḇyaryas roi ḇeḇor nanekam maro nko."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Aya iso wawos kukerya."
Rofyor ani manfamyan ḇyesi srama ma sikandor, mboi isya dawawos kuker bin oso. Ḇape oso rofandusi ifuken ḇaḇeri faro bin ani: "Rosai wamarisenya? Roḇaido: Ḇefuken Yesus, snaro wawawos kuker bin ani?"
Rarirya bin ani ibur babewu ḇyedi rodia ma ryaḇe mnu ma ikofen faro snonkaku ḇero mnuya ansi:
"Mkorama, mkakmam snonkaku oser isya ikofen ḇadir faro aya ro roi ḇeḇor yafrur kwar nakam. Imbude Kristus iryake?"
Inja snonkakusya sisasyarbur mnu ani fa sisrow Yesus.
Ro fafisu ani manfamyan ḇyesi sidifi, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, wanan."
Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Faro aya roḇean naisya mkomambaḇir naba."
Inja manfamyan ansi sawos yaye farosi: "Imbude snonkaku ono sun roḇean ono fa dan kwarke?"
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Roḇean ayena isoine yafrur marisen ḇewan ayanya ma yaḇeimnis fararur ḇyuk ḇe ayanya.
Mboi mkokofen ḇo mkoḇo: Paik rifiak wer fafisu afufyake? Ḇape yakofen faro mko: Mkomam kada yaf na nambrai kwar fa neḇeyuf.
Snonkaku ḇeyufsya sisma sasuref sedi kwar ma sfanjur bon faro kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, isof ḇekekef ma ḇeyufsya sikam simarisen.
Wos sarḇer ine kyaku isoine: Ono sḇuḇer mboi ono ḇese suf.
Yawan mko fa mkuf roi mkoker ḇa; snonkaku ḇese sesasewar mboi mkorama mkuf bon ro sasewar sena."
Ma kawasa Samaria sibor ro mnu ani sikyar kwar faroi snar bin ani wos ḇyena, ḇeḇesaksi: "Ikofen ḇadir faro aya roi ḇeḇor yafrur kwar nakam."
Fafisu snonkaku Samaria ansi srafa sisrow Yesus, sor faroi insa ryowus si; ma ryowus si rodia ḇe ras risuru.
Ma snonkaku sibor syadi wer ḇekyar snar wos ḇyena,
ma sikofen faro bin ani: "Nkokyar, snar wos ḇena wer ḇa mboi snar mankun inko, nkomnaf kwar roi ma nkofawi, mboi kaku ḇeri i ḇeḇuk koreri faro supswan ine."
Ma ras risuru susyonde ro Sikhar, Yesus ryaḇe Galilea,
snar Yesus mankundi myam kwar, mboi nabi oso sesyowi i ḇa ro mankundi mnu ḇyedi.
Ma rofyor ryama kwar ro Galilea, kawasa Galilea siwafi, snar smam roi ḇeḇor kam ifrur kwar ro Yerusalem ro munara ani, snar sikako sakso munara ani.
Inja Yesus kyaḇer wer ḇe Kana ro Galilea, ro moḇ ifrur warna fa neanggur ani. Ma ro Kapernaum manfyan wairek oso romawa ḇyedi iduf.
Fafisu imnaf, mboi Yesus ryama ker Yudea kwar ro Galilea, rya isrowi ma dor, insa ryama ma ḇyuk pararei faro romawa ḇyedi, snar romawa ḇyedi iduf marḇak.
Inja Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rofyor mkomam aḇyair kanandor ḇa, nari mkokyarḇa.
Manfyan warek ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rwama rofyor romawa ayedi imar ḇaim kada."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rwamura, romawa bani ikenem!" Snon ani ikyar wos Yesus ikofen faroi ani, inja ryaḇeri.
Fafisu isya kaker ro nyanya faduri manfyan ḇyesi srama sisrowi ma sikofen faroi, mboi romawa ḇyedi iprei.
Ikofen farosi oras rifis romawa ani ipreiya. Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Mandoḇinja orkokya oras oser samsam ḇyedi imnai."
Rarirya sinan ani iswarepen, mboi rofafisu aniso Yesus ikofen faroi: "Romawa bani iprei." Rarirya i kuker kina ḇyesi sikyar faro Yesus.
Ine aḇyair kanandor ḇeḇesuru Yesus ifrur ro fafisu iburker Yudea ḇe Galilea.
Raimnai Yahudisya ras ḇeba sedi fyanam, inja Yesus dekḇe Yerusalem.
Ro Yerusalem fanam "Kedwai Ḇeba Domba" sawon oso isya, ro wos Ibrani sniriḇe Betesda; ḇye aḇdares ririm
ma ro abdares anna kawasa ḇeduf sibor kaku sḇarek ro na: isoine snonkaku ḇepraf, ḇeyapaper ma snonkaku ḇepapipen, ḇewaf sawon ani irḇaren.
Snar rofafisu ono Manseren malaikat ḇyedi dado ro sawon ani fa irḇaren war ani; ma mansei ḇesabu ḇepon ro war ani ro fafisu irḇaren kwarya, ikada iprei ro dafduf rosairya wer.
Rodia snon oso isya iduf ḇewampasi wambarek samfur rikior seser war kwar.
Rofyor Yesus myam snon ani ḇyarek rodia ma snar Yesus ifawi, mboi iduf fyoro kwar, inja Yesus ifuken faroi: "Wamarisen fa wapreike?"
Snon ḇeduf ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, yana snonkakuyo rodineḇa fa ḇesabu aya ḇe sawon ani rofyor warya irḇarenya, ma rofyor yara ḇe sawon ani, snonkaku ḇese sisabu ḇepon aya kwar."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wakḇoke, wakanow yar ḇena ma wambrane."
Ma rofafisu ani beri snon ani iprei inja ikanow yar ḇyena ma imbrane. Fafisu ani ras Mananai Yahudi rirya.
Inja snonkaku Yahudisya sikofen faro snon ḇeprei babo ani: "Ras ine ras Mananai Yahudi inja wapok ḇar yar benaḇa."
Ḇape kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ḇeḇuk pararei maro aya kwarya, iso ḇekofen maro aya: wakanow yar ḇena ḇo wambrane."
Sifuken faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Snon manseiso ḇekofen faro aw: Wakanow yar ḇena ma wambranya?"
Ḇape snon ḇeprei babo ani ifawi mansei ḇeḇesyan yaba, snar Yesus syun ro fadu snonkaku ḇeḇor ro mob ani.
Ḇarpurya Yesus isrowi ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dori inja ikofen faroi: "Waprei kwar; wafrur sasar wer awer, imbude roi ḇeḇyeḇa syadi nkur aw wer ri."
Snon ani isasyar ma fyar faro kawasa Yahudisya, mboi Yesus iso ḇeḇuk pararei faroi kwarya.
Ma eḇedari kawasa Yahudisya sesasewar fa siḇe sewayam Yesus, snar ifrur roi ḇeḇor anna ro ras Mananai Yahudi.
Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Mami ifararur isof ras ine, inja aya kako yakfararur."
Inja kawasa Yahudisya sesasewar syadi wer insa smuni, snar ifararur ro ras Mananai Yahudiya derer ḇa, ḇape snar dap Allah ḇe kma ḇyedi, rarirya dow mankundi fa imnis kuker Allah.
Inja Yesus kyarem farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, Rumkunya nari ifrur royo ro mankundi ḇa, ikada ifrur monda rosai myam ro Kmari ifrur na; snar rosai Kmaya ifrurna, naiso Rumkunya dakfrurna.
Snar Kmaya iswar Rumkunya inja fyasna faroi roi ḇeḇor kam ifrur ro mankundi, mboi nari fyasna faroi fararur-fararur ḇeba syadi wer ro fararur-fararur anna, isof mkokandor.
Snar imnis raris Kmaya ḇyawes snonkaku ḇemarsya ma ḇyuk fa sikenem, rarirya kako Rumkunya dakḇuk kankenem faro mansei imarisenya.
Kmaya ḇyemankara oso ḇaḇeri, mboi ḇyuk kwar ḇaḇemankara ani ḇesiper faro Rumkunya,
insa kawasa kam sesyowi Rumkunya imnis raris moḇ sesyowi faro Kmaya. Mansei ḇeḇesyowi Rumkunya ḇa, ikako ḇyesyowi Kma ḇewani yaḇa.
Yakofen faro mko: "Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇerower wos ayena ma ikyar faro ḇewan ayanya, isma kankenem ḇemnaiḇa ma dakso samamyaiya ḇa, snar ikfisbur marmarya kwar ḇe kankenemya.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri fafisuya nari isyama ma ryama kwar, mboi snonkaku ḇemarsya simnaf Allah Rumkun ḇyedi mkarenya, ma ḇemnafi sya, nari sikenem.
Snar imnis raris Mami isma kankenemya ro mankundi, rarirya ḇyuk faro Rumkunya fa daksma kankenemya ro mankundi kako.
Ma ḇyuk kwar papoik faroi fa ḇyuk mankara, snar i Rumkun Snonkaku rirya.
Mkokandor awer roi ḇeḇesya nane, snar fafisu ḇyedi nari ryama, mboi snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇero ureren na dona nari simnaf mkaren ḇyedi,
ma faro ḇefrur mnis sya nari siḇersi ro ureren na faro kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, ḇape faro ḇeḇarḇorsya nari siḇersi fa sisma samamyai."
"Mankundaya ḇardi yafrur royoḇa; yaḇe mankara imnis kuker rosai yamnaf na, ma ḇaḇemankara yena nanapes, snar yaso marisen ayena ḇa, mboi marisen ro Kma bewan ayanya.
Rofyor yaḇe saksi ro roi ḇekur mankundaya, rarirya ḇaḇesaksi yena nanapesḇa;
ono ḇese sisya sesaksi ro roi ḇekur aya ma yafawi ḇaḇesaksi ssḇuk fa ḇekur aya mboi nanapes.
Mkofarem wawansya kwar faro Yohanes ma ḇyesaksi kwar ro nanapes;
ḇape yaḇefandun ḇaḇesaksi ro snonkakuḇa, mboi yakofen roi ḇeḇesya ani, insa mkosma koreri.
Yohanes imnis paramrom ḇesak ma ḇesnai ma mkokada mkomarisen knik monda sasnai ḇyedi.
Ḇape ḇaḇesaksi ayedi iba syadi ro ḇaḇesaksi Yohanes, isoine fararur ḇeḇor Mami ḇyuk maḇe Aya, insa yafrur na. Fararur ani kako iso yafrur kwar ine, ma iso ḇefasnai aya, mboi Mami iso ḇewan Aya.
Mami ḇewan Aya, iso ḇeḇuk saksi ro Aya. Mkopok mkomnaf mkaren ḇyediḇa, moḇ isnai raya kako mkopok fa mkomami ḇa,
ma wos ḇyena mkadu na ro mkosnemna ḇa, snar mkokyar faro wawan ani ḇa isoine ayaḇa.
Mkokukeḇ Refo, snar mkokara mkoḇe, mboi kuker i nari mkosma kankenem ḇemnaiḇa, ḇape Refoya ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ro Aya,
rarirya mkomewer mkorama faro aya fa mkosma kankenem ani.
Yafandun ḇa kuker samsyom ro snonkaku.
Ḇape faro mko, yafawi mboi ro mkosnemna mkona saswar faro Allah ḇa.
Yarama kuker snonsnon ro Mami ḇape mkofandun ayaḇa; rofyor snonkaku ḇese srama kuker snonsnon sena, nari mkomarisen si.
Nari mkokyar rariso, ne, mko ḇesewar sanandik ro snonkaku ḇese ma ḇesewar syom ḇerama ker Allah oser bakenya ḇa?
Mkokara awer nari yaḇuk sof mko ro ḇarpon Mami; ḇeḇuksof faro mkoya iso Moses, mkokyar ani.
Snar rofyor mkokyar faro Moses, rarirya nari mkokyar faro Aya, snar roi fyasna nkur Aya.
Ḇape rofyor mkokyar roi fyasna ḇa rariso nari mkokyar rosai yakofen na?"
Raimnai Yesus imbran ḇe danosen Galilea ḇar iwara, isoine danosen Tiberias.
Kawasa ḇeḇor semarani ḇo sisoi, snar smam aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ḇeḇuk parare, ifrur faro snonkaku ḇedufsi.
Ma Yesus dek urek oso ma kyain rodia kuker manfamyan ḇyesi.
Ma Paskah, ras ḇeba kawasa Yahudi, fyanam kwar.
Fafisu Yesus myam yaryari, myam snonkaku sibor semarani ḇo srama yoḇi, inja ikofen faro Filipus: "Romoḇ rosai nari kokoḇes mamami roya, insa kawasa sine san?"
Yesus ikofen rarirya snar imarisen imnasen Filipus, snar mankundi ifawi kwar, rosai nari ifrurya.
Filipus kyaren ḇo doḇo: "Mamami ḇeḇemaeja kumpan sarak utin risuru kakoyo, nari namnis farosi ḇa."
Snon oso ro manfamyan ḇyesi, isoine Andreas, Simon Petrus naek ḇyedi, ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo:
"Rodine romawa oso isya, nya mamami ririm ma in risuru; ḇape ndarirya ḇo nari namnis snonkaku ḇeḇor sine?"
Yesus ikofen: "Mkowansi fa skain." Ro moḇ ani aḇris sibor, inja snonkaku ansi skain, barbor sedi indokada snon syaran ririm.
Raimnai Yesus dun mamami anna, ma ikofen kasumasa faro Allah. Posa kwar ḇyerarwas na farosi, rarirya kako in ansuya, ma san rao isof sisyopen.
Ma rofyor sarbor kwar ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mkoryur mamami kerker ḇesyadi na, insa sisawen awer na."
Inja siryur inoken samfur seser risuru nafo kuker roḇean ḇesyadi ro mamami ririm snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi san na.
Fafisu snonkaku ansi smam aḇyair kanandor ifrur kwar ani, sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Kaku ḇeri inekada nabi nari ḇerama ḇe supswan ine."
Snar Yesus ifawi, siḇe srama fa sidifi insa ḇye wairek farosi. Inja isusu bursi ḇe urek.
Ma fafisu fyanam roḇ kwar, Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sraḇe danosen, ma sek ro wai
ma sunuk ḇe Kapernaum. Fafisu pyampan kwar Yesus ryama ḇaim kaker fa isrowsi,
mboi sorenya ikroḇ snar wamya ipok.
Skoḇores indokada kilometer risuru kior kwar, skomam Yesus imbran ro warya bori muma fanam wai ani. Inja skomkak kaku.
Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Aya irya, mkomkak awer!"
Simarisen fa dek ro waiya, ma rofafisu ani beri kako wai ani ifyafer ro moḇ skorayoḇya.
Ro meserdi kawasa ḇeḇor ḇekain ro danosenya ḇar iwara ansi, sifawi insanja wai oser monda rodia ma Yesus iso manfamyan ḇyesi ḇa, ḇoi serer siso ḇesyoḇsya.
Ḇape rofafisu ani wai ono ndama ker Tiberias napyar fanam moḇ san mamami ro ani, posa ro Yesus ikofen kasumasa kuker roḇean anna.
Fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi smam, mboi Yesus isya ro diaḇa ma manfamyan ḇyesi kako roḇa, sek ro wai anyaḇo sisyoḇ ḇe Kapernaum fa ssewar Yesus.
Fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sisrow Yesus ro danosenya ḇar iwara, sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rabi, fafisu rosai rwama ro dineya?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, mkosewar aya, snar mkomam aḇyair kanandor yafrur naba ḇoi snar mkan mamami rao mkosyopen.
Mkofararur, faro roḇean nari ḇero na awer, mboi faro roḇean ḇekain fyoro faro kenkenem ḇemnai ḇaya kada, nari Rumkun Snonkaku ḇyuk faro mko; snar iso Mami ḇyeasas kwar, isoine Allah."
Raimnai sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rosaiso nari nkofrurya, insa nkofrur Allah roi imarisen na?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Allah fararur imarisenya, isoine iḇye syadi mkokyar faro Allah wawan iwan kwarya."
Inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Aḇyair rosai wafrurya, insa nkomami ma nkokyar faro au? Fararur rosai nari wafrurya?
Kpu nkoḇesi san manna kwar ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa, imnis fasfas oso isya ro Refo: ssḇuk farosi fa san mamami ḇeraker boiyaswa."
Inja Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, Moses i ḇeḇuk mamami faro mko ro boiyaswa yaḇa, mboi Kma yedi ḇeḇuk faro mko mamami ḇekaku ro boiyaswa.
Snar mamami ḇeraker Allah irya mamami ḇesabu ro boiyaswa ma ḇeḇuk kankenem faro supswan."
Inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Manseren, buk maḇe nko ḇesya kwar mamami ani."
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Aya ine mamami ḇeḇuk kankenem; mansei ḇerama faro aya, nari ipok ibiser werḇa, ma mansei ḇekyar faro aya, ipok imbruw werḇa.
Ḇape yakofen faro mko kwar: Kaku ḇeri mkomam aya kwar, ḇape mkokyar ḇa.
Roi ḇeḇor kam Mami ḇyuk faro aya, nakam nari ndama faro aya, ma mansei nari ḇerama faro aya, nari yasaweni ḇa.
Snar ayai ḇesabu kwar ro boiyaswa, insa yafrur marisen ayena ḇa, ḇape yaḇeuser Allah marisen ḇyena ḇewan aya kwar.
Ma Allah ḇewan aya marisen ḇyedi, isoine insa snonkaku ḇeḇor kam ḇyuk faro aya kwar ono sro awer, ḇape insa yaḇawes si wer ro ras ḇepupesya.
Snar Mami marisen ḇyedi ryadine, isoine insa snonkaku oser-oser ḇemam Rumkunya, ma ḇekyar faroi, sisma kankenem ḇekain fyoro, ma insa yaḇawes si ro ras ḇepupesya."
Inja kawasa Yahudisya suremi snar ikofen kwar: "Aya ine mamami ḇesabu ro boiyaswa."
Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Mboi inenido Yesus iryake, Yusuf mandaḇendi, snar kma ma sna ḇyesu kofawi su? Rariso ikofen, ḇo doḇo: Aya ine yasabu ker boiyaswa?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mkurem awer."
Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ryama faro aya, rofyor Mami ḇewan aya duni maro aya, ma nari yaḇawesi ro ras papupesya.
Fasfas isya ro syap nabi-nabi ḇerok radine: Ma sikam nari Allah fyarkorsi. Ma snonkaku oser-oser ḇemnaf kwar, ma ḇemarisen farkarkor ro Mami, srama faro aya.
Fasfas ani ikofen ḇa mboi ono sisya smam Mami. Demir i ḇerama ro Allah, iso ḇemam kwar Kmari.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇekyarya, isma kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
Aya ine kada mamami ḇeḇuk kankenemya.
Kpu mkoḇesi san kwar manna ro sup ḇeursḇa ma simar kwar.
Ine mamami ḇesabu ro boiyaswa: Mansei ḇeyan mamami ine ido, ikada nari imar ḇa.
Aya ine mamami ḇekenem ḇesabu kwar ro boiyaswa. Rofyor oso dan ro mamami ine ido, ikada ikenem fyoro-fyoro ma mamami yaḇuk ani irya kraf ayedi, yaḇuk faro kankenem supswan."
Kawasa Yahudi sfamfaḇri rofandu mankunsi ma sikofen: "Rariso nari ḇyuk kraf ḇyedi fa ḇyeroḇean fa kani?"
Inja Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko rofyor mkan kraf Rumkun Snonkakuya ḇa ma mkinem rik ḇyedi ḇa, nari mkosma kankenemya ro mankun mko ḇa.
Mansei ḇeyan kraf ayedi ma ḇeyinem rik ayedi, ikada isma kankenem ḇekain fyoro ma nari yaḇuk fa diḇri ro awar ḇepupesya.
Snar kraf ayedi irya roḇean ḇekaku ma rik ayedi aninem ḇekaku.
Mansei ḇeyan kraf ayedi ma ḇeyinem ro rik ayadi kada ḇyeoser kuker aya ma yaḇe oser kukeri.
Imnis raris Mami ḇekenem ḇewan aya ma yakenem snar Mami, rarirya kako mansei ḇeyan aya, nari ikenem snar aya.
Ine kada mamami ḇesabu kwar ro boiyaswa, mamami ḇemnis kuker mamami kpu mkoḇesi san raimnai simar kwar aniḇa. Mansei ḇeyan mamami ine ikada isma kankenem fyoro-fyoroya."
Roi ḇeḇor nanekam Yesus ikofen na ro Kapernaum rofyor ḇyuk farkarkor ro Rum nadi.
Rofyor simnaf wos anna kam sibor ro manfamyan Yesus ḇyesi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Wos nane npakrek, mansei nari ḇekḇaḇ ḇemnaf naya?"
Yesus ifawi, mboi manfamyan ḇyesi sisurem snar wos anna, ikofen farosi: "Inja wos anna neḇirḇar kakyar mkoḇena?
Ma rariso rofyor mkomam Rumkun Snonkakuya dekḇe moḇ randakya isya roya?
Rurya iso ḇeḇuk kankenem, krafya ḇyefainda oso ḇaḇeri. Wos yawos faro mko nane irya Rur ma kankenem.
Ḇape rofandu mko ono sisya sikyarḇa." Snar Yesus ifawi ro randakya, mansei ḇekyarḇa ma mansei nari ḇeḇoḇiya.
Raimnai ikofen: "Eḇedari yakofen faro mko: Snonkaku oseroḇaḇeri nari ryama faro aya ido, Mami nari ḇyuk na faroi ḇa."
Randak ro ras ani manfamyan ḇyesi sisusu buri ma sisoi werḇa.
Inja Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyesi: "Inja mko kako mkomarisen mkobur ayake?"
Simon Petrus kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, faro mansei nari nkobur faroya? Manseren wos ḇena nbuk kankenem ḇekain fyoro;
ma nkokyar kwar ma nkofawi au Manseren wawan ḇesren ro Allah."
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mboi aya iso ḇekinfir mko snon samfur seser risuru ine? Mboi oso rofandu mko ḇyeibiris."
Ikofen fa kyurya isoine Yudas, Simon Iskariot mandaḇendi; snar iso nari ḇeḇoḇ Yesus, oso ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi.
Raimnai Yesus imbran yaryar Galilea, snar imewer kyain faswef ro Yudea, snar kawasa Yahudi sesewar fa siḇe smuni.
Fafisu ani ras munara kawasa Yahudi, isoine ras munara Soyai Undam fyanam kwar.
Rarirya Yesus naek ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Mkombran rodine ma mkora ḇe Yudea, insa manfamyan-manfamyan besi sakmam fararur wafrur na.
Snar snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri iyokef rosai ifrur na rofyor imarisen ḇye snonsnon ro ḇarpon kawasa. Rofyor wafrur roi ḇerarirya, fasnai mankundaw faro supswan ine."
Snar naek ma srar ḇyesi kako sakkyari ḇa.
Inja Yesus kyarem farosi: "Fafisu ayedi ryama ḇaim, ḇape faro mko fafisu na naisya ḇesya kwar.
Supswan ipok dayin mkoḇa, ḇape aya kada dayin aya, snar yakofen ḇesya kwar faro supswan ine roi ifrur na nḇarḇor.
Mkoramura ḇemunara ani. Aya kada yakra ḇaim, snar fafisu ayedi imnis ḇaim."
Rarirya wos ḇyena farosi, ma ikada kyain ro Galilea.
Ḇape rofyor naek srar ḇyesi sra kwar ḇe munara ani, insape ikako dakra, ḇape kuker kankunes.
Kawasa Yahudi ssasewar i ro munara ani ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Isya ro?"
Ma kawasa sibor sawos fasasis roi. Ono sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "I, snon ḇeḇye rirya." Ono wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Roḇa, fyarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor."
Ḇape snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ḇemku fa ḇeyawos fababa roi snar simkak kawasa Yahudisya.
Fafisu munara ani ḇyedodo, Yesus syun ro Allah Rum byedi ma ḇyuk farkarkor.
Inja kawasa Yahudisya sikandor ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso, snon ine daksun farkarkorḇa ḇesyaḇo isma fawawi ḇeradine!"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Farkarkor yaḇuk nane neknam ro mankundaya ḇa, ḇape neknam ro Allah ḇewan aya kwarya.
Mansei ḇemarisen ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi, nari ifawi farkarkor ayena ndamuma ro Allah, roḇaido yawawos ro mankundaya ḇardi.
Mansei ḇeyawawos ro mankundi ḇardi, syewar sanandik faro mankundi, ḇape mansei ḇesewar syom faro Allah ḇewaniya, ikada inapes ma dankar ḇa.
Moses iso ḇeḇuk sasoser Refo Yahudi faro mkoke? Ḇape oso ḇaḇeri rofandu mko ifrur sasoser anna. Snaro mkosewar fa mkomun aya?"
Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Setansya siswoḇer aw; mansei ḇeḇesewar fa ḇemun awya?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Fararur oser monda iso yafrur ro ras Mananai Yahudi ma mkokam mkokandor.
Inja: Moses ḇyuk fa insa mkofrur sofakfuk ḇape sofakfuk ani ḇyeknam ro Moses ḇa ḇoi ḇyeknam ro up mkoḇesi --mkomarisen sofakfuk ro ras Mananai Yahudi!
Rofyor snon oso isma sofakfuk ro ras Mananai Yahudi, insa seyuk awer Moses sasoser ḇyena, snaro mkomsor aya, snar yaḇuk pararei faro baken ḇesiper ro snonkaku oso ro ras Mananai Yahudi.
Mkoḇe mankara awer imnis rosai ḇeḇair, ḇape mkoḇe mankara kuker napnapes."
Snon Yerusalem ono sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku ine iso simarisen smunya?
Ma mkomam kada, dawawos kuker fababa ma sipok sawos roi oso faroi ḇa. Imbude manfarkin koḇesi sifawi kaku kwar, mboi i Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri?
Ḇape snon inekada kofawi moḇsai ryamuma roya, ḇape rofyor Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri ryama, snon osero ḇaḇeri ifawi moḇsai ryamuma roya."

Rofyor Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, dor naba: "Mboi ayakada mkomambaḇir ma mko fawi moḇ yaramuma roya; ḇape yarama ro mankundaya marisen ayediḇa, ḇape aya ine yaser wawan ro ḇenapesya ikada mkomamḇaḇiri ḇa.
Ayakada yamambaḇiri, snar yaramuma roi ma iso ḇewan aya."
Sesewar fa sfor Yesus, ḇape snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa iserepen i, snar fafisu ḇyedi ryama ḇaim.
Ḇape rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ono sibor sikyar faroi ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor Kristus ryama, nari ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor syadi ro snonkaku ine ifrurnake?"
Snon Farisi simnaf snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi roi sfararum fa ḇekur Yesus, inja mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi siwan fa ḇewaren Allah Rum ḇyedi sfor Yesus.
Inja Yesus ikofen: "Fafisu kermkun monda aya isya kuker mko ma ḇarpurya nari yakaḇer faro ḇewan ayanya.
Nari mkosewar aya, ḇape nari mkosrow ayaḇa, snar nari mkopok mkoramuma ro moḇ ayaisya royaḇa."
Snon Yahudi ansi sikofen yae farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Moḇ rosai iḇe ryaḇeya, isof kopok kosrowi ḇa? Imbude iḇe ryaḇe moḇ kawasa Yahudi ḇekon imnis ambersya rofandu kawasa Yunanisya fa ḇyuk farkar farosike?
Rosaiso kyara ḇesya ro wos iwos nane: Nari mkosewar aya, ḇape nari mkosrow ayaḇa, ma: mkopok mkora faro moḇ rosai aya isya royaḇa?"
Ma ro ras ḇepupes ro munara ani ḇyedodo Yesus dores ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma dor naba: "Mansei ḇembrowya, iḇye ryama faro aya ma dinem!
Mansei ḇekyar faro aya, imnis raris Refo moḇ ikofen raya: Rosne ḇyedi nari war ḇeryuḇerya idaf fa ḇyuk kankenem."
Roi kyaraya isoine ḇekyar faroisya nari sisma Rur ḇesrenya; snar rurya ryama ḇaim, snar Yesus isma payamyum ḇaim ro marmar ḇyedi.
Snonkaku ono rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, ḇemnaf wos anna, sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Snon ine nabi rirya."
Ono wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Ineido Wairek." Ḇape ono wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Roḇa, Wairekya ryama ro Galilea ḇa!
Snar Refoya ikofen, mboi Wairek ḇyeḇarpur ro Daud ma ro mnu Betlehem, moḇ Daud kyon ḇepon roya."
Inja rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sfamfaḇri snar Yesus.
Snonkaku ono rofandusi simarisen sfori, ḇape snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri iserepeni.
Inja manwarwaren-manwarwaren ansi sra faro mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi ansi sikofen farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Snaro mkuni ḇa?"
Manwarwaren-manwarwaren ansi skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku oso ḇaim dawos imnis snon ani!"
Snon Farisi ansi skarem farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Inja ḇyeninyan mko kwarke?
Inja snon ono fandu manfarkin-manfarkin ma Farisisya sakyar faroike?
Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor sine ḇeyakfawi Refo Yahudiḇa, frasya kyursi!"
Nikodemus, snon oso ro si, ḇerama yoḇ Yesus kwar ani ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo:
"Inja sasoser Refo Yahudi koḇedi ḇyuk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇesasar oso, rofafisu ḇyeḇemnaf ma ḇyeḇekukeḇ ḇaim?"
Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Inja aw kako snon Galileake? Kwukeḇ Refo ma nari wafawi mboi nabi oso isya ryama ro Galilea ḇa."
Raimnai sibur ḇerum sena,
ḇape Yesus ryaḇe urek Zaitun.
Meserdi arwo prim kaku Yesus isya wer ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam srama yoḇi. Kyain ma ḇyuk farkarkor farosi.
Mboi ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi sun faro Yesus bin oso sisrow ḇefrur farbuk. Siwan bin ani fa dores rofadu,
raimnai sikofen faro Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, bin ine nkosrow ro fafisu isya ifrur farbuk.
Ro sasoser Refo Yahudi Moses doḇo bin ḇeradine sḇeḇeso kuker karui isof simar. Rosai wakkara ro mnuk ine?"
Sikofen rarirya fa sifrowes biri, insa sisma roi oso fa ssḇuk sofi. Ḇape Yesus kyankunem ma fyas kuker ḇrampin ḇyesi ro sapropya.
Ma snar sifuken yayayu ḇesya kwar, inja ikḇawes ma dores, raimnai ikofen farosi: "Mansei rofandu mko ḇeyaksasar ḇa, iḇye syadi iso ḇeso ḇepon karui faro bin ine."
Raimnai kyankunem wer ma fyas ro sapropya.
Ḇape rofyor simnaf wos ani, sibur ḇesisye kam, randak ro ḇeḇesinansya. Papupesya Yesus derer dores kuker bin ani, ḇeyores faswef ro moḇ ḇyedi.
Raimnai Yesus iyori ma ikofen faro bin ani: "Kawasa ansi sraiso? Snonkaku oso isyaḇake fa ḇyuk samamyai faro aw?"
Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Oroḇa, Manseren." Raimnai Yesus ikofen: "Aya kako yaḇuk samamyai faro awḇa. Wabur ma randak ro knikine wafrur sasar wer awer."
Inja Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi: "Aya ine isnai supswan ine; mansei ḇeso aya, ikada nari imbrain ro pampan ḇa, mboi nari isma isnai ḇekenemya."
Kawasa Farisi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Mankundaw buk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur aw, inja ḇaḇesaksi bedi kyakuḇa."
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur mankundayano, mboi ḇaḇesaksi ayena nkaku, snar yafawi, moḇ yarama roya ma moḇ yarayoḇya. Ḇape mkokada mkofawiḇa, moḇsai yaramuma roya ma moḇsai yarayoḇya.
Mkokada mkoḇuk samamyai imnis warnkyara snonkaku, ayakada yaḇuk samamyai faro snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri,
ma rofyor yaḇuk samamyai mboi samamyai yaḇuk na nkaku, snar yerer ro mankundaya ḇa, mboi yafnoḇek kuker Kma yedi ḇewan ayanya.
Ma ro Refo Yahudi mkoḇedi fasfas isya, mboi ḇaḇesaksi ro snonkaku risuru irya kyaku.
Aya ine yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur mankundaya ḇardi, ma Mami, ḇewan ayanya, dakḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur aya."
Ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Kma bedi isyaro?" Yesus kyarem: "Iḇye aya, ma Kma yedi mkomambaḇir nuḇa. Rofyor mkomambaḇir ayakada, mkomambaḇir Mami kako."
Wos nane Yesus ikofen na fanam burua pipi rofyor ḇyuk farkarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi. Ma snonkaku oso fyoriḇa snar fafisu ḇyedi ryama ḇaim.
Raimnai Yesus ikofen wer faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi: "Nari yara ma nari mkosewar aya, ḇape nari mkomar snar sasar mkoḇena. Moḇ yara ḇeya nari mkorama ro iba."
Inja kawasa Yahudi ansi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Inja iḇe myun mankundike eḇedari ikofen, ḇo doḇo: Ḇemoḇ yaraḇeya, mkopok mkora faroi ḇa?"
Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Mkoine mkoḇe knam ro supswan ine, ayakada yarama ro boiyaswa; mkokada mkoraker supswan ine, aya yaraker supswan ineḇa.
Eḇedari insanja yakofen faro mko, mboi nari mkomar snar sasar mkoḇena; rofyor mkokyarḇa, mboi aya irya nari mkomar rodo sasar mkoḇena."
Inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Manseiso aw?" Yesus kyarem farosi: "Fainda rosai yawawos kuker mko kaker?
Nabor kaku roi yamarisen yawos ma yaḇemankara fa ḇekur mko; ḇape i ḇewan aya, ikada inapes ma rosai yarower roi, naiso yakofen faro supswan ine."
Sifawiḇa, mboi dawawos farosi ro Kmari.

Inja Yesus ikofen: "Rofyor mkoyer nakaki Rumkun Snonkaku kwar, insape mkofawi mboi aya ine Aya Isya, ma rarirya yafrur roi oso ro mankundaya ḇardiḇa, ḇape yawawos monda, imnis raris Mami fyarkor maro aya.
Ma i ḇewan aya kwar, ifnoḇek aya. Ipok ryir ayaḇa, snar yafrur ḇesya kwar rosai ḇefrur i marisen na."
Yesus ikofen roi anna kam kwar, snonkaku sibor sikyar faroi.
Rarirya ikofen faro kawasa Yahudi ḇekyar faroisya: "Kaku ḇeri rofyor mkokin nako wos ayena, rarirya mkoḇe manfamyan kaku ḇe aya
ma nari mkofawi napnapesya ma napnapesya nari ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro mko."
Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Nkoine nkoḇe ḇarpur ro Abraham ma nkoḇe manfyan ḇaim faro manseiryawer. Rosai wakofen, ḇo woḇo: "Nari mkosma ḇaḇemkei?"
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri snonkaku ḇefrur sasarsya, nari semanfyan faro sasarya.
Ma manfyan oso kyain faswef ro rumya doriḇa, ḇape romawaya kada kyain faswef ro rumya dori.
Inja rofyor Rumkunya ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro mko, kaku ḇeri nari mkoḇe mkei."
"Yafawi, mboi mkoḇe ḇarpur ro Abraham, ḇape mkosewar fa mkomun aya snar mkomewer mkoso farkarkor ayenari.
Rosai yamam ro Mami, naiso yakofen na ma rarirya kako mkofrur rosai mkomnaf ro kma mkoḇesi."
Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Kma nkoḇedi isoine Abraham." Yesus ikofen farosi: "Rofyor mkokofen kaku mko romawa Abraham, rarirya ido nari mkofrur fararur Abraham ifrur na.
Ḇape roi mkofrur na isoine mkoḇesewar fa mko mun aya, aya ine, snonkaku ḇekofen napnapes faro mko, isoine napnapes yamnaf ro Allah; fararur ḇerarirya Abraham dakfrur naba.
Mboi kma mkoḇesi roi sifrur naiso mkakfrur na." Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Nkoine romawa soneiḇa. Kma nkoḇedi isoine Allah."
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Rofyor Kma mkoḇedi Allah, nari mkoswar aya, snar yarama ro Allah. Ma yarama kuker marisen ro mankundayaḇa, mboi iso ḇewan ayanya.
Rosai ḇeḇewar fa mkofawi roi yakofen naba? Snar mkosambraḇ fa mkomnaf farkarkor ayenaḇa.

Kma mkoḇedi Ibirisya inja mko marisen mkoso marisen ḇyena. Ro randakya Ibirisya myamun, ikada iso napnapes yaḇa, snar napnapesya isya roiḇa. Rofyor ḇyeankar, ima kaku snar rari ḇyedi moḇ ryairi, snar ḇyeankarkar ma ḇye kma ro ankarkar na kam.
Ḇape snar yawos ro napnapesya, faro mko snaro mkokyar ayaḇa.
Mansei rofandu mko ḇeḇuk fasasna mboi yafrur sasar? Rofyor yawos ro napnapesya, snaro mkokyar ayaḇa?
Mansei ḇeḇeknam ro Allah ikada, imnaf Allah wos ḇyena; snar mkoḇe knam ro Allah ḇa, eḇedari mkomewer mkomnafi."
Kawasa Yahudi skarem faro Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Kaku ḇake rofyor nkokofen mboi aw snon Samaria ma rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇer aw?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇer ayaḇa, ḇape yaḇe syowi Mami yedi ma mkokada mkoḇe syowi ayaḇa.
Ḇape yasewar syowi faro ayaḇa: Oser isya ḇesewar syowiya ma ikako ḇye mankara.
Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇeḇeuser wos ayena, ima nari daksma marmariḇa isof fyoro-fyoro."

Yahudisya sikofen faroi wer, soḇo: "Insape nkofawi, rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇer aw. Snar Abraham imar kwar ma rarirya kako nabi-nabisya, ḇesyaḇo woḇo: mansei ḇeḇeuser wos ayena, ima nari daksma marmariḇa isof fyoro-fyoro.
Inja waba syadike ro kma nkoḇedi Abraham, ḇemar kwarya! Nabi-nabisya kako simar kwar; kuker mansei bukmnis aw?"
Yesus kyarem: "Rofyor yasandik mankundaya, rarirya ido sanandik ayedi ḇyemaeja kermkuno ḇaḇeri. Kma ayedi ḇeḇuk sanandik ḇe aya, iso mkofen ḇo mkoḇo: Ikada Allah nkoḇedi,
ḇesyaḇo mkomambaḇiri ḇa, ḇape ayakada yamambaḇiri. Ma rofyor yakofen: Yamambaḇiri ḇa, rarirya aya ine manankarkar, imnis raris mko, ḇape yafawi i ma yaḇeuser wos ḇyena.
Abraham kma mkoḇedi iryaḇ kaku mboi nari myam ras ayedi ma myami kwar ma iryaḇ kaku."
Inja kawasa Yahudi ansi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Umur bedi ḇyewampasi wambarek samfur ririm ḇaim ḇesyaḇo wamam Abraham kwarke?"
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri Abraham ḇyeḇeaḇen ḇaim, aya isya kwar."
Raimnai sun karui fa siḇe ssḇuk soi; ḇape Yesus smamiḇa ma ibur Allah Rum ḇyedi.
Rofyor Yesus imbranuk, myam snon ḇepraf oso ro fafisu ḇyeḇeaḇenya.
Manfamyan ḇyesi sifuken faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, snaro snon ine ipraf rofyor ḇyeḇeaḇenya, snar mankundi sasar ḇyena roḇa ido snari ma kmari sasar suḇenake?"
Yesus kyarem: "Snon ine sasar ḇyenaḇa ma sinan ḇyesuyaḇa kako, ḇape snar fararur-fararur Allah nari neḇefasna roi.
Nari kofrur ḇewan ayanya fararur ḇyena rofyor isnaya isya kaker; mboi roḇya ryama, snonkaku oso ipok ifararur werḇa.
Fyor aya isya ro supswan ine, aya ine isna supswan ine."
Rofyor ikofen wos nane kam kwar, ininef ḇe sapropya, ma irḇaren aninef ḇyena ro sapropya, raimnai ipyos na ro snon ḇepraf ani mkamor ḇyesuya
ma ikofen faroi: "Rwamura, ban mkamsu ro sawon Siloam." Siloam isoine: "Manwawan". Inja snon ani rya ḇyan mkamor ḇyesuya, raimnai kyaḇer muma ma myam kwar.
Ḇape min ḇyesi ma ḇese ḇefawi i ḇefararyor ani, inja soḇo: "Inja snon ḇefararyor ani iso ineke?"
Ono ḇese sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Kaku, irya ḇaḇoi." Ono ḇese wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Isyaḇa ḇoi, imnisbos kakui." Snon ani mankundi ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Kaku aya irya."
Sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso mkamsu suḇas wer?"

Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ḇenirḇe Yesus irḇaren saprop na ma ḇyuki isfu mkamor ayesuya ma ikofen maro aya: 'Rwamura ma ban mkamor besuya ro sawon Siloam. Inja yara, ma rofyor yaḇan mkamor ayesuya, ma yamam beri.' "
Raimnai sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Snon ani isyaro?" Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawiḇa."
Raimnai ssun snon ḇepraf ani faro kawasa Farisisya.
Ras Yesus irḇaren sapropya ma aninef fa ḇyuki isfu snon ani mkamor ḇyesuya, irya ras Mananai Yahudi rirya.
Eḇedari kawasa Farisi ansi sifuken faroi, rariso mkamor besuya suḇas wer. Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Isfu saprop irḇaren kwar ro mkamor ayesuya, raimnai yaḇan mkamor ayesuya ma insape yamam."

Ma ono ro Farisi ansi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Snon ine ḇyeknam ro Allah ḇa, snar ḇyefandun ras Mananai Yahudiya ḇa." Ono kada sobo: "Rariso snon ḇesasar oso ipok ifrur aḇyair kanandor radine?" Rarirya sfamfaḇri ro fandusi.
Raimnai sikofen wer faro snon ḇepraf ani, ḇo soḇo: "Mboi awne ido, rosai wakofen roi, snar ifrur mkamor ḇesuya fa mam kwar?" Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Inido nabi rirya."
Ḇape kawasa Yahudi ansi sikyarḇa, snon ani insandi ipraf ma myam wer, isof sor sinan ḇyesuya
ma sifuken su, ḇo soḇo: "Romawa muḇedisine, iso mukofen, ḇo muyoḇo, ipraf ro ḇyeḇeaḇenya? Rariryaido, rariso knikine myam wer?"
Sinan ansu sukarem, ḇo suyoḇo: "Roi nufawiya isoine, mboi i romawa nuḇedirya ma fafisu ḇyeḇeaḇenya ipraf.
Ḇape rariso knikine myam werya, nufawiḇa, ma mansei ḇeḇas mkamor ḇyesuya, nufawiḇa kako. Mkofuken ro mankundi, snar ḇyesnonkbor kwar, ifawi kyarem ro mankundi."
Sinan ḇyansu suwos rarirya snar sumkak kawasa Yahudisya, snar kawasa Yahudisya sna sne oser kwar, mboi snonkaku mansei ḇekaremi ḇe Wairek, nari spampumi.
Eḇedari sinan ḇyesu sukofen, ḇo suyoḇo: "Ḇyesnonkbor kwar, inja mkofuken faro mankundi."
Raimnai sorḇe oser wer snon insanja ḇepraf ani ma sikofen faroi: "Wawos kuker napnapes ro ḇarpon Allah; nkofawi mboi snon ani snon ḇesasar."
Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Snon ani snon ḇesasar rirya, yafawiḇa; ḇape roi oser yafawiya, mboi isoine insandi yapraf ma knikine yamam wer."
Sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rosai ifrur faro aw? Rariso ḇyuk mkamor besuya fa suḇas wer?"
Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yakofen faro mko kwar, ma mkomnafḇa; snaro mkomarisen mko mnaf wer? Imbude mkomarisen mkakḇe manfamyan faroi kako?"
Rarirya skoryaei ḇo sikofen faroi: "Awkada ḇe manfamyan faro snon ani mboi nkokada manfamyan ro Moses.
Nkofawi, mboi Allah iwawos faro Moses, ḇape faroi nkofawiḇa moḇsai ryama roya."
Snon ani kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Kokandor kaku snar mkofawi moḇ ryamuma royaḇa, ḇape ḇyas mkamor ayesuya kwar fa yamam wer.
Kofawi, mboi Allah imnaf snonkaku ḇesasarsya ḇa, mboi snonkaku ḇesren ma ḇeḇeuser marisen ḇyedi.
Ro ḇepon isof babo ine komnaf ḇaḇeri, mboi snonkaku oso isya ḇyas mkamor snonkaku ḇepraf ro fafisu ḇyeḇeaḇenya ḇaim.
Rofyor snonkaku ani ryamuma ro Allah ḇa, ipok ifrur royoḇa."
Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Aw ine beḇeaḇen ro sasar ḇesyaḇo woḇe farkor nko?" Raimnai siyawi ḇe ḇondibur rum nadi.
Yesus imnaf mboi siyawi kwar ḇeḇondi. Ḇarpurya isrowi ma ikofen: "Wakyar faro Rumkun Snonkakuyake?"
Kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Manseren manseirya? Insa yakyar faroi."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Aw mami mondaḇa; ḇape iso ḇeyawawos faro aw ine!"
Ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Manseren yakyar!" Raimnai ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Yesus ikofen: "Yarama ḇe supswan ine insa yaḇe mankara, insa mansei ḇemamba smame, ma mansei ḇemamsya siprafe."
Wos anna Farisi ono sakmnaf na, inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Inja woḇe nkokako nkoprafke?"
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mboi mkopraf kada, mkoḇe sasarḇa, ḇape snar mkoḇo: Nko kada nkomam, rarirya sasar mkoḇena naisya faswef."
"Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇesun ro kedwai padwar dombayaḇa, ma dek ro ayaryaido, ḇekaraw ma ḇefasyar rirya;
ḇape mansei ḇesun ro kedwaiya, ikada manfarandows domba rirya.
Faroi ḇewarenya ḇyas kedwai padwarya ma dombasya simnaf mkaren ḇyedi ma dor domba ḇyesi oser-oser kuker snonsnon sena ma fyarkin sifa sisasyar.
Rofyor domba ḇyesi kam dunsi ḇe ḇondi kwar, pyonsi ma domba-domba ansi sisoi, snar simnaf ḇaḇir mkaren ḇyedi.
Simewer siso snonkaku ḇesesyandi, ḇape sifrar sibursi, snar simnaf ḇaḇir mkaren ḇyediḇa."
Yesus ikofen sarḇer ani farosi, ḇape sifawi rosai ikofen ḇesyanya ḇa.
Ma Yesus ikofen wer: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, aya ine kedwai ḇe domba-dombasya.
Snonkaku ḇerama ḇepon ro aya, sikada mankaraw ma manfasyar, ma domba-domba ansi simnaf siḇa.
Aya ine kedwai; mansei ḇesun ḇeyunuk ro aya, nari isma aski ma ikada nari syun syae ma isma maper aḇris.
Mankarawya ryama fa kyaraw ma myamun ma kyakok monda; ḇape yarama insa snonkakusya sisma kankenem fyoroya.
Aya ine manfarandows ḇeḇye. Manfarandows ḇeḇye ḇyuk kankenem ḇyedi faro domba-domba ḇyesi;
mboi snonkaku besma sasuref manfarandows risyaḇa, ma snar domba-domba ḇyesisya ḇa, rofyor myam naf supya ryama, ifrar ibur domba-domba ansi, isof naf sup ani doper ma fyasasye domba-domba ansi.
Ibur snar snon ḇesma sasuref rirya ma fyandun domba-domba ansiḇa.
Aya ine manfarandows ḇeḇye ma yamamḇaḇir domba-domba ayesi ma domba-domba ayesi simnaf ḇaḇir aya
imnis raris Mami ifawi aya ma ayano yafawi Mami, ma yaḇuk kankenem ayedi faro domba-domba ayesi.
Yasma domba-domba ono ḇese kako fa sisya, ḇeyaksun ro padwar ine ḇa; domba ansi nari yunsi kako ma nari simnaf mkaren ayedi ma sikam senai oser kuker manfarandows oser.
Mami iswar aya, snar yaḇuk kwar kankenem ayedi faro yasma kaḇeri wer.
Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri duni bur ayaḇa, mboi yaḇuki raris mankundaya marisen ayedi. Yasma papoik fa yaḇuki ma papoik fa yun kaberi kako. Inekada fararur yasma ro Kma yedi."
Rarirya kawasa Yahudi ansi sfamfaḇri ro mankunsi snar wos anna. Sibor rofandusi soḇo:
"Rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇeri ma syawo; snaro mkoroweri?"
Ḇesesya soḇo: "Snonkaku rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇersya sawos rariryaḇa; rur ḇemaḇaksya nari sifrur fa ḇeprafsya smame?"
Fyoroḇa Ras Saḇseḇen Allah Rum byedi ro Yerusalem; fafisu ani supya ipnunek.
Ma Yesus imbran ro Allah Rum byedi ro sim Salomo.
Inja kawasa Yahudi sores yari ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Fyor rosai ryakaker wafrur fa nkokenem kuker ḇirḇar? Rofyor Wairek isawido, wakofen maḇe inko."
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Yakofen faro mko kwar, ḇape mko kyarḇa; fararur-fararur yafrur kuker Mami snonsnon ḇyedi, naiso ḇefasna ḇadir ro aya,
ḇape mko kyarḇa, snar mkaksun ro domba-domba ayesi ḇa.
Domba-domba ayesi simnaf mkaren ayedi ma ayano yafawisi ma siso aya,
ma yaḇuk kankenem ḇekain fyoro farosi ma sikada nari sroḇa fyoro-fyoro ma snonkaku osoḇaḇeri nari pyosersi ro ḇramin ayedi.
Mami, ḇeḇuksi maro aya, iba syadi ro mansei ryawer, ma snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri pyosersi ro Mami ḇramin ḇyesuya.
Aya ma Mami nuḇe oser."
Kawasa Yahudi ssun karui fa siḇe sḇukso Yesus wer.
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkomam yafrur fararur ḇeḇye nabor kwar, Mami ḇyuk maro aya; ro fararur ḇeḇor anna, fararur rosai ḇefnai fa mkoḇe mkoso aya kuker karui?"
Yahudi ansi skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Snar fararur ḇeḇye oso eḇedari nkoḇe nkoso aw kuker karuiyaḇa, mboi snar wonef Allah, ma snar aw snonkaku monda, ḇesyaḇo woḇo wamnis kuker Allah."
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Ro Refo Yahudi mkoḇedi fasfas oso isyaḇake doḇo: Yakofen kwar: Mkoine Allahke?
Kofawi mboi rosai ḇefas ro Refo, isya rofyoro. Rofyor Allah ḇyuk aror "Allah" faro snonkaku ḇena wos ḇyedisya,
snaro mko kofen yonef Allah, snar yakofen aya ine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi? Mboi Mami kyinfir aya ma iwan ayaḇe supswan ine.
Rofyor yafrur fararur-fararur Mami ḇyenaḇa, mkokyar awer aya,
ḇape rofyor yafrur na ma mkomewer mkokyar aya, mkokyar fararur-fararur anna, insa mkofawi mkomambir ma mkofawi mboi Mami ḇye oser kuker aya ma ayano yeḇe oser kuker Mami."
Ḇerarwan oser wer ssewar fa sfori, ḇape ikfis ro siḇrasna.
Ḇarpurya Yesus ryaḇe war Yordan ḇariwara, ḇemoḇ ḇepon Yohanes ḇyuk masasi ro ani, ma kyain ro dia.
Ma kawasa sibor srama faroi ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Yohanes kada dakfrur aḇyair kanandor osoḇa, ḇape wos ḇeḇor ikofen nakam ḇekur snon ine nkaku kam."
Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ro dia sikyar faro Yesus.
Snon oso snonsnon ḇyedi Lazarus isya ro dafduf. Kyain ro Betania fnoḇek srar ḇyesuya Maria ma ḇedar ḇyedi Marta.
Maria ine bin ḇerem Manseren wemin ḇyesuya kwar kuker mani ḇespum ma ḇepyos wemin ansu kuker snonḇuryam ḇyena.
Ma Lazarus ḇeduf ani Maria srar ḇyedirya. Bin ansuya suyankinem faro Yesus, ḇo suyoḇo: "Manseren, snonkaku waswar ani iduf."
Fafisu Yesus imnaf ankinem anna, ikofen: "Dafduf ani nari dunḇe marmarḇa, ḇape nari fyasna Allah baba ḇyena, snar kuker dafduf ani Allah Rumkun ḇyedi nari isma baba kako."
Mboi Yesus iswar kaku Marta, Maria ma Lazarus.
Yesus imnaf kwar Lazarus iduf, ḇesyaḇo kyain ras risuru wer ro moḇsai isya roya;
ḇape ḇarpurya ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mko rama kokaḇer wer ḇe Yudea."
Manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rabi, babo ine kawasa Yahudi sesewar fa sso aw, ḇesyaḇo wamarisen kaker fa kwaḇer ḇe diwara?"
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mkofawi ḇake oras samfur seser risuru ro ras oser? Mansei ḇembran ro meserya wemin ḇyesu sukarkarḇa, snar myam isna supswan ine.
Ḇape rofyor snon oso imbran ro roḇ, wemin ḇyesu sukarkar, snar isnaya isya roiḇa."
Raimnai Yesus ikofen wer farosi: "Lazarus, naek koḇani denef kwar, ḇape yara fa yaḇani ro anenef ḇyedi."
Irya manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Manseren, rofyor denef, nari ikḇok ro mankundi."
Yesus dawos ro Lazarus marmar ḇyedi, ḇape skara ḇo soḇo: Yesus ikofen ro anenef monda.
Eḇedari Yesus ikofenbos farosi: "Lazarus imar kwar;
ḇape kasumasa snar aya isya rofafisu aniḇa, rarirya iḇye syadi faro mko, insa mkosma farkarkor kakyar. Knikine mkorama koramura faroi."
Inja Tomas sapḇe Didimus, ikofen faro min ḇyesi, isoine manfamyan ḇesesya, ḇo doḇo: "Mkorama kosoi, insa kakmar fnoḇeki."
Ma rofyor Yesus rya kwar ro Betania, isma Lazarus sikriri ras rifiak kwar.
Betania kyain fanam Yerusalem, indokada swafya mil risuru.
Rodia kawasa Yahudi sibor srama kwar faro Marta ma Maria fa ssḇuk sneprei faro su snar srar suḇedi marmar ḇyedi.
Ma fafisu Marta imnaf mboi Yesus ryama, inja rya fa isrowi. Ḇape Maria kyain ro rum.
Mboi Marta ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren rofyor awsya ro dinekada, srar ayedi nari imar ḇa.
Ḇape knikine kako yafawi mboi Allah nari ḇyuk faro aw roi ḇeḇor wor faroi na."
Yesus ikofen faro Marta: "Srar bani nari diḇeri."
Marta ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawi mboi nari diḇri rofyor ḇemarsya siḇersi ro ras fawarya."
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Aya ine aḇiḇer ma kankenem; mansei ḇekyar faro aya, imar kwaro nari ikenem wer,
ma snonkaku ḇemar ma ḇekyar faro aya nari simar ḇa isof fyoro-fyoro. Wakyar roi ḇeḇesne ani?"
Marta kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren, yakyar mboi aw Wairek Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, awso nari ḇerama ḇe supswan ine."
Ma ikofen rarirya kwar raposa, rya dor ḇeba ḇyedi Maria ma fyararum faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Guru isya rodiwa ma dor aw."
Maria imnaf rarirya iyori fasau fa isrow Yesus.
Ḇape rofyor ani Yesus syun ro mnu ani ḇaim. Isya kaker ro moḇ Marta isrowi ro ani.
Fafisu kawasa Yahudi ḇefnoḇek Maria ro rumsya fa ḇeḇuk sneprei faroi, smam mboi Maria iyori fasau ma ryaḇe ḇondi, inja sisoi, snar skara soḇo mboi ryaḇe rus fa kyanes ro diwa.
Maria rya kwar ro moḇ Yesus isya ro ani ma isrow Yesus, ma kyain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rofyor awsya ro dinekada, srar ayedi nari imarḇa."
Fafisu Yesus myam Maria kyanes ma kawasa Yahudi ḇerama ḇefnoḇekisya kako sakkanes, inja Yesus sneri isosi ma ikofen:
"Moḇ saiso mko kriri roya?" Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Manseren, rwamura fa wakmam!"
Fyor ani Yesus kyanes.
Kawasa Yahudisya sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Mkomam kada, iswarbos faroi!"
Ḇape snonkaku ono fandusi, soḇo: "I ḇeḇuk mamam faro ḇeprafsi, ipok ḇake fa ifrur isof snon ine imarḇa?"
Yesus iswarsi wer, inja ryaḇe rus ani. Rus ani aḇyaḇ rirya, ma sisiseni kuker karui.
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkokris karui ine!" Lazarus ḇemar ani srar ḇyedi Marta ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, ras rifiak kwar ro rusya, inja nari isnarem."
Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen ḇeaw; rofyor wakyar nari wakmam Allah papoik ḇyena!"
Inja sikris karui ani raimnai Yesus myam ḇebo ma ikofen: "Mami, yakofen kasumasa faro aw, snar wamnaf aya kwar.
Yafawi wamnaf aya ḇesya kwar, ḇape snar snonkaku ḇeyores yar aya rodine, yakofen na insa sikyar, mboi Mami ḇewan aya kwarya."
Ma ikofen rarirya kwar, ma dor naba: "Lazarus, wasasyar!"

Snonkaku ḇemar ani isasyar ro rus ani, wemin ma ḇramin ḇyesuya neḇeparek kuker kruḇen ḇeruren ma mkamor ḇyesuya suḇe ḇekawef kuker marḇun. Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkoper kruḇen anna insa imbran ḇe mkei."
Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇerama ḇeḇuk sneprei faro Maria ansi smam rosai Yesus ifrur na inja sikam sikyar Yesus.
Ḇape onokada sra faro snon Farisisya ma sfarfyar farosi ro rosai Yesus ifrur kwar na.
Inja mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi sor Kankain Karkara Agama fa siryur ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rosai nari kofrurya? Snar snon ani ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor.
Rofyor komam mondai, nari kawasa kam sikyar faroi, ma kawasa Roma nari srama ma skakok Allah Rum ḇyedi ma er koḇansine ḇesiper."
Ḇape oso rofandusi isoine Kayafas, imam ḇeba ro wampasi wambarek ani, ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkofawi royoḇa,
ma mkokara ḇake, mboi iḇye syadi faro mko, rofyor snonkaku oser imar fadwer er ḇesiper koḇedi, ro er ḇesiper koḇedi ryoe."
Kayafas ikofen rarirya ro mankundi ḇa, ḇape snar ḇye imam ro wampasi wambarek ani, inja ḇyardi mboi Yesus nari imar sadwer er ansi,
ma faro er Yahudi sererḇa, ḇape insa fyanjur Allah romawa ḇyesi ḇekakek sya fa seoser kako.
Randak ro ras ani sḇesneoser fa smun Yesus.
Snar rarirya Yesus imbran fababa wer ḇa ro ḇarpon kawasa Yahudi imbran rodia ḇe sup mnuk ḇefanam sup ḇeḇeursḇa, ḇe mnu oso snonsnon ḇyedi Efraim, ma kyain fnoḇek manfamyan ḇyesi rodia.
Rofafisu ani ras ḇeba munara Paskah Yahudi sedi fyanam kwar ma kawasa ḇeḇor ro mnu ani sraḇe Yerusalem insa sfasren mankunsi ḇepon ro munara Paskah ani.
Ssewar Yesus ma sores ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dori, sikofen yae farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso kakara mkoḇena? Nari ryama kako ḇe munara ineke?"
Rofafisu ani mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi ssḇuk sasoser kwar insa snonkaku mansei ḇefawi Yesus ro moḇsai isya, sikofen ḇadir insa sfori.
Ras riwonem ḇepon ro Paskahya Yesus ryama ro Betania, ro moḇsai Yesus ḇyuk aḇiḇer faro Lazarus fandu ḇemarsya ro ani.
Rodia sfasos roḇean faro Yesus, ḇeyanan fnoḇek Yesus sya oso snonsnon ḇyedi Lazarus, Marta ḇeyuf farmyan si.
Ma Maria dun mani ḇespum ḇekakur kaku, kati mun ono fa ḇyuki ryem Yesus wemin ḇyesuya ma ipyos su kuker snonburyam ḇyena; ma rum ani ḇesiper isnarem apan ḇemani spum.
Ḇape Yudas Iskariot snon oso fandu Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi, nari ḇeḇoḇ fasawi, ikofen ḇo doḇo:
"Snaro mani ḇespum ine ḇyeḇeḇoḇ ḇa kuker maeja kumpan sarak utin rikior ma pipisya seḇeḇerwas faro ḇesaḇararsya?"
Wos ikofen ine, ikofen rarirya snar iswar kawasa ḇesaḇarar syaḇa mboi snar i snon ḇekaraw-raw rirya; snar ikada dun ḇesya kwar pipi ḇekram ro rosaser dufya.
Inja Yesus ikofen: "Mkomam monda bin ine ifrur rarirya fa ḇyeswarapepen ro ras kardir ayedi.
Snar snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya sisya ro fandu mko ḇesya kwar, ḇape ayama roḇa."
Kawasa Yahudi sibor simnaf, mboi Yesus isya ro Betania ma srama snar Yesus mondaḇa, mboi srama insa sakmam kako Lazarus ḇesma aḇiḇer kwar rofandu snonkaku ḇemarsya.
Raimnai mananir imam-imam sna awi fa smun Lazarus kako,
snar kukeri kawasa Yahudi sibor sibursi ma sikyar faro Yesus.
Meserdi fafisu snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇerama ḇeyakso munara simnaf, mboi Yesus isya ro nyanya faduri fa ryama ḇe Yerusalem,
sun yar ram ono, ma sra sisrowi kuker bararas, ḇo soḇo: "Hosana! (Wakenem!) Ḇerama kuker snonsnon Manseren isma ḇok, Wairek Israel!"
Yesus isma keledai kuḇ oso raimnai dekroi, imnis fasfas ro Refo:
"Mkomkak awer inai infun Sion, mkomame Wairek mkoḇedi ryama, dek keledai mkun oso!"
Randakya Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sifawi roi ḇeḇesya ineḇa, ḇape rofyor Yesus isma baba ḇyedi, si swarepen mboi mnuk ani kyuri, ma sifrur rarirya faroi.
Snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇefnoḇek i ro fafisu dor Lazarus fa isasyar ro rus ma ḇeḇuk aḇiḇer faroi rofandu ḇemarsya si ḇeḇesaksi ro Yesus.
Eḇedari snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sra sisrowi, snar simnaf, mboi i ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor ani.
Inja snon Farisi ansi sikofen yae faro mankunsi, ḇo soḇo: "Kopok kofrur royoḇa mboi mkomam kada, supswan ḇesiper siwayan kam fa sisoi."
Rofandu snonkaku ḇeyakḇe nadisya ro ras munara ani, snon Yunani ono sisya.
Snonkaku ansi sra faro Filipus, ḇeḇeknam ro Betsaida ro Galilea, ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Naeko mkomarisen ido nkomarisen nkosrow Yesus."
Filipus rya ikofen ḇadir faro Andreas; Andreas ma Filipus sukofen ḇadir wer faro Yesus.
Ḇape Yesus kyarem faro su: "Fafisu Rumkun Snonkaku isma babaya ryama kwar.
Yakofen faro mko: Rofyor fas morya isapi ro sapropya ma imarḇa ido, nari ḇyemor oser faswef monda; ḇape rofyor imar nari ḇyuk bon nabor.
Mansei ḇeswar kankenem ḇyedi, nari kankenem ḇyedi ryoburi, mboi mansei ḇeswar kankenem ḇyediḇa ro supswan ine nari fyadurui faro kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
Mansei ḇeyuf farmyan aya, nari iso aya ma moḇsai aya isya roya, rodia kako ḇeyuf farmyan ayasya sisya. Mansei ḇeyuf farmyan aya nari Mami ḇyesyowi i.
Knikine sneri fyafardun ma rosai yaḇe yakofenya? Inja nari yor ro Mami fa fyaspar aya ro fafisu ine? Ḇape insa yasma kandera ine eḇedari yarama kwar ine.
Mami snombri isma baba!" Rarirya simnaf mkaren ro boiyaswa: "Yaḇuk baba faroi kwar, ma nari yaḇuk baba faroi wer!"
Snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇeyores ro moḇ ani ma ḇerower sikofen, mboi ine rakrok karadu. Ono wer sikofen: "Malaikat oso iso ḇeyawawos kuker i kwar."
Yesus kyarem: "Mkaren ani ḇyeḇerower kwar snar ayaḇa, mboi snar mko.
Knikine samamyai imbran ro supswan ine: knikine kako papoik supswan ine ḇyeḇesawen ḇe ḇondi;
ma aya, rofyor mkoyer nakaki aya ro supswan ine, nari yun snonkaku syakam fa srayoḇ aya."
Ikofen radine fa fyasna moḇsai nari imar raya.
Raimnai snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi skarem: "Nkomnaf ro sasoser Refo Yahudi mboi Wairek ikenem faswef fyoro-fyoro; inja rariso wakofen Rumkun Snonkaku nari siyer nakaki i? Mansei Rumkun Snonkakuya?"

Yesus ikofen farosi: "Fafisu kermkun monda wer isna isya fandu mko, fafisu rosai isnaya isya ro mko, mkokyar faroi, insa papoik pampanya ikawef awer mko; mansei ḇembran ro pampanya dori, ifawi moḇ iḇe ryayoḇyaḇa.
Mkokyar faro isnaya, rofyor isnaya isya faro mko, insa mkoḇe romawa-romawa isna." Yesus ikofen rarirya kwar, rya dofbursi.
Ma Yesus ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor kako kwar, ḇape sikyar faroi ḇa,
insa nabi Yesaya wos ikofenya imnis: "Manseren, mansei ḇekyar faro ḇaryas nkoḇena? Ma faro mansei Manseren papoik bedi ḇyeḇefasna farosya?"
Eḇedari sikyarḇa, snar Yesaya ikofen kako kwar:
"Yafrur mkamor sena fa napraf, Yafrur sisnesna fa nedip; insa mkamor sena nmam awer, kakara sena nafawi awer. Insa skaḇer awer faro aya, fa yaḇuk parare farosi."
Yesaya ikofen rarirya snar myam Yesus baba ḇyedi kwar ma iwawos roi kwar.
Rariryano manfarkinsya sibor kaku sikyar faroi, ḇape snar snon Farisi simewer skarem i rofababa, insa spampum awer si ro rum ari.
Snar simarisen syadi faro sanandik snonkaku ro ḇaḇesyowi Allah.
Ḇape Yesus iyiw ḇo ikofen: "Mansei ḇekyar faro aya, ikyar faro Allah ḇewan aya kwarya;
ma mansei ḇemam aya, myam kako Allah ḇewan aya kwarya.
Yarama ḇe supswan ine kwar imnis isna, insa snonkaku ḇekyar aya sya, skain awer ro pampanya.
Ma rofyor oso ryower wos ayena, ḇape ifrur naba, yaḇe mankara faroi ḇa, snar yarama yeḇe mankara supswan ineḇa, mboi yaḇuk koreri.
Mansei ḇemewer aya, ma ḇemnaf wos ayenaḇa sya, mankaraya isya kwar farosi, isoine wos yakofen kwar na, naiso nari ḇeḇemankara farosi ro awar ḇepupesya.
Snar yawawos ro mankundayaḇa ḇape Mami ḇewan ayanya, iso ḇeḇuk sasoser faro aya insa yakofen rosai nari yakofen na ma yaḇuk mufa.
Ma yafawi, mboi sasoser ḇyena irya kankenem ḇekain fyoro. Inja rosai yakofenya, yaḇuk na raris Mami ikofen maro aya kwar."
Ras oser wer munara Paskahya ḇyeḇefrur, Yesus ifawi kwar, mboi fafisu ḇyedi ryama kwar fa ibur supswan ine faro kmari. Imnis raris iswar manfamyan ḇyesi rarirya baboine iswarsi isof papupesya.
Rofyor sisya sanan kam, ma Ibiris fyararum kwar ro Yudas Iskariot, Simon mandaḇendi sne ḇyedi ro nyan rosai nari ḇyuki ḇyoḇ Yesus.
Yesus ifawi, mboi Kmari ḇyuk roi ḇeḇor nakam faroi kwar ma ifawi ryama ker Allah ma nari kyaḇer faro Allah.
Raimnai Yesus iyori ma pyer syatu ḇyedi. Dun marḇun oso ma fyesi ro sifer ḇyedi,
raimnai iwek war ro sayer oso, ma ḇyuki ḇyan manfamyan ḇyesi wemin sena ma ḇyunek kuker marḇun ḇefes ro sifer ḇyedi ani.
Rofyor ryama faro Simon Petrus, Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, inja waḇe ban wemin ayesuya?"
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rosai yafrur ro knikineya wafawi ḇaim, ḇape ras ḇarpurya nari wafawi."
Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Roḇa Manseren, wapok ban wemin ayesuyaḇa." Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor yaḇan wemin besuyaḇa, nari wasma rarwas kuker ayaḇa."
Simon Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren rarirya ido, ban wemin ayesuya monda ḇa, mboi ḇramin ma ḇukor ayedi kako!"
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Mansei ḇemasi kwar, ipok imasi wer ḇa, mboi koḇan wemin ḇyesya, snar isren kwar. Mko kako mkosren kwar mboi mkosren kam ba."
[Snar ifawi kwar, nari mansei ḇeḇoḇiya. Eḇedari ikofen: "Mkosren kwar ḇape mkosren kam baim."]
Ḇyan wemin sena kwar, syansun sansun ḇyena wer raimnai kyain. Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Mkofawi kwarke rosai yafrur faro mkoya?
Mkap ayaḇe Guru ma Manseren ma kaku ro wos mkoḇena, snar kaku aya ine Guru ma Manseren.
Inja rofyor yaḇe Manseren ma Guru mkoḇedi ḇape yaḇan wemin mkoḇena, rarirya mko kako mkakḇan yae wemin mkoḇena.
Snar yaḇuk nyan oso kwar faro mko, insa mko kako mkakfrur raris moḇ rosai yafrur faro mko kwar raya.
Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Manfyan oso ikaki syadibur tuan ḇyedi ḇa, roḇaido wawan oso iba syadi ḇewani yaḇa.
Rofyor mkofawi roi nane kam kwar, ma rofyor mkofrur na ido, aski faro mko.
Yakofen faro mko kam ḇa, snar yafawi, mansei yakinfir kwar. Ḇape imnis rosai sfas kwar ro Refo isoine: Snonkaku ḇeyanan fnoḇek aya nari isampum aya.
