Yakofen na rarirya faro mko rofafisu ine kako rofyor roi yakofen nane ndama ḇaim, insa roi ḇeḇesya ani ryama kwar, rarirya mkokyar mboi aya irya.
Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko; mansei ḇena snonkaku yawansya, nya aya, ma mansei ḇena ayansya sakna kako ḇewan ayanya."
Yesus ikofen rarirya kwar iswar fafayaḇa inja ḇyesaksi: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri rofandu mko nari oso ḇyoḇ aya."
Manfamyan ansi smam yaesi, ma sikmom snar sifawi mansei Yesus ikofenya ḇa.
Oso rofandu Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi, isoine manfamyan iswar ani ma ḇekain fanami, ro ḇar raku ḇyedi.
Simon Petrus pyanir manfamyan ani ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Wafuken manseiso ikofen ḇesyanya!"
Manfamyan ḇekain fanam Yesus ani iknenef ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, manseiso eḇesyani?"
Yesus kyarem: "Snonkaku yasowen mamami ma yaḇuk faroya ido irya." Ikofen rarirya posa dun mamami ma syoweni posa ḇyuki faro Yudas, Simon Iskariot mandaḇendi.
Ma Yudas duf mamami ani kwar, Ibirisya isawoḇi. Ma Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rosai waḇe wafrurya, iḇye wafrur fasaw."
Ḇape snon osero ḇaḇeri ro ḇekain ḇeyanan ansi ifawiḇa, rosai Yesus ikofen rarirya faro Yudas.
Snar Yudas iso ḇeyuf mansrip ḇeser pipiya inja skara, mboi Yesus iwani fa kyoḇes roi ḇeḇefandun faro munara ani, roḇaido ḇyuk roi ono faro ḇesaḇararsya.
Yudas dun mamami raimnai rya fasau. Ma rofyor ani roḇ kwar.
Rofyor rya kwar, Yesus ikofen: "Insape Rumkun Snonkaku isma baba ma Allah isma baba kukeri.
Rofyor Allah isma baba snar i, ma Allah nari ḇyuk faḇei baba kako, baba ro Allah mankundi ḇardi ma nari ḇyuk baba fasaw faroi.

Ne, romawa ayena mko, fafisu kermkun monda kaker, aya isya fnoḇek mko. Ma nari mkosewar aya, ḇape raris yakofen faro kawasa Yahudisya: Ḇemoḇ yara yoḇya, mkopok mkorama roiḇa, rarirya kako knikine yakofen faro mko.
Yaḇuk sasoser ḇaḇo faro mko, insa mko swar yae mko; imnis raris moḇ yaswar mko kwar raya, rarirya mko kako mko swar yae mko.
Rofyor mko swar yae mko ido snonkakusya kam nari sifawi mboi manfamyan ayesi mko, rofyor mko swar yae mko kada."
Simon Petrus ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, waḇe rwaḇeso?" Yesus kyarem: "Moḇ yarayoḇya, nari wapok waso ayaḇeri ro knikine ḇa, ḇape insape nari waso aya."
Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, snaro yaso beri au ro knikine ḇa? Yamarisen yamar sadwer aw!"
Yesus kyarem: "Kakuke wamarisen fa wamar sadwer aya? Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro aw: Mankokosya sor ḇaim, famyun aya ḇe rarwan rikior kwar."
"Mkosnemna neḇirḇar awer; mkokyar faro Allah, mkokyar maro aya kako.
Ro Mami rum ḇyedi moḇ kankain nasya nabor. Rofyor rariryaḇa, nari yakofen na faro mko. Snar yaramura ḇediwa insa yafasos moḇ faro mko.
Ma rofyor yara ro diwa kwar ma yafasos moḇ faro mko kwar, nari yakaḇer muma wer ma yun mkoḇe moḇ ayedi, insa moḇ rosai aya isya roya, mko kako mkoisya ro moḇ ani.
Ma moḇ yaraḇeya, mkofawi nyan ḇeraḇe moḇ ani."
Raimnai Tomas ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, nkofawi moḇsai rwaḇeyaḇa; inja rariso nari nkofawi nyanya?"
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Aya ine kada nyanya ma napnapes ma kankenem. Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ḇerama faro Mami, rofyor imbranuk ro ayaḇa.
Rofyor mkomambaḇir aya, nari mkomambaḇir kaku mami kako. Knikine mkomam baḇiri ma mkomami kwar."
Filipus ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, fasna Kmaya maro nko, rarirya imnis maro nko kwar."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Fyoro kaku aya isya fnoḇek mko, Filipus, ḇesyaḇo mambaḇir ayaḇa? Mansei ḇemam aya kwar ido, myam Kmaya kwar kako; rariso wakofen: Fasna Kmaya maro nko.
Wakyarḇake, yaḇe oser kuker Kmaya ma Kmaya ḇyeoser kuker aya? Rosai yakofen faro aw, yakofen na ro mankundaya ḇardiḇa, ḇape Kmaya ḇaḇeoser nuḇedi, iso ḇefrur nakamya.
Mkokyar faro aya mboi yaḇe oser kuker Kmaya ma Kmaya ḇye oser kuker aya, mboi roḇaido mkokyar snar rosai yafrur kwar na.
Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Mansei ḇekyar faro aya, nari dakfrur kako fararur-fararur yafrur nane, mboi nari ifrur roi ḇeba syadi wer. Snar yara faro Kmaya;
ma rosai mkor kuker snonsnon ayedi, nari yafrur na faro mko, insa Kmaya isma baba ro Rumkunya.
Rofyor mkor roi ono kuker snonsnon ayedi, nari yafrur na."
"Rofyor mkoswar aya ido, nari mkoḇeuser sasoser ayena kam kada.
Nari yor faro Kmaya, ma nari ḇyuk faro mko snon ḇesaramper oso ḇese, insa ifnoḇek mko,
isoine Rur Napnapesya. Supswan ine dakna iba, snar supswan ine dakmam iba ma ssmambaḇir iba. Ḇape mko kada mkomamḇaḇiri, snar ifnoḇek mko ma ḇyeoser kuker mko.
Nari yabur mkoḇa imnis awak param. Nari yakaḇer maro mko wer.
Fyoroḇa wer supswan ine nari smam aya werḇa, ḇape mkoma nari mkomam aya, snar yakenem ma mko kako nari mkakkenem.
Rofyor ani nari mkofawi, mboi yaḇeoser kuker Mami, ma mkoḇe oser kuker aya ma ayano yaḇe oser kuker mko.
Mansei ḇeyuf sasoser ayena ma ḇeḇeuser na, iso ḇeswar ayanya. Ma mansei ḇeswar aya, ikada nari Mami dakswari ma aya kako nari yakswari ma nari yafasna aya ḇardi faroi."
Yudas ḇekofen ine Iskariot isyaḇa, ifuken faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rosai eḇedari woḇo fasna au maḇe nko, mboi faro supswan ineḇa?"
Yesus kyarem: "Rofyor oso iswar aya, ikada nari ḇyeuser farkarkor ayena, ma Mami nari iswari ma nari nko rama faroi ma nko kainusi.
Mansei ḇeswar ayaḇa, nari ḇyeuser farkarkor ayenaḇa; ma farkarkor mkomnaf anna ndama ro ayaḇa, mboi ndama ro Kmaya ḇewan aya.
Yakofen roi ḇeḇor annane kam faro mko, rofyor aya isya kaker kuker mko;
ḇape Rur Ḇesren, isoine Rur Ḇeḇuk snepreiya nari Kmaya iwani kuker snonsnon ayedi, iso nari ḇefarkor fa ḇemko ma ḇeḇuk swarepen ro roi ḇeḇor yakofen kwar faro mko anna kam.
Askiya yaḇeifa kyainus mko. Aski ayena yaḇuk na faro mko, ma rosai yaḇuk faro mko namnis kuker roi supswan ine ḇyuk faro mko naba. Mkosnemna neḇirḇar ma mkomkak awer.
Mkomnaf mboi yakofen faro mko kwar: 'Yara, ḇape nari yakaḇer faro mko wer.' Rofyor mko swar aya kada, nari mko marisen kaku snar yara faro Mami, snar Mami ḇeba syadi ro aya.
Ma knikine yakofen na kako faro mko rofyor ndama ḇaimya, insa mko kyare, rofyor ndama kwarya.
Yawos nabor wer faro mkoḇa, snar papoik supswan ine ryama ma ipok ayaḇa.
Ḇape insa supswan ine sifawi, mboi yaswar Mami ma yafrur roi ḇeḇor kam Mami syoser faro ayana kwar. Mkoyor mko kora kobur moḇ ine."
Yesus ikofen wer, "Aya ine anggur knam ḇenapesya ma Mamiso ḇefrur yaf ani.
Snaw ayena ḇeḇuk bon ḇana kyaruk na mboi snaw ḇeḇuk bon na ifron sren na, insa namarem syadi wer.
Mkokada mkosren kwar snar farkarkor yaḇuk faro mko kwarna.

Mkoḇe oser faswef kuker aya, ma ayano nari yaḇe oser faswef kuker mko. Imnis snawya imarem ro mankundiḇa, rofyor ḇyeoser faswef kuker knamyaḇa, rarirya ido nari mko maremba, rofyor mkoḇe oser faswef kuker ayaḇa.
Aya ine anggur knam ma mkoḇe snaw ro aya. Mansei ḇeḇeoser kuker aya nari ayano yaḇe oser kukeri, ikada ḇyuk bon nabor, snar roḇondibur aya mkopok mkofrur royoḇa.
Mansei ḇeḇeoser kuker ayaḇa, nari ḇyeḇesawen imnis snaw ma nari myas, ḇarpurya snonkakusya siryur na ma sisawen na ro forya fa nananem.
Rofyor mkoḇe oser kuker aya ma farkarkor ayena nkain ro mkosnemna, mkor rosai mko marisen na ro Mami, nari mkosma na.
Rofyor mkoḇuk bon nabor, Mami isma baba, rarirya mko fasna mkoḇe manfamyan ḇeaya."
"Raris Mami iswar aya kwar, rarirya kako yakswar mko; mko kain ro saswar ayedi kada.
Rofyor mkoḇeuser sasoser ayena ido, nari mko kain ro saswar ayena, imnis raris yaḇeuser Mami sasoser ḇyena rarirya yakain ro saswar ḇyedi.
Roi ḇeḇor nane kam yakofen na faro mko, insa raryaḇ ayena naisya ro mkosnemna ma marisen mkoḇena namnis.
Sasoser ayena naiso nane, insa mkoswar yae mko, raris moḇ yaswar mko raya.
Snonkaku ḇeswar syadi bati ḇyesi isoine, snonkaku ḇeḇuk kankenem ḇyedi faro bati ansi.
Bati ayesiso mko, rofyor mko frur rosai yasoser faro mko.
Yor mkoḇe manfyan wer ḇa, snar manfyanya ifawi roi tuan ḇyedi ifrur naba, ḇape yor mkoḇe bati, snar yakofen ḇadir faro mko kwar roi ḇeḇor nakam yamnaf kwar ro Mami na.
Mkoi ḇekimfir ayaḇa ḇape ayaiso ḇekimfir mko. Ma yaḇeasas faro mko kwar, insa mkora ma mkoḇuk bon ma bon mkoḇena nako, insa rosai mkor ro Kmaya kuker snonsnon ayedi, Mami ḇyuk na faro mko.
Sasoser ayena naiso nane faro mko: Mkoswar yae mko."
"Rofyor supswan ine dayin mko, mko swarepen mboi dayin ḇepon aya kwar ro mko.
Rofyor supswan ine i ḇena mkonya, nari iswar mko imnis snonkaku ḇyesi. Ḇape snar supswan ine i ḇena mkonyaḇa, mboi yakimfir mko kwar ro supswan ine, eḇedari supswan ine dayin mko.

Mko swarepen rosai yakofen faro mko kwar: manfamyan oso ikaki syadi tuan ḇyediḇa. Rofyor sewayam aya kwar, rarirya nari sewayam mko kako; rofyor siso farkarkor ayena, nari siso farkarkor mkoḇena kako.
Ḇape roi ḇeḇor nakam nari sifrur na faro mko snar aya, snar ssmambaḇir ḇewan ayanyaḇa.
Rofyor yarama ḇaim ma yawawos faro siḇa, nari sesasar ḇa. Ḇape baboine sisma sanoḇa faro sasar sena!
Mansei ḇeyayin aya, ikako dayin Mami.
Rofyor yafrur fararur nane ro fadu senaḇa imnis raris snonkaku ḇesesya moḇ sifararur ḇaḇeri raya nari sesasarḇa. Ḇape baboine smam roi ḇeḇor yafrur nakam kwar ḇesyaḇo sayin faro aya ma Mami kako.
Ḇape fasfas ro Refo Yahudi sedi nari seimnisi: Sayin aya kuker knamoḇa.
Nari yawan faro mko Rur Ḇeḇuk sneprei ḇeḇeknam ro Kmaya iso nari ḇafasna napnapes ro Allah ya. Rofyor ryama kwar, nari ḇyesaksi ro aya.
Ma mko kako nari mkoḇe saksi ro aya, snar mko kada ro randakya mko fnoḇek aya kwar."
"Yakofen roi ḇeḇor nane kam faro mko, insa mkoḇe ḇirḇar awer.
Nari spampum mkobur rum nadi na, ma nari fafisuya ryama nari snonkaku ḇemun mko skara ḇo soḇo: sesyowi faro Allah.
Nari sifrur rarirya faro mko, snar ssmambaḇir faro Mami ma ayaḇa.

(4a) Ḇape yakofen roi ḇeḇor nane kam faro mko, insa rofyor fafisuya ryama ido mko swarepen mboi yakofen na kwar faro mko." (4b) "Roi nane kam yakofen na faro mko ro randakyaḇa, snar fyor ine aya isya fnoḇek mko,
ḇape baboine nari yakaḇer faro ḇewan aya kwarya ma mkono osero ḇaḇeri ḇefuken maro aya: Waḇe rwa ḇeso?
Ḇape snar yakofen roi ḇeḇor nane faro mko, eḇedari mkosnemna nfafardun.
Rarirya roi yakofen faro mko nane nkaku: Iḇye syadi faro mko, fa yara. Snar rofyor yaraḇa, nari yawan Rur Ḇeḇuk snepreiya faro mkoḇa. Ḇape rofyor yara, nari yawani faro mko.
Ma rofyor ryama ido, iso nari ḇeḇuk fa supswan ine ssmambaḇir sasarna, napnapes ma ḇaḇesamamyaiya;
ro sasarna, snar sikyar faswef faro ayaḇa;
faro napnapesya, snar yara faro Mami ma mkomam aya werḇa;
ro ḇaḇesamamyaiya, snar samambraḇ supswan ine isma samamyai kwar.
Roi ono naisya nabor kaker fa yakofen faro mko wer, ḇape baboine mko sambraḇ ḇaim fa mko kamar na.

Ḇape rofyor Rur ḇenapesya ryama, ikada nari dun mko faro napnapesya; snar nari iwos ro roi ḇekur mankundi ḇardiḇa, ḇape dawos roi ḇeḇor kam imnaf na naiso ikofen na ma nari ḇyaryas faro mko ro roi nari ḇerama na.
Ikada nari ḇyuk baba maḇe aya, snar nari ḇyaryas faro mko rosai isma ro aya.
Roi ḇeḇor kam Mami ḇyena, roi yana nairya, eḇedari yakofen: Rur ani nari ḇyaryas faro mko rosai isma ro aya."
"Fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya werḇa ma fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya wer."
Simnaf rarirya manfamyan ḇyesi ono sifuken yae farosi: "Rosai ikofen ḇesyani: Fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya werḇa, ma fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya wer? Ma: Yara faro Kmaya?"
Inja sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rosai ikofen ḇesya maroko: Fafisu kermkun monda wer? Kofawi rosai ikofenyaḇa."

Yesus ifawi, mboi simarisen sifuken roi oso faroi, inja ikofen farosi: "Inja roi yakofen ro insanja anna naiso mko fuken yae mko kuker na, isoine: Fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam ayaḇa ma fafisu kermkun monda wer kako nari mkomam aya?
Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Nari mko kanes mboi supswan ine nari siryaḇ; mko kada nari mkomandak, ḇape mandak mkoḇena nari nfarwe ḇe raryaḇ.
Bin oso fyafardun rofafisu fanam iḇe daḇenya, ḇape rofafisu daḇen romawa ḇyedi kwar, bin ani ḇyepro kandera ḇyena, snar wombrek mkun oso ḇyeḇeaḇen kwar ḇe supswan ine.
Rarirya kako fafisu ine mkoḇe mandak, ḇape nari yasrow mko wer ma nari mkoryaḇ ma snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri fa dun raryaḇ mkoḇena burmko.
Ma ro ras ani mkono nari ifuken roi ono faro aya ḇa. Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Roi ḇeḇor kam mkor faro Mami kuker snonsnon ayedi nari ḇyukna faro mko.
Isof ro ras ine mkor roi oso ḇaim kuker snonsnon ayedi. Mkor nari mkosma, insa raryaḇ mkoḇedi imnis.
Roi ḇeḇor nane kam yakofen na faro mko kuker sarḇer. Mboi fafisuya nari ryama yawos faro mko kuker sarḇer wer ḇa, ḇape yawos isnabos beri ro Mami faro mko.
Ro ras ani nari mkonadi kuker snonsnon ayedi. Ma yakofen faro mkoḇa mboi yor ro Mami faro mko;
snar Mami mankundi iswar mko, snar mkoswar aya kwar ma mkokyar mboi yarama ro Allah.
Yarama ro Mami ma yarama ḇe supswan ine; yabur supswan ine wer ma yara faro Mami wer."
Manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Babo ine Manseren wawos isna bosḇeri ma swarḇer werḇa.
Insape nkofawi, mboi wafawi roi ḇeḇor nane kam ma fandun fa snonkaku sifuken wer ro awḇa. Eḇedari nkokyar mboi rwama ro Allah."
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Inja insape mkokyare?
Mkomam, fafisuya ryama ma ryama kwar, mboi mkoḇe ḇekakek oser-oser ḇe moḇ ḇyedi ma mkobur ayaḇo yerer ro mankundaya. Mboi yemir ḇardiḇa, snar Mami ryous aya.
Yakofen faro mko, roi ḇeḇor nane, insa mkosma aski snar mkoḇe oser kuker aya. Ro supswan ine sewayam mko ma mkoḇe kandera ḇape mkosambraḇser mkosnemna, snar yakafyo supswan ine kwar."
Yesus ikofen rarirya. Raimnai iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma ikofen: "Mami, fafisuya ryama kwar; buk baba faro Rumkun bedi, insa Rumkun bedi dakfrur baba faro aw.
Imnis raris buk faroi kwar papoik robo kawasasya kam, rarirya nari ḇyuk kako kankenem ḇekain fyoroya faro snonkakusya kam buk faroi kwarsya.
Kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, isoine mboi ssmambaḇir aw werer Allah ḇenapes, ma ssmambaḇir Yesus Kristus wawan kwar ani.
Yafrur wasma baba kwar ro supswan ine kuker nyan yafrur posa fararur buk maro aya fa yafrur na.
Inja knikine, o Mami, buk baba ḇe aya ro aw ḇardi, kuker baba yasma ro ḇarpon bedi rofyor supswan ine isya ḇaim.
Yafasna Mami kwar faro snonkaku ḇeḇor buk kwar maro aya ro supswan ine. Sikada aw ḇenasi ma buksi maro aya kwar ma siso wos ḇena kwar.
Insape sifawi, mboi snonkaku buk ḇe ayansya kam seknam ro aw.
Snar roi ḇeḇor buk maro aya kwar yaḇuk na kwar farosi ma sakna na kwar. Sifawibos kaku, yaḇe knam ro aw ma sikyar aw ḇewan ayanya.
Yaḇe nadi warek si. Yaḇe nadi faro supswan ineḇa, ḇape faro snonkaku buk kwar maro aya, snar aw ḇenasi,
ma roi ḇeḇor ayena kam aw ḇenananya ma roi nwana ayai ḇenananya, ma yasma baba kukersi kwar.

Ma aya isya ro supswan ine werḇa, ḇape sikada sisya kaker ro supswan ine, ma yara mufaḇe aw. O Mami ḇesren, fadurusi ro snonsnon ḇedi, isoine snonsnon bedi bema ḇe aya kwar; insa sḇeoser imnis raris Ko.
Rofyor aya isya fnoḇek si, yafadurusi ro snonsnon bedi, isoine snonsnon bedi buk kwar maḇe aya; yawarensi kwar, ma oso rosi ryoḇa derer faroi sfasna kwar fa ḇeroe, insa fasfas Refoya imnis.
Insape yara mufaḇe aw ma yakofen nakam ine rofyor aya isya kaker ro supswan ine, insa raryaḇ ayena rofandusi.
Yaḇuk wos ḇena farosi kwar, inja supswan ine sayinsi, snar sikada supswan ine nyasiḇa, imnis raris aya ine kako sup-swan ine nya ayaḇa.
Yor fa wunsi bur supswan ineḇa, imboi insa fadirensi ro ḇarḇorya.
Supswan ine nyasiḇa, imnis aya kako supswan ine nya ayaḇa.
Fasren si ro napnapesya; wos bedi kada napnapes rirya.
Imnis raris wawan aya kwar ḇe supswan ine, rarirya yawansi ḇe supswan ine kako;
ma yafasren mankundaya farosi, insa seḇeyakfasren ro napnapesya.
Ma yaḇenadi warek serer mondaḇa, ma yaḇenadi warek kako snonkaku ḇekyar faro ayasya snar ḇararyas sena;
insa sikam seoser, imnis raris Mami, ḇyeoser kuker aya ma aya yaḇeoser kuker Mami, insa sikako sakḇe oser kuker Ko, insa supswan ine sikyar, mboi Mami ḇewan ayanya.
Yaḇuk farosi baba, buk kwar maḇe ayana, insa sḇeoser, imnis raris moḇ Ko ḇeoser raya.
Aya yaḇe oser kukersi ma aw beoser kuker aya insa simnis sḇeoser, insa supswan ine sifawi, mboi aw ḇewan aya kwar ma waswarsi, imnis raris waswar aya.
O Mami ḇenapes, mboi supswan ine dakmam baḇir awḇa, ḇape aya kada yamambaḇir aw ma naek ansine kada sifawi, mboi aw ḇewan ayanya.
O Mami, yamarisen insa, moḇ rosai aya isya roya, sisya fnoḇek aya, snonkaku buk kwar maḇe aya, insa smam baba ayena buk kwar maḇe aya, snar waswar aya kwar rofyor supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya.
Ma yakofen ḇadir snonsnon bedi farosi kwar ma nari yakofen ḇadir wer, insa saswar buk faro aya ḇyeoser kuker si ma ayano yaḇe oser kukersi."
Yesus ḇyenadi rarirya kwar isasyar ro moḇ ani kuker manfamyan ḇyesi skunuk war Kidron. Rodia yaf oso isya ma Yesus syun ro yaf ani fnoḇek manfamyan ḇyesi.
Yudas ḇeḇoḇ Yesus, dakfawi moḇ ani kako, snar fafisu ono Yesus fyananjur kuker manfamyan ḇyesi ro moḇ ani.
Inja mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisisya siwan Yudas fa dun sarar sordade Romawi ma manwarwaren Allah Rum ḇyedi, ssun romamun ma ambar, ḇo sakrama ro moḇ ani.
Yesus ifawi kwar rosai nari ḇekuri, inja imbran fa isrowsi ma ikofen farosi: "Manseiso mko sewarya?"
Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Yesus ro Nazaret." Ikofen farosi: "Aya isoine." Yudas ḇeḇoḇi ani isya kako rodia fnoḇeksi.
Rofafisu ikofen farosi: "Aya isoine," sisusu ma sisapi kam.
Raimnai ifuken wer: "Manseiso mko sewarya?" Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Yesus ro Nazaret."
Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen kwar faro mko, aya isoine. Rofyor ayai mkosewarya ido, mkorir ḇese sine fa sibur."
Rarirya insa Yesus wos ikofen kwar imnis: "Mami manseiso buk kwar maro aya, yamam mondasi ḇo oso ryoḇa."
Inja Simon Petrus, ḇeyun sumber oso, pyas sumber ani ro sowerya ma pyapek bas imam ḇeba manfyan ḇyedi knaram byedi ḇar rakuya. Manfyan ani snonsnon ḇyedi Malkus.
Yesus ikofen faro Petrus: "Swower sumber bedi; kwara woḇo yamewer yinem ro sekaninem kandera Mami ḇyuk kwar maro aya?"
Inja sarar sordade Romawi mananir sedi ma Yahudisya manwarwaren siwansya sfor Yesus ma sewankai.
Raimnai suni ḇepon faro Hanas, Kayafas manbanyori, Kayafas ine iso ḇeḇe Imam Ḇeba ro wampasi wambarek ani.
Kayafas ine iso ḇeḇuk swarepen kwar faro kawasa Yahudisya: "Iḇye syadi snonkaku oser imar sadwer er ḇeḇor kam."
Simon Petrus ma manfamyan ḇese ani suso Yesus. Manfamyan ḇese anikada ifawi Imam Ḇebaya, inja daksun fnoḇek Yesus ḇe buḇes Imam Ḇeba rum ḇyedi,
mboi Petrus iwaf ro ḇondi fanam kedwaya. Manfamyan ḇese ḇefawi Imam Ḇeba ani, kyaḇer randi, dawawos faro ḇinfyan ḇewaren kedwaya, raimnai dun Petrus fa syun.
Ḇinfyan ḇewaren kadwai ani ikofen faro Petrus, ḇo doḇo: "Awne kako manfamyan oso ro snon iwa?" Petrus kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Roḇa!"
Rofafisu ani manfyan manwarwaren Allah Rum ḇyedi ono sikaḇen for oso kwar, snar pnunek iba ro fafisu ani, ma sores sidapen rodia. Petrus kako dores dakdapen fnoḇeksi.
Ma Imam Ḇebaya irandak ifuken Yesus ro manfamyan ḇyesi ma farkarkor ḇyena kako.
Yesus kyarem farosi: "Yawos isna ro fababa faro supswan ine: Yaḇuk farkarkor ḇesya kwar ro rum nadi ma Allah Rum ḇyedi moḇ kawasa Yahudisya siryur ro na; yawos roi ono kuker kankunes ḇaim.
Snaro wafuken aya? Wafukensi rosai yakofen kwar farosi; kaku ḇeri sifawi rosai yafarkor kwar farosi."
Rofafisu ikofen rarirya, snon ḇewaren oso ḇeyores ro dia, ḇyaser Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Kwarem rarirya faro Imam Ḇeba?"
Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor wos ayedi syasar ido, fasna sasarya, ḇape rofyor wos ayedi kyaku ido, snaro baser aya?"
Ma Hanas fyaremi kuker ḇramin ḇeḇewanka faro Imam Ḇeba Kayafas.
Simon Petrus dores dakdapen for kaker rodia. Snonkaku ḇeyores rodia sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Aw kako manfamyan oso roi?"
Fyamyuni ḇo doḇo: "Roḇa." Manfyan oso ro Imam Ḇeba isoine kina ro snon Petrus pyapekbas knaram ani ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Insanja yamam aw kako ro yaf ani fnoḇek snon ani?"
Ma Petrus fyamyun wer ma rofyorya mankokosya sor.
Ma arwo prim kaku Yesus ḇyeḇeyun ro Kayafas rum ḇyedi ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes. Sikada saksun ro rum karkara ḇenapesḇa snar simkak ḇude sifrur mamas mankunsi, snar siḇe san Paskah.
Eḇedari Pilatus isasyar fa isrowsi ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Rosai mkoḇuksof snon ineya?"
Skarem faroi ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor snon ḇeḇarḇor risyaḇa kada nari nkuni fa nkoḇuki faro awḇa!"
Pilatus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkuni ma mkoḇe mankarai raris sasoser Refo Yahudi mkoḇedi." Yahudi ansi soḇo: "Nkopok nkoḇuk samamyai marmari faro snonkakuḇa."
Rarirya insa imnis Yesus wos ikofen, fa ḇekur marmar ḇyedi.
Raimnai Pilatus syun kaḇer ḇerum karkara ḇenapesya, raimnai dor Yesus ma ifukeni, ḇo doḇo: "Aw ine wairek Yahudisya sediso awke?"
Yesus kyarem: "Inja fakfuken ḇedine dekro snembrike roḇaido ono ḇese ḇekofen faro aw ro aya?"
Pilatus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Inja aya ine snon Yahudike? Er ḇesi ḇardi ma mananir imam-imam siso ḇeḇuk aw faro aya kwar; rosai wafrur kwarya?"

Yesus kyarem: "Ḇaḇesasoser ayedi isya ro supswan ineḇa; rofyor Ḇaḇesasoser ayadi isya ro supswan inekada, nari manfamyan ayesi sisampum, ma siḇri warek aya insa ssḇuk aya faro Yahudisya ḇa, ḇape Ḇaḇesasoser ayedi ro dineḇa."

Inja Pilatus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Inja wairek risawke?" Yesus kyarem: "Imnis raris moḇ wakofen raya, kaku aya ine wairek. Iso eḇedari yaḇe ḇeaḇen ma iso eḇedari yarama ḇe supswan ine, insa yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ro ḇaḇenapnapesya; snonkaku oser-oser ḇeḇeknam ro napnapesya simnaf mkaren ayedi."

(38a) Pilatus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai ḇaḇenapnapes ani?" (38b) Raimnai Pilatus isasyar ro rum karkara ḇenapes wer faro kawasa ansi ma ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yasma sasar oso ḇaḇeri ro snon ine.
Ḇape faro mko ro ras Paskah yasasyar snon oso ro ḇesmaisya faro mko. Mko marisenke yasasyar wairek Yahudi faro mko?"
Skarem kuker ḇararas, ḇo soḇo: "Roḇa, iba ḇoi Barabas!" Barabas ikada snon oso ḇefasyar.
Raimnai Pilatus duni ma iwan fa sipreri.
Sordadesya siyanem wower borek oso ro kaḇrai borek posa sriri ro ḇukor ḇyedi. Ma ssansuni kuker syatuḇefuk,
Ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Jow suba, ne wairek Yahudi!" Raimnai sḇaseri.
Raimnai Pilatus isasyar wer ma ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkomam, yuni fa isasyar faro mko, insa mkofawi, yasma sasar oso roi ḇaḇeri."
Raimnai Yesus isasyar, isaswo wower borek ma syansun syatu ḇefuk. Ma Pilatus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkomam snonkaku ine!"

Rofyor mananir imam-imam ma manwarwaren ansi smami, sibras kam ḇo soḇo: "Ḇye ḇepai ro aprop, ḇye ḇepai ro aprop!" Pilatus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkuni ma mkopai ro mankun mko; snar yasma sasar oso roi ḇaḇeri."
Kawasa Yahudi skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Nkona sasoser ma sasoser ani doḇo nari imar snar kyarem mankundi ḇe Allah Rumkun ḇyedi."
Rofafisu Pilatus imnaf wos ḇerarirya imkak syadi wer,
raimnai syun kaḇer wer ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes ma ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Aw ido beknam roriso?" Ḇape Yesus kyaremba.
Inja Pilatus ikofen faroi wer, ḇo doḇo: "Inja wamewer wawos kuker ayake? Wafawi ḇake yasma papoik fa yafaspar aw, ma papoik kako fa yawan ḇo spai aw ro aprop?"
Yesus kyarem: "Wasma papoik oḇa beri kako faro aya, rofyor papoik ani ḇyeḇeḇuk faro aw ro boiyaswaḇa. Eḇedari: ḇeḇuk aya faro awsya sasar sena naba syadi ro aw."
Rofyor ani Pilatus ḇyesewar fa fyaspar Yesus, ḇape kawasa Yahudisya sibras, ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor faspari ido Kaisar bati ḇyediso awḇa. Snonkaku oso ḇekara mankundi ḇe wairek ikada isampum Kaisar."
Rofyor Pilatus imnaf wos anna, iwan fa ssun Yesus ḇe ḇondi, ma kyain ro karapesa napnapesya, ro moḇ ḇenirḇe Litostrotos, (ansan karui) ro wos Ibrani Gabata.
Ras ani kada ras fasasos Paskah, indokada oras samfur seser risuru. Pilatus ikofen faro kawasa Yahudi ansi; ḇo doḇo: "Inekada wairek mkoḇedi!"

Inja sibras ḇo soḇo: "Mkomuni! Mkomuni! Mko pai ro aprop!" Pilatus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Inja mkomarisen ḇoyapai wairek mkoḇedi ro aprop?" Mananir imam-imam ansi skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Nkona wairek oso ḇese ḇa mboi Kaisar ikada wairek nkoḇedirya!"
(16a) Ḇarpurya Pilatus ḇyuk Yesus farosi fa spai ro aprop. (16b) Ssun Yesus raimnai sra.
Yesus mankundi ḇyar aprop ḇyedi ḇo isasyar ḇe moḇ ḇenirḇe Ḇukorbei, ro wos Ibrani: Golgota.
Ma rodia spai ro aprop ma spai fnoḇeki kako snon risuru oso ro ḇar raku ma oso ro ḇar rasar ḇoi Yesus ro fadu.
Ma Pilatus iwan fa sfas ro Yesus aprop ḇyedi: "Yesus ro Nazaret, wairek kawasa Yahudi."
Kawasa Yahudi sibor siwasya fasfas ani, snar moḇ spai Yesus ro ani fyanam mnuya ma fasfas anna neḇefas ro wos Ibrani, Latin (Roma) ma wos Yunani.
Inja mananir imam-imamsya sikofen faro Pilatus, ḇo soḇo: "Fas awer: 'Yahudisya wairek sedi,' mboi fas radine: 'Snon ine ikofen, Aya Wairek kawasa Yahudi.' "
Pilatus kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai yafas kwar, kyain raririrya."
Sordade ansi spai Yesus kwar, ssun sansun ḇyena ma serwas na ḇefiak: Oser-oser isma rarwas oser ma syatu ḇyedi suni kako. Syatu ani ḇyeḇesipḇa mboi ḇyeḇesnai robo ḇe sop monda.

Eḇedari sikofen yae farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Korwas iḇe mnuk-mnuk awer, mboi iḇye kokinsor fa kofawi mansei ḇenaiya. Sifrur rarirya insa seimnis fas-fas ro Refo: "Sḇerarwas sansun ayena, ma skinsor faro syatu ayedi." Ma sordade ansi sifrur rarirya.
Ma ro fanam Yesus aprop ḇyedi, snari dores ma sna ḇedar ḇyedi Maria, Kleopas swari ma Maria Magdalena.
Fafisu Yesus myam snari ma manfamyan iswar ani dores fanami, inja ikofen faro snari: "Awine, inekada romawa bedi!"
Raimnai ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyedi: "Inekada sna bedi!" Randak ro ras ani beri manfamyan ani dun Yesus snari ḇe rum ḇyedi.
Raimnai, Yesus ifawi, mboi roi ḇeḇor kam namnis kwar, ma insa rosai sfas ro Refo ndarirya, inja ikofen: "Yambrow!"
Rodia isya sek oso ifo kuker anggur ḇemnir. Inja skokukser bunek ḇesowen kwar ro anggur ḇemnir ansi ro amfriwen oso ma skosui ro Yesus sḇardip ḇyedi.
Yesus dinem anggur ḇemnir ani kwar, ikofen: "Imnis kwar." Raimnai kyankunem ma imar.

Snar ras ani ras fasasos ma insa ro ras Mananai Yahudi ani kekḇa ansi skaf awer ro aprop-snar ras Mananai Yahudi ani ras ḇeba rirya-inja kawasa Yahudi sra faro Pilatus ma sor faroi insa snonkaku spai ansi wemin sena neḇepankar ma kekḇa ansi seḇesabu.
Inja sordade ansi sra ma spankar ḇepon snon risuru spai fnoḇek Yesus ansuya wemin suḇesi;
ḇape rofyor srama faro Yesus ma smam imar kwar, inja sakpankar wemin ḇyesuya ḇa,
ḇape snon oso ro sordade ansi iwankir pe ḇyedi kuker bom, ma rik kuker war nasar beri.
Ma snonkaku ḇemam roi ḇeḇesya ani iso ḇeḇuk ḇaḇesaksi kako ma ifawi ḇaḇesaksi ḇyedi kyaku, ma ifawi, mboi ikofen roi ḇenapes, insa mkokyar kako.
Roi ḇeradine ndarirya, insa fasfas ro Refo imnis isoine: "Kor ḇyesi oso nari ḇyeḇepankarḇa."
Ro Refo sfas kako radine: "Nari smam Yesus siwankir ani."

Posa kwar Yusuf ro Arimatea rya faro Pilatus ma dor insa dun Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi ro apropya. (Yusuf manfamyan ro Yesus ḇeso fasis, snar imkak kawasa Yahudisya.) Ma Pilatus ḇyuk raris fararyor ani. Inja rya dun Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi.
Nikodemus, ro randakya ḇera faro Yesus rofafisu roḇ, dakso Yusuf kako. Nikodemus dun mani mur ḇefawas mampasa marḇakḇakya indokada kati samfur ririm.
Snon ansuine suyun Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi, suparek epeni kuker kruḇen ḇepyoper ma supyosi kuker kefi-kefi imnis rari kawasa Yahudi rofyor sikrir ḇemarsya.
Fanam moḇ spai Yesus ro ani yaf pampen oso isya, ma ro yaf ani ureren babo oso isya, ḇape sikrir snon oso roi ḇaim.
Snar ras ani ras fasasos kawasa Yahudi ma ureren ani ḇyinkwanḇa, inja sfaryaker Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi ro dia.
Ro ras ari arwo prim kaku, fafisu isnai karkir, Maria Magdalena ryaḇe rus ani ma myam mboi karui ḇesisen urerenya ḇyeḇekris kwar bur urerenya.
Ifrar fa syewar Simon Petrus ma manfamyan Yesus iswar ani, ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ono ssun Manseren bur ureren ḇyani ma nkofawi moḇ sikrami wer royaḇa."
Inja Petrus ma manfamyan ḇese ani sura ḇe rus ani.
Sufrar kam ḇape manfamyan ḇese ani ifrar samberen syadi Petrus inja pyonra ro rus ani.
Kyankunem ma ikiki myam ro urerenya, kruḇen ḇeparek Yesusya ḇyarek ro moḇ ani, ḇape syun ro ureren aniḇa.
Simon Petrus iyauser ma syun pdef ro ureren ani. Myam kruḇen ḇeparek Yesus ani ḇyarek rodia,
ma marḇun ḇefes Yesus bukor ḇyedi ḇyarek fanam kruḇen ḇeparekiya ḇa, mboi ḇyeḇeyaper ḇo ḇyarek ḇese.
Inja manfamyan ḇese ḇefrar ḇepon maro rus ani, dakkiki kako ma myam rarirya inja ikyar.
Snar rofyor ani kada sifawi ḇaim rosai sfas ro Refo mboi nari diḇeri bur marmarya.
Raimnai manfamyan ansuya subur ḇe rum.
Ḇape Maria dores fanam ureren ani ḇo kyanes. Fafisu kyanes ḇo ikiki fa myam ro ureren ani,
ma myam malaikat risuru susansun sansun ḇepyoper ḇo sukain ro moḇ Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi ḇyarek ro ani, suminya ro mun ḇukorya ma suminya ro mun weminya.
Malaikat ansuya sukofen faroi: "Awine, rosai kwanes kukerya?" Maria kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ono ssun Manseren ayedi kwar ma yafawi moḇ sriri royaḇa."
Ikofen rarirya kwar iknenef ḇeḇarpur ma myam Yesus dores, ḇape ifawiḇa, mboi Yesus irya.

Yesus ikofen faroi: "Awine, rosai kwanes kukerya? Mansei swewarya?" Maria kyara ḇo doḇo snon ḇewaren yaf rirya inja ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Tuan rofyor awi ḇeyuni ido wakofen ḇadiri ḇe aya, moḇ rosai rwiri roya, insa yara yuni."
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Maria!" Maria iknenef ma ikofen faroi kuker wos Ibrani: "Rabuni!" isoine, "Guru".
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Pan awer ro aya, snar yara faro Mami ḇaim, mboi rwa wakofen faro naek ayansi, mboi insape yaḇe yara faro Mami ma Kma mko ḇedi, faro Allah ayedi ma Allah mkoḇedi."
Maria Magdalena rya ma ikofen faro manfamyan ansi: "Yamam Manseren kwar!" ma Manseren iso ḇekofen roi ḇeḇor anna faroi.
Ro ras ari ani kako fafisu roḇ kwar, Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi siryur ro rum oso ma kedwana neḇesopder, snar simkak kawasa Yahudisya. Rofafisu ani Yesus ryama dores fandusi, ma ikofen: "Aski faro mko!"
Ma ikofen rarirya kwar, fyasna ḇramin ḇyesu ma pe ḇyedi farosi. Manfamyan ansi simarisen kaku rofafisu smam Manseren.
Ma Yesus ikofen wer: "Aski faro mko! Imnis raris Mami iwan aya, rarirya knikine yakwan mko kako."
Ma rofyor dawawos rarirya kwar, iwuf yoi ḇyedi farosi ma ikofen: "Mkosma Rur Ḇesrenya.
Rofyor mkopyos snonkaku oso sasar ḇyena, Allah kako dakpyos sasar ḇyena. Mboi rofyor mkopyos oso sasar ḇyenaḇa, Allah kako dakpyos sasar ḇyenaḇa."
Tomas, snon oso ro manfamyan samfur seser risuru, ḇyansi sap i kako ḇe Didimus, isya fnoḇek min ḇyesiḇa rofafisu Yesus ryama farosi ani.

Inja manfamyan ḇese ansi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Nko mam Manseren kwar!" Ḇape Tomas kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Rofyor yamam apurwan paku ro ḇramin ḇyesuyaḇa, ma yasyun ḇrampin ayesi ro apurwan paku ani ma yasyun ḇramin ayesi ro pe ḇyediḇa, yakyar ḇaim."
Ras riwar nawas kwar Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi siryur wer ro rum ani ma Tomas ifnoḇeksi kako. Fafisu ani kedwana neḇesopder kam, ḇesyaḇo Yesus ryama dores fanandusi, ma ikofen: "Aski faro mko!"
Ḇarpurya Yesus ikofen faro Tomas: "Wasyun ḇrampin besi rodine, ma mam ḇramin ayesuine, fos ḇramsu ma wasyun ro pe ayedine ma wakyarḇa kaker awer, mboi wakyar beri."
Tomas kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren yedi ma Allah yedi!"
Yesus ikofen faroi: "Snar mam aya kwar eḇedari wakyarya. Aski faro ḇemamḇa, mboi ḇekyarsya."
Aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor naisya nabor kaker Yesus ifrur ro ḇarpon manfamyan ḇyesi mamam sena, ḇape neḇefas kamba ro syap ine,
ḇape roi ḇeḇor nane neḇefas kwar insa mko kyar, mboi Yesus Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri, Allah Rumkun ḇyedirya, ma snar mko kyar faroi, inja mkosma kankenemya.
Ḇarpurya Yesus fyasna mankundi wer faro manfamyan ḇyesi ro danosen Tiberias andirya ma fyasna mankundi farosi radine.
Ro danosen andir ani manfamyan ḇyesi ono sisya siryur isoine: Simon Petrus, Tomas sap kako ḇe Didimus, Natanael ro Kana ro Galilea, Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesuya ma manfamyan ḇyesi suru wer.
Simon Petrus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yaḇe yaraswan." Sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Nkoso aw!" Sra sek ro waya, ḇape roḇ ani smun ino ḇaḇeri.
Fafisu fanam meser, Yesus dores ro danosen andirya; ḇape manfamyan ansi sifawiḇa, mboi ḇeyores ani Yesus irya.
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Ne, romawa yesi, mkosma manfna onoke?" Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Oroḇa beri."
Inja Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mko nap pam mkoḇedi ro waya ḇar rakuya, ma nari mkosma in ono." Raimnai snap pam ani ma ssambraḇ fa spaw pam aniḇa snar insya sibor mankenem.
Inja manfamyan Yesus iswar ani ikofen faro Petrus: "Manseren irya." Fafisu Petrus imnaf mboi Manseren irya, inja syansun sansun ḇyena, snar syansuni ḇa, raimnai doper ro danosenya.
Manfamyan ḇesesya siyauser kuker waya ma spaw pam ḇefo kuker in ani ḇe ḇonde snar sḇinkwan ro ḇondeyaḇa, indokada rof utin oser monda.
Fafisu srande kwar smam fondesna kuker in ma mamami.
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Indo mkun in mko mun babo ansi ono muma."
Simon Petrus dek ro waya raimnai skopaw pam ani ḇe ḇonde, ifo kuker in ḇeba-ḇeba monda: Utin oser samfur ririm seser rikior, sibor rarirya ḇesyaḇo pam ani imuk ḇaḇeri.
Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkorama kanan." Manfamyan ansi oso ḇaḇeri ḇefuken faroi: "Inja manseso aw?" Snar sifawi, mboi Manseren irya.
Ḇarpurya Yesus fyanamsi, ma dun mamami ani fa ḇyukḇoḇ si. Ifrur rarirya kuker in ansi.
Ine rarwan ḇeḇe kior Yesus fyasna mankundi faro manfamyan ḇyesi posa ro aḇiḇer ḇyedi ro fandu ḇemarsya.

Sanan posa kwar Yesus ikofen faro Simon Petrus: "Simon, Yohanes mandaḇen ḇyedi, waswar syadi ayake ro min besine?" Petrus kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren, wafawi, mboi yaswar aw." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wafarandows domba-domba ayesi."

Yesus ikofen faroi ḇerarwan ḇeḇe suruya: "Simon, Yohanes mandaḇen ḇyedi, waswar syadi ayake?" Petrus kyarem faroi; ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren wafawi, mboi yaswar aw." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wafarandows domba-domba ayesi."

Yesus ikofen faroi wer ḇerarwan ḇeḇekiorya: "Simon, Yohanes mandaḇen ḇyedi, waswar syadi ayake?" Inja Petrus sne ḇyedi fyafardun snar Yesus ifuken ḇerarwan rikior: "Waswar syadi ayake?" Ma ikofen faroi: "Manseren, Manseren wafawi roi ḇeḇor kam, wafawi, mboi yaswar aw." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wafarandows domba-domba ayesi.

Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro aw: Fafisu besnonkborya mankundaw fes sifer bedi kuker ḇeḇoḇek ma wambran ḇe moḇ rosai wamarisenya, ḇape rofyor bemansar kwar, nari fos ḇramsu ma snonkaku ḇese siyaḇek aw ma sun awḇe moḇ mankundaw wamarisenḇa."
Wos nane ikofen na rarirya fa nfasna Petrus marmar ḇyedi ḇeḇuk baba faro Allah. Posa kwar Yesus ikofen faro Petrus: "Waso aya."
Fafisu Petrus iknenef, myam mboi manfamyan Yesus iswar ani isoine manfamyan ro fafisu skanan kam ma ḇekain fanam Yesus ma ḇefuken, ḇo ḇeyoḇo: "Manseren, manseiso nari ḇeḇoḇ awya?"
Rofyor Petrus myam manfamyan ani, ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rariso kuker snon ine?"
Yesus kyarem: "Rofyor yamarisen, nari ikenem rao isof yakaḇer werma, ine fararur bedisyaḇa. Mboi awkada waso aya."

Inja wos ani ḇyesno ro fandu manfamyan Yesus ḇyansi mankunsi, mboi manfamyan ani nari imarḇa. Ḇape Yesus ikofen rariryaḇa, mboi doḇo: "Rofyor yamarisen nari ikenem rao isof yakaḇerma wer, ine fararur bedisyaḇa."
Manfamyan ani iso, ḇeḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ro roi ḇeḇor nane kamya. Iso ḇefas epen na kako, insa kofawi rosai ikofen na nkaku.
Yesus roi ifrurna naisya nabor kaker, ḇape rofyor neḇefas kam oser ḇe oser ido, yakara ḇoi moḇ ono ro supswan ine fa naser syap ḇeḇor nari sfas naba.
Ne, Teofilus, ro syap ḇepon ayedi yafas kwar ro Yesus, roi ḇeḇor I frur ma fyarkor na,
isof ro ras ḇyeḇekanow ya. Fafisu ḇyeḇekanow ḇaim ḇyuk sasoser kwar kuker papoik Rur Ḇesren faro manwawan kyimfir kwar ansi.

Faro manwawan ansi Yesus fyasna mankundi ro fyor marindi ḇekur i nasyof kwar, ma kuker aḇyair nabor ḇyuk fasasnai mboi i kenem. Snar ro ras samfur rifiak, fyasnai mankundi ḇe rarwan ono ma dawawos faro si ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ya.
Ro ras oso fafisu dananus si, danunyoḇ si insa sibur awer Yerusalem, ḇoi skain ro dia fa siwaf Mami asas ḇyedi, raris i kofen kwar: "Imnis raris mkomnaf kwar ro aya.
Snar Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren kuker war, ḇape mkokada fyoroḇa nari mkosma masi sren kuker Rur Ḇesren."
Inja kawasa ḇeryur ro dia sifuken: "Manseren, wamarisenke ro fafisu ine, bawes Ḇaḇesasoser faro kawasa Israel?"
Yesus kyarem: "Fandunba fa mkofawi fafisu Mami mankundi ḇyuk kwar raris papoik ḇyedi.
Mboi nari mkosma papoik, rofyor Rur Ḇesren dadofes ḇemko, ma nari mkoḇesaksi ḇe aya ro Yerusalem ma sup Yudea ḇesiper, Samaria isof supswan pember ya."
Yesus dawos rarirya posa, ḇyeḇekanowḇo sesaksi kam, ma mandifna nakawef i bur mamam sena.
Rofyor smam asuser ḇe nanki, fafisu ḇyeḇekanow ani, kniko snon risuru ḇesansun sansun ḇepyoper suyores fanam si,
ma sukofen faro si: "Ne, snon Galilea, snaro mkores ma mkomam ḇenanki? Yesus ine, ḇyeḇekanow benanki ḇebur mko, nari kyaḇer wer kuker nyan ḇeraris mkomambo ḇyeḇekanow ḇe boiyaswa."
Ma manwawan ansi skaḇer ro urk sapḇe urk Zaitun ḇe Yerusalem, swaf ya imnis mararan ro ras Ari ro Yerusalem.

Fyor sra kwar ro mnu ya, sekḇe sim ḇero bo, moḇ seryar roya. Manwawan ansi isoine Petrus ma Yohanes, Yakobus ma Andreas, Filipus ma Tomas, Bartolomeus ma Matius, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, Simon snon Zelot ma Yudas Yakobus mandaḇendi.
Sikam sesne oser ro nadi kayam, kuker bin ono ma Maria Yesus snari ma Yesus ḇedar ḇyesi.
Ro ras anna Petrus dores fandu naek ḇeryur ansi, barbor sedi indokada utin oser samfur risuru, ma ikofen:
"Ne, naek ayena mko, imnis fas-fas ro Refo, Daud ikofen kwar kuker famfnoḇek Rur Ḇesren ro roi ḇekur Yudas, ḇefarkin snonkaku ḇefor Yesus ansi.
Snar randak ya Yudas daksun kako ro dandonek koḇedi ma daksmai rarwas ro fararur ine."
Yudas ani kyoḇes kwar saprop mnuk oso kuker ḇaḇyak ro ḇarḇor ḇyena, ma isapi fa doḇer bosi, isof sneri imef ma snewar ḇyesi skakyai.
Roi ḇeḇesya ine kawasa kam ḇekain ro Yerusalem sifawiyi, isof saprop ani sap i ro wos sedi "Hakal-Dama", isoine "Saprop Rik".
"Snar fas-fas oso isya ro syap Mazmur: 'Iḇyesyadi aḇdares kankain ḇyedi ḇyeursḇa, ma iḇyesyadi ono skain awer ro moḇ ani;' ma: 'Iḇyesyadi oso ḇeso syadwer i ro nasan ḇyedi.'
Inja nari oso i fnoḇek ko isoine oso ro kawasa ḇerama ḇesoko ḇesya kwar ro fafisu Manseren Yesus i sya ro fandu ko,
isoine randak ro fafisu Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren isof ro Yesus ḇyeḇekanow ḇeboiyaswa bur ko, insa dakḇe saksi fnoḇek ko ro Yesus aḇiḇer ḇyedi."
Inja sfasnai snon risuru isoine: Yusuf sapḇe Barsabas roḇa Yustus ma Matias.
Sikam senadiḇo soḇo: "O Manseren, au ḇefawi snonkaku sya kam sisnesna, fasnaikada ro fandu snonkaku ansuine,
insa dakuf farmyan nasan ḇaḇemanwawan Yudas ibur ani, ḇesapi kwar faro moḇ ḇemnis kuker frur ḇyedi."
Raimnai skinsor snon ansui ma syor ro Matias ma rarirya i fnoḇek barbor ro manwawan samfur seser oser ansi.
Ro ras Sababu Rur Ḇesren, snonkaku ḇekyar sya si ryur kam ro moḇ oso.
Kniko rakrok oso dado ro nanki imnis wam doḇer ma kyain nosen rum, skain ro ya;
ma smam sak-sak ono namnis ramar, nasber ma nkain ro siḇrusna.
Ma sifo kuker Rur Ḇesren, mboi sirandak sawos ro wos-wos ḇeso, raris moḇ Rur ya ḇyuk fa sawos raya.
Rofyor ya snon Yahudi ḇekyar ono si sya ro Yerusalem ro er nakam ro supswan pember.
Fafisu rakrok ani dado ya, kawasa ḇeḇor ansi spanjuḇer. Ma sikmom snar oso-oso ro si imnaf manwawan ansi sawos ro wos sena.
Sikam sikandor ḇo sefesfyas ma sifuken: "Inja rariso snar ḇeyawawos sine kam snon Galilea inke?
Rariso indiri kokam komnaf sawawos ro wos koḇena oser-oser, isoine wos kawos ro mnu marin koḇena:
koine snon Partia, Media, Elam, ḇekain ro Mesopotamia, Yudea ma Kapadokia, Pontus ma Asia, Frigia ma Pamfilia,
Masir ma sup-sup Libia ḇefanam Kirene, snonkaku ḇerama ker Roma,
iḇye snon Yahudi ma ḇeyakso kako agama Yahudi, snon Kreta ma snon Arab, komnaf siwawos ro wos koḇena oser-oser ro fararur ḇeba Allah ifrurna."
Sikam sefesfyas ma sikmom ḇo sikofen yae faro si: "Rosaisoine?"
Ḇape snonkaku ḇeso ono skoryae ḇo soḇo: "Simser."
Inja Petrus iyori fnoḇek manwawan samfur seser oser ansi ma kuker mkaren ḇeba ikofen besi: "Ne, kawasa Yahudi ma mkokam ḇekain ro mnu Yerusalem, mkofawi ma mkokara wos ayena ne.
Snonkaku ansine simser raris moḇ mkokara raya ḇa, snar insape arwo babo oras siw,
ḇape raris Allah ikofen kwar kuker sḇayo Nabi Yoel:

Roi ḇeḇor nane ro ras ḇepupes nari ndama imnis Allah wos ḇyena nari yawan Rur Yedi faro kawasa kam; ma nari Rur ya fyarkor romawa-inai mkoḇesi fa sawos roi ono, ma snonkbor-inkbor mkoḇesi nari smam mamam ono, ma kawasa mansar mkoḇesi nari smafu mafu ono.
Ma manfamyan ayesi kako snon ma bin nari yawan Rur Yedi faro si ro ras-ras anna ma nari sawos roi ono.
Ma nari yafrur aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ro nanki yaswa ma fasasnai kanandor ro supswan ine: isoine rik ma for kamayow ma paw.
Ma ori nari syadwer fa pyampanbos ma paikya irik ḇepon ro ras Manseren ifyafer ya, ras payamyum ḇeba ani.
Ma mansei ḇefararyor kuker snonsnon Manseren nari isma aski.

Ne, kawasa Israel, mkorower wos nane: Roi yakofen kuker ya isoine, Yesus ro Nazaret, snonkaku Allah kyimfir kwar ma fyasnai faro mko kuker samambraḇ ma aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor Allah ifrurna kuker Yesus ro fandu mko raris mkofawi.
Iso Allah ḇyuk, imnis marisen ḇyedi, ma mkopai i kwar ḇo mkomun i kuker ḇramin ro er-er ḇeḇarḇor.
Ḇape Allah ḇyawes i ma fyaspar i bur marindi marmar ya, snar papok marmar ya ipok fa kyarwarek i ḇa.
Snar Daud ikofen ro i doḇo: 'Yamam ḇesya kwar faro Manseren, snar dores fanam aya isof yapok yamarmer ḇa.
Eḇedari sneri marisen syadi ma rur yedi sandik Manseren, ma kraf yedi kenem kuker aski,
snar rwir aya faro munaiḇui ḇa, ma mam monda Manfamyan ḇesren bedi i pokem ḇa.
Wakofen ḇadir faro aya nyan kankenem ya; yamarisen syadi ro ḇarpon bedi snar au sya fanam aya.'
Naek ma srar, ryani yakofen ḇayirbos faro mko ro Daud, er koḇedi kpusedi. Imar kwar ma seraki ma rus ḇyedi, isya kaker ro fanduko isof ras ine.
Ḇape ikada nabi dirya ma ifawi, Allah ḇyeasas ḇe i kwar kuker soar, nari isiḇer oso ro Daud kpu ḇyesi fa ḇye wairek.
Eḇedari myam rarpon kwar ma ikofen ro Wairek aḇiḇer ḇyedi, rofyor ikofen, nari yamam monda au ro munaiḇui ḇa, ma kraf bedi ipokem ḇa.
Yesus ine kada iso Allah ḇyawes ya, ma ro aḇiḇer ḇyedi nkoine kam nko ḇesaksi.
Ma Allah ikanow i kwar ro ḇar raku ḇyedi ma isma Rur Ḇesren ḇyeasas ani, i sabui fa iso mkomam ma mkorower ine.
Snar Daud kada, dekḇe boiyaswa ḇa, mboi mankundi ikofen: Manseren ikofen kwar faro Manseren yedi:
Kwain ro ḇar raku yedi, isof yafrur mbroḇ besi fa seararef ro wemssu.
Inja er Israel syakam ipyum syadi si fawibos, isoine Allah isiḇer Yesus kwar, mkopai ro aprop ani, fa ḇye Manseren ma Kristus."
Rofyor simnaf rarirya sisnesna nkarsosen, isof sifuken faro Petrus ma manwawan ḇeso ansi: "O naek nkoḇesi mko, rosaiso nari nkofrur ya?"
Inja Petrus kyarem faro si: "Mkombror ma iḇye kada mkor fa mkosma masi sren kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus ḇeḇuk ampun ro sasar mkobena, ma nari mkosma Rur Ḇesren.
Snar mkoiso ḇeḇeknam asas ani ma faro romawa mkoḇesi ma faro kawasa ḇeḇinkwan kaker sya, isoine dandonek nari ḇesma fararyor ro Manseren Allah koḇedi."
Ma kuker wos ḇeso nabor wer Petrus ḇyesaksibos beri, ma imsorḇo danun si ma ikofen: "Mko faspar mankun mko bur syos ḇeḇarḇor sine."
Kawasa ḇekyar Petrus wos ḇyena sor fa sisma masi sren ma ro ras ani dandonek ḇefnoḇek sya indokada syaran rikior.
Sikam si souser manwawan ansi farkarkor sena kuker ḇaḇeoser. Ma sikam siraryur ḇesyakwar fa spanasnis mamami ma senadi.
Kawasa ansi simkak kam, snar manwawan ansi sifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor.
Ma kawasa ḇekyar kwar syakada sḇeoser ma nana sena snakam na,
ma ro fandu si, ono sisya sḇoḇ ḇesya kwar nana sena ma sirarwasna faro kawasa ansi imnis ananjar sena oser-oser.
Kuker ḇaḇeuser ma kuker sne oser siryur ro ras-ras kam ro Rum Allah. Spanasnis mamami ro rum sena oser-oser ro rum ḇe rum ma sanan kam kuker raryaḇ ma kuker sne ḇenapes,
mboi sisandik Allah. Ma kawasa kam simarisen si. Ma ras-ras nakam Manseren ḇyuk kawasa sibor fa sifnoḇek kuker snonkaku ḇesma aski.
Ro ras oso fanam oras nadi, isoine oras kior fafisu ori ikren, Petrus ma Yohanes suyek ḇe Rum Allah.

Ro dia snon oso isya ḇyemanis rofyor snari daḇen i isof sunfarma i kuker waryar. Ras-ras kam snon ani sriri fanam kedwai ḇeba ro Rum Allah, ḇenirḇe kedwai Ḇepyum, insa dor farsarser faro snonkaku ḇesun ro Rum Allah sya.
Rofyor snon ani myam, Petrus ma Yohanes suḇe susun ro Rum Allah, inja dor farsarser ro su.
Sumam bosi ma Petrus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Mambe nurori."
Inja snon ani iknower su kuker kakyar nari isma roi oso ro su.
Ḇape Petrus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Sarak ma brawen yana onoḇa, ḇape rosai yasma ya, yaḇuki faro au: Kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus, snon Nazaret ani, wambran!"
Raimnai ikin snon ani ḇrasi ḇar rakuya ma iyeri fa dores. Rofyor aniḇeri fasfisew ro wemin ḇyesu nsambraḇ.
Snon ani dores, ma doper ma imbran mura-muma ma iso su randum ro Rum Allah, imbran dapoper ma isandik Allah.
Kawasa ansi kam smam imbranḇo isandik Allah,
raimnai kawasa ansi smamḇaḇir iso ḇekainḇo ḇefararyor farsarser ro kedwai Ḇepyum ro Rum Allah, isof sikam sikandor ma sikmom rosai ḇeḇesya kukeri.
Snar snon ani iso wanan Petrus ma Yohanes su, inja kawasa ḇeḇor ḇekandor ansi srama spanjuḇer sko ro rumbrawer snirḇe Salomo.

Petrus myam kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ḇo ikofen: "Ne, kawasa Israel, snaro mko kandor kuker roi ḇeḇesyanine ma rosai mko knower inko imnis inkoiso ḇefrur snonkaku ine fa imbran snar samambraḇ roḇa souser inko ḇena nerer?
Allah Abraham, Ishak ma Yakub, Allah kpu koḇesi ḇyuk payamyum faro Manfamyan Ḇyedi kwar, isoine Yesus mkoḇoḇ ma mkopampum ro ḇarpon Pilatus, rofyor Pilatus kyara fa doḇo fyaspar i.
Ḇape mkopampum kwar, Ḇesren ma Ḇenapes ya, ma mkomarisen snon mamun oso ḇe sasuref ḇemko.
Rarirya Ḇye Manfarkin kankenem ya, mkomun i kwar, ḇape Allah ḇyawes i ro munaiḇui; ma roi ḇeḇesya nane inkoiso ḇeḇesaksi.
Ma snar kakyar faro snonsnon Yesus, rarirya snonsnon ani iso ḇeḇuk sambraḇ kwar faro snonkaku mkomam ma mkofawi ine; ma kakyar ani ḇeḇuk pararei kwar faro snon ine, ro ḇarpon mkoḇena kam.
Ne, naek ma srar mko, yafaw mkofrur rarirya snar fawawi ḇa mkoḇena, imnisbos kaku manfarkin mkoḇesi.
Ḇape kuker nyan ine Allah ifrur mnis rosai ikofen kwar ro ḇepon kuker sḇayo nabi-nabi Ḇyesi, isoine Wairek iwan ani nari isma marindi.
Inja mko mbror kada ma mkokaḇer insa sasar mkoḇena neḇepyos.
Insa Manseren ḇyuk fafisu marisen ma iwan Yesus Kristus, ḇyuk ḇemko ro randak ya.
Kristus ani kyain ro boiyas isof fafisu roi ḇeḇor nakam namnis raris moḇ Allah ikofen kwar kuker sḇayo nabi-nabi ḇesren ḇyesi ro awar madero.
Imboi Moses ikofen kwar, ḇodoḇo: 'Manseren Allah nari ḇyawes faro mko nabi oso ro fandu naek mkoḇesi imnis i wan aya: Mko mnaf i ro roi ḇeḇor nari ikofen faro mko.
Ma nari ro fafisu iyama mansei ḇemnaf pyum nabi ani ḇa ikada nari ḇyeḇemun ro fandu er koḇesi.
Ma nabi sibor ḇekofen kwar randak ro Semuel ma ḇepon roi, sawos kwar ro fafisu ine.'
Mkokada mko ḇeknam wos nane ma mkosma rarwas ro asas Manseren Allah ḇyuk kwar faro up koḇesi, rofyor ikofen faro Abraham: Kuker kpu besi er kam ro supswan nari sisma ḇok.
Ma faro mko kada eḇedari Allah ḇyawes Manfamyan Ḇyedi ma iwan i faro mko insa ḇyeḇok mko ma fyarkin mko oser-oser fa imbror ro sasar ḇarbor ḇeḇor ḇyena."
Rofyor Petrus ma Yohanes su yawawos kaker kuker kawasa ḇebor ansi, mananir ḇewaren Rum Allah kuker kawasa Saduki srama fasaw faro su.
Snon ansi simsorbos kaku snar sufarkor kawasa ḇebor ansi ma suḇaryas, Yesus ḇyeknam ro aḇiḇer fandu snonkaku ḇemar sya.
Inja sfor su ma ssun suḇe bui snar roḇ kwar, inja siwaf meserdi.
Ḇape rofandu snonkaku ḇemnaf farkarkor ansi sibor sikyar, isof dandonek sedi indokada sesnon syaran ririm.
Ro meserdi manfarkin-manfarkin Yahudi ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara kuker ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi sfananjur ro Yerusalem
kuker Imam Ḇeba Hanas ma Kayafas, Yohanes ma Aleksander ma snonkaku ḇeso kam ḇesun ro keret Imam Ḇeba.
Rarirya ssun Petrus ma Yohanes ḇe ḇarpon kankain ani ma sirandak sifuken su, ḇo soḇo: "Kuker papok rosai roḇaido kuker snonsnon mansei mufrur rarirya?"
Inja Petrus kyarem, kuker papok Rur Ḇesren: "Ne, manfarkin-manfarkin er ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara,
rofyor knikine mko kukeḇ nu snar fararur pyum faro snonkaku ḇeduf oso ma mkoḇo nu kofen ḇadir kuker papok rosai snon anine isma pararei,

inja mko kam ma er Israel ḇesiper mkofawi kwar, isoine kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus, snon Nazaret, mkopai kwar ani, ḇape Allah ḇyawes i kwar ro fandu snonkaku ḇemar sya -- ma kuker papoik Yesus ani snon ine dores kuker pararei ro ḇarpon mkoḇedi.
Yesus ani irya karui ḇefawi ḇeḇawes rum sya sisawen ya -- isoine mankun mko, -- ḇape i ḇeḇe karui dopir ya.
Ma koreri isya ro snonkaku oso ḇeseḇa demir kuker Yesus, snar ro supswan ḇesiper ine snonsnon oso ḇeso isya ḇa ḇesma kwar papoik ro Allah fa ḇeḇuk koreriya maḇeko."
Rofyor fananjur ani smam Petrus ma Yohanes ḇri suḇena ma sifawi, sukada snonkaku waworek befarkorḇa, inja sikam sikandor; ma smamḇaḇir su imnis snonkaku ḇeso Yesus.
Ḇape rofyor smam snon ḇeprei ani dores kuker su, inja sawos royo ḇa fa siksampum su.
Ma rofyor siwan sufa susasyarbur fananjur ani, insape skara, ma soḇo:
"Nyan rosai nari kun faro snonkaku sine? Snar kawasa kam ro Yerusalem ḇesiper, sifawi kam kwar, sufrur aḇyair kanandor oso kwar ro fababa ma kopok kofamyun iba.
Ḇape insa roi ḇeḇesya ine imbran awer ro fandu kawasa ḇebor ansi, ipyum syadi kodwarek si, insa sawos kaker awer ro snonsnon ani faro manseirya kaker."
Rofyor siwan kwar fa susun wer, ssoser faro su insa sawawos roḇa sfarkor kaker awer snonsnon Yesus.
Ḇape Petrus ma Yohanes sukarem faro si: "Mankun mkokara, rosai ḇenapes ro ḇarpon Allah: koso mkoke roḇa koso syadi faro Allah.
Snar nari inkomnai ḇaḇeri fa inkawawos ro roi inko mam ma inko mnaf kwar."

Ḇape sḇaḇekwef manwawan ansi syadi wer, fama ḇarpur ya srir si snar kankain ani sisma nyano ḇa fa ssḇuk samamyai faro su, snar simkak kawasa ḇebor ansi, ḇeḇuk sanandik faro Allah snori snar roi ḇeḇesya kwar ani.
Snar snon ḇeprei kuker aḇyair kanandor ani umur ḇyedi isyadi kwar ro wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak.
Rofyor sfaspar su kwar Petrus ma Yohanes sura faro min suḇesi; ma sufarfyar ro roi ḇebor mananir imam-imamsya ma ḇebarara Yahudisya sikofen faro su anna.
Fafisu min suḇesi simnaf wos anna, sikam sinadi faro Allah, soḇo: "O Manseren, au ḇefrur nanki, supswan ma roi ḇebor kam ḇero ina.
Ma kuker famfnoḇek Rur Ḇesren ro manfyan bedi Daud, kma inkoḇedi, wakofen kwar: Snaro er-er sya sembrus, snaro keret-keret ro er-er sya skakara ro roi ḇeḇefromo?
Wairek-wairek supswan sfasasos ma ḇebarara sya sfananjur fa sisampum Manseren ma Kristus.
Snar kaku ḇeri Herodes ma Pontius Pilatus kuker er-er ma keret-keret ro er Israel siraryur kwar ro mnu ine fa sisampum Yesus, Manfyan Ḇesren bedi rwem kwar,
fa ifrur roi ḇebor kam fasnai kwar ro randak ya kuker papoik ma marisen bedi.
Ma fafisu ine, o Manseren, mamkada rariso sfamfaḇri kuker inko inja buk faro manfyan besi ḇri fa inkoḇuk ḇaryas wos bedi.
Wasu bramsu fa buk pararei faro snonkaku, ma wafrur aḇyair-aḇyair ma fasasnai kanandor kuker snonsnon Yesus, Manfyan Ḇesren bedi."
Ma ro fafisu sisya senadi, moḇ siryur ro ani imararer ma sikam sifo kuker Rur Ḇesren, ma sbaryas wos Allah kuker ḇri.
Rarirya raryur snonkaku ḇekyar kwar, sikam sesne oser ma serur oser, ma oso ikofen ḇa, nana ḇyena faro mankundi, ḇape roi ḇebor anna faro sikam.
Ma kuker papoik ḇeba manwawan ansi ssḇuk kesaksian ro aḇiḇer Manseren Yesus, ma sikam sikenem ro saswar ma fakamaman Allah.
Rarirya oso ro si dananjar ḇa; snar sikam ḇena saprop roḇa rum, sḇoḇ nana sena ma maeja ro roi sḇoḇ anna ssun na
ma srir na ro ḇarpon manwawan ansi siwesna; raimnai sirwas na faro snonkaku ansi oser-oser imnis fandun ḇyena.
Rarirya kako kuker Yusuf manwawan sya sap kako iḇe Barnabas, isoine romawa sneprei, snon Lewi ḇeraker Siprus.
Ḇyoḇ yaf ḇyedi, ma pipi sya dunsi faro manwawan ansi.
Snon oso ḇeso snori Ananias. I kuker swari snori Safira suḇoḇ saprop mnuk oso.
Kuker fawawi ro swari Safira sukram maeja saprop ani ḇarya ma ḇaryakada Ananias duni fa ryiri ro ḇarpon manwawan ansi siwesna.
Ḇape Petrus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Ananias, rosai ḇeḇewari ibiris ḇyewayam snembri, isof wafrowes Rur Ḇesren ya ma wakram maeja ro yaf boḇ ani ḇarya?
Rofyor boḇ saprop ani ḇaim, saprop beirya, ma rofyor boḇi kwar, maeja ya kako isya ro ḇramsi? Snaro kwara ro snembri fa wafrur roi ḇeradine? Wafrowes snonkaku ḇa, ḇoi wafrowes Allah."
Rofyor Ananias imnaf wos ani isapi ma imarbos beri. Inja kawasa kam ḇemnaf roi ḇeḇesya anine simkak fafayaḇa.
Ma romawa babo ono srama; spankun ḇemar ani, ma ssuni ro waryar randi, fa sikriri.
Indokada oras rikior nawas wer, Ananias swari syun ḇoi ifawi roi ḇeḇesya kwar ya ḇa.
Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Wakofen kaku faro aya, maeja ḇero saprop muḇoḇ ani irya kamke?" Bin ani kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Kaku rarirya."
Petrus ikofen: "Snaro muḇe oser fa mufrowes bir Manseren Rur Ḇyedi? Mame, snonkaku insandi ḇekrir swambri sya, si ḇeyores ro ḇarpon kedwa ya ma nari sakun au kako ro waryar ḇeḇondi."
Rofyor ani beri bin ani isapi ro ḇarpon Petrus wemin ḇyesu ya ma imarbos beri. Rofyor ani snonkbor ansi ssun, sisma bin ani imar kwar, inja ssuni ro waryar ya randi ma sikriri fanam swari.
Inja jemaat ani ḇesiper ma kawasa ḇemnaf roi ḇeḇesya ine simkak fafaya ḇa.
Ma manwawan ansi sifrur aḇyair nabor ma fasasnai kanandor ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi. Kawasa ḇekyarsya kam siryur ḇesya kwar ro rumbrawer Salomo kuker ḇaḇeoser.
Snonkaku ḇeso sya simku ḇa fa seoser kuker si. Rariryano kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam semaf si.
Ma faḇaḇye muma snonkaku ḇefnoḇek fa ḇekyar Manseren sibor kaku iḇye snon ma bin,
rarirya ssun ḇeduf ono ḇeḇondi, ḇenyan ḇeba, ma srir si fa sḇarek ro kamboi ro yar sena, insa Petrus rofyor imbrainuk, nin ḇyedi dunuk ro si.
Ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇeraker mnu-mnu fanam Yerusalem kako semaraniḇo srama ssun ḇeduf sesi ma snonkaku rurḇemaḇak iswoḇer sya. Ma sikam ḇyuk pararei faro si.
Ḇarpurya Imam Ḇeba kuker ḇeso isya, isoine snonkaku ro rarwas Saduki sirandak fa smunwarek si, snar sisnesna namsor kaku ḇeri,
inja sfor manwawan ansi fa sismai ro bui ro mnu ya.
Ḇape rofyor roḇ kwar Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso syeḇen kedwai ḇeḇor ro bui ma dunsi ḇeḇondi ma ikofen:
"Mkora, mkores ro Rum Allah ma mko ḇaryas wos ḇekenem ya faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi."

Seuser anun ani, ma fyor arwo babo sra ssun ro Rum Allah ma sirandak ssḇuk farkarkor ro dia. Rofyor ani Imam Ḇeba ma ḇeso isya siwan Kankain Karkara Agama fa siryur, isoine ḇebarara kankain er Israel sya kam, posa siwan fa ssun manwawan ansi ro bui.
Ḇape rofyor snonkaku siwan ansi sra ro bui, fama sisrow manwawan ansi ro dia ḇa. Inja skaḇer fa sikofen ḇayir,
ḇo soḇo: "Inkora ḇoi bui isisen pyum kaku ma manwadwaren sya kam sisya ro moḇ sena ro ḇarpon kedwaya, ḇape rofyor inkoseḇen kwar, inkosrow snonkaku osero ḇa ro bui."
Rofyor mananir ḇewaren Rum Allah ma mananir imam-imamsya simnaf wos anna, seḇirḇar ma sifuken inja rosai ḇeḇesya kwar kuker manwawan ansi.
Ḇape snon oso ryama faro si ma ikofen: "Mkomame, snonkaku mkoḇefa ḇesun ro bui, sisya ro Rum Allah ma ssḇuk farkarkor faro kawasa ḇeḇor."
Inja mananir ḇewaren Rum Allah kuker min ḇyesi sra ssun manwawan ansi, ḇape kuker aḇaḇen, snar simkak nari kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ssosi kuker karui.
Ssun manwawan ansi ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama. Imam Ḇeba ifuken si,
doḇo: "Inkodwarek pakrek mko kwar insa mkoḇuk farkarkor kaker awer. Ḇape mko ḇaryas farkarkor mkoḇena, ro Yerusalem ḇesiper, ma mkomarisen mkorir Snon ani rik ḇyedi fa nek inko."
Ḇape Petrus ma manwawan ḇeso ansi skarem, soḇo: "Inkoso syadi faro Allah ro inkoso snonkaku.
Up koḇesi Allah sedi ḇyaus Yesus kwar, mkomun i ma mkopai ro aprop.
I kada isma saḇsiḇer ro Allah mankundi ḇar raku ḇyedi fa ḇyemanfarkin ḇeḇeknam koreri, insa Israel simbror ma sisma ampun ro sasar sena.
Ma inkoine inkoḇe saksi ro roi ḇeḇor annane, inko ma Rur Ḇesren, Allah ḇyuk faro kawasa sya kam ḇeḇeuser Yesus."
Simnaf wos anna sisnesna nfafardun ma skara fa siḇe smun manwawan ansi.
Ḇape snon Farisi oso ro fandu kankain ani snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi snori Gamaliel, kawasa sibor semafi, iyori ma dor, insa siwan snonkaku ansi fa sisasyar resari.
Raimnai ikofen faro kankain ani: "Ne, kawasa Israel, mkokara naḇye resari, rosai mkomarisen mkofrur faro snonkaku sine.
Snar ro ḇepon Teudas ikḇawes kwar ma dow mankundi ḇesnon ḇeba, ma snonkaku ḇesoi sya indokada utin rifiak; ḇape smun i ma ḇesoi sya kam sibur ḇesisye ma roi ḇeḇesya ani imnai.
Posa kwar roi, ro fafisu fasfas epen ḇarbor snonkaku sya, Yudas snon Galilea oso ikḇawes. Dun kawasa sibor kaku fa siso i ro mbrus ḇyedi, ḇape ikako imar, ma ḇesoi sya kam siḇesisye.
Eḇedari yakofen faro mko: Mkopok mkofrur roi oso ḇaḇeri faro snonkaku ansine. Mkorir si, snar rofyor roi sifrur ine ḇyeknam ro snonkaku nari ipromes,
ḇape rofyor ḇyeknam ro Allah nari mkopok mkodwarek snonkaku sine ḇa; snar imbude mkosampum Allah."
Rarirya siso farkarkor ani. Ma sor manwawan ansi fa siprer si ma sidwarek si insa ssḇuk farkarkor kaker awer kuker snonsnon Yesus. Raimnai siwan si fa sibur.
Manwawan ansi sibur kankain ani kuker raryaḇ ḇeba, snar skara kwar sikako sakḇe kandera ma san anonef snar snonsnon Yesus.
Rarirya ras-ras kam ssḇuk farkarkor pdef ro Rum Allah ma ro kawasa rum sena ma sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekur Wairek.

Ro fafisu ani, kawasa Kristen ḇesun babo sya sibor syadi wer, isof ro fandu kawasa Yahudi ḇeyawosḇe Yunani sya surem kawasa Ibrani sya, snar rarwas faro kabom sesi sefandun siḇa ro afuf farmyan ḇero ras-ras.
Snar roi ḇeḇesya nine manwawan samfur seser risuru ansi sor kawasa Kristen sya kam fa sfanjur ma sikofen: "Inko kara imnisḇa, snar inko myaren ḇa fa inkoḇaryas Allah wos ya, snar afuffarmyan meja ya.
Inja naek ma srar mko iḇye mko kinfir snon rifik ro fandu mko. Snonkaku kofawi kam kankenem ḇepyum ma ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren ma ḇefawinananem, insa ko kanow si fa suf fararur ine,
insa mankun inko inkomam ker nadi ma afuffarmyan wos ya."

Karkara ani jemaat ḇesiper simarisen i, inja skinfir Stefanus snon oso ḇefo kuker kakyar ma Rur Ḇesren, ma Filipus, Prokhorus, Nikanor, Timon, Permenas ma Nikolaus, snon oso ḇeso agama Yahudi ro Antiokhia.
Raimnai ssun si ḇeḇarpon manwawan ansi, ma manwawan ansi srir siḇrasna ro siḇrusna ma senadi.
Allah wos ḇyedi iryer syadi wer, ma dandonek kawasa Kristen ro Yerusalem sibor syadi wer, ma imam sya sibor sakkyar ma sakso kako.
Ma Stefanus, ḇefo kuker fakamaman ma papoik, ifrur fasasnai kanandor ma aḇyair-aḇyair ro fandu kawasa.

Ḇape naek ono sikḇawes ro fandu jemaat Yahudi, sap siḇe kina jemaat Libertini -- kina jemaat ansi ido snonkaku ro Kirene ma ro Aleksandria -- fnoḇek snon Yahudi ono ḇeraker Kilikia ma Asia. Snon ansi sfamfaḇri kuker Stefanus,
ḇape sipok sisampum Stefanus fawawinananem ḇyena ḇa ma Rur ḇedifi fa dawos ya ḇa.
Inja sna wosi kuker snonkaku ono ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Inkomnaf kwar ikofen wos anonef faro Moses ma Allah."
Kuker nyan ḇeradine sfarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ma ḇebarara ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi; fa soper Stefanus, sismeri ma ssuni ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama.
Ma siwan saksi ankarkar ono fa sikofen: "Snon ine dawos ḇesya kwar wos anonef ḇekur moḇ ḇesren ine ma sasoser Refo Yahudi,
snar inkomnaf kwar ikofen, Yesus snon Nazaret ine, nari kyakok Rum Allah ine ma syadwer rari Moses ḇyefa ḇeḇewaris ḇeko."
Kawasa ḇeryur ro Kankain Karkara Agama ine siknower Stefanus, ma smam Stefanus ḇarpon ḇyedi isnai imnis ḇarpon malaikat oso.
Imam Ḇeba ikofen: "Kaku rariryake?"

Stefanus kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Ne, naek ma sinan-sinan, mkomnaf naḇye! Allah ḇeḇye syadi fyasnai ḇayir mankundi kwar faro sinan up ḇepon koḇedi Abraham, rofyor isya kaker ro sup Mesopotamia, fafisu kyain faswef ḇaim ro Haran,
ma dawos faroi: Wasasyar bur mnu bedi ma naek srar besi ma rwaḇe mnu nari Yafasnai faro au.
Inja isasyar ro mnu kawasa Kasdim, ma ryama kyain faswef ro Haran. Ma rofyor kmari imar kwar, Allah iwan i fa ibur sup ani ḇesup ine, moḇ babo ine, mko kain ro ine;
ma ro dia Allah ḇyuk pusaka faroi ḇa, ma saprop mnuk ono roḇa, ḇape Allah ḇyeasas nari ḇyuk sup ani faroi ma kpu ma up ḇyesi, ḇape ro fafisu ani isma romawa ḇaim.
Ma Allah ikofen radine, nari kpu ḇyesi semandaman ro sup amber ma nari sewayam si ḇemanfyan ma sifrur kandera si ḇewampasi wambarek utin rifiak."
Ḇape Allah ikofen: "Nari er ḇeḇewayam ansi yaḇuk samamyai faro si, ma nari sisasyar kwar ro dia ma seari faro aya ro moḇ ine.
Raimnai Allah ḇyuk faroi asas sofuk; ma rarirya Abraham daḇen Ishak, ma ifrur sofakfuk ḇyedi ro ras ḇeḇewar ya; ma Ishak daḇen Yakub, ma Yakub daḇen kpu samfur seser risuru koḇan si.
Snar sne masasor, ro kpu koḇesi inja sḇoḇ Yusuf ḇesup Masir, ḇape Allah ryowusi,
ma fyaspari ro kandera ḇyena kam ma ḇyuk faroi saswar-fakamaman ma fawawi nanem ro fafisu dores ro ḇarpon Firaon, wairek Masir. Firaon isiḇer i fa ḇyefaker ro sup Masir ma rum wairek ḇesiper.
Ma ro fafisu ani andoḇa myun sup Masir ḇesiper ma sup Kanaan, ma sekandera naba, isof kpu koḇesi sisma nanan ḇa.
Ḇape rofyor Yakub imnaf, ro sup Masir gandum sisya inja iwan up koḇesi ḇe Masir. Ine kada rara ḇepon ya iri.
Ma ro rara ḇeḇesuru ya Yusuf fyasnai ḇadir mankundi faro naek ḇyesi, isof Firaon ifawi Yusuf er ma ḇarpur ḇyesi.
Ḇarpur ya Yusuf iwan fa sfaryan kmari Yakub ma naek ḇyesi kina senakam ḇarbor sedi sesamfur rifik seser ririm.
Rarirya Yakub fyaryan ḇesup Masir. Ro dia Yakub imar, i ma kpu koḇesi;
kor sesi ssunsi ḇe Sikhem ma sikramsi ro rus Abraham kyoḇes kwar kuker pipi sarak ono ro Hemor romawa ḇyesi ro Sikhem.
Ḇape asas Allah ḇyuk faro Abraham fyanam imnis kwar, ma er ani iryewen ma sibor ro sup Masir,
isof wairek babo oso ikḇawes ma ikif sasoser ro sup Masir, snon ani dakfawi Yusuf ḇa.
Wairek ani syewar nyan ankar ma sararer faro er koḇedi ma ifrur kandera kpu koḇesi, ma iwanbo sisawen romawa kasun sesi, insa er koḇedi ipromes.
Ro fafisu ani Moses ḇyeḇeaḇen ma ipyum ro mamam Allah. Paik rikior ḇyeḇefaduru ro kmari rum ḇyedi.
Raimnai si sawen i, ḇape imboki Firaon duni ma iwan fa sfadurui imnis ḇinkundi romawa ḇyedirya.
Ma Moses ḇyeḇefarkor kuker fawawi ḇeḇor ro kawasa Masir, ma ipok ro wos ma fararur ḇyena.
Fafisu byeumur wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak, iswaruser ro sneri fa ryakaki naek ḇyesi, isoine kawasa Israel.
Rofyor ani myam snon Masir ya, iprer naek ḇyesi oso, inja ifnoḇek i ma myun snon Masir ani.
Kyara doḇo naek ḇyesi nari sifawi, Allah ḇyuki fa fyaspar si, ḇape sikada sifawiḇa.
Ro meserdi ryakaki si wer ma fyor ani, snon Israel risuru sumunsu, ma syewar fa ḇyedasisu doḇo: Naek mko! Mkofawiḇake mkoḇe manbekanaek? Snaro mkomun yae mko?
Ḇape snon ḇefrur sasar faro min ḇyedi ani isampum Moses ma ikofen doḇo:
Mansei ḇekanow au fa bemanfarkin ma mankara faro inko? Inja woḇo wakmun aya imnis mandoḇindi mun snon Masir ani?
Moses imnaf wos ani, ifrar ibur ma ikenem imnis mandaman ro sup Midian. Ro diwa daḇen romawa snon risuru.
Ma wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak nawas myam malaikat oso ro sup ḇeursḇa fanam bon Sinai rofor ḇesber ḇesasyar ro manuk.
Moses ikandor snar mamam ani, ma fafisu ryaḇe moḇ ani fa myam fanam, Manseren dawos faroi:
Aya ine Allah up besi, Allah Abraham, Isak ma Yakub, inja Moses ryadai ma imkuḇa beri rofyor myam roi ḇeḇesya ani.
Manseren Allah ikofen faroi: Per roi ḇesower wemsi, snar moḇ, wores ro ani, saprop ḇesren dirya.
Ya mamepen kwar kuker kaku ḇeri ḇaḇekandera ḇekur er ayesi ro sup Masir, ma yamnaf kwar fafafko sena, ma yado kwar insa yafaspar si; inja rwama, insa yawan au ḇesup Masir.

Moses ine iso simewer kwar ani, ma sikofen: Mansei ḇekanow au ḇemanfarkin ma mankara? -- Moses ani iso Allah iwan fa ḇeḇemanfarkin ma ḇeyun aski kuker fafnoḇek malaikat, befasna mankundi kwar faroi ro manuk.
Iso ḇeyunsi fa sisasyar kuker frur fasasnai kanandor ma aḇyair-aḇyair ro sup Masir, ro soren ḇerik ma sup ḇeursḇa, wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak.
Moses anine kaker iso ḇekofen faro kawasa Israel: Nabi oso ḇemnis raris aya ine nari Allah ḇyausi faro mko ro fandu naek mkoḇesi.
Moses anine iso ḇeyores fanandu jemaat ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa fandu malaikat ḇekofen faroi ro bon Sinai ma up koḇesi; ma iso ḇemnaf wos-wos ḇekenem, raimnai ḇeyakḇuk wos anna wer faro mko.
Ḇape kpu koḇesi simewer siso useri, ḇoi spampumi. Ro sisnesna simarisen skaḇer ḇesup Masir.
Inja sikofen faro Haruni: Wafrur amfyanir ono faro inko, ḇembran ro ḇarpon inkoḇedi, snar Moses ḇeyun inko fa inko sasyar bur sup Masir ani -- inko fawiḇa rosai ḇeḇesya kwar kukeri.
Ma rofyor ani sifrur sapi mkun oso ma sikun farsarser faro amfyanir ani ma simarisen kuker rosai sifrur ro mankunsi ani.

Inja Allah myambur si ḇo ryirsi fa seari faro roi ḇeḇor ḇero nanki imnis fasfas ḇero syap nabi-nabi: 'Inja rosai mko bukfarser faro aya ma aiwan rosai mko karuk ḇesamsom fafisu wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa ani, ne, er Israel?
Royo ḇaim, mboi mkoḇar aḇdares Molokh ma mak amfyanir Refan, amfyanir-amfyanir mko frur ani faro mko syom. Rarirya nari Yun mko ma Yasawen mko isof ro Babel ḇar iwara.'
Rum ḇeḇesaksi faro kpu koḇesi ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa, imnis Allah syoser kwar faro Moses insa ifrur raris rum myam kwar ya.
Rum ani kpu koḇesi sisma i ma kuker farkankin ro Yosua suni ḇo ssun ro sup ine, isoine fafisu sup ine ḇyeḇeyun bur er-er ḇeso, Allah iyaw ro ḇarpon kpu koḇesi; rarirya isof fafisu Daud.
Daud isma saswar ma fakamaman ro ḇarpon Allah ma dor insa Allah imarisen ido ifrur rum oso faro Allah Yakub kyain ro.
Ḇape Salomo kada iso ḇeḇawes rum oso faro Allah.
Ḇape Allah ḇekaki syadi ipok fa kyain ro rosai snonkaku sifrur kuker ḇramin ḇa, imnis rosai nabi sya sikofen:
'Nanki irya karapesa nasan ayedi, ma supswan irya araref ayedi. Rum rosai nari mko frur faro aya, rarirya Allah ikofen, moḇ rosai nari ḇeḇemananai faro aya?
Mkofawi ḇake nanefakam ḇrawr ḇero ḇrassu?'
Ne, snonkaku ḇukor ḇepakrek ma sne ḇesouser ḇa ma knaram ḇeproi, mko kada mkosampum Rur Ḇesren, imnis kpu mko ḇesi rarirya mko kako.
Mansei si ro nabi-nabi sya ḇeyaksma kandera ro kpu mkoḇesi ḇa? Mboi smun snonkaku ḇepon sya ḇeḇaryas raramuma ro snon ḇenapes, ro baboine mko famyun ma mkomun kwar ani.
Mkosma kwar sasoser ro Refo Yahudi ma malaikat-malaikatsya ssḇukḇe mko ḇape mkoso naba."
Rofyor Kankain Karkara Agama simnaf wos anna sisnesna nasam kaku ma sark fafais sinasna.
Ḇape Stefanus ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma myam payamyum Allah ma Yesus dores ro ḇar raku Ḇyedi.
Inja ikofen: "Kaku ḇeri yamam nanki ḇyas ma Rumkun Snonkaku dores ro Allah ḇarpon Ḇyedi."
Rarirya sar naba ma snos siknasna ḇo sopri ma sfori.
Sismeri ḇe mnuya ḇandiri, ma ssoi kuker karui. Ma saksi-saksi sya srir syatu sena ro ḇarpon snonkbor ḇenir Saulus.
Fafisu ssoi, Stefanus ḇyenadi, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren Yesus, wun rur ayedi."
Kyain wepur ma dor naba: "Manseren befa sḇar awer sasar ine!" Ikofen rarirya posa imar.
(1a) Paulus kako dakmarisen fa Stefanus smuni. (1b) Ro fafisu ani randak ro kandera ḇeba ḇekur jemaat ro Yerusalem. Sikam sibur sfamok sup Yudea ḇesiper ma Samaria, demir manwawan ansi si ḇekainepen.
Kawasa ḇekyar sya skanes Stefanus ma sikriri.
Ḇape Saulus syewar nyan fa fyasasye jemaat ani inja syun-syaye rum ḇe rum ma ismer snon ma bin ḇeḇandi ma ḇyesi fa ssun ro bui.
Kawasa Kristen ḇebur famok ansi simbran ro sup ḇesiper ma sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye.
Ma Filipus ryaḇe mnu oso ro Samaria ma ḇyaryas Wairek faro snonkaku ḇero dia.
Rofyor kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simnaf Filipus ḇaryas ḇyena ma smam fasasnai kanandor ma aḇyair-aḇyair ifrurna, sikam sesne oser simarisen rosai ḇyaryasna.
Snar kawasa ḇeḇor rur ḇemaḇak siwoḇer sya, rur ḇemaḇak ansi si sasyarḇo siyiw naba, ma snonkaku sibor ḇepapipen ma ḇeḇemanis ono ifrursi fa siprei.
Rarirya raryaḇ ḇeba kaku ro mnu ani.
Snon oso snori Simon fyoro kwar nya mon ro mnu ani ma ifrur kanandor kawasa Samaria, ma dow mankundi ḇe snon ḇeba.
Snonkaku sya kam kasun ḇeba sisoi ma sikofen: "Snon ine isma papoik ro Allah, sorḇe Papoik Ḇeba."
Ma sikam sisoi snar fyoro kwar ifrur fa sikandor kuker fararur mon ḇyesi.
Ḇape baboine sikyar faro Filipus ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ma snonsnon Yesus Kristus, ma sor fa sisma masi sren, iḇye snon ma bin.
Simon mankundi kako dakkyar, ma rofyor isma masi sren kwar, iso wanan Filipus, ma ikandor rofyor myam aḇyair-aḇyair ma fasasnai kanandor ḇeba ḇeḇesya na.
Rofyor manwawan ḇero Yerusalem simnaf, sup Samaria kawasa ansi sisma wos Allah kwar, inja siwan Petrus ma Yohanes suraḇe Samaria.
Sura kwar ro dia manwawan ansu suḇenadi, insa kawasa Samaria saksma Rur Ḇesren.
Snar Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro snon oso ḇaim ro fandu si, snar sisma masi sren monda kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus.
Raimnai susawar dofensi, posa sisma Rur Ḇesren.
Rofyor Simon myam Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro kawasa ansi snar manwawan ansu ya susawar dofen si, inja ḇyuk pipi ono faro su, ma ikofen:
"Muḇuk ḇe aya kako papoik ani, insa rofyor yaksawar dofen snonkaku ono, sikako saksma Rur Ḇesren."
Ḇape Petrus ikofen faroi: "Mboi pipi besi nari sro kuker au, snar woḇoda, fakamaman Allah kwoḇes i kuker pipi.
Wasma rarwas osoḇa ro mnuk ine, snar snembri inapes ḇa ro ḇarpon Allah.
Iḇyekada wambror ro ḇarḇor benane ma benadi faro Manseren, insa ḇyuk ampon ro swaruser ḇero snembri;
snar yamam snembri ḇyepus kwar ma syarmar ma ḇarḇor ḇena newayam au."
Simon kyarem: "Iḇyekada mkonadi kuker aya faro Manseren, insa roi ḇeḇor mko kofen kwar nane nkur awer aya."
Suḇe saksi ma suḇaryas Manseren wos ḇyedi kwar sukaḇer ḇe Yerusalem ma ro mararan suḇedi suḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro mnu-mnu nabor ro sup Samaria.
Ḇarpur ya malaikat Manseren ḇyesi oso ikofen faro Filipus, doḇo: "Wayor au ma rwaḇe ḇar wambraw waso nyan ḇesabu ro Yerusalem ḇe Gasa." Nyan ani ḇyeusḇa. Inja Filipus rya.
Snon Etiopia oso, wairek Kandake, wairek bin ro sup Etiopia faker ḇyedi, ḇebarara mananir ḇemamwark wairek ani nana ḇyena, ryaker sup Etiopia ḇe Yerusalem fa daksun ari.
Snon ani ro mararan barbur ḇyedi kyain ro kereta ḇyedi ma ḇyewasya syap Nabi Yesaya.
Ma Rur ya ikofen faro Filipus: "Rwamura fanam kereta ya!"
Filipus rya fasaw ma imnaf faker ani ḇyewasya syap Nabi Yesaya. Filipus doḇo: "Tuan wafawi roi wawasya nake?"
Kyarem: "Yafawi rariso rofyor oso fyarkin aya ḇa?" Raimnai dor Filipus fa dek ma kyainusi.
Mnuk ḇyewasya ani ryok radine: "Raris domba oso suni ḇemoḇ skarakruk ro ya; ma imnis domba mkun ḇeḇeawer ro ḇarpon snon ḇekapnik bur ḇyesi, rarirya ipok ḇyas sḇari ḇa.
Ro ḇaḇemanfyan ḇyena kandera ya deki; manseiso nari ḇefarfyar ḇarpur ḇyedi? Snar nyawa ḇyedi sunibur supswan."
Inja faker ani ifuken Filipus: "Yafuken au manseiso nabiya ikofen ḇesyan ya? Ikofen mankundike roḇa snon oso ḇeso?"
Inja Filipus dawos randak kuker mnuk ani ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Yesus faroi.
Skombran pdef mararan skoḇedi isof ro moḇ ḇeḇewar oso. Raimnai faker ani ikofen: "Mamkada war ya iso iya; rosai ḇedwarek aya fa yasma masi sren?" [
Filipus kyarem: "Rofyor tuan wakyar kuker snembri ḇesiper, ido." Faker ani kyarem: "Mboi yakyar, Yesus Kristus Rumkun Allah."]
Inja snon Etiopia ani iwan fa kereta ani imnai, ma sudoḇe war ya ma Filipus ḇyuk masi sren faroi.
Rofyor susasyar bur war ya kwar Rur Manseren dun Filipus ma faker ani myami werḇa. Imbran pdef mararan ḇyedi kuker raryaḇ.
Ḇape Filipus kada isya ro Asdod. Imbranuk sup aniḇo ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro mnu nakam isof ryama ro Kaisarea.
Fafisu ani Saulus dosam ḇyedi isber ma daw fa iḇemyun Manseren kawasa ḇyesi. Rya faro Imam Ḇeba,
ma dor syap kuasa roi fa dun faro majelis Yahudi ro Damsyik, insa, rofyor isrow snon ma bin ḇeso Manseren Nyan ḇyedi, fyor si ma dunsi ḇe Yerusalem.
Ro mararan ḇyedi ḇe Damsyik, fafisu fyanam mnu ani kwar kniko sananai oso syoker nanki ma isnai yari.
Isapi ma imnaf mkaren oso ikofen faroi: "Saulus, Saulus, snaro bewayam aya?"
Saulus kyarem: "Manseiso au, Manseren?" Inja Ikofen: "Aya ine Yesus, bewayam ya.
Indo wakḇok ma rwaḇe mnu ya, ro diwa nari sikofen faro au, rosai nari wafrur ya."
Kawasa ḇesoi ro mararan ani sikmom, snar simnaf mkaren ani, ḇape smam snonkaku oso ḇa.
Saulus ikḇok ma dores, raimnai ḇyas mkasu, ḇape myam royoḇa; inja sikfin i fa syun ro Damsyik.
Ras rikior dafafare ma dananba dinemba.
Ro Damsyik Manseren kawasa Kristen ḇyesi oso isya snori Ananias. Manseren ikofen faroi ro mamam oso: "Ananias!" Kyarem: "Ayaisine Manseren!"
Manseren ikofen: "Rwama rwaḇe nyan ḇenir Nyan Ḇeyaḇyoḇer, ma swewar ro Yudas rum ḇyedi snon oso ḇeraker Tarsus benir Saulus isya fafisu ine ḇyenadi,
ma ro mamam oso myam, snonkaku ḇenir Ananias syun randum isawar dofeni, insa myam wer."
Ananias kyarem: "Manseren ro snonkaku sibor yamnaf kwar ro snon ani ifrur ḇarḇor nabor kwar faro snonkaku ḇesren besi ro Yerusalem.
Ma ryama ro dine kuker papoik ḇeba ro mananir imam, insa fyor snonkaku syakam ḇeyap snombri."
Ḇape Manseren ikofen faroi: "Rwamura snar snon ani dera yakimfir kwar faro aya fa ḇyaryas snonsnon Yedi faro er ḇeso kako ma faro wairek-wairek ma kawasa Israel.
Mankundaya nari yafasna faroi, kandera nabor nari nkuri snar snonsnon ayedi."

Inja Ananias rya ma syun ro rum ani. Isawar dofen Saulus ma ikofen: "Saulus, naek yedi, Manseren Yesus, ḇefasnai mankundi faro au ro nyan wambrar ro ani, iwan aya kwar faro au insa mam wer ma wafo kuker Rur Ḇesren."
Ma ro fafisuya beri, arpar ro mkassu noḇes isof myam wer. Ikḇok ma isma masi sren.
(19a) Ma rofyor danan kwar syamḇraḇ wer. (19b) Saulus kyain ras ono kuker kawasa Kristen ro Damsyik.
Fafisu ani beri ḇyaryas Yesus ro rum nadi, ma ikofen Yesus irya Rumkun Allah.

Kawasa Kristen ḇeḇor ḇemnafi sya sikmom ma sikofen: "Inja snonkaku ineke, iso ḇemarisen ḇemun mansei-mansei ḇeyap snonsnon Yesus ro Yerusalem? Ma ryama kuker swaruser ani kako insa fyor ma dunsi ḇeḇarpon mananir imam-imam?"
Ḇape Saulus fararur ḇyedi iba syadi wer isof kawasa Yahudi ro Damsyik sikmom, snar fyasnaibos, Yesus i Wairek.
Ḇarpur ro ras ono kawasa Yahudi ssewar nyan oso insa smun Saulus.
Ḇape nyan ḇeḇyeḇa ani Saulus ifawiyi. Ras-roḇ kawasa Yahudi siwaren wark kedwai nakam ro mnu ani insa smuni.
Rarirya ro roḇ oso kawasa Kristen ḇyesi ono suni fa sikyui ro aram oso ro ayar mamun mnuya ḇandiri.
Saulus rofyor ryama kwar ro Yerusalem syewar fa isnefer kawasa Kristen sya ḇape simkak i kam, ma sikyarḇa beri, ikako daksun kwar ḇe Kristen.

Ḇape Barnabas ikada duni faro manwawan sya ma fyar faro si, rariso Saulus myam Manseren ro nyan ya faduri ma moḇsaiso Manseren dakawawos faroi ma rariso ḇri ḇyedi fa ḇyuk farkarkor ro Damsyik ro snonsnon Yesus.
Ma Saulus ryowus si ro Yerusalem, ma kuker ḇri ḇyuk farkarkor ro snonsnon Manseren.
Ikako dawawos ma fyaḇaḇri kuker kawasa Yahudi ḇeyawos ḇe Yunani, ḇape ssewar nyan insa smuni.
Ḇape rofyor naek Kristen ro jemaat sifawi awine kwar inja ssun Saulus be Kaisarea ma siwani fa iburḇe Tarsus.
Fyoro kaku jemaat ro Yudea ḇesiper, Galilea ma Samaria skain kuker aski. Jemaat ani sḇawsi ma sikenem kuker araryof faro Manseren. Dandonek sedi sibor syadi wer kuker fafnoḇek ro Rur Ḇesren ya.
Rofyor ani Petrus imbran yar fa ryakaki ḇe moḇna kam. Ro mararan ani dakrama kako faro kawasa ḇesren ro Lida.
Ro dia isrow snon oso snori Eneas, ḇeduf papipen ma ḇeḇarek ro kamboi ḇyedi ḇewampasi wambarek riwar kwar.
Petrus ikofen faroi: "Eneas, Yesus Kristus ḇyuk pararei faro au; wakḇok ma fasos kamboi bedi!" Fafisu ani beri snon ani ikḇok.
Kawasa kam ḇero Lida ma Saron smami, inja skaḇer faro Manseren.
Ro Yope bin Kristen oso snori Tabita -- ro wos Yunani Dorkas. Bin ine nabor kaku ḇyesyowi ma ḇyuk farsarser.
Ḇape ro fafisu ani iduf rao isof imar. Ma rofyor si masi i posa, suni fa ḇyarek ro sim ḇero bo.
Lida fyanam Yope. Rofyor kawasa Kristen simnaf Petrus isya ro Lida, siwan naek risuru faroi kuker fararyor: "Rwama fasaw ḇe inko."
Inja Petrus fyasos fa iso si. Sra kwar ro Yope, ssun pdefi ḇesim ḇero bo ma kabom sya kam srama sores fanam i ma skanesḇo sfasnai faroi sansun ma rofmar, Dorkas isip faro si ro fafisu isya iḇye ya.
Ḇape Petrus iwan fa sisasyar kam, posa kyain wepur ma ḇyenadi. Raimnai myam ḇemar ani ma ikofen: "Tabita, wakḇok kada!" Inja Tabita ḇyas mkasu ma fyor myam Petrus, ikḇok fa kyain.
Petrus ikin ḇrasu ma ifnoḇek i fa dores. Raimnai dor kawasa ḇesren ansi fnoḇek kabom sya ma fyasnai faro si, bin ani ikenem.
Roi ḇeḇesya anine imbran yar Yope ḇesiper ma kawasa sibor kaku sikyar faro Manseren.
Ḇarpur ro roi ḇeḇesya ani Petrus kyain ras ono ro Yope ro rum snon ḇenir Simon, ḇeyak aiwan kif.
Ro Kaisarea snon oso isya snori Kornelius, mambri sarar sor ḇe sarar Italia.
I kuker kina ro rum ḇyedi sikyar ma sararyof faro Allah ma ḇyuk farsarser nabor faro er Yahudi ma ḇyenadi ḇesya kwar faro Allah.
Indokada fanam oras kior mandira, myambos Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso ryama syun ro rum ḇyedi ma ikofen: "Kornelius!"
Myambos malaikat ani kuker makakak ma ikofen: "Rariso ine o Manseren?" Malaikat ani kyarem: "Nadi ma farsarser ḇena kam nek kwar faro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ma Allah iswarepen au.
Inja knikine, wawan snonkaku onoḇe Yope fa ssun snon ḇenir Simon sapi kakoḇe Petrus.
Isya ro rum Simon snon ḇeyak aiwan kif, ḇekain ro swan andir."
Malaikat ḇeyawos faroi ani i buri kwar, raimnai dor snon risuru ro manfamyan ḇyesi fnoḇek sordade ḇekyar oso ro snonkaku ḇefnoḇek i ḇesya kwar si.
Rofyor ikofen ḇayir roi ḇeḇor anna kam faro si posa iwan siḇe Yope.
Meserdi rofyor snon rikior ansi sisya kaker ro mararan ma sfanam mnu Yope kwar, indokada fanam oras samfur seser risuru arkok, Petrus dekḇe rum ya bori fa ḇyenadi.
Petrus iḇe danan snar ibiser, ḇape insape sfasos roḇean na, fafisu ani papoik Allah iswoḇer i.
Myam nanki ḇyas ma roi oso imnis kruḇen ḇeba ḇyedopir rifiak ma sikyui isof ro saprop ya.
Ro dori iser aiwan syoso-syoso kam ḇeḇewemin rifiak, ḇeanawer ma mansya.
Imnaf mkaren oso ikofen: "Ne, Petrus wayor au, kwaruksi ma wansi!"
Ḇape Petrus kyarem: "Roḇa, o Manseren rariryaḇa snar aya yakan ḇaim roi ḇefor ma ḇemamas."
Mkaren ani ryokḇe eḇesuru ya faroi: "Rosai Allah fyasren, wapok fa befor naba."
Roi ḇeḇesya ani ryamaḇe rarwan rikior posa kruḇen ani ḇyeḇeyer fasau ḇe nanki.
Petrus kyara ro sneri, fasasnai rosai ḇero mamam myam kwar ine. Fafisu ani Kornelius snonkaku iwan ansi sisya ro kedwai ya ḇarpondi ma sifuken Petrus rum ḇyedi.
Skor snon oso fa skofuken, imbude Simon sapḇe Petrus isya ro rum ani.
Fyor ani Petrus kyara kaker ro mamam ani, ma Rur ya ikofen faroi: "Snon risuru suisya susewar au.
Wayor au wado ma waso si, beḇirḇar awer, snar ayaiso ḇewan si muma."
Inja Petrus dado rarḇaḇ ikofen faro si: "Ayaiso mkossewar ya; rosaiso ḇeḇedari mkoramuma ya?"

Skarem faro i: "Kornelius snon mambri sne ḇenapes ma ḇeyararyof Allah ro fandu er Yahudisya kam si fawiyi, isma kwar fasasnai ro Allah ma mam malaikat ḇesren oso ḇekofen faroi insa dor au ḇe rum ḇyedi fa imnaf rosai nari wakofen faroi."
Ma Petrus ikofen fa skenef ro dia. Mesrdi ikḇok fa iso si fnoḇek naek ono ro Yope.
Ro arwori skorama ro Kaisarea. Kornelius isya iwafsi ma dor naek ma bati ḇyesi fa siryur kwar.
Rofyor Petrus syun, Kornelius rya isrow i ma ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Ḇape Petrus idwarki doḇo: "Wores, aya ine snonkaku monda."
Ma dawawos kukeri, ḇo syun ma isrow kawasa sibor sisya siryur.

Ikofen faro si: "Mkofawi kam kwar, rari Yahudi ḇyuk ḇaḇeri fa snon Yahudi oso ikenem fawas snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudi ḇa, roḇa syun ro rum sena. Ḇape Allah fyasnai kwar faro aya insa yapok yakofen awer snonkaku osoḇe ḇemamas.
Snar rarirya yaḇerer fararyor mkoḇena ḇa mboi yara muma beri. Insape yamarisen yafawi rosai ḇeḇedari mkor aya."
Kornelius kyarem: "Ras rifiak ḇesyof kwar indokada fanam oras kior ro fafisu ḇeradine, yaḇenadi ro rum ayedi."
Kniko snonkaku oso dores ro ḇarpon ayedi, ma sansun ḇyena nasnaper ma ikofen: "Kornelius nadi ḇena Allah imnaf na kwar ma farsarser ḇena kam Allah iswarepen na ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Inja wawan snon onoḇe Yope fa ssun Simon sap kakoḇe Petrus; isya ro Simon snon ḇeyak aiwan kif rum ḇyedi, ḇekain ro swan andir.
Eḇedari yawan fasaw snon ono faro au, ma kuker sne ḇeryaḇ rwama kwar ine. Knikine inko ryur kam kwar ro ḇarpon Allah ro dine, insa inko mnaf rosai Allah ḇyeasas faro au."
Raimnai Petrus irandak dawawos doḇo: "Kaku ḇeri yafawi kwar, Allah myam rarwas snonkaku ḇa.
Snonkaku oser-oser ro er rosairya kaker, ḇeyararyof ma ḇeḇesyowi Allah kuker napnapes imarisen si.
Wos ani iso Allah iwan fa sḇaryas faro er Israel isoine wos ḇeḇaryas aski ro Yesus Kristus i Manseren faro kawasa kam.
Mkofawi roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar ro sup Yudea ḇesiper randak ro Galilea posa ro masasisren Yohanes ḇyaryas, isoine Yesus ro Nazaret.
Rariso Allah ryemi kuker Rur Ḇesren ma papoik, iso, ḇembran yar-yar ma ḇefrur pyum ma ḇeḇuk pararei faro snonkaku kam rur ibiris iswoḇer si, snar Allah ifnoḇeki.
Ma inkoine saksi-saksi ro roi ḇeḇor ifrur kwar ro Yudea ma Yerusalem kako; ḇape smuni ma skafi ro aprop.
Yesus ani Allah ḇyawesi kwar ro ras ḇeḇekior ya, ma Allah imarisen insa fyasnai ḇayir mankundi,
faro kawasa er sya kam ḇa, ḇoi faro saksi-saksi, Allah fyasnai kwar ro ḇepon, isoine faro inko ḇeyan ma ḇeyinem kuker i, rofyor diḇri ro munaiḇui.
Ma isiḇer inko kwar fa inko ḇaryas faro er-er sya kam, ma inkoḇe saksi, iso Allah kyur fasnai fa ḇaḇemankara faro snonkaku ḇekenem ma ḇemar sya."
Iso nabisya kam sḇardi kwar isoine mansei ḇekyar faroi nari ismai ampon ro sasar kuker snonsnon ḇyedi.
Fafisu Petrus dawos rarirya, Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro snonkaku kam ḇemnaf ḇaryas ani.
Ma kawasa ḇekyar kwar ro rarwas ḇesofuk ḇeso Petrus, sikandor, snar smam, mboi fakamaman Rur Ḇesren ḇyeḇesbawer faro er-er ḇeso kako,
snar simnaf kawasa ansi sawawos ro wos Rur ya ma sisandik Allah. Inja Petrus ikofen:
