Rodine nari yakofen masasik ayedi, ḇape Manseren iso ḇewan fa yakofenyaḇa. Mboi roi ḇeḇesya ine yawawos imnis snon ḇefawi royoḇa oso.
Kakuḇaḇoi snonkaku sibor simsiksi ro roi ḇeḇor ro supswan, inja yoḇe yamsik mankundaya kermkuno kako.
Naek srar kuker sneḇemarisen mkokḇaḇ faro snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇasya, snar mkokara mkofawi nanemrya!
Rofyor snonkaku sifrur mkoḇe women, roḇa sinem rik mkoḇena, sfasyar nana mkoḇena, ma skara sikaki syadi ro mko ma sḇaser mko, mkoren monda!
Yamai yakarem mboi nkosambraḇ ḇafa nkofrur imnis si. Ḇape rosai snonkaku ḇese simsiksi kuker na, yamsik aya kako! (Yawawos imnis snon ḇefawi royoḇa.)
Snon Ibrani siryake? Aya kako snon Ibrani. Snon Israel siryake? Aya kako snon Israel. Abraham up ḇyesiryake? Aya kako rarirya!
Kristus manfamyan ḇyesiryake? Mboi yawawos imnis snonkaku ḇena swaruserḇa, ḇape aya manfamyan ḇeḇye syadi ro sikam. Yafararur sambraḇ syadi, sḇeaya fa yasun ro bui, siprer aya syadi isof fanam yamar.
Kawasa Yahudi siprer aya ḇerarwan ririm kwar kuker ayos samfur rikior seser risiw.
Kawasa Roma siprer ayaḇe rarwan rikior; fafisu ono sso aya kuker karui. Kapalna nambroi kuker ayaḇe rarwan rikior ro soren, ma rarwan oser yapyar yaki yararyoi ḇeoras samfur risuru seser fiak.

Rarwan nabor kaku yambran mararan ḇeyun raro: war ḇedaf ḇeyun raro, manfasyar ḇeyun raro ro kawasa Yahudi rarirya kako kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, raro ro mnu ḇebana, ḇondina, raro ro soren, ma raro ro kawasa ḇeyap mankunsiḇe naek Kristen ḇape Kristen sisyaḇa.
Yafararur sambraḇ isof yaḇe yamar kaku: rarwan ono yenefḇa, yananḇa, yinemḇa, rarwan nabor yabiser, yasyuf snar mar bemnisba ma yasma mob fa yakain roḇa.
Robo nakam, ras ono yararyofwarek kawasa Kristen kam.
Rofyor ono ssambraḇ ḇa aya kako yaksambraḇ ḇa. Rofyor ono sisapi ro sasar, sne ayedi fyafardun kako.
Rofyor yamsik ro ras ono, rarirya yamsik ro roi ḇefasna samambraḇ ḇa ayena.
Yaḇe ankarḇa; Allah, Manseren Yesus Kma ḇyedi ḇyesaksi ḇeaya! Snonsnon ḇyedi isma sanandik ro fyoro-fyoro.
Rofafisu aya isya ro Damsyik, wairek Aretas faker ḇyedi, iwan bo sordadesya siwaren warek kedwai ro mnuya insa sfor aya.
Ḇape sikyu aya kuker aram oso ro koḇkir ayar mamun karuya. Rarirya yasma faspar rodia.
Kakuḇaḇoi fainda oso ro masasikyaḇa. Ḇape yamarisen yaḇaryas kako Allah rosai ḇyuk maḇe aya ro fasasna ma mamam oso.

Ro wampasi wambarek samfur seser rifiak ḇesyonde yamam snon Kristen oso ḇyeḇekanow ḇesyos ḇeḇekior ro Firdaus (Yafawiḇa baken ḇyedi ḇyeḇekanow kaku roḇa ine mamam oso monda -- Allah i ḇefawi mondaya).

Yakofen ḇeosero wer yafawi mboi snon ine ḇyeḇekanow ḇe Firdaus (Yafawiḇa baken ḇyedi ḇyeḇekanow kaku roḇa ine mamam oso monda -- Allah i ḇefawi mondaya). Rodiwa snon ani imnaf roi ono snonkakusya sifawi skara naba ma ssḇuk fa snonkakusya sawos naba.
Snonkaku ani iso eḇedari yamarisen yamsikya, mboi mankundayaḇa. Faro mankundaya, yawos monda roi ḇeḇor ḇekur samambraḇ ḇa ayena, iso eḇedari yamarisen yamsikya.

Imnis raris yamarisen yamsik ro roi oso kako, ḇape yamewer yaḇe mandawri; mboi nari yakofen roi ḇenapes. Ḇape yafarmkuser aya, snar yamewer snonkaku ono skara ayaḇe ḇesyadi ro rosai smam yafrur kwar roḇa rosai simnaf yakofen kwar.
Ḇape insa yamarares mankenem awer snar mamam ḇefrur kanandor anna inja skuk baken ayedi kuker borek oso imnis malaikat Ibirisya ḇyaserpum aya. Dafduf ani ḇyeḇeḇuk faiprer aya insa yamararesḇa.
Yaḇenadi ḇerarwan rikior faro Manseren ro dafduf ani. Yor fa Manseren imarisen ido ikanow dafduf anibur aya.

Ḇape Manseren kyarem, "Yaswar aw inja imnis mufa ḇeaw; snar papoik ayena nsambraḇ syadi rofyor awsya rwoi samambraḇ ḇaya." Iso eḇedari yamarisen yamsik ro samambraḇ ḇayena, snar rofyor yasambraḇ ḇa, rofafisu ani yaḇaḇir Kristus samambraḇ ḇyedi fyadiren aya.
Inja yaryaḇ kako kuker samambraḇ ḇa ayena. Yaryaḇ rofyor sonef aya, rofyor yasma kandera, rofyor siyawyaw aya ma rofyor yasma kandera snar Kristus. Snar rofyor yasambraḇ ḇa, rofafisu ani yapok kaku.

Kaku ḇeri yafrur imnis snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa -- ḇape naek srar mkoiso ḇefrur fa yararirya. Inja yafawi mkoiso ḇesandik aya. Mboi yaḇe maejaḇa rariso wer, nari yakafyoḇa faro manwawan ḇebasyadi mkoḇesi!
Aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ma papoik yafasna ro fararur ḇeba kuker kabaḇaḇ mufaḇe naek srar fa nfasna aya ine manwawan oso.
Ma rosaiso nkomam mankunba ro mko, rofyor nkoḇuk kakara kuker kawasa Kristen ḇese? Mboi roi oser monda isoine: Yafrur kandera faro naek srar mkoḇa famkoḇak warek aya. Mkoḇuk maaf ro sasar aninekada.

Baboine yafasos ḇerarwan ḇeḇekiorya fa yara kaki mko. Ma yamewer yafrur kandera mko, snar roi yamarisenya arasa mkoḇenaḇa, mboi mankun mko. Snar romawa siso ḇesewar arasa faro sinan sesiḇa, ḇape sinan ansiso ḇesewar arasa faro romawa sesya.

Snar naek srar mkoi eḇedari kuker sne ḇeryaḇ yamarisen fayaḇuk roi ḇeḇor kam, mboi isof yamarisen yaḇuk mankundaya kako faro naek srar mko. Rofyor yaswar mko rarirya, rosai eḇedari naek srar mkoswar mankun ayaḇa?
Inja, naek srar mkokofen mankundaya yafrur kandera mkoḇa. Ḇape ono sisya sikofen aya ine yafawi yasararer; inja yasma ḇaḇefainda ro naek srar mko snar kakara sararer ayena.
Rariryaḇa! Inja ḇaḇefainda rosai yasma ro naek srar ro snonkaku yawan faro mkonsya?
Yawan Titus ma naek Kristen ḇese ansi kwar fa srakaki mko. Inja Titus dun ḇaḇefainda ono ro mkoke? Ḇape Titus ma aya nufararur kam kuker rur ḇemamnis ma nuso wewur oser!

Inja mkokara mkoḇo fafisu ine nuḇesewar fa nuḇesano warek nu faro mkoke? Roḇaḇeri! Naek srar nuswar kaku, Allah ifawi roi nkokofen anna kam kada namnis Kristus marisen ḇyedi. Ma roi ḇeḇor nkofrur annakada nkoḇukḇawes kankenem rur ro naek srar.

Yamames warek imbude rofafisu yarakaki naek srar, nari yasrow naek srar mko imnis moḇ yakyar rayaḇari, ma naek srar kako nari mkosrow aya imnis moḇ mkokyar rayaḇari. Imḇude kosrow ko kuker rakrakrok, sasurem, dosam, rmomen arasa, anonefyae, sikofenyae, marares ma anunḇesisye.

Yamkak warek imbude Allah ayedi ryun aya wer ro ḇarpon naek srar rofafisu yaramufa ḇemko. Yamames warek kako roḇepon iwara naek srar ono ḇefrur sasar kwar, nari sifrur fayakanes snar simbror baim ma simnaiba ro sifrur farbuk, roi bemamas ma roi ḇemnisḇa.
Ine rarwan ḇeḇekior nari yarakaki naek srar wer. Sfas ro Refo radine, "Wawos (parakara) oso kyaku rofyor kosma saksi risuru roba kior."

Snonkaku ḇefrur sasar ro ḇepon iwara kwar ma snonkaku ḇesesya kam, yaḇuk swarepen ḇepon farosi kwar rofafisu yarakaki naek srar ro rarwan ḇeḇesuruya. Insape, rofafisu yaḇinkwan ro naek srar, yaḇuk swarepen wer insa rofyor yaramufa wer, snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri rosi nari ikfisḇa ro samamyaiya.
Nari naek srar mkosma fasasna kaku ḇeri Kristus dawawos kuker sḇayo ayedi. Rofyor Kristus fyasna papoik ḇyedi faro mko, papoik ḇyedi syambraḇ kaku, rarirya fyasna papoik ḇyedi rofandu naek srar.

Mboi rofafisu ḇyeḇepai ro aprop, syambraḇ ḇa, ḇape snar Allah papoik ḇyedi baboine ikenem. Nko kako nkosambraḇ ḇa, snar nko ḇeoser kuker Kristus ro kankenemya, ḇape rofyor nkoisya ro ḇarpon mkoḇedi, nko kako nkosambraḇ fnoḇek Kristus snar Allah papoik ḇyedi.

Indo naek srar mkomnasenbir mankun mko ma mkokukeḇ kaku ḇeri naek srar mkoisya mkokenem imnis kankarem kakyar mkoḇena faro Kristus! Nari naek srar mkofawi mboi Yesus Kristus isya ro fandu mko! -- mboi rofyor naek srar kakyar mkoḇena nkakuḇari.
Yakyar naek srar mkofawi nkoine nkodworen kaku ro manasnasenya.

Nkonadi mufaḇe Allah insa imarisen ifnoḇek naek srar famkofrur sasar awer. Mboi nkofasnaḇa nkoine nkofawi nkofrur posa fararur nkoḇena, ḇape insa naek srar mkofawi Allah rosai imarisen na -- imnis raris nkoḇefromo, ḇape roi osoḇa!
Snar nari nkofrur roi osoḇaḇeri ḇemnisḇa ḇesampum Allah marisen ḇyena; nkokada nkoso Allah marisen ḇyena.
Nkoryaḇ rofyor nkosambraḇ ḇa, mboi naek srar mkosambraḇ. Nkonadi warek naek srar insa mkokenem mnis.

Eḇedari yafas syap ine ḇepon rofyor aya isya ḇaim rofandu naek srar mko. Rarirya, rofyor yarafa kwar, nari yafasna pakakrek faro mkoḇa kuker papoik Manseren ḇyukma ḇeaya. Papoik ani ḇyeḇeḇuk fa nkoḇuki ḇyawes naek srar mko, mboi nkoḇuki kyakokḇa.

Ḇarpurya, naek srar, iḇye mkoryaḇ, ma mkoḇesewar mkokenem mnis. Mko kram farkarkor ḇeḇor ayena. Iḇye naek srar mkoḇe sne oser ma mkokenem kuker aski. Allah ḇesaswar syadi ma ḇeḇeknam aski ani nari ryowus naek srar mko.
Mkokofen arooyae ma faḇyee imnis naek srar Kristen. Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam sfarem aroo mufa ḇenaek srar.
Manseren Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok naek srar, ma Allah iswar naek srar. Iḇye Allah Rur ḇyedi ryowus naek srar mko kam kada! Ro nu, Paulus ma Timotius
Ro Paulus, manwawan oso, mboi snar ro snonkakuḇa, ma ro snonkaku osoḇa kako, mboi ro Yesus Kristus ma Allah, Kmaya, ḇeḇawes i kwar rofandu ḇemarsya,
ma aya kuker naek ḇerowus ayasya kam, faro jemaat-jemaat ro Galatia:
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ḇeramaker Allah, Kma koḇedi, ḇerama ro Yesus Kristus.
Ḇeḇuk mankundi kwar ḇefarsarser snar sasar koḇena, insa fyasparko ro ḇarḇor supswan ine imnis Allah ma Kma koḇedi marisen ḇyedi.
Sanandik mufaḇe Allah rawo isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
Yakandor, snar mkowai dokor fasaw bur Allah, ro saswar-fakamaman Yesus ḇeyor mko kwar, ma mkoso ankankinem ḇeḇye oso ḇese,
Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekakuḇa. Snar snonkaku ono sisya sfarkor ninyan mko ma skara fasoḇo siwararye Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus.
Ḇape iḇye nko roḇaido malaikat oso ro boiyaswa ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye oso ḇese bur Ankankakinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas faro mko, nari ḇyeḇefras kada.
Imnis nkokofen ḇepon kwar, baboine yakofen ḇeoser wer: rofyor snonkaku sisya sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye oso ḇese bur, rosai mkosma kwar, nari ḇyeḇefras kada.

Inja knikine rariso: yasewar snonkaku marisen sena roḇaido yasewar Allah marisen ḇyenake? Yasewar fayun snonkaku sisnesna insa simarisen aya kaker? Rofyor yamarisen yasewar fayun snonkaku sisnesna insa simarisen maro aya, rarirya ido ayaine Kristus manfamyan ḇyedi sayaḇa.
Rarirya yaḇuk farkarkor faro naek ayesi mko, mboi Ankankinem Ḇeḇye yaḇukfarkor ani Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro snonkaku riryaḇa.
Snar yasma i ro snonkakuḇa, ma snonkakusi ḇefarkor i maḇe ayasyaḇa, mboi yasma i kuker fasasna ro Yesus Kristus.
Snar mkomnaf ḇepon kwar kankenem ayedi ro agama Yahudi: Yafrur kandera Allah jemaat ḇyena kuker pakakrek kaku ma yasewar fayakakok na.
Ma rofyor ayaisya ro agama Yahudi ayaiso ḇero ḇarpon syadi ro min ḇeḇor ayesi ḇemnis kuker aya rofandu er ayedi, imnis snonkaku ḇemyaren ḇefaduru rari up ayesi.
Ḇape rofafisu Allah, ḇekimfir aya randak ro yaḇe ḇeyaḇen ḇaimya ma dor aya kuker saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi,
imarisen fyasna Rumkun ḇyedi maḇe aya, insa yaḇaryas i rofandu er-er ḇese ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, rarirya fafisu oso ḇaḇeri fayor kakara ro snonkaku;
ma yara ḇe Yerusalemḇa kako fayasrow naek ḇeḇe manwawan ḇepon kwar ro aya, ḇape yara ḇesup Arab raimnai yakaḇer wer ḇe Damsyik.
Raimnai, wampasi wambarek rikior posa, yara ḇe Yerusalem fa yarakaki Kefas, ma yeḇeryar ro rum ḇyedi ḇeras samfur seser ririm.
Ḇape yamam manwawan ḇese ansi oso ḇaḇeri, derer Manseren Yesus naek ḇyedi Yakobus.
Ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi yakofenbos: roi yafas faro mko nane nkaku rarirya, yasrerḇa.
Ḇarpurya yara ḇesupya fyor Siria ma Kilikia.
Ḇape jemaat-jemaat ro Yudea smamḇaḇir aya ḇaim.
Sikada srower monda, iso ḇeponiwara ḇefrur kandera si, knikine ḇyaryas kakyar saiso, imarisen kyakok ani.
Ma sisandik Allah snar aya.
Ḇarpur ro wampasi wambarek samfur seser rifiak besyof kwar, aya kuker Barnabas nura ḇe Yerusalem wer ma yun Titus kako.
Yara snar fasasna oso. Ma yafar farosi Ankankinem Ḇeḇye yaḇaryas faro er-er ḇese ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa -- yawawos ḇardi kuker ḇefawisya serer, -- insa fararur yafrur ḇepon ma yafrur wer na nefromoḇa.
Rariryano Titus, ḇewarpu aya ani, ikada snon Yunani rirya, ḇape ḇyeḇedif faifrur sofakfuk ḇyediḇa.
Mboi kaku naek ḇesararer ono sisya ssun fasis fa sidafdif, isoine ḇesun fasis faḇedwarek ḇaḇemkei koḇedi kosma ro Yesus Kristus, insa kuker nyan ine sewayam ko wer.
Ḇape fafisu oso ḇaḇeri fa komarisen kosusu ma kokunem farosi insa Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekakuya kyain faswef faro mko.
Ma faro si kokara ḇefawi ansi rariso kankain ḇepon sena, faro aya nefandunḇa, snar Allah myam ḇaḇekaryerḇa -- ḇefawi ansi rariso wer kako, nari sedafdifer aya kuker roi oso ḇeseḇa.
Ḇape rarirya roḇarya, fafisu smam kwar mboi faro aya ssḇuk kakyar kwar ro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro kawasa ḇesma ḇaḇesofakfuk ḇasya, imnis raris Petrus faro ḇesma ḇaḇesofakfuksya
-- snar Allah ḇeḇuk kwar samambraḇ mufaḇe Petrus fa ḇyemanwawan faro snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuksya, Allah ani kako ḇyuk kwar samambraḇ maḇe aya faro snonkaku ḇeyaksma sofakfuk ḇaimsya.

Ma smam saswar-fakamaman ḇeḇuk kwar maḇe aya, inja Yakobus, Kefas ma Yohanes, smam imnis ḇeḇe manfarkin jemaat, sedasi kuker aya ma Barnabas imnis aḇyair ḇaḇeoser, insa nkora mura ḇe snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ḇaimsya ma sikada sra faro snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk kwarsya;
mboi nkoswarepen kaku snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya ma iso yamarisen yaḇesewar kaku ḇeri fayafrurya.
Rofafisu Kefas ryama ḇe Antiokhia, kuker fababa yasampumi snar ikada syasar.
Snar snonkaku ono ro ḇar Yakobus srama ḇaim, Petrus danan kuker naek ḇeyaksma sofakfuk ḇaimsya, ḇape srama kwar, isusu ma ḇyinkwanbur si snar imkak kawasa ḇesma sofakfuk kwarsya.
Ma kawasa Yahudi ḇesesya sifrur ankar kako kuker i, isof Barnabas dakso ankarkar sena kako.

Ḇape rofyor yamam, mboi kankenem sena namnis kuker Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekakuyaḇa, yakofen bos kaku mufaḇe Kefas ro ḇarpon sena kam: "Rofyor aw, snon Yahudi oso, wakenem imnis korwar ma wakenem imnis Yahudiḇa, rariso nari wadafdif naek ḇeyakso sofakfuk ḇasya fasikenem imnis snonkaku Yahudi?"
Koḇe ḇeyaḇen imnis snon Yahudi ma komnis snon ḇesasar ro er-er ḇesesyaḇa.

Mkofawi, mboi snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri sbuk napnapes faroi snar ḇyeuser sasoser Refo Yahudiya, ḇape snar kakyar faro Yesus Kristus monda. Eḇedari nko kako nkokyar faro Yesus Kristus kwar, insa nkosma ḇaḇenapnapesya snar kakyar faro Kristus. Mboi snar ḇaḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudiyaḇa.

Ḇape rofyor mankun nko ḇardi, nkoḇesewar insa ssḇuk ḇaḇenapnapesya maḇe nko ro Kristus, rofyor ani nkofawi nko snonkaku ḇesasar, rarirya ido roi ḇeradine fyasna inja Kristus duffarmyan sasar na ke? Oroḇaḇeri.
Ḇape aya ine yafasna mankundaya imnis snon ḇeḇeyuk sasoser Refo Yahudi, rofyor yaḇawes kaḇer rosai yakakok kwar na.
Ḇape yamar kwar faro sasoser agama anna -- inja sasoser anna naiso ḇemun aya -- insa yakenem kuker Allah. Spai epen aya ro aprop kuker Kristus kwar;

rariryano yakenem, ḇape yakenem ro mankundaya ḇa, mboi Kristus ikenem fnoḇek aya. Ma kankenem ayedi yakenem kuker baken ro baboine, irya kankenem ro kakyarya faro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ḇeswar aya kwar ma ḇyuk mankundi ḇefarsarser maro aya.
Nari yapampum saswar-fakamaman Allah ḇyena ḇa. Snar rofyor ḇaḇenapnapes isya ro sasoser Refo Yahudi ido, nari Kristus ḇaḇemarmar ḇyedi ḇyefromo monda.
Sye, kawasa Galatia mkoyano, ḇemamkarkirḇa, mansei ḇeyawninyan mko kwar? Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇepaiepen kwar ro aprop ani ḇyeḇefasna kwar faro mko ḇake?
Inja roi yamarisen yafawi ro mko isoine: Mkosma Rurya kwarke snar mkoḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi roḇaido snar kakyar faro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya?
Snaro mkomamkarkir ḇaḇeri rarirya? Mkorandak kwar kuker Rurya, raimnai ro ḇarpurya mkomarisen mkosma i kuker papoik ro mankun mko?
Roi mkosma kwar anna kam nefromoke? Nari nefromoḇa!
Inja knikine rariso, Allah ḇeḇuk fa mkofo kuker Rurya ma ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor rofandu mko, ifrur rarirya snar mkoḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudiya roḇaido snar kakyar faro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya?
Rarirya kako kakyar Abraham ḇyedi faro Allah, eḇedari Allah kyor roi ani ḇenapnapesya faro i.
Inja mkomam, snonkaku ḇekenem kuker kakyarsya sikada Abraham romawa ḇyesirya.
Ma Refo ifawi ḇepon kwar, Allah ḇyuk napnapesya faro snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya snar kakyar, Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine ḇyeḇeḇaryas ḇepon faro Abraham kwar: "Snar aw nari er-ersya kam ro sup ine sḇeḇeḇok."
Inja ḇekenem kuker kakyarsya sikada sisma ḇaḇeḇok fnoḇek kuker Abraham snon ḇekyar ani.

Snonkaku ḇekyar ma ḇeswarmura ro kankenem sena neknam ro ḇaḇekoreri -- snaro sḇeḇefras? Snar sfas kwar radine: "Fafras faḇe snonkaku ḇeḇeuser ma ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor ḇefas kwar ro syap sasoser Refo Yahudiḇasya."
Ma ḇaḇenapnapesya isya faro snonkaku osoḇa ro Allah barpon ḇyedi snar ifrur sasoser Refo Yahudi isna kwar, snar: "Snonkaku ḇenapes nari sikenem kuker kakyarya."
Ḇape sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇyeknam ro kakyaryaḇa, mboi mansei ḇefrur na, nari sikenem snar na.
Kristus ḇyak namuk ko kwar ro fafras sasoser Refo Yahudi kuker nyan ḇyuk mankundi fa isma fras snar ko, snar sfas kwar radine: "Fafras faro snonkaku ḇekaf ro ai apropya!"
Yesus Kristus ifrur rarirya kwar, insa kuker i Abraham ḇaḇeḇok ḇyedi rya faro er-er ḇese, isof kuker kakyar kosma Rur ḇeḇeasas kwar ani.
Naek srar, iḇye yun fasasna oso ro kankenem ras-ras. Asas oso ḇeser kankarem namuk kwar ro snonkaku, osoḇaḇeri faḇyereri roḇa pyami.
Faro Abraham ma ḇeḇekpu roi Allah ikofen asas ḇeḇor anna kam. Sikofenḇa "faro kpu-kpu ḇyesi" imnis raris kawasa ḇeḇor, ḇape faro snonkaku oser monda: "ma faro kpu besi," isoine Kristus.

Swaruser ayedi isoine: Allah asas ḇyena ro randakya neḇekarem namuk kwar, inja sasoser Refo Yahudi nari damrer naba, snar insape nasasyar babo ro wampasi wambarek utin rifiak samfur rikior ro ḇarpurya, isof samambraḇ asas ani ipromes.
Snar, rofyor rosai Allah ḇyuk na neknam ro sasoser Refo Yahudi, mboi neknam ro asasḇa; ḇape snar Allah asas ḇyena ḇyuk saswar-fakamaman ḇyena faro Abraham kwar.
Rarirya ido fandun rosai kuker sasoser Refo Yahudiya? Sasoser anna nafnoḇek snar ḇaḇeyuk -- sasoser anna nambran isof fafisu kpu ro asas ani ryama -- ma malaikat-malaikatsya ssḇuki faro manfandu oso.
Manfandu dun wos ro snonkaku oser mondaḇa, mboi Allah ikada ḇyeoser.
Rariryaido, sasoser Refo Yahudi nasampum kuker Allah asas ḇyenake? Roḇaḇeri. Snar sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇyeḇeḇuk imnis roi oso ḇeḇuk kankenem, rariryaido napnapesya ḇyeknam ro sasoser Refo Yahudiya.
Ḇape sfas ro Refo radine mboi roi ḇeḇor kam naisya ro ḇaḇepapoik sasarya, insa kuker kakyar faro Yesus Kristus asas ani ḇyeḇeḇuk faro bekyarsya.
Rofyor kakyar ani ryama ḇaim sasoser Refo Yahudi iwaren warek ko, ma pyadwar ko isof kakyar ani ḇyeḇefasna.
Rarirya sasoser Refo Yahudi ikfin ko isof Kristus ryama, insa ḇyuk napnapesya maḇe ko snar kakyar koḇena.
Baboine kakyar ani ryama kwar, inja koisyaḇa kwar ro manwadwaren ḇefarkin ani.
Snar mkokam mkoḇe romawa faro Allah snar kakyar faro Yesus Kristus.
Snar mkokam, mkoḇe ḇemasi kuker snonsnon Kristus, inja mkona Kristus kwar.
Rarisya rarwas oso isyaḇa rofandu snonkaku Yahudi roḇaido snonkaku Yunani, manfyanoḇa roḇaido snonkaku ḇemkei, snon ma bin isyaḇa kwar, snar mko kam mko ḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus.
Rofyor Kristus nya mko, mko kako mko ḇeup ro Abraham ma nari mkosma kako Allah asas ḇyena.
Swaruser ayedi isoine: rofyor snon ḇena waris oso ḇyesnonkuf ḇaim, imnisbos kaku manfyan oso, ḇape i ḇena waris ḇeḇor anna;
ḇape isya ro manwadwaren ḇefaduru i isof fafisu kmari ikofen faroiya imnis kwar.
Rarirya ko kako: rofyor koḇesnonkuf ḇaim, koḇemanfyan faro rodur ḇero supswan ine.
Ḇape fafisuya imnis kwar, Allah iwan Rumkun ḇyedi, ma bin oso daḇen i ma kyunem faro sasoser Refo Yahudi.
Ḇyeḇewan faḇyak namuk kawasa kam ḇekunem faro sasoser Refo Yahudisya, insa nya ko ḇeromawa ḇyesi.
Ma snar nya mko ḇeromawa ḇyesi, inja Allah iwan Rumkun ḇyedi Rur ḇyedi fasyun ro kosnesna, ma kyaru: "o Mami, o Mami yedi!"
Inja mkoḇemanfyan wer ḇa kwar, mboi mko ḇeromawa; rofyor mko ḇeromawa, nari mko kako mkasma Allah waris ḇyena kam.
Ro ḇeponiwara, rofyor mkomamḇaḇir Allah ḇa, mko ḇemanfyan faro papoik-papoik imnis allah, ḇape Allah ḇekaku naisya ḇaḇeri.
Ḇape baboine mkofawi Allah kwar, roḇaido Allah ifawi mko kwar, inja rariso mko kaḇer wer faro rodur-rodur ro supswan ḇesambraḇ ḇa ma ḇesaḇarar ma mkomarisen mkorandak mko ḇemanfyan faro na wer?
Kuker aunos mkofaduru ras ono, paik ono, fafisu ono faswef ma wampasi wambarek ono.
Yamames warek imbude kandera yena faro mko nefromo mondari.
Naek srar yor faro mko, insa mkomnis raris aya, snar aya kako yamnis raris mko kwar. Mko frur roi ḇeḇyeḇa oso ḇaim maro aya.
Mkofawi, mboi ro randakya yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya faro mko kwar isoine snar baken ayedi iduf.
Kaku ḇeri rariryano baken ayedi ḇyefafrowes faro mkono, mkayin ayaḇa mboi mkosrow aya kwar, imnis mkosrow Allah malaikat ḇyesi oso, isyadi wer imnis mkosrow Yesus Kristus mankundi.
Fyor ani aski ḇeba faro mko! Ma baboine, ḇaḇeaski mkoḇani ryoiyo? Snar yaḇesaksi ḇemko, mboi rofyor ani mkomarisen mker mka mkoḇesi maḇe aya kwar.
Inja baboine mkokara aya ḇembroḇ mkoḇedi, snar yafasna napnapesya faro mko?
Sikada sfaḇri sesewar insa ssun mko, ḇape kuker sne ḇenapesḇa sena, snar simarisen ssun mko fa mkoso si kuker kaku ḇeri.
Mboi iḇye rofyor snonkaku sesewar fasun snonkaku ḇese faro roi ḇeḇye, mboi sifrur rarirya rofafisu nakam, imbude rofafisu aya isya rofandu mko mondari.
Ne, romawa yesi, snar mko yaḇekandera dafduf yaḇeyaḇen wer, isof rari Kristus ḇyair ro mko.
Yaswarkuf kaku aya isya rofandu mko rofyor ine fa yawawos kuker mko kuker mkaren ḇese, snar yafawi werba yafrur rosai mufabemko.
Mkokofen maḇe aya, ne, mko kam ḇemarisen ḇeso sasoser Refo Yahudi, mkomnaf ḇaimke sasoser Refo Yahudiya?
Ro dia isya sfas, Abraham nya romawa risuru, oso ro infyan bin ḇyedi ma oso ro bin ḇemkeya?
Ḇape romawa ro infyan bin ani ḇyeḇeaḇen imnis marisen snonkaku ma romawa ro bin ḇemkei ani ḇyeḇeaḇen snar Allah asas ḇyedi.
Inekada wospeper. Snar bin risuru ansuya supeperyar ḇaḇeasas risuru ro Allah: Oso ḇyeknam ro bon Sinai (isoine Hagar) -- (Hagar daḇen romawa ḇyesi simnis manfyan.)
Hagar imnis bon Sinai ro sup Arab -- ma imnis kuker Yerusalem ro baboine, snar ikenem ro ḇaḇeinfyan kuker romawa ḇyesi.
Ḇape Yerusalem ro boiyaswa ikada bin ḇemkeiya ma ikada sna kobedirya.

Snar sfas kwar radine: "Mkoryaḇ naba ḇae, ne, bin ḇepansnasem ḇefawi ḇeaḇen ḇaim! Mkoryaḇ ma mkobras, ne aw ḇefawi ḇaḇekandera ḇaim dafduf aḇaḇenya! Snar bin swa ḇyedi iburya nari daḇen romawa sibor syadi ro bin ḇeḇeswaya."
Inja naek srar, mkokada romawa sḇeasas imnis Ishak.
Ḇape imnis ḇeponiwara, saḇen kuker marisen snonkaku, ḇyewayam faro saḇen kuker marisen Rurya, rarirya baboine kako.
Ḇape rosai sfas ro Refoya? Ro Refo sfas radine: "Mkoyaw infyan ani kuker romawa ḇyedi, snar romawa ro infyan ani nari daksma warisḇa fnoḇek kuker romawa ro bin ḇemkei ani."
Inja, naek srar, koine romawa ro infyan aniḇa, mboi romawa ro bin ḇemkeiya.
Baboine komkei, snar Kristus ḇyuk makakei maḇe ko kwar! Inja mkufnako ro ḇaḇemkei mkoḇedi ma mkomarisen fasrir awer kamnam ḇaḇemanfyan ani wer.
Kaku ḇeri, aya, Paulus, yakofen faro mko: rofyor mkor famkosma sofakfuk ido, Kristus ḇyefainda faro mkoḇa.
Yakofen wer faro snonkaku mansei ḇeyor faḇesma sofakfuk, insa sifrur sasoser ḇeḇor kam ḇero Refo Yahudi na.
Ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi kuker Kristus imuk, rofyor mkokyar ḇaḇenapnapes sasoser Refo Yahudiya; nari mkokenem ro ḇandibur saswar-fakamaman Allahya.
Snar fafnoḇek Rurya, ma snar kakyarya faro Kristus, kowaf ḇaḇenapnapes, koswarmura roya.
Snar kuker Kristus, ḇaḇesofakfuk ro baken, nefandunḇa, mboi fararur kakyarya kuker saswar monda.
Ro ḇeponiwara mkofaḇri naḇye kwar. Baboine mansei ḇedwarek mko wer, isof mkoso napnapesya wer ḇa?
Dafdif faro mkoso si wer ndama ro Allah ḇeyor mko kwar aniḇa.
Mur kermkun ifrur faterigu amek oser ipisen.
Snar koḇeoser kuker Manseren, inja yakyar mkosma swaruser ḇesebur swaruser ineḇa. Ḇape manseirya wer kako ḇefrur ḇirḇar mko nari isma samamyaiya, ro Allah.
Ma aya ine wer, naek srar, rofafisu yaḇaryas kaker sofakfuk ani, ḇyefandun, snaro sewayam aya kaker? Rarirya ido, aprop ani ḇyekarui karkar werḇa.
Iḇyesyadi ḇefrur ḇirḇar mko ansi skar mankunsi monda!
Naek srar, mkoḇe ḇeyor kwar famkomkei. Ḇape mkona ḇaḇemkei ani imnis fafisu fa mkoḇuki ifrur marisen kankenem ḇesasar awer, mboi iḇye mkuffarmyan yae mko kuker saswar.
Snar sasoser Refo Yahudi nakam neknam ro wos oser ine, isoine: "Waswar min ḇesi snonkaku ḇese imnis waswar mankundaw!"
Ḇape rofyor mkarek yae ma mkoren yae mko ido, mko swarepen naḇye, insa mkofarmambri yae awer.
Kakara yedi radine: mkokenem kuker Rurya kada, nari mkoso kankenem rmomen krafya ḇa.
Snar rmomen krafya fyamfaḇri kuker rmomen Rurya ma rmomen Rurya fyamfaḇri kuker rmomen krafya -- snar sukam sufamfaḇriyae -- isof ro rarwan ono mkofrur rosai mkomarisen naba.
Ḇape rofyor Rurya ikfin, mko nari mkokenem ro sasoser Refo Yahudiya ḇa.
Fararur krafya isna kwar, isoine: farbuk, mamas, rmomen,
ḇaḇesyom amfyanir, mon, mbroḇ, fadḇan, masasor ro sne, msor, fandun mankun, rakrakrok, rur-makakok,
ayin, masaser, munara marares, ma ḇese na. Nane kam yaḇuk swarepen faro mko -- imnis yaḇuk swarepen ro ḇepon kwar -- mboi mansei ḇefrur roi ḇerarirya, nari isma rarwas ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ḇa.
Ḇape rofyor Rurya ikfin ido bon ḇyena isoine: saswar, raryaḇ, aski, ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ, ḇaḇenaḇye, ḇaḇeuser, ḇaḇesyowi,
ḇaḇerandun sne, ḇaḇefarmku mankun. Roi ḇeradine sasoser oso isyaḇa faisampum na.
Yesus Kristus nya manseirya kwar ido, nari myun kraf kuker nafsu ḇeḇor ma rmomen ḇyena kam.
Rofyor kokenem kuker Rurya, iḇye wer Rur ani ikfin kankenem koḇena kako,
inja komararesḇa, kosampumyae ḇa ma kayinyae awer ko.

Naek srar, rofyor mkosrow snon oso rofandu mko ifrur sasar, iḇye syadi ḇekenem kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi, mkokfin snon ani ḇenyan ḇenapes kuker rur kaḇaḇaḇ, ma mkoḇesasor mankun mko, insa mkaksapi awer ro farawrowesya kako.
Mkofnoḇekyae mko ma mkoḇar kamnam mkoḇena! Rarirya mkoḇeimnis sasoser Kristus.
Snar rofyor snon oso kyara iso ḇesyadiya, mboi ḇyerarirya ḇaido, ikada ḇyeankar mankundi.
Iḇye syadi snonkaku oser-oser imnasen mankundi resari ro kankenem ḇyedi; insape imsik mankundi, mboi myam awer faro kankenem snonkaku ḇese.
Snar snonkaku oser kamnam ḇyena namnis faro i kwar.
Ma mansei ḇesma farkarkor ro Manseren wosya, nari ḇyerwas roi ismana faro snonkaku ḇeḇuk farkarkor faro iya.
Mkoḇor awer! Allah myam monda mankundi ḇo ḇyeḇekoryae ḇa. Snar rosai snonkakusya sker ma skekef na nari sinekna.

Snar mansei ḇeker ma ḇekekef imnis rari snonkaku, nari dinek marmarya ro rari ḇyedi. Ḇape rofyor kyer ma kyekef imnis farkankin ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, nari dinek kankenem ḇekaku ma ḇekain fyoro ro Allah Rur ḇyedi.
Inja komor awer ro kofrur roi ḇeḇye, snar rofyor fafisuya ryama, nari kinek bon na rofyor ani.
Rarirya, rofyor kosma fafisu ine, mkorama kofrur roi ḇeḇye faro snonkakusya kam, isyadi faro min koḇesi ḇesma kakyar oser.
Mkomam, ro mnuk ine mankundayai ḇefas faro mko rodine, kuker fasfas ker ḇeba.
Snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇeyow mankun kuker roi ḇero baken, sikada sesewar seyayu mko faro ḇaḇesofakfuk, kuker kakara, insa sisma awer kandera snar aprop Kristus.
Snar snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuksya kako, sfaduru sasoser Refo Yahudiya ḇa. Mboi simarisen, fa mkosma sofakfuk, insa simarares si snar mkoḇeyuser sasoser anna.
Ḇape ayama yamewerbos kaku yamarares aya, mboi kuker aprop Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, snar kuker i supswan ine ḇyeḇepai maro aya, ma aya faro supswan ine.
Snar ḇaḇesofakfukke roḇake, nefainda ḇa. Ḇeḇefaindaya isoine snonkaku saḇen babosya.
Ma snonkaku kam, ḇeḇuk mankun faro kakara ine, aski ḇaḇenaḇye Allah isabu faro si ma faro Israel ḇyesi.
Inja snonkaku oso ifrur kandera ḇe aya awer, snar aḇyair-aḇyair Yesus nya aya naisya ro baken ayedi.
Saswar-fakamaman ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok mko! Amin. Ro aya, Paulus
Aya Paulus, manwawan Yesus Kristus kuker marisen ro Allah, mufaḇe kawasa ḇesren ro Efesus, kawasa ḇekyar faro Yesus Kristus!
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ḇerama ro Allah, Kma koḇedi ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryoyus mko.
Sanandik faro Allah, Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, ḇeḇuk kwar maḇeko ro Kristus, ḇaḇeḇok rur ḇeḇor kam ro boiyaswa.
Snar kuker Yesus Allah kyinfir ko kwar rofyor supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya, insa kosren ma kofarorew ḇa ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Kuker Allah saswar ḇyedi fyasna ḇepon ko kwar ro randakya ro Yesus Kristus fa koḇeromawa ḇe i imnisbos marisen ḇyedi,
insa koḇuk sanandik mufaḇe Allah saswar-fakamaman baba ḇyedi, ḇyukma ḇeko ro Yesus, Rumkun ḇyedi iswarbos ani.
Snar ro Yesus kosma fasaspar snar rik ḇyedi, isoine ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar, imnis nana saswar-fakamaman ḇyena,
fakamaman ḇyena, ḇyuk fawawi ma kakara, nabor syadi maḇeko.
Snar fyasna kwar kankunes marisen ḇyedi maḇeko, imnis aw ḇyedi, isoine aw dun namuk kwar ro randakya kuker Yesus
imnis fasasos faro fafisuya ryama roi ḇeḇor kam neoser ro Kristus ma ḇyeḇru faro nakam, iḇye ro boiyaswa iḇye kako ro supswan ine.
Yakofen "ro Kristus", snar ro Allah kosma rarwas ro ḇaḇeasas ḇyedi -- koine ro awarya ḇyuk fa kosma rarwas ani imnisbos kuker Allah kakara ḇyedi, ifrur roi ḇeḇor kam imnis marisen ḇyedi --
insa koine ro randakya bekyar faro Kristus, kosandik faro Allah, baba ḇyedi.

Ma ro Allah mko kako -- snar mkomnaf kwar wos napnapesya, isoine Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇeḇuk koreri faro mko -- ro Allah mko kako, rofyor mkokyarya, Allah ḇyuk aḇyair mboi nya mko, isoine Rur Ḇesren ḇyedi ḇyeasas kwar faro mko ani.
Ma Rur Ḇesren ani isaramper ko insa kosma rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar faro kawasa ḇyesi, isoine ḇaḇefaspar ḇefrur fa Allah nya ko, insa kosandik Allah baba ḇyedi.
Snar yamnaf kwar mkokyar faro Manseren Yesus ma mkoswar snonkaku ḇesrensya,
inja yamnaiḇa yakofen kasumasa ḇemko. Ma indo yaswarepen mko ma yanadiwarek mko ḇesya kwar,
ma yor ḇe Allah Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, Kma ḇepyum ani, ḇyuk Rur fawawi nanem ḇyedi fa fyasna i faro mko isof mkomambir kaku i.
Insa kakara ḇero snembri neḇeseḇen fanasnai, insa mkofawi sanemura ro rosai nari mkosma ro fararyor ḇyedi: isoine payamyum ḇeḇor ḇyena fyasos mufaḇekawasa ḇesrensya,
ma Allah papoik ḇyedi iba faro ḇekyar koya, imnis raris mankundi papoik ḇyedi,
ḇyuki ifrur rofafisu ḇyawes Kristus rofandu ḇemarsya ma ḇyeifa kyain ro ḇar raku ḇyedi ro boiyaswa,
kankain Kristus ikaki syadibur ro ḇeḇuk sasoser ḇeborsya kam, ḇesma papoiksya kam, ḇeḇeḇrusya kam, ma manseirya kaker ḇeḇesnonsnon ro supswan ine mondaḇa ma supswan nari ḇeramaya.
Ma roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ryir na kwar ro Kristus weḇam ḇyedi ma ḇyeifa ḇyeḇru ro jemaat ro roi ḇeḇor nakam kwar.
Jemaat ani Kristus baken ḇyedirya, iḇeḇefa namnis, snar mankundi ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor kam fanamnisya.
Ḇeponiwara mkomar snar ḇaḇeyuk ma sasar mkoḇena.
Mkokenem ro sasar na, snar mko nyan supswan ine, ma mkoḇeyuser ḇesma papoik ḇaḇesasoser ro sansoren, isoine rur ḇeḇarḇor baboine ḇefararur rofandu snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya.
Kaku ḇeri roḇeponiwara ko kako sakkor ko rofandu si, rofyor kokenem ro kakara ma marisen baken ḇeḇarḇor koḇena. Rofafisu ani kosma masasor ro Allah kako, imnis snonkaku ḇese ansi.
Ḇape Allah ḇyuk maḇe ko fakamaman snar ifo kuker saswar ḇeba.
Koine snonkaku ḇemar kwar snar sasar koḇena -- ḇape ifrur fa kokenem kaḇer fnoḇek Kristus, snar saswar-fakamaman Allah mkosma koreri --
snar koḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus, Allah ḇyawes kaḇer ko ma ḇyuk moḇ ḇeko fnoḇek Yesus Kristus ro boiyaswa,
insa rofafisu nari ḇeramaya, fyasna saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi imnis raris ḇaḇye ḇyedi maḇeko ro Yesus Kristus.
Snar saswar-fakamaman mkosma koreri snar kakyar; ima bon ro sasewar bediḇa, mboi Allah i ḇeḇukiya,
ine bon ro fararur bediḇa: insa snonkaku ono simarares awer mankunsi.
Snar Allah iso ḇefrur konya, koḇe ḇefrur ro Yesus Kristus insa kofrur fararur ḇeḇye, Allah fyasos ḇepon maḇeko kwarya.

Rarirya mkoswarepen, mboi fafisu iwara -- mkoḇe snonkaku Yahudiḇa ḇesma aḇyair ro baken, imnis snir ḇesnonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ḇa ro kawasa Yahudi ḇenir mankunsi "ḇesofakfuk", isoine sofakfuk ro baken kuker fararur snonkaku, --
mboi rofafisu ani mkoḇeoser kuker Kristusḇa, mkaksun ḇekawasa Israel ḇa ma mkaksma rarwasḇa ro asas sikofen na, kuker saneraroḇa ma kuker Allah ro supswan ineḇa.
Ḇape baboine mkoḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus, ḇeponiwara mko "ḇinkwan", ḇape mko "fanam" kwar snar Kristus rik ḇyedi.
Snar ikada aski ma raryaḇ koḇedirya, ifrur fakawasa Yahudi ma kawasa Yahudiḇa sḇeoser kwar ma kyakok ayar ḇerwas, isoine ḇaḇembroḇ,
snar marmar ḇyedi; imnis snonkaku ipyos kwar sasoser Refo Yahudi ma sasoser ḇeborna ma ifrur er ansuya fasuḇe er oser snonkaku babo ḇeḇeoser kuker Kristus, ma rarirya ifrur askiya,
ma ifrur fa er ansuya suḇedasi kuker Allah fa suḇebaken oser, kuker aprop ipyos ḇaḇembroḇ ro su.
Ryama ma ḇyaryas kwar aski faro "ḇeḇinkwan" mkoya ma aski faro "ḇefanamsya",
snar kuker Kristus kokam -- iḇye kawasa Yahudi iḇye kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa -- kosma Rur oser fakofanam Kmari.
Rarirya mkoḇe amber ma mandamanḇa, mboi mkoḇe min kina oser ro snonkaku ḇesren ma kina-kina ro Allah,
sḇawes robo araref manwawan ma nabisya, kuker Yesus Kristus ḇeḇe karui dopir.
I ḇepam ḇaḇawes rum ani ḇesiper fa ḇyerum ḇepyum faro Allah ḇesrenya, ro Manseren.
Kuker Kristus mko kako mkomnis dera-dera insa mkoḇe ḇeḇawes fa mko kako mkoḇe Rum Rur faro Allah.
Rarirya aya ine, Paulus, manfamyan Yesus Kristus, ḇesmai snar fandun mkoḇena, ne kawasa ḇefawi Allahḇa
-- ma mkomnaf kwar rariso fararur saswar-fakamaman Allah, sikyar mabe aya faro mko,
isoine kuker nyan mamam sfasna maḇe aya kankunes, imnis fas-fas ḇeknampu yafas iyasne.
Fyor mkowasya i, nari mkofawi kakara ayedi ro Kristus kankunes ḇyedi,
rofyor syos ḇeponiwara kankunes ani ḇyeḇeḇaryas ḇa faro romawa-romawa snonkaku, ḇape ro baboine Allah Rur ḇyedi fyasna i faro manwawansya ma nabi ḇesren ḇyesya,
isoine snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, ḇape snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, sisma kako ḇaḇeromowi ma sḇekina ro baken ma siwarpu ro amar ssḇuk ro Yesus Kristus ani.
Ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani yuffarmyan kwar raris Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyukma ḇeaya, imnisbos kaku fararur papoik ḇyedi.
Aya kada, yaḇyeḇa syadi rofandu kawasa kam ḇesrensya, ḇape ssḇuk saswar-fakamaman ine, insa yaḇaryas mufaḇe kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa nana Kristus ḇyena nari ḇeḇroḇa,
ma insa yaḇaryas rosai ḇeḇeknam ro fararur kankunes ro wampasi wambarek utin-utin ono ḇeyokef ro Allah, ḇeau roi nakam,
baboine insa jemaatna nbaryas Allah fawawi ḇeḇor ḇyena faro ḇeḇuk sasoser, ma ḇesma papoik ro boiyaswa,
imnisbos kuker Allah marisen ḇyena ḇekain fyoro, ifrur kwar kuker Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
Kokyar faro Kristus ma koḇeoser kuker i nari komsik ma kosma nyan ḇesun mufaḇe Allah, kuker kakyar koḇena faro i.
Rarirya yor faro mko, insa mkomkak warek awer aya ro kandera ayedi snar mko, snar kandera ayedi kada idaw ḇaḇye ḇemko.
Rarirya yakain wepur yaḇansubainaḇe Mami ḇarpon ḇyedi,
faro i kina kam ro boiyaswa ma ro supswan ine sna snonsnon ḇyedi.
Yaḇenadi insa Allah ḇeḇye syadi imarisen ḇyuk samambraḇ ma makaku faro mkosnemna kuker Rur ḇyedi,
insa Kristus kyain ro mkosnemna snar kakyar mkoḇena, ma mkoḇe rares ma mkoḇe knam ro saswar.
Yanadi, insa mko ma snonkaku ḇesrensya kam mkofawi, saswar Kristus ḇyedi aḇaḇamya, kawanwanya, kakakiya ma swafya,
insa mkofawi kaku saswar Kristus ani isyadi fawawi ḇeḇor kam. Yanadi, insa mkofo kuker Allah ḇaḇeimnis ḇyena.
Kuker Allah papoik ḇyedi ḇefararur sambraḇ ro ko, Allah ifrur rosai kam nasyadi ro rosai konadi ma korna roḇa kokarana,
Allah imarisen akak-awob ro jemaat sisandik Allah kada ro Yesus Kristus isof fyoro-fyoro. Amin.
Snar rarirya yaḇuk swarapepen faro mko, aya, snon sḇefa ḇesma samamyai snar Manseren, insa kankenem mkoḇena namnis snonkaku sor kwar imnis raris fararyor ani.
Inja mkorun mkosnemna ḇesya kwar, mkosnemna nasḇunek ma mkokaḇaḇaḇ. Mkofasnai saswar mkoḇena ro mkofnoḇekyae mko.
Ma mkoḇesewar famkofaduru ḇaḇeoser Rurya insa fyesepen mko kuker aski:
baken oser ma Rur oser, imnis raris moḇ sor mko kwar raya faro saneraro oser ro fararyor mko smaya,
Manseren oser, kakyar oser, masisren oser,
Allah oser ma Kma ro roi nakam, Allah robo roi nakam ma ifnoḇek roi nakam ma nya papoik nakam.
Faro oser-oser ro ko ssḇuk kwar saswar-fakamaman siso warnkyara Kristus ḇyukya.
Rarirya mnuk ro Refo doḇo: "Rofafisu dek ḇemoḇ ḇekaki, dun women sibor; i ḇebuk roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇye faro snonkaku."
Rarirya "dek kwar" isoine, ido kwar kako ḇesupswan mun ḇerabaḇ syadiya?
I ḇedo kwar, i kako dek ḇinkwan ḇemoḇ ḇekaki syadi kwar ro nanki kam, insa ifrur mnis roi ḇeḇor kam.
Ma i ḇeḇuk kwar iḇye manwawan, iḇye kako nabi-nabi, iḇye manbaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, iḇye kako manfarandous ma ḇeḇuk farkarkorsya,
insa sfasos snonkaku ḇesren faro fararur afuffarmyan, faro ḇaḇawes Kristus baken ḇyedi,
isof kokam kosma kwar ḇaḇeoser ro kakyarya ma fawawi ḇekaku ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, ma komnis snonkuf ḇepduk, ma faḇaḇye muma ḇesur imnis Kristus,
inja komnis romawa kasun werḇa, ro farkarkor wam syoso-syoso ḇefrur ḇirḇar ro farfnak fromo ro snonkaku ḇefawi ankarkar ḇeḇuk farkarkor ninyan,
ḇape kuf nako farkarkor ḇenapes ma saswar, ro roi ḇeḇor kam insa nasur faro i, isoine Kristus, ḇeḇeḇruya.
Ro i baken ḇesiper ani, -- ḇyeḇesyos ma ḇyeḇeyaḇek ḇeoser imnis afuffarmyan baken ḇesiper ro kina oser-oser, --ḇesma sasur ḇyedi ma ḇeḇawes mankundi ro saswarya.
Rarirya kuker snonsnon Manseren, yakofenbos faro mko: Mkokenem kaker awer imnis snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇa kuker kakara ḇeḇefromo
ma kakara ḇepampan ḇyena sikenem ḇinkwanbur ḇaḇeoser kuker Allah, snar fawawiḇa ma pakakrek ro sisnesna.
Ḇaḇaḇir sena napup, isof siso rmomen ḇeḇor kam, ma sifrur farbuk raris marisen sena kuker mamyaiḇa.
Ḇape mko kada mkoḇese kaku ḇeri. Mko kada mkofarkor kwar ma mkofawi Kristus.
Snar mkomnaf i kwar ma mkosma farkarkor ro i ma mkoḇeuser napnapes ro Yesus,
isoine mkosawen kankenem ḇekwar ro ḇepon, rmomenya kyakok kwar kuker ankarkar,
insama mkosnemna ma kakara ḇeḇor mkoḇena nbabo kam,
inja mkokenem babo, imnis raris Allah ifrur kwar ma marisen ḇyedi isoine kankenem ḇenapes, ma ḇesren.
Rarirya mkosawen ankarkar ma mkokofen roi ḇekakuyae faro mko, snar kokam koḇekina ro Kristus baken ḇyedi.
Rofyor mkomsor, mkomsor isof ori isyun epen awer, rarirya ido mkoḇesasar,
inja mkoḇuk fafisu faro Ibirisya awer.
Snonkaku ḇekarawraw, kyaraw wer awer, iḇye syadi ifararur sambraḇ kaku ro fararur ḇeḇye kuker ḇra ḇyesuya, isof isma roi ono faḇyerwas na faro snonkaku ḇesma mnisḇasya.
Wawos ḇemamas nasasyar awer ro mkosḇamna, mkawos kuker wos ḇeḇefandun ḇeḇawes, insa ḇemnafsya, sisma saswar-fakamaman.
Mkofrur snefafardun Allah Rur Ḇesren ḇyedi awer, snar Rur ani ryem mko kwar famkowaf ras Koreriya.
Mkosawen swaruser ḇeḇor ḇesarmar ro mkosnemna, dosam masasor, rakrakrok ma famfaras, rarirya kako ḇarḇor ḇeḇor ḇero mkosnemna kam.
Mboi mkosnemna nfafir faro min mkoḇesi, mko swaryae mko, ma mkoḇuk ampunyae faro mko, imnis raris Allah ḇyuk ampun ḇemko ro Kristus.
Rarirya mkoso asuser Allah, imnis romawa iswar kaku
ma mkokenem ro saswar, imnis Yesus Kristus iswar mko ma ḇyuk mankundi fa ḇyefarsarser samsom ḇediref faro Allah.
Ḇape farbuk ma roi ḇemamas roḇa fararur famfnom neḇekofen awer rofandu mko, imnis kankenem ro snonkaku ḇesrensya.
Rarirya kako wos ḇemamas, ḇeḇebei roḇa fararur famfnom -- snar roi ḇeradine nasyusḇa -- iḇye syadi wakofen kasumasa faro Allah.
Mkoswarepen naḇye: snonkaku ḇefrur farbuk, ḇefrur mamas roḇaido snonkaku ḇefrur famfnom, isoine ḇesyom faro amfyanir, osoḇaḇeri fanari isma rarwas ro Kristus ma Allah Ḇaḇesasoser suḇedi.
Mkoḇor awer kuker wos ḇeḇebeidi ro snonkaku, snar roi ḇerarirya nbuk masasor faro Allah ro kawasa ḇeḇeuser i ḇasya.
Mkoḇebati awer kuker si.
Ḇepon iwara mkoro pampan, ḇape baboine mkoroi Manseren isnai ḇyedi. Inja mkokenem imnis romawa ro isnaiya,
bon ro isnaiya isoine kankenem ḇeḇye ma fararur ḇenapes ma ḇekaku faro Allah,
ma mkoḇesewar fa mkomamḇaḇir rosai ḇefrur sneprei faro Allah.
Mkoso ma mkun awer rarwas ro fararur ḇepampan ḇeḇefaindaḇa, iḇye syadi mkosampum fararur anna.
Snar roi sifrur ro kankunes sikofen na ido nafrur mamyai kwar.
Ḇape roi ḇeḇor ḇero isnaiya na nfababa, snar isnaiya isnaiyar nakam kwar.
Rarirya sikofen kwar: "Mkokḇok, ne, ḇeyenef mko, ma mkiḇer mko rofandu ḇemarsya ma nari Kristus isnai mko."
Rarirya, mkokara naḇye kaku, mkokenem rariso, mkomnis awer snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, mboi mkokenem imnis snonkaku ḇemamkarkir,
mkofandun fafisuna kuker aunos, snar fafisu ine fafisu ḇeḇarḇor.
Snar rarirya mkofawi royoḇa awer, ḇape mkoḇesewar insa mkofawi Manseren marisen ḇyedi.
Ma mkinem awer anggur ḇefrur masaser mko, snar anggur ifrur rarmomen-nafsu, mboi mkoḇesewar insa mkofo kuker Rurya,
ma mkowawosyae faro min mkoḇesi kuker dow, dow sanandik. Mkodisen dow rurya mkobras faro Manseren kuker sneḇesiper.
Ma mkomarisen syadi ro roi ḇeḇor kam ma mkokofen kasumasa ḇesyakwar faro Allah -- Kmaya, kuker snonsnon ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus,
ma mkorun mankun mko oser faro ḇeseya ma nari mkomkak Kristus.
Ne, bin, kwunem faro swambri imnis kwunem faro Manseren,
snar swambri ḇyebru faro aw imnis raris Kristus ḇyebru ro jemaat. I kada ḇyuk aski faro jemaat ḇeḇebaken oser ro i.
Snar jemaat kyunem faro Kristus, rarirya kako binya kyunem faro swari ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
Ne, snon, waswar swambri imnis Kristus iswar jemaat kwar ma ḇyuk mankundi faḇyesom warek jemaat ani
ma fyasren jemaat, fyasren kwar ani kuker war masisren ma Allah wos ḇyedi,
insa ḇye jemaat ani fadores ro ḇarpon ḇyedi kuker baba fyarorewḇa, ikruremḇa roḇaido eḇesena, insa jemaat isren ma fyarorewḇa.
Rarirya kako snonya iswar swari kada imnis raris baken mankundi ḇyedi: Mansei ḇeswar swari imnis raris iswar mankundi.
Snar snonkaku oso dayin baken mankundi ḇyedi ḇaim, mboi fyaduru ma ḇyemanmin i imnis raris Kristus faro jemaat ḇyedi,
snar koine kina ro Kristus baken ḇyedi.
Ro Refo sfas radine, "Rarirya nari snon oso ibur snari ma kmari ma ḇyeoser kuker swari, isof suḇe baken oser."
Kankunes ine ibabos, ḇape ro yakofen kukerya isoine ḇaḇeoser Kristus kuker jemaat ḇyena.
Ḇape rariso wer kako snon mko oser-oser: iswar swari imnis iswar mankundi ma bin oser-oser iḇye kada ḇyesyowi swa ḇyedi.
Snar rarirya, ne, romawa mko, indo mkosouser sasoser ro sna-kma mkoḇesi snar Manseren.
Mkoḇesyowi sna-kma mkoḇesi -- ine kada sasoser ḇeḇefandun ro asas ine:
insa mkosma aski ma kankenem ḇekwan ro supswan ine.
Ma kma mkoya, mkomsor awer romawa mkoḇesi, mboi mkofarkor si kuker farkarkor ma ananun Manseren.
Ne, manfamyan mkoya, mkosouser tuan mkoḇesi kuker makakak ma radadai kuker sne ḇeḇye ro supswan ine, imnis raris mko souser faro Kristus,
ma mkoso user ro ḇarpon sena monda awer fa mkofrur sneprei sisnesna, ḇape mkomnis manfyan faro Kristus inja mkofrur Allah marisen ḇyena kuker sne ḇesiper,
ma ḇemarisen ḇefrur afuffarmyan ḇyedi imnis snonkaku ḇeyuffarmyan faro Manseren mboi faro snonkaku ḇa.
Mkofawi, mboi snonkaku oser-oser, iḇye manfamyan, iḇye kako ḇemkei, rofyor ifrur roi ḇeḇye oso, nari isma munsu ḇyedi ro Manseren.
Ma tuan-tuan mkofrur rarirya kako faro si ma mkosawen masasor. Mkoswarepen, mboi Manseren sedi ma Manseren mkoḇedi isya ro boiyaswa ma ikada snonkakusya simnis kam.
Ḇarpurya, mkosambraḇ kuker papoik ro Manseren.
Mkuf Allah romamun ḇeḇor fyasos faḇyuk faro mkona, insa mkofarmku mkosampum Ibiris ankarkar ḇyena;
snar kofaḇri fakosampum snonkaku ḇa, ḇape kosampum samambraḇ ḇeḇuk sasoser, ḇesma papoiksya, ḇeḇeḇru ro supswan ḇepampan ine, rur ḇeḇarḇor ro farsyos sansoren.
Snar rarirya mkun Allah romamun ḇeḇor fyasos na, insa mkosambraḇ mkoḇuk sampum ro ras ḇeḇarḇor ani ma mkores nako, famkokfrur mnis roi ḇeḇor kam kwar.
Inja mkores nako, mkoḇoḇek roi ḇeḇoḇek napnapesya ma mkosansun-sansun embroḇ napnapesya,
mkosower mkowemna kuker roi ḇesower wemin, ma mkoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro askiya.
Rofafisu nakam mkun adai kakyar snar kuker adai ani nari mkofasye ikoi ḇesak nakam ro Ibirisya;
mkosaswo ḇaḇeaskiya imnis roi ḇesaswo ma Allah wos ḇyedi imnis sepada Rurya,
mkofrur nakam kuker nadi famkor fafnoḇek ro Allah. Mkonadi kada rofafisu nakam kuker Rurya ma mkomnai awer ro nadi ma fararyor faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇesrensya,
ma aya kako, insa yasma wawos ḇemnis, rofyor yaḇas sḇadon ayedi, yasma fakamaman ḇenapes, insa yaḇri yaḇaryas kankunes Ankankinem Ḇeḇye,
yuffarmyan imnis manwawan sḇefa ḇesmai. Mkonadi kada insa kuker ḇri yaḇaryas i, imnis moḇ yawos rai.
Insa mkofawi rariso ro mankundaya ma rariso ro dine, nakam nari Tikhikus, naek koḇedi yaswar ani ma ḇefnoḇek aya ro afuffarmyan ro Manseren, nari ikofen ḇadir faro mko.
Kuker kakara ine yawan i faro mko insa ikofen ḇadir rariso kuker nko faro mko ma iwos sneprei mkosnemna.
Aski ma saswar kuker kakyar ro Allah, Kmaya ma Manseren Yesus Kristus ryowus mko kam.
Iḇye Allah ḇyeḇok naek srar mko kam kada, ḇeswar Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus kuker saswar ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya. Ro aya Paulus
Syap ro Paulus ma Timotius, Yesus Kristus manfamyan ḇyesi, faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam ro Yesus Kristus ro Filipi, kuker manfarkin ma ḇeyuffarmyan (syamas) jemaat.
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-marisen ro Allah, Kma koḇedi, ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryous mko kada.
Rofyor yaswarepen mko rofafisu ono yakofen kasumasa faro Allah yedi.
Ma rofyor yanadiwarek mko kam, yaḇenadi ḇesya kwar kuker sneḇemarisen.
Yakofen kasumasa faro Allah yedi snar ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi ro ḇararyas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro ras randakya isof baboine.
Inja yakyar kuker sne ḇesiper, insa Allah, ḇerandak fararur ḇeḇye ine rofandu mko, nari ifnoḇek pdefi isof ro papupesya ro ras Yesus Kristus kyaḇer muma werya.

Mboi yakara rarirya kwar ro mko kam, snar yaswarepen mko ro sneri, snar mko kam mkosma rarwas ro saswar-fakamaman Allah ḇyuk ḇeaya, iḇye rofyor yasmai ro bui, iḇye kako rofyor yaḇesanowarek Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya.
Snar Allah ḇyesaksi ḇeaya ro roi yakofen na kaku ḇeri yaswar mko kuker saswarkuf ro Yesus Kristus mankundi.
Ma yanadi radine, iḇyekada saswar mkoḇena nafo ro fawawi ḇenapes ma kakara ḇeḇor kam,
isof mkokinfir roi ḇeḇye kam, insa mkosren ma mkofarorewḇa famkowaf Kristus ras ḇyedi,
ḇefo kuker bon napnapes Yesus Kristus ifrur kwar faro payamyum ma sanandik Allah.
Yamarisen, insa naek srar mkofawi, mboi roi ḇeradine kuker aya nane, nai ḇeḇewar fa Ankankinem Ḇeḇye iryer,
isof ḇekon ro istana (rum) Gubernur ma snonkaku ḇese ḇero diansya kam sakfawi yasmai ro bui snar Kristus.
Ma samamyai yedi eḇedari naek srar ḇena kakyar oser sibor sikyar syadi faro Manseren ma simsik ḇo siwawos ro Allah wos ḇyedi kuker makakak ḇa.
Snonkaku ono sisya sḇaryas Kristus snar masasor ma rakrakrok, ḇape ono kako sḇaryasi kuker kakara ḇeḇye.
Snonkaku sine kada sḇaryas Kristus kuker saswar, snar sifawi, mboi aya isya rodine fayaḇesanowarek Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya,
ḇape ḇesesya snar ḇaḇefandun mankunsi sena ma kuker kakara ḇenapesḇa, skara ḇo soḇo kuker rarirya sifrur samamyai yedi famyarḇak ro bui.
Ḇape rariryano royoḇa, snar rariso wer kako, Kristus ḇyeḇeḇaryas, kuker kakara ḇesasar roḇaido kakara ḇeḇye. Roi ḇeradine yamarisen na. Ma nari yamarisen faswef,
snar yafawi, mboi ro roi ḇeḇor nane kam ḇarpurya isoine yasma aski snar nadi mkoḇena ma fafnoḇek ro Yesus Kristus Rur ḇyedi.
Snar roi yaḇe ḇare ma yakyar kakuya isoine mboi ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam nari yamai ḇa, mboi raris fafisu nakam, rarirya baboine, Kristus isma syom snar aya, ro kankenem yedi, iḇye ro marmar yedi kako.
Snar kankenemya maḇe aya Kristus irya ma marmarya fainda rirya.
Ḇape rofyor nari yakenem ro supswan ine, irya fyasna ḇeaya yafararur fayaḇuk bon. Inja rosai nari yakimfirya, yafawi ḇa.
Ḇar risuru suḇedifer aya: yamarisen yara yakain fnoḇek Kristus -- ikada iḇye syadi kaku;
ḇape fandun syadi yakain ro supswan ine snar mko.
Ma ro kakyar ine yafawi: nari yakain ma nari yarowus mko kam wer, insa mkosamberen syadi ma nkoryaḇ snar kakyarya,
isof masasik mkoḇena ro Yesus Kristus nasyadi wer snar aya, rofyor yakaḇer faro mko.

Iḇye syadi mkokenem namnis kuker Kristus Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi insa rofyor yaramufa yamam, mboi rofyor yarafa ḇaido yamnaf, mboi mkores nako ro rur oser, ma mkoḇe sne oser ro fararur faro kakyar ḇerama ro ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye,
kuker makakak kermkuno ḇaḇeri faro mbroḇ mkoḇesi. Faro sikam irya aḇyair raroya, ḇape faro mko aḇyair ro askiya, ḇerama ro Allah.
Snar faro mko mkosma fakamaman snar kakyar faro Kristus monda ḇa, mboi mkoḇekandera kukeri kako,
ḇaḇesewar mkoḇedi imnis kuker rosai mkomam ro aya, ma baboine rosai mkomnaf ro aya.
Inja ro Kristus ananun naisya, sneprei ma saswar, ḇaḇeoser ro Rurya isya, saswarya ma snesoya isya,
insa mkofrur mnis raryaḇ yedi isoine: iḇye mkona sne-kakara oser, mkona saswar oser, rur oser, kakara oser,
mboi mkosewar ḇaḇefandun mankun mkoḇena ḇardi awer roḇa sanandik ḇeḇefromo awer. Inja iḇye kuker randun sne mkomam min mkoḇesi sikaki syadi ro mankun mko;
ma mkono oser-oser syewar fandun mankundi ḇyena awer, ḇape fandun snonkaku ḇesesya kako.
Iḇye ro kankenem kayam mkona, swaruser ma ḇaḇir raris kosma ro Yesus Kristus kako,
I kada imnis kuker Allah, ḇape kyara ḇaḇaḇeoser ḇyedi ḇemnis kuker Allah, nari iḇriwarek naḇa.
Mboi ryir nakam kwar ma ḇyeimnis mankundi raris manfyan oso. Imnis raris snonkaku, ma ikenem imnis snonkaku.
Ryun mankundi, ma ikenem kuker aunos faro Allah isof imar -- isoine spai ro aprop faimar.
Eḇedari Allah ikanowi fa ikaki syadi, ma ḇyuk faroi snonsnon ḇeba syadi ro snonsnon besena kam.
Ma faro ḇaḇesyowi Yesus, roi ḇeḇor kam ḇekenem ro boiyaswa, ma ro supnane baḇna, nari nbansuba faroi.
Sikam nari skarem Yesus Kristus ikada Manseren, ma rarirya Allah Kmaya isma syom.

Naek srar yaswar kaku mkoine, indo mkoḇeuser; inja mko fararur faswef ro sasewar koreri mkoḇena kuker makakak ma araryof, imnis raris rofyor aya isya rofandu mko, mboi isyadi baboine rofafisu aya isya rofandu mko ḇa kako,
snar Allah iso ḇefararur ro mko iḇye marisen ma ro fararur kako imnis marisen ḇyedi.
Mkofrur roi ḇeḇor kam kuker sasurem ma famfaḇri awer,
ma mkofrur sasar awer, imnis Allah romawa ḇesren ḇyesi rofandu snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇesasar ma ḇeḇor sine, isof mkosna rofandusi imnis maksya ro supswan ine,
ma mkoserepen ro wos ḇekenemya, insa ro ras Kristus ḇyedi yamsik aya, mboi yafaḇri waworek ḇa ma yaḇekandera fromo ḇa.
Ḇape rik ayena neḇesbawer ḇefasarser kako snar kakyar mkoḇena, yamarisen naba ma yaryaḇ naba kaku kuker mko.
Ma rarirya kako nari mkoryaḇ kaku ma mkoryaḇ kuker aya.
Ḇape ro Manseren Yesus yakyar nari yawan Timotius faro mko, insa yasma sneprei kako rofyor yamnaf rariso kankenem mkoḇena.
Snar snonkaku oso isya ro dine ḇa, ḇena sne ma kakara oser kukeri ma ḇekara kaku ḇeri ḇaḇefandun mkoḇena;
snar sikam ssewar ḇaḇefandun mankunsi sena, mboi ḇaḇefandun ro Yesus Kristus ḇa.
Mboi mkofawi ḇaḇeuser ḇyena neḇemnasen kwar ma ifnoḇek aya kwar ro afuffarmyan ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya imnis romawa oso ifnoḇek kmari.
Iso nari yakyar yawan fasaw mufaḇemko, rofyor wawos ḇekur aya nane nasnai kwar maḇeaya.
Ḇape yakyar faro Manseren, nari mankundaya kako yarakaki fasaw faro mko.
Rofafisu ine yakara iḇye yawan Epafroditus faro mko, isoine naek ayedi ma min ḇefararur kayam, mkowan faḇeyuffarmyan aya ro ḇaḇefandun yena.
Snar iswarkuf mko kam ma imkakwarek mko snar mkomnaf dafduf ḇyedi kwar.
Kaku iduf rawo fanam imar, ḇape Allah iswari, ma derer monda ḇa, mboi aya kako, insa yaḇekandera mankenem awer.
Eḇedari yawan fasaw i, insa rofyor mkomam i, mkoryaḇ wer ma sneri iknon.
Inja mkosrow i kuker marisen ḇeba ma mkoḇesyowi snonkaku ḇerariryasya.
Snar kuker fararur Kristus ḇyena indokada imar ma ḇyuk rur ḇyedi fa ifrur mnis rosai ḇemisḇa ro afuffarmyan mkoḇena maro aya.
(1a) Papupesya naek srar mkoryaḇ snar Manseren. (1b) Yafas radine faro mko snar nmarḇak maro aya ḇa mboi nbuk aski faro mko.
Mkosasor mko ro nafsya, mkosasor mko ro snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya, mkosasor mko ro sofakfuk ḇesasarna,
snar koine snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ḇekaku, ḇeḇeari kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi, ma ḇemsik kuker Yesus Kristus mboi kosma kakyar faro rari snonkaku ḇa.
Kaku ḇeri aya kako yasma knam faro yakyar rari snonkaku sena. Rofyor snonkaku ono ḇese sisya skara soḇo sikyar faro rari snonkaku sena, ayama yasyadi wer:
yasma sofakfuk ro ras ḇeḇewar, ro er Israel, ro keret Benyamin, snon Ibrani kaku, ro ḇaḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi aya ine snon Farisi,
ro fararur yaḇewayam jemaat, ro ḇaḇenapnapes ma sasouser sasoser Refo Yahudi yafarorewḇa.
Ḇape rosai ḇeḇefandun ḇeaya, baboine nefainda ḇa snar Kristus.
Rarirya roi ḇeḇor kam yakara naḇe roi ḇeḇefromo, snar mambir faro Yesus Kristus Manseren ayedi, naḇye syadi ro roi nakam. Snar i eḇedari yasawen ḇesena kam ma yakara naḇe mamas, insa yasma Kristus,
ma aya isya kuker Kristus mboi kuker ḇaḇenapnapes ayena ḇa snar yaḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi, mboi kuker napnapes snar kakyar faro Kristus, isoine napnapes Allah ḇyuk snar kakyarya.
Ma Yamarisen insa yamambaḇir Kristus ma papoik ro ḇaḇeaḇiḇer ḇyedi ma ḇaḇeoser ro ḇaḇekandera ḇyena, ro moḇ yaḇeoser kuker Kristus ro ḇaḇemarmar ḇyedi,
insa ro papupesya yasma ḇaḇeaḇiḇer rofandu ḇemarsya.
Inja imnis raris yasma moḇ ine kwar roḇa yamnis kwar, mboi yayawna, isof yaforna, snar aya kako Yesus Kristus fyor aya ro marandan ḇeraḇe Damsyik.
Naek srar, yakara ḇa ro mankundaya, mboi yaforna kwar,

ḇape moḇ yafararur raiso ine: yafanander rosai ḇero ḇarpur ayedi kwar ma yamamker monda faro rosai ḇero ḇarpon ayedi, ma yafrar faro yasma sasuref, isoine fararyor ro boiyaswa ro Allah snar Yesus Kristus.
Inja mkorama, ḇemnis kwar koya, kokara rarirya. Ma rofyor mkona kakara ḇese ro roi oso, roi ḇerarirya ani nari Allah fyasnai faro mko.
Ma rosairya monda kosma kwar, kombran rarirya monda.
Naek srar, mkoso kankenem ayedi ma mkomam warek si, imnis kankenem mkomam ro nko.
Snar, raris yakofen ḇerarwan ono faro mko kwar, ma yafasḇair wer ro baboine kuker kankanes, snar kawasa sibor sikenem imnis sembroḇ Kristus aprop ḇyedi.
Ḇarpurya nari sisma raro, snar Manseren sedi iso marisen baken sena, simsik si kuker roi ḇefrur mamyai, siswaruserker monda roi ḇero supswan ine.
Snar koine koḇe kina ro boiyaswa, ma rodia kako kowaf Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ḇeḇuk koreri ḇeko,
ma nari ḇesadwer baken ḇepyumba koḇenane, fanamnis kuker baken ḇepyum ḇyedi, imnis papoik ḇyedi ḇefrur kafyo roi ḇeḇor kam faro mankundi.
Eḇedari, naek srar yaswar kaku ma yaḇeḇare-ḇeswar, raryaḇ ayedi ma wower ayedi, mkores nako kako snar Manseren, ne, naek srar yaswar kaku!
Yanun mu Euodia ma Sintike, insa muna sne-kakara oser snar Manseren.

Mboi, yor kaku faro mko kako, Sunsugos, min ḇeḇeasuser ayedi: mkofnoḇek si. Snar sifnoḇek aya kwar ro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, fnoḇek kuker Klemens ma min ḇese yesi ḇesma fararur oser, ḇena snonsnon ḇefasepen ro syap kankenemya.
Mkoryaḇ ḇesya kwar snar Manseren! Yakofen ḇeoser wer: mkoryaḇ mura!
Iḇye syadi sneḇefafir mkoḇena snonkakusya kam sifawina. Manseren fyanam kwar!
Iḇye mkoraryof rosairya wer kako, mboi mkofasna roi ḇeḇor kam marisen mkoḇena faro Allah ro nadi ma fararyor kuker kafkofen kasumasa.
Saswar-ḇaḇye ro Allah, ḇesyadi ro kakara, nari nfaduru sne ma kakara mkoḇena snar Yesus Kristus.

Inja papupesya, naek srar, ḇekaku mkoya kam, ḇesma snonsnon mkoya kam, ḇenapes mkoya kam, ḇesren mkoya kam, ḇefafir mkoya kam, ḇewos pyum mkoya kam, ḇeḇenaḇye mkoya kam ma nari ḇesma sanandik, mkokara roi ḇeḇor anna kam.
Ma rosai mkofarkor kwar, ma rosai mkosma kwar, ma rosai mkomnaf kwar, ma rosai mkomam kwar ro aya, mkofrurna. Mboi Allah ḇeḇeknam saswar-ḇaḇenaḇye nari ryowus mko.
Yaryab fafayaḇa snar Manseren, mboi ḇarpurya kakara mkoḇena ma ḇaḇaḇir mkoḇena mkoswar aya wer. Mboi swarapepen mkoḇena naisya, ḇape mkosma fafisu ḇa.
Yakofen rarirya snar yananjar ḇa, snar mankundaya yafrur mnis fandun yena ro fafisu nakam.

Yafawi rosaiso ḇaḇebakyafya ma yafawi rosaiso andidoya. Ro roi ḇeḇor kam ma rosairya wer nekankunes wer maro aya ḇa; iḇye rofafisu yasyopen, iḇye rofafisu yabiser, iḇye rofafisu andido, iḇye rofafisu bakyaf kako.
Ro roi ḇeḇor nakam yaḇarna snar Kristus ḇeḇuk samambraḇ maḇe aya.
Rarirya fararur mkoḇena naḇye kako, snar mkun rarwas kwar ro kandera yena.
Mankun mkofawi kako, ne, kawasa Filipi; rofafisu yarandak yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, rofyor yabur Makedonia, jemaat oso isya ḇa ifrur karkor kuker aya ro nyaki yena mboi mkerer.
Snar ro Tesalonika kako rarwan risuru mkofarem kwar fafnoḇek mkoḇena maro aya.
Mboi farsarser anna naiso yakor syadina ḇa, mboi bon ḇyena, ḇefrur fainda mkoḇena naba syadi.

Baboine yasma kwar rosai ḇeḇefandun ro mko, mboi isyadi wer ro roi ḇeḇor anna. Ayaisya ro andido, snar yasma kwar farem mkoḇena ro Epafroditus, farsarser ḇediref oso, samsom oso ḇefrur marisen ma Allah imarisen na.
Allah yedi nari myunsu fandun mkoḇena kam imnis raris nana ma papoik ḇyedi ro Yesus Kristus.
Sanandik faro Allah ma Kma koḇedi isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin!
Mko kofen aroo ayena faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi ḇeḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus. Aroo faro mko ro naek srar ḇewarpu aya rodinesya.
Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam rodine, isyadi wer snonkaku ro istana (rum) Kaisar, sfarem aroo faro naek srar.
Saswar-ḇaḇye ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryowus rur mkoḇesi! Ro nu, Paulus ma Timotius
Ro Paulus, Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyedi, snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma Timotius naek koḇedi,
faro naek srar Allah kawasa ḇyesi ḇekyar faro Kristus ro Kolose. Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ro Allah, Kma koḇedi, ryowus mko kada.
Rofafisu nkoḇenadiwarek mko, nkokofen kasumasa ḇesya kwar faro Allah, Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus,
snar nkomnaf kwar kakyar mkoḇena faro Yesus Kristus ma ro saswar mkoḇena faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi,
snar kakyar, ḇefasos kwar faḇemko ro boiyaswa. Ro kakyar ani mkorower ḇepon kwar ro wos ḇaḇenapnapesya, isoine Ankankinem Ḇeḇye,
mkosma kwar. Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani imarem ma iryer supswan ḇesiper, rarirya kako rofandu mko rofafisu mkorower i ma mkomam baḇir Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇekaku ḇyena.
Mkofawi nakam kwar ro Epafras, min nkoswar ro afuffarmyan, ḇeḇemanfamyan ḇeḇeuser Kristus snar nko.
I ḇekofen kako saswar mkoḇedi ḇyeknam ro Rurya.
Eḇedari rofyor nkomnafya, nkomnai ḇa nkonadiwarek mko. Ma nkor, insa mkona fawawi nakam ma kakara rurya, faro mkofawi mnis Manseren marisen ḇyena,
isof kankenem mkoḇena naḇye ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ma imarisen na ro roi ḇeḇor nakam, ma mkoḇuk bon ro fararur ḇeḇor ḇeḇyena ma mkosur ro fawawi ḇekaku ro Allah,
ma mkosambraḇ kuker samambraḇ ḇeḇor kam kuker Allah papoik ḇyedi kada insa mkoḇar roi ḇeḇor kam kuker farmku ma kbaḇ,
ma mkokofen kasumasa kuker raryaḇ faro Kmaya, iso ḇefrur famkona rarwas ro rosai ssḇuk faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam ro ḇaḇesasoser isnaya.
Fyaspar kobur papoik pampanya ma dun koḇe papoik Ḇaḇesasoser Rumkun saswar ḇyedi;
kuker Rumkun ḇyedi kosma faspar, isoine sasar koḇena neḇepyos kwar.
Kristus ikada fanir ro Allah kopok komamba, i rumkun rak, i ḇepon ro roi ḇeḇor ḇefrur kwarna.

Snar kuker i, Allah ifrur kwar roi ḇeḇor kam, ro boiyaswa ma ro supnane, roi komamna ma roi komambana, iḇye karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, ḇaḇesasoser kako, iḇye ḇesasosersya, iḇye kako ḇesma papoiksya; roi ḇeḇor kam neḇefrur snar Kristus ma faro Kristus.
Kristus isya ḇepon kaku kwar ro roi ḇeḇor nakam ma roi ḇeḇor anna kam naisya snar Kristus.
I ḇeḇeḇru ro bakenya, isoine jemaat. I rumkun rak, ḇyeḇeḇawes ḇepon rofandu snonkaku ḇemarsya, isof i ḇeḇefandun syadi ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
Allah mankundi imarisen insa roi ḇeḇor anna kam ḇemnis ro Allah, kosma nakam ro Rumkun ḇyedi,
snar Rumkun ani kako Allah ifrur roi ḇeḇor kam kuker ḇaḇeaski faro mankundi, iḇye roi ḇeḇor kam ro supnane, ma roi ḇeḇor kam ro boiyaswa kako, Allah ifrurna snar marmar Rumkun ḇyedi ro apropya.
Randakya mkokenem ḇinkwanbur Allah, ma mkoḇe mbroḇ i kuker rari ma kakara ḇeḇarḇor mkoḇena;
ḇape ro baboine, kuker marmar ro Rumkun ḇyedi, Allah ifrur ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi, iḇye kaḇer wer kuker mankundi. Kuker nyan ine dun mko faro Allah imnis snonkaku ḇesren, mkokaku ma mkofarorew ḇa.

Inja nari mkodworen ro kakyarya, mkores faswef ma mkomarmer ḇa, ma mkorir awer kakyar faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, mkomnaf kwarya ma ḇyeḇeḇaryas kwar ro supswan ine, ma aya ine, Paulus, ḇeyuffarmyan faro i kwar.
Baboine yaryaḇ snar yaḇekandera kuker mko, snar kuker kandera yena, yafasos rosai ḇemnis ḇa ro kandera Kristus ḇyena, ro baken ḇyedi, isoine jemaat.
Aya ine yaḇemanfyan faro jemaat ani imnis raris fararur Allah ikyar kwar maro aya fayaḇaryas pdef wos ḇyedi faro mko,
isoine ḇaryas ḇeyokef ma ḇeḇekankunes wampasi wambarek utin-utin roḇepon iwara faro snonkakusya kam, ḇape baboine ḇyeḇekofenḇadir faro kawasa ḇyesi.
Allah imarisen ikofenḇadir faro si, ro ḇaḇye ma baba ro kankunes ani rofandu er-er ḇese, isoine: Kristus isya rofandu mko, isoine nari mkosma rarwas ro Allah baba ḇyedi!
Iso nkoḇaryasya, rofyor nkoḇuk farkarkor ma nkanun snonkaku oser-oser ro fawawi ḇeḇor kam, insa sfarkin snonkaku oser-oser faro ḇaḇeimnis snar Kristus.
Eḇedari yaḇesewar kaku kuker samambraḇ ḇeḇor kam imnis Kristus papoik ḇyedi ḇefararur sambraḇ ro aya.
Snar yamarisen insa mkofawi, fararur ḇemarḇak yafrur faro mko, ma faro si ro Laodikia ma faro mko kam, ḇemambaḇir aya ḇaimsya,

insa sisnesna naprei ma sḇeoser ro saswari, isof sisma nana ḇeḇor kam ḇekur ḇaḇesnekin ro kakara, inja smambaḇir Allah kankunes ḇyedi isoine Kristus, sna nana ḇaḇemamkarkir ḇeḇor kam ma fawawi anna neḇeyokef ro Kristus.
Snar nana fawawinanem ḇeḇor kam ma fawawi neknam ro Kristus.
Roi ḇeḇor nane kam yakofena, insa ono sḇeankar mko maroḇa kuker wos ḇerok marndanden.
Snar rariso wer kako imburo baken yedi isya rofandu mkoḇa, ḇape rur yedi isya fnoḇek mko ma yamam kuker raryaḇ kankenem aunos ma kakyar ḇedworen mkoḇena snar Kristus.
Mkona Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi kwar. Inja nari mkokenem faswef kuker i.
Ma mkoḇerares ro i ma mko ḇeḇeḇawes roi, ma kakyar mkoḇena nadworen syadi ro rosai sḇukfarkor mko, ma mkosnemna nafo kuker kasumasa.
Mkosasor mko insa rosai sḇukfarkor ninyan mko fasfarkin mko ro nyan sasar awer ma ḇekaku ḇana, snar siso farkarkor ninyan ma rodur ḇero supswan ine, fama ḇyeknam ro Kristus ḇa.
Snar roi ḇeḇor kam ro Allah naisya ro Kristus, isoine ro ḇaḇesnonkaku ḇyedi,
ma ssḇuk namnis ḇemko kwar ro Kristus, snar Kristus iso ḇeḇeḇru ro ḇesasosersya ma ḇesma papoiksya kam.
Ro Kristus mkosma sofakfuk kwar, sofakfuk snonkaku sifrur ḇa, ḇape kuker Kristus sofakfuk ḇyedi, ḇeḇeknam ro ḇaḇemkei baken ḇesasar ine,
snar kuker Kristus mko ḇeḇekrir ro masisren, ma kuker Kristus mko ḇeḇeḇawes kako snar kakyar mkoḇena faro Allah fararur papoik ḇyedi, ḇeḇawes Kristus rofandu ḇemarsya kwar.
Mko kako, ro randakya mkomar ro ḇar rurya snar sasar mkoḇena, ma snar mkosma sofakfuk ro ḇaken ḇa, ḇape ro baboine Allah ḇyuk kankenem faro mko fnoḇek Kristus. Allah ipyos sasar ḇeḇor mkoḇena kwar.
Snar kuker payasyos syap nyakiya, ro fasasna sasoser ḇeḇuksof ma ḇesampum ko. Ma ipyosna ḇo pyaepenna ro ai apropya:
Kristus pyampum ḇesasosersya ma ḇesma papoiksya kwar ma ifrur si ḇeḇaḇeuni ḇefababa ro ḇaḇefainda ḇyedi faro si.
Inja mkomam monda awer snonkaku oso ḇeḇuksof faro mko ro roi ḇefor, inja rosai mkan ma mkinem roḇaido ras munara, munara paik babo roḇa wer ras Mananai Yahudi:
Nane kam nenin monda ro roi nari ḇerama, mboi neknam ro Kristus.

Mkomam monda awer fainda mkoḇena ḇo neḇeposer ro snonkaku ḇefrur ḇeḇefawi ḇa ḇerun mankun ḇo ḇeḇenadi faro malaikatsya, ḇeḇesewar ro ḇaḇemamam kuker knam oso ḇa ḇekanow mankun ro kakara sena ro supswan ine.
Mboi iserepen nako ḇa faro Ḇeḇeḇru, ro moḇsai baken ḇesiper ḇyeḇefaduru ma ḇyeḇefesepen faḇyeoser kuker urek ma faswisew, ḇesma sarsur ḇerama ro Allahya.
Rofyor mkomar fnoḇek Kristus kwar ma mkomkei ro rodur ro supswan ine, rosai eḇedari mkokafyo faro rari ḇeḇor, imnis raris mkoisya mkokenem kaker ro supswan ine:
Mkopan awer ine, mkorepen awer iwa, mkoḇyunek awer ine;
nakam nkur monda roi ḇeḇor kona ma nari ḇero snar naso monda sasoser ma farkarkor snonkaku.
Kaku ḇeri, rari anna komamna nafo kuker fawawi nanem kuker ḇaḇeari sifrur ro mankunsi, imnis raris randun mankun, ḇaḇewayam mankun, nefainda oso ḇa mboi sifrur syopen kankenem sena ro supswan ine.
Eḇedari rofyor mko ḇeḇeḇawes fnoḇek Kristus, mkosewar roi ḇero boiyaswa, ro moḇ Kristus isya, kyain ro Allah ḇar raku ḇyedi.
Mkoswarepen monda roi ḇekur boiyaswana, mboi mkoswaruser roi ḇero supswan inena awer.
Snar mkomar kwar ma kankenem mkoḇena nayokef kuker Kristus snar Allah.
Rofyor Kristus, ḇeḇeknam kankenem koḇena, nari fyasna mankundi kwar, mko kako nari mkakfasna mkofnoḇek i ro ḇaḇenasan ḇyedi.
Eḇedari mkomun marisen rosai ḇero baken mkoḇena ro supswan ine, isoine ḇaḇe farḇuk, ḇaḇearwarem, ḇaḇermomen, marisen ḇeḇarḇor, ma faḇri mankun kako, imnis kuker ḇaḇesamsyom faro karwar,
nakam nafrur fa Allah imsor [faro snonkaku ḇeso Allah ḇasya].
Ma mko kako ro randakya mkakfrur roi ḇerarirya rofafisu mkokenem rona.
Ḇape baboine, mkosawen roi ḇerarirya kam, isoine masasor, dosam, ḇarḇor, kankonem ma wos ḇemamas ḇesasyar ro mkosḇamna.
Ma mko ḇeankaryae awer, snar mkobur snonkaku ḇekwar ani ma rari ḇyena kwar,
ma mkorer kwarbur snonkaku ḇekwar fnoḇek rari ḇeponiwara, ma mko ḇeḇefrur babo pdef ro ras ḇe ras farari fanir (Allah) ḇefrur mko kwar.

Roi ḇeradine isya wer ḇa snonkaku Yunani, roḇa snonkaku Yahudi, snonkaku ḇesofakfuk ma snonkaku ḇesofakfuk ḇa, snonkaku Barbar roḇa snonkaku Skit, women roḇa ḇemkei, ḇape Kristus monda ḇyeknam ro roi ḇeḇor nakam.
Eḇedari, mkomnis snonkaku Allah kyinfir ma fyasren ma iswar syadi, ma mkofasna ḇaḇesneso, snemura, ḇaḇerun sne, ḇaḇefafir ma ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ.
Mkokḇaḇyae mko ma mkoḇuk ampunyae rofyor snon oso ikram masasor faro min ḇyedi; imnis raris Manseren ipyos sasar mkoḇena kwar mko kako mkakfrur rarirya kada.
Ma ro roi ḇeḇor nane kam: mkona saswari, ḇekaḇrai ḇefesepen ḇaḇeoser ma ḇaḇemanasnisya.
Ma saswar-ḇaḇye Kristus ḇyedi ḇyepoik mkosnemna, snar i eḇedari mko ḇeḇeyor kwar famko ḇebaken oser. Inja mkokofen kasumasa.

Mboi Kristus wos ḇyena nakenem kuker nana ḇeḇor ḇyena kam rofandu mko, isof kuker fawawinanem ḇeḇor kam mkoḇuk farkarkor ma mkosonekyae mko ma mkodisen mazmur, ma sanandik ma dow rurya, ma mkokofen kasumasa ro mkosnemna faro Allah.
Ma roi ḇeḇor kam mkofrurna, mkofrurna kuker wawos ma fararur, mkofrur nakam kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus, ma mkokofen kasumasa snar Kristus faro Allah, Kma koḇedi.
Ne, bin ḇena swa, wasouser swambri imnis faro Manseren.
Ne, snon ḇena swa, waswar swambri ma bewayam awer i.
Ne, inai ma romawa mko, indo mkoḇeuser sna-kma mkoḇesi ro roi ḇeḇor kam, snar naiso ḇefrur marisen faro Manseren.
Ne, sna-kma mkoya, indo mkofrur sneduf awer faro inai ma romawa mkoḇesi, insa sisnesna nfafayaf awer.
Ne, manfamyan mkoya, mkoḇeuser kuker manseren mkoḇesi ro supswan ine ro roi ḇeḇor kam, mboi mkoḇeuser ro ḇarpon sena monda awer famkofrur sneprei si, mboi kuker sneḇenapes snar mkomkak faro Manseren.
Ma rosairyawer mkofrurna, mkofrur kuker sne ḇeryaḇ imnis faro Manseren mboi faro snonkaku ḇa.
Mkofawi, isoine ro Manseren nari mkosma rarwas sfasnaḇadir imnis sasuref. Kristus imnis tuan ma mko ḇemanfamyan ḇei.
Mansei ḇefrur sasar, nari ḇyar sasar ḇyena, snar ro Manseren kakara ḇyedi snonkaku simnis kame.
Ne, faro manseren mkoya, mkofrur mnis kuker napnapes faro manfamyan mkoḇesi ro sasuref sena; snar mkofawi mkona Manseren oso ro boiyaswa.
Mkofarmku ro nadi ma mkepen mko ma mkokofen kasumasa.
Ma mkonadiwarek aya kako, insa Allah ḇyas kedwai faro ḇaḇeḇaryas nkoḇena, isof nkawawos kankunes ro Kristus, ḇefnai fayasmai ro buiya.
Rarirya nari yafasnai, ḇararyas ani imnis moḇ ryaya.
Inja mkokenem kuker fawawi faro snonkaku ḇekyar ḇasya, ma mkofnak awer fafisuna.
Iḇye mkawawos kuker saswar, ma wos anna mbuar awer, isof mkofawi, rariso nari mkokarem faro snonkaku oser-oser.
Tikhikus, naek koḇedi koswar kaku ani, manfamyan ḇeḇeuser ma min ḇeyuffarmyan faro Manseren nari ikofenḇayir faro mko, ro roi ḇeḇor kam ḇekur ayana.
Yawan i faro mko kuker kakara insa mkofawi roi ḇekur nko ma insa ḇyuk sneprei faro mko.
Yawan i warpu Onesimus, naek koswar kaku ani ma ḇeḇeuser, snon oso rofandu mko. Nari sukofenḇayir faro mko ro roi ḇeḇor kam ḇero dinena.
Ma Aristarkus fyarem aroo faro mko, min ḇesmai fnoḇek aya ro bui ma Barnabas fno ḇyedi Markus mkosma ankinem kwar ro i; mkosrow i rofyor ryafa kwar faro mko.
Ma ro Yesus snirḇe Yustus. Snonkaku rikior skoine skerer skoi ḇesma sofakfuk skoi ḇeḇemin kuker aya ḇesma fararur oser ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah; skoiso ḇeḇesneprei maro aya.
Epafras fyarem aroo faro mko; i snon oso rofandu mko, Yesus Kristus manfamyan ḇyedi, ḇeḇenadi ḇesyakwar faro mko, insa mkores nako, imnis snonkuf ma ḇekyar kaku roi ḇeḇor kam Allah imarisen na.
Mankundaya yaḇesaksi mboi ifararur sambraḇ kaku kwar faro mko ma naek srar ro Laodikia ma Hierapolis.
Lukas dokter (ḇefawinanem aryawin faro ḇedufsya) koswar kaku ma Demas sufarem aroo faro mko.
Mko kofenḇayir aroo nkoḇena faro naek srar ro Laodikia; ma faro Nimfa ma jemaat ḇero rum ḇyedi.
Ma rofafisu syap ine ḇyeḇewasya rofandu mko kwar, mkosewar fainsa ḇyeḇewasya faro jemaat Laodikia kako ma syap faro Laodikia kako ḇyeḇewasya faro mko.
Ma mko kofenḇayir faro Arkhipus: Mamwarek naḇye, insa afuffarmyan wasma ro Manseren ani wafrur mnisna.
Aya, Paulus, yafarem aroo faro mko. Aroo ine mankundaya iso ḇefas iya. Nari mkoswarepen wanka yena. Saswar-fakamaman ryowus mko kada. Ro nu, Paulus ma Timotius
Ro Paulus, Silwanus ma Timotius faro kawasa jemaat ro Tesalonika, kawasa ro Allah Kmaya ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus: Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇye ryowus mko kada.
Nkokofen kasumasa faro Allah ḇesyakwar snar nko kam ma nkap mko ronadi nkoḇena ḇesyakwar.
Snar nkoswarepen fararur kakyar mkoḇena ḇeaya kwar, fararur saswar mkoḇena ma ḇaḇesaneraro ḇedworen mkoḇena faro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ro ḇarpon Allah ma Kma koḇedi.
Ma nkofawi, ne, naek srar Allah iswar mkoya, mboi Allah kyinfir mko kwar.
Snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas ani nkoḇuki faro mko kuker wawos monda ḇa, ḇape kuker papoik ro Rur Ḇesrenya ma kuker kakyar ḇeko. Mboi mkofawi, rariso nkofararur rofandu mko snar mko.
Mboi fyasna ḇadir mkosouser nko ma mkoso Manseren kwar; ro ḇaḇewayam ḇemarḇak mkona wos ani kuker raryaḇ ḇeḇeknam ro Rur Ḇesrenya.
Isof mko ḇefasasna kwar faro kawasa ḇekyarsya kam ro supya mnuk Makedonia ma ro Akhaya.
Snar rofandu mko, Manseren wos ḇyedi ryok ḇeruran ro Makedonia ma Akhaya monda ḇa, ḇape ro moḇna kam kakyar mkoḇedi faro Allah, ḇyesno kwar, isof nari nkokofen roi oso ḇa.
Snar mankunsi sfarfyar ro nko, rariso mkosrow nko ma rariso mkokaḇerbur karwarsya faro Allah famkuffarmyan Allah ḇekenem ma ḇenapes,
ma insa mkowaf raramuma ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ro boiyaswa, ḇyefa ḇeyiḇer kwar rofandu ḇemarsya isoine Yesus, ḇefaspar kobur masasor nari ḇeramumaya.
Naek srar mankun mko kako mkofawi, raramufa nkoḇedi faro mko waworek ḇa.
Mboi kaku ḇeri nkorafa ḇaimya, mkofawi sewayam ma sonef nko ro Filipi kwar, ḇape kuker fafnoḇek ro Allah koḇedi, nkosma makaku fankoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah faro mko ro fararur ḇemarḇak ine.
Snar ananun nkoḇena farkarkor ninyan naisya ḇa roḇaido kakara ḇekaku nairya ma sararer naisya ḇa kako.
Roḇa. Snar Allah kyara nkosyus ma ikyar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani faro nko, rarirya nkoḇaryas, fankofrur marisen snonkaku ḇa, mboi nkofrurfa Allah imarisen ma imnasen nkosnesna.
Snar fafisu oso ḇaim fankowos marnden -- roi ḇeradine mkofawi -- ma nkona kakara faḇrimankun ḇeyokef ḇa -- Allah ḇeḇesaksiya --
fafisu oso ḇaim nkosewar sanandik ro snonkaku, inja ro naek srar mko ma snonkaku ḇese kako. Kaku ḇeri nkofrur rarirya imnis Kristus manwawan ḇyesi, rarirya nari nkor roi ono ro mko.
Ḇape nkoḇeaḇaḇen mko, imnis sna oso fyarus ma fyaduru romawa ḇyedi.
Rarirya kako, nkoswar naba faro mko, inja nkomarisen nkoḇerwas Allah Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi monda faro mkoḇa, ḇape kankenem nkoḇena ḇardi kako kuker mko, snar nkoswar mko kwar.

Snar mkoswarepen kaker ḇaḇesewar ma kandera -- marmor nkoḇena kwar. Rofafisu nkofararur ro roḇ meser, insa nkofrur kandera faro oso ḇa kako rofandu mko, snar nkoḇaryas Allah Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi faro mko.
Mko ḇesaksi maro nko, rarirya kako Allah, nkokenem nasren, nkofrur mnis ma nkofarorew ḇa fankokenem rofandu mko ḇekyar faro Kristus kwar.
Mkofawi, nkomnis kma oso faro romawa ḇyesi, nkanun mko ma nkoḇuk sambraḇ faro mko oser ḇe oser kwar;
ma nkor kaku ḇeri, insa mkokenem namnis raris Allah marisen ḇyena, ḇeyor mko faro Ḇaḇesasoser ma baba ḇyedi.

Ma rarirya nkomnai ḇa ro nkokofen kasumasa faro Allah kako, snar mkona Allah wos ḇyedi nkoḇaryas kwar ani, imnis wos ro snonkaku ḇa, ḇape -- ma kaku ḇeri rarirya -- Allah wos ḇyedi, ḇefararur ro ḇekyar mkoya kako.

Naek srar ḇaḇewayam rosai mkosmana, jemaat-jemaat Allah ro Yudea ḇena Yesus Kristus saksma ḇaḇewayam anna kako kwar. Ḇaḇewayam mkosmana ro er mankun mkoḇansya, imnisbos kaku moḇ Allah jemaat ḇyena ro Yudea sisma ḇaḇewayam raya ro Yahudisya.
Mboi Yahudisya smun Manseren Yesus kwar ma nabisya ma sḇewayam nko ḇesya kwar. Allah rosai imarisenna sfandun naba mboi sḇembroḇ snonkakusya kam,
snar simarisen sidwarek nko insa nkobaryas awer wos ani faro er ḇese fasaksma koreri. Rarirya sifrur pdef ḇesya kwar sasar sena rawo nabor kaku inja baboine Allah masasor ḇyedi myun si kwar.
Ḇape naek srar rofafisu koḇesisyeya koḇinkwan ro mamamyae, ḇape kofanamyae ro kosnesna, nkoḇeḇare ḇeswar kaku ḇeri ma nkoḇesewar insa nkorakaki fankomam mko.
Snar nkokara kwar fankorakaki mko -- ma aya, Paulus, yafasos kwar isyadi ro rarwan oser, -- ḇape Ibirisya idwarek nko.
Kaku ḇeri mkoiso nkokyar ma nkoryaḇ kukerya. Snar nari rofyor Manseren Yesus ryama ma kosrow iya, nari mkoiso komsik kukerya.
Kaku ḇeri, mkoi eḇedar nkomsik ma nkoryaḇya.
Ḇarpurya nkofarmku wer ḇa, mboi nkokara iḇye syadi yerer yakain ro Atena.
Mboi nkowan Timotius, naek ḇefararur faro Allah fnoḇek ro ḇaḇeḇaryas Kristus Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi ryafa ḇyuk sambraḇ ḇemko ma danun mko ro kakyarya,
insa ono kakyar sena namarmer awer snar ḇaḇewayam anna. Mankun mkofawi, mboi sfasna ko faro ḇaḇewayam ḇera dinena kwar.
Snar, rofyor nkoisya fnoḇek mko, nkokofen faro mko kwar, nari kosma ḇaḇewayam. Ma mkofawi, ḇaḇewayam ḇeradine ndarirya kwar.
Eḇedari yafarmku wer ḇa, mboi yawan Timotius, insa yafawi rariso kakyar mkoḇena, snar yaḇeḇirḇar rofyor mkosma fafrowes ro Ibirisya kwar ma nari ḇaḇesewar nkoḇeja ḇyefromo.
Ḇape baboine, Timotius kyaḇerma kwar ma dun ḇaryas ḇefrur raryaḇ ro kakyar ma saswar mkoḇena, ma mkoḇe ḇare nko ḇesyakwar ma mkomarisen mkosrow nko, imnis nko kako nkomarisen nkosrow mko,
naek srar, nko kako, ro ḇaḇewayam ḇeḇor nkoḇena nkosma sneprei snar kakyar mkoḇena.
Baboine rofyor mkores faswef ro Manseren, imnis raris nkokenem kaḇer wer.
Snar kafkofen kasumasa rosai nari nkoḇuk faro Allah ro ḇaḇeraryaḇ ḇeḇor, nkosma ro mko, ro ḇarpon Allah koḇedi?
Ro roḇ meser nkonadi kaku ḇeri, insa kosrowyae ḇarpon kuker ḇarpon ma nkofamfon rosai ḇedawer kaker ro kakyar mkoḇena.
Allah, Kma koḇedi, ma Manseren koḇedi Yesus, ḇyuk nyan maro nko fankosrow mko kada.
Manseren ifrur famkoswar syadiyae mko ma mkoswar kawasa kam, imnis raris nko kako nkoswar mko.
Manseren ḇyuk sambraḇ faro mko kada, insa mkosren ma mkofarorew ḇa, ro ḇarpon Allah ma Kma koḇedi rofyor raramuma ro Manseren koḇedi, Yesus fnoḇek kawasa ḇyesya kam.
Ḇarpurya, naek srar, nkor ma nkanun mko ro Manseren Yesus: Mkorower ro nko kwar rariso mkokenem insa mkofrur Allah marisen ḇyedi. Roi ḇerarirya ani mkoso i kwar, ḇape kaku ḇeri mkofrur i kada.
Snar mkofawi kako fasasnai rosai nkoḇuk kwar faro mko ro snonsnon Yesus.
Snar Allah marisen ḇyedi isoine ido: Insa mkokenem kuker saranden, isoine mkofrur farḇuk awer,
inja mkono oser-oser dun bin oser faḇyeswa faro mankundi ḇardi insa ikenem kuker saranden ma ḇaḇesyowi,
mboi kuker rmomen baken nafsu ḇa, imnis fararur ro snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇasya,
ma insa roi ḇeradine kawasa sifrur awer roi ḇeḇyeḇa faro naek sesi roḇa seankar si. Snar Manseren nari myunsu roi nanekam, imnis nkokofen fasna faro mko ro ḇeponnya.
Allah dorko insa kofrur roi ḇemamas ḇa, mboi roi ḇesren.
Inja, mansei ḇesampum roi ḇeradine, isampum snonkaku ḇa, mboi isampum Allah ḇeḇuk Rur Ḇesren ḇyedi faro mko kako.
Ro saswar manbekanaek fandun faneḇefas faro mko ḇa, snar mankun mko mkofarkor kwar saswaryae ro Allah.
Roi ḇeradine mkofrurna kako faro naek mkoḇesi kam ro supya mnuk Makedonia ḇesiper. Ḇape nkanun mko, naek srar, insa mkofrur syadi kakuna wer.
Ma mkokarana imnis ḇaḇesyowi oso faro kankenem ḇeknon, famkokara roi ḇekur mankun mko ḇardi ma mkosewar nanan ro mankun mko, imnis nkanun kwar faro mko,
isof mkokenem raris snonkaku ḇeḇesyowi ro mamam snonkaku ḇese ma mkokasandem awer faro si.
Naek srar nkomarisen insa mkakfawi kaku roi ḇekur snonkaku ḇemar kwar ansi; insa mkoḇarop awer imnis snonkaku ḇese ḇena kakyar ḇasya.
Snar rofyor kokyar, mboi Yesus imar kwar ma ḇyeḇeḇawes wer, ma kokyar kako mboi ḇemar kwar ro Yesus nari Allah fyanjur si fasiwarpui.
Nkokofen radine faro mko kuker Manseren wos ḇyedi: ma ḇekenem kaker koya isof Manseren raramuma ḇyedi nari kopon ḇemar ansya ḇaḇeri.
Snar rofafisu ssḇuk aḇyair, isoine rofafisu mananir malaikatya kyaru ma Allah kḇur ḇyedi ryok, ma nari Manseren mankundi dado ro boiyaswa ma ḇemar ro Kristus nari sḇawes si ḇepon;
raimnai, ḇekenem kaker koya, nari koḇe ḇekanow fnoḇek si ḇemandep ro farsyos sansoren fakosrow Manseren. Rarirya nari kowarpu Manseren isof fyoro-fyoro.
Inja mkoḇuk snepreiyae faro mko kuker wos nane.
Ro awar ma fafisu fandun faneḇefas faro mko ḇa,
snar mankun mko ḇardi mkofawi kwar, mboi ras Manseren ryamumaya imnisbos kaku ḇekaraw ro roḇna.
Rofyor sikofen: Nakam neaski ma naknon -- ḇape fasaw kaku ḇaḇeraroya kyur si, imnis bin ḇemoḇesḇa oso iduf iḇedaḇen romawa ḇyedi.
Ḇape naek srar, mkokenem ro pampanya ḇa, isof ras ani ryama ifrur kanandor mko imnis ḇekaraw oso,
snar mko kam romawa ro sananai ma romawa ro meser. Koine snonkaku ro pampan roḇa snonkaku ro roḇ ḇa.
Rarirya kenef awer imnis kawasa ḇese, mboi koḇaḇir ma kowaren.
Snar ḇeyenefsya, senef ro fafisu roḇ ma ḇemsersya simser rofafisu roḇ.
Ḇape koine, kawasa ro meser, iḇyekada koḇaḇir, kona kakyar ma saswar imnis sansun mankarmomen ma kona saswoi mankarmomen kakyar faro koreri.
Snar Allah ḇyuk fakosma masasor ḇyedi ḇa, mboi kosma koreri snar Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi,
ḇemar kwar snar ko, insa kowarenke, roḇa kenefke, kokenem fnoḇek kuker Kristus.
Rarirya mkanunyae mko ma mkosonemyae mko, imnis moḇ mkofrur ro baboine raya.
Nkor faro naek srar, insa mkoḇesyowi ḇefararur sambraḇ rofandu mko, ḇefarkin ma ḇesonek mko snar Manseren;
ma insa kaku ḇeri mkoḇeuser si kuker saswar snar fararur sena. Mkokenemyae ḇesya kwar kuker aski.
Nkanun mko kako, naek srar, insa mkosonek ḇekenem kuker aunos ḇasya, mkawos sneprei faro ḇefafardunsya, mko ḇesanowarek ḇeryarḇasya, mkokḇaḇ faro snonkakusya kam.
Mkoswarepen naḇye, insa snonkaku ono smunsu ḇarḇor kuker ḇarḇor awer, ḇape mkoḇesewar ḇesya kwar roi ḇeḇye, faro mko oser-oser ma faro snonkaku kam.
Mkorayaḇ ḇesya kwar.
Mkoḇenadi faswef.
Mkokofen kasumasa ro roi ḇeḇor kam, snar Allah marisen ḇyedi faro mko ro Yesus Kristus.
Mkofasye awer Rurya.
Ma mkomamkyof awer ḇardadi Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyukna.
Mkomnasen roi ḇeḇor kam ma mkona ḇeḇyena.
Ma mkoḇinkwanbur ḇarḇor syoso-syoso kam kada.
Allah saswar-ḇaḇye ḇyedi fyasren mko kam kada mboi rur kenem fnoḇek baken mkoḇena, neḇefaduru mnis kuker farorewḇa faro raramuma ro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
Allah i ḇeyor mko kwar ima ikaḇaḇaḇ, i kako nari ḇyefanamnis.
Naek srar mkonadiwarek nko kada.
Mkokofen aroo nkoḇenane faro naeksya kam ḇena kakyar oser.
Kuker snonsnon ro Manseren yor kaku ḇeri insa mkowasya syap ine faro naeksya kam.
Saswar-fakamaman ro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi, ryowus mko kam kada! Ro nko, Paulus, Silas ma Timotius
Ro Paulus, Silwanus ma Timotius, faro kawasa jemaat Tesalonika ro Allah Kma koḇedi ma Manseren Yesus Kristus.
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇenaḇye ro Allah, Kma koḇedi, ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryowus mko kada.
Naek srar, ro ras nakam nkokofen kasumasa faro Allah snar mko. Ma nkofrur rarirya, snar kakyar mkoḇena nfamfon syadi ma saswaryae mkoḇena nsambraḇ syadi rofandu mko,
isof ro Allah jemaat ḇyena mankun nkomsik snar mko snar ḇaḇefarmku mkoḇena ma kakyar mkoḇena ro kandera ma wayam ḇeḇor mkosmana:
fasasna oso ro napnapes ro Allah ḇaḇemankara ḇyedi, ḇekofen mboi mkosyus famkosun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, snar rofafisu ine mkoḇekandera kuker Ḇaḇesasoser ani.
Snar ḇeḇenapnapes Allah nari myunsu ḇaḇewayam mkoḇena faro ḇeḇewayam mkosya.
Ma ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro sewayam mkoya, ma faro nko kako, rofafisu Manseren Yesus Kristus fyasna mankundi fnoḇek malaikat ḇyesi ro boiyaswa kuker papoik ḇyedi,
rofor ḇesak-ḇesber ma myunsu faro si ḇefawi Allah ḇasya ma ḇeḇeuser Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Yesus, Manseren koḇedi ḇa.
Sikada nari sisma samamyai raro fyoro-fyoroya, sḇinkwanbur Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ro papoik samambraḇ ḇyedi,
rofyor ryama ro ras ani kawasa ḇesren ḇyesya nari sisandik baba ḇyedi ma snonkaku ḇekyarsya sikandori, snar ḇaḇesaksi nkun faro mkona mkokyarna kwar.

Rarirya nkoḇenadiwarek mko ḇesyakwar kako, insa Allah koḇedi kyara mkosyus faro fararyor ḇyedi ma kuker samambraḇ ḇyedi ifrur mnis marisen mkoḇena famkofrur roi ḇeḇye ma ḇyeimnis fararur kakyar ḇeḇor mkoḇena kam,
isof snonsnon Yesus, Manseren koḇedi, isma baba snar mko ma mkosma baba snar i, imnis Allah koḇedi saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi ma Manseren Yesus Kristus.
