Ro raramuma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ma raryur koḇedi kuker Yesus Kristus nkor faro mko naek srar,
insa mkokmom ma mkoḇeḇirḇar fasaw awer, roi ḇekur fasasna rurya, ma kako ro ḇaḇeḇararyasya roḇa sikofen ro syap nkoḇeja, ma wos ḇeyoḇo Manseren ras ḇyedi ryama kwar.
Rariso wer kako, imbude snonkakusya sḇeankar mkori. Snar ras ani ryama ḇaimya roi ḇeradinena ndama ḇepon resari: Ma sfasna ḇepon snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya fa nari simar,
isoine mbroḇ ḇekanow mankunsi syadi ro roi ḇeḇor kam sapḇe roba sisyom imnis Allah. Ma kyain ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma imarisen fyasna mankundiḇe Allah.
Mkoswarepen ḇake roi ḇeradinena yakofenna ḇesyakwar faro mko, rofafisu aya isya yarowus mko?
Ma baboine mkofawi rosai ḇeḇriwareki, isof nari insape fyasna mankundi rofafisu sfasna faro iya.
Snar kuker kankunes ḇarḇorya irandak ifararur kwar, ḇape baboine oso isya idwarek. Rofyor ḇedwarek ani sḇeifa ikren kwar,
rofyor ani ḇeḇarḇor ani nari fyasna mankundi, ḇape Manseren Yesus nari myuni kuker sḇayo ḇyedi faimar, rofyor Manseren Yesus kyaḇer muma werya.
Raramuma ro ḇeḇarḇor ani ikada fararur ro Ibirisya, ma nari ifrur ḇaḇekanandor nabor, aḇyair-aḇyair ma aḇyair kanandor ḇekaku ḇa.
Ma nari ifrur ankarsararer ḇeḇor faḇyukḇeninyan snonkaku rawo isof nari simar, ma simar snar simewer siswar ḇaḇenapnapes ḇeḇuk koreri faro siya.
Eḇedari Allah ḇyuk papoik oso fadun siḇe nyan ḇeḇor, isof sikyar faro roi ḇeḇeankarkar.
Ḇarpurya snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇaḇeḇarḇorya ma simewer sikyar faro ḇaḇenapnapesya nari sisma samamyai.
Ma nari nkokofen kasumasa ḇesyakwar faro Allah snar mko, naek srar, Manseren iswar kaku, snar ro randakya Allah kyinfir mko kwar famkosma koreri kuker Rur ḇefasren mko ma ro napnapes mkokyar ani.
Eḇedari dor mko kwar kuker Ankankinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas ani, insa mkaksma ḇaḇebaba ro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
Inja mkores nako ma mkufepen farkarkor mkosma ro nko kwar, ma kuker wos roḇa wer kuker fas-fas.
Ma Allah, Kma koḇedi, kuker Manseren Yesus Kristus, saswar-fakamaman ḇyena iswar ko kwar ma ḇyuk ḇeko sneprei ḇekain fyoro ma saneraro ḇeḇye maḇeko,
ma nbuk sneprei ma samambraḇ faro mko ro fararur mkoḇena kada, fnoḇek awawos ḇeḇye ro kakyarya.
Inja, naek srar, mko ḇenadiwarek nko, insa Manseren wos ḇyedi irwuren ma imbran kuker payamyum rofandu mko.
Ma insa nkosma faspar ro ḇefrur fafardun ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, snar snonkakusya saksma kakyar kam ḇa.
Manseren ikada i kaḇaḇaḇ. Nari ḇyuk samambraḇ ma i ḇriwarek mko ro ḇeḇarḇorsya.
Ma nkokyar faro Manseren, mboi rosai nkanun faro mko kwar, nari mkofrur pdefna.
Ma Manseren ikfin mko faswef rarirya ḇesyakwar faro Allah saswar ḇyedi kada, isof Kristus kananon ḇyedi.
Ḇape nkanun faro mko, naek srar, kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus Kristus, insa mkoḇinkwanbur naek ono ḇefrur fararur sena ḇa ma ḇeḇeuser farkarkor mkosma kwar ro nko anna ḇa.
Snar mankun mkofawi, rariso nari mkoso kankenem nkoḇena. Rofyor nkoisya rofandu mko nkofararur myaren kaku.
Ma nkan snonkakusya roḇeyan sena waworek ḇa, mboi nkoḇesewar rawo nkardomes ro roḇ meser, insa nkofrur kandera awer oso ro mko.
Nkosma hak fankor fafnoḇek faro naek srar kako, ḇape nkor ḇa, snar nkomarisen nkoḇe fasasna faro mko, insa mkoso fasasna ani.
Snar, rofyor nkoisya rofandu mko kako, nkoḇuk swarapepen ine faro mko kwar: Rofyor snonkaku oso imewer ifararur, dakanan awer.
Nkokofen radine snar nkomnaf, mboi ono sisya sikenem kuker aunosḇa ma sifararur ḇa, mboi ssombirek kuker roi ḇeḇefandun ḇa,
snonkaku ḇerariryasya nkoḇuk swarepen ma anun kuker Manseren Yesus Kristus, insa siknon ma sifrur faswef fararur sena ma rarirya nari sanan ro mankunsi.
Ma mko, naek srar, mko papum fasaw awer mkofrur fararur ḇeḇye.
Rofyor snonkaku ono simewer simnaf rosai nkokofen ro syap ine, mko kakop si (mko fasepen si) ma mkokenem awer kuker si, insa simai,
mboi mkokara si ḇembroḇ awer, ḇape mkosonek si imnis naek mkoḇesirya.
Manseren ḇeḇeknam aski-fakamaman, ani ḇyuk aski-fakamaman ḇyedi ro roi ḇeḇor kam, faro mko kada. Manseren ryowus mko kam kada.
Aroo ro aya, Paulus. Aroo ine mankundaya yafas ḇardi. Ine aḇyair ro syap ḇeḇor ayena.
Ma saswar fnoḇek fakamaman ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, ryowus mko kam kada! Ro nko, Paulus, Silas ma Timotius
Ro Paulus, manwawan Yesus Kristus ḇeso Allah sasoser ḇyedi, ḇeḇe Manfaspar ḇeko, snar kakyar koḇedi,
faro Timotius, romawa karyer ayedi snar wakyar faro Kristus: saswar-fakamaman, ma aski-ḇaḇenaḇye ro Allah Kmaya ma Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi, ryous aw kada!
Rofyor yaḇe yambran pdef mararan ayedi ḇesupya mnuk Makedonia, yanun aw insa kwain ro Efesus ma buk farkarkor faro snonkaku ono ḇardi, insa ssḇuk farkarkor eḇese awer
roḇaido ssombirek kuker farfyar kakais ma ḇaḇeḇarpur ḇemnaiḇa, ḇeḇawes rakrakrok monda, mboi sisoḇa kankenem awnos ma ḇaḇeaski Allah ḇyukya snar kakyarya.
Knam ro ananun ani isoine saswar ḇeyek ro sne ḇesren, ro sneuser ḇesren kaku ma ro kakyar ḇenapes kakuya.
Ḇape snonkaku ono sisya srarpon ro knam aniḇa mboi sikmom ro wawos ḇeḇefromo monda.
Simarisen sḇeguru fasḇuk farkarkor ro sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇape sifawi mankunsi wos sikofen naba ma knam siḇe ssḇuki fyarkarkor naba.
Kofawi mboi sasoser Refo Yahudi ani iḇye rofyor koḇeuser i,

isoine kuker fawawi mboi sasoser Refo Yahudi ani faro snonkaku ḇenapesya ḇa, mboi faro snonkaku ḇefrur arubiru ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, faro manankarkar ma snonkaku ḇesasar, faro snonkaku ḇefrur marisen supswan ma ḇena agama ḇasya, faro ḇemun sna ma kma sesi, faro ḇemamun ḇesyakwarsya,
faro snonkaku ḇefrur farḇuk ma snon ḇefarḇuk kuker snon, faro ḇefor snonkaku faḇeḇoḇ, faro manankarkar, faro mananfafores ma roi ḇemnisḇa nabor kaker ḇesampum farkarkor ḇenapesya
ḇeḇeknam ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah ḇeba ma ḇesma sanandik, imnis sikyar kwar faro aya.
Yakofen kasumasa faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇani, ḇeḇuk sambraḇ ḇeaya ma snar kyara aya ḇeḇeuser ma ikyar afuffarmyan ine maḇeaya --
Ḇeponya yonef ma yaḇewayam kuker yakoryae ma yamsor Yesus Kristus, ḇape Allah iswar aya, snar yafrur nakam kuker fawawiḇa snar rofyor ani yakyar ḇaim.
Ḇape saswar-fakamaman ro Manseren koḇani ḇyuk kwar maro aya kakyar ma saswar snar Yesus Kristus.
Wos nane nkaku inja konakasiperna: "Yesus Kristus ryafes ḇesupswan ine insa ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇesasarsya," ma rofandu si ayaiso ḇesasar syadiya.

Ḇape rariryano Allah iswar aya, insa aya ḇardi imnis snon ḇesasar syadi, Yesus Kristus fyasna kaḇaḇaḇ ḇyena kam maro aya. Snar rarirya yaḇefasasna faro snonkaku ḇekyar papur faro isya insa sisma kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
Syowi ma sanandik faro Allah isof fyoro-fyoro, Wairek ro awar nakam, snar i ḇekain fyoro, ḇyeoser ma komami ḇa! Amin.
Timotius romawa yedi, yaḇuk fararur ine faro aw, imnis rosai ḇeḇardi kwar faḇekur aw, insa ḇardadi ani ḇyuk samambraḇ faro aw fawafararur kuker fararur ḇeḇye kuker kakyar ma sneuser ḇekaku.
Snonkaku ono sisampum sneuser ḇesren ani eḇedari kakyar sena ndo,
rofandu si Himeneus ma Aleksander, yaḇuk kwar faro Ibiris, insa sumnai ro anonef suḇena.
Ananun yaḇuk ḇepon kaku: Insa mkoḇenadi, mkofararyor fafnoḇek ma mkokofen kasumasa faro Allah snar snonkakusya kam,
ma faro waireksya ma faro ḇebararasya kam, insa kokenem kuker kananon ma aski, ro kakyar ma ḇaḇesyowi faro Allah.
Naiso ḇeḇyena ma ḇefrur marisen faro Allah, Manfaspar koḇedi,
ḇemarisen insa snonkakusya kam sisma koreri ma sifawi ro ḇaḇenapnapesya.
Snar Allah ḇyeoser ma i ḇeḇemanfandu rofandu Allah ma snonkaku, ḇyeoser kako, isoine snonkaku Yesus Kristus,
Yesus Kristus ḇyuk mankundi kwar imnis sasuref warek sasar ro snonkakusya kam: iso ḇeḇesaksi rofafisu ḇemnis kwar.
Faro ḇaḇesaksi ani yaḇe ḇekinfir kwar imnis manbaryas ma manwawan -- roi yakofen nane kam, yasrer ḇa -- ma yamnis ḇeḇuk farkarkor faro ḇeḇe-Yahudibasya, ro kakyar ma ḇaḇenapnapesya.
Eḇedari yamarisen, insa ro moḇna kam snonsya sḇenadi kuker sne ḇesren, kuker masasor ma sasurem ḇa.
Rarirya kako binsya. Bin ansi sḇemaris faḇaḇye si mboi kuker syowi, ma snonburyam sena nbekapyai -- kapyai awer, semaris awer si kuker karamas brawen roḇa mustika roḇa kako sansun ḇekakur,
ḇape ḇyemaris i kuker fararur ḇeḇye, imnis bin ḇesyus faro ḇaḇeariya.
Iḇyesyadi binsya sḇefasis ro ḇinkunsi ma sisma farkarkor kaku ḇeri ma srun ḇinkunsi.
Yaḇuk kaku ro binsya ḇa fasakḇuk farkarkor oroḇa kako yaḇuk kaku ḇa fasawawos syadi snonsya; iḇye sefasis ro ḇinkunsi.
Snar Adam i sifrur ḇeponya, raimnai insape Hawa.
Ma Adam i ḇesma fafrowesya ḇa mboi bin ani iso ḇesma fafrowes ma ḇesapi ro sasar.
Rariryano, bin ani nari isma koreri snar aḇaḇen romawa, rofyor ḇyeuser kuker kakyar ma saswar ma ḇaḇesaranden ma ikenem faro Allah.
Kaku ḇeri ro wos ine: "Snonkaku ḇemarisen nasan manfarkin ro jemaat imarisen snar fararur ine iḇye kaku."
Eḇedari manfarkin ro jemaat iḇye snonkaku ḇefarorewḇa, snon ḇefakawin kuker bin oser, imkuser mankundi, ifawi nanem, ikenem kuker aunos, imarisen nya dakam, ifawi ḇyuk farkarkor,
fyarandinem ḇa, ḇemasasor ḇa mboi ḇefafir, ḇewos sneprei, ḇermomen pipi ḇa,
ifawi fyaduru kina ḇyesi kuker ḇaḇye, ma ḇyuk farkarkor faro romawa ḇyesi fasikenem kuker aunos ma sesyowi mankundi.
Snar rofyor snon oso ifawi fyaduru kina mankundi ḇyesi ḇa, rariso nari fyaduru Allah jemaat ḇyena?
Manfarkin ani snonkaku ḇeḇe-Kristen babo awer, insa imarares awer i, imbude isma fras imnis Ibiris ro ḇeponiwara.
Snonkaku ḇesma snonsnon ḇeḇye rofandu kawasa, insa sonef awer i ma isapi awer ro Ibirisya denem ḇyedi.
Rarirya kako (syamas) ḇefnoḇek ro jemaat iḇye snonkaku ḇesma syowi, mboi snonkaku ḇeḇeramar kasipḇa, snonkaku ḇefarandinem ḇa, snonkaku ḇermomen pipi ḇa,
mboi snonkaku ḇekram kankunes kakyar ro sneuser ḇesren.
Iḇye seḇemnasen ḇepon resari, rawo sfarorewḇa, insape sifnoḇek ro jemaat.
Rarirya kako swa sesi bin ḇeḇesyowi, bin ḇeyawos anonef ḇa, iḇye fyarmkuser ḇinkundi ma ḇyeḇekyar ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
Syamas (ḇefnoḇek ro jemaat) fyakawin bin oser ma fyaduru romawa ḇyesi ma kina ḇyena kuker ḇaḇye.
Snar snonkaku ḇeyuffarmyan ro jemaat nari isma syowi ma nari imku ro ḇaḇesaksi kakyar sena faro Yesus Kristus.
Yakyar nari yarakaki aw fasaw, rariryano yafas roi ḇeḇor nane faro aw.
Inja, rofyor yasaryar ido, wafawi kwar rariso snonkaku sikenem imnis Allah kina ḇyesi, isoine jemaat ro Allah ḇekenem, adir kakyar ma knam napnapes.

Ma kaku ḇeri kankunes ḇaḇeari koḇedi iba kaku: "Fyasna mankundi kwar ro ḇaḇesnonkakuya, Rurya fyasna irya kaku; ḇefasna mankundi faro malaikatsya. Ḇyeḇeḇaryas rofandu er-er ḇemamḇaḇir Allah ḇasya; ḇyeḇekyar ro supswan ḇesiper, ma ḇyeḇekanow ḇeboiyaswa."
Ḇape Rurya ikofenbos mboi rofafisu ḇarpurya, nari snonkaku ono nari sfamyunepen Allah raimnai siso rodur ḇeḇeninyan ma farkarkor ro Ibiris
ma kuker farawrowes ro ḇesararersya snar sneuser sena npanpan.

Sikada sidwarek snonkaku sfakawin awer, sidwarek snonkaku san awer Allah roḇean ifrurna, insa roḇean anna nbeḇeyan kuker kafkofen kasumasa faro Allah, ro snonkaku ḇekyar faro Kristus ma ḇemamḇaḇir kwar Allah ḇaḇenapnapes ḇyedi.
Snar Allah roi ifrur anna kam naḇye ma osoḇaḇeri faḇyeḇean farfor, rofyor neḇean kuker nadi kafkofen kasumasa faro Allah,
snar nakam neḇefasren kuker nadi ma Allah wos ḇyedi.

Ma buk swarepen ḇesyakwar ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam faro naek srar koḇansi, nari wamnis snonkaku ḇeḇye oso ḇeyuffarmyan Yesus Kristus, farkor mankundaw ro knam kakyar koḇedi ma farkarkor ḇekaku waso fyoro kwar ani.
Waso awer kakyar famfnom ma farfyar kakais ḇeḇefainda ḇa.
Fari faro baken ḇyefandun mankenem ba, ḇape ḇaḇeari ani ḇyefandun ro roi ḇeḇor kam, snar naisya kuker asas, iḇye faro kankenem ine ma faro kankenem nari ḇeramaya kako.
Kaku ḇeri wos ine ma kona kakui.
Eḇedari kofaḇri isof kardomes, snar kona kakyar faro Allah ḇekenem, Ḇeḇuk koreri faro snonkaku kam, isyadi faro ḇekyarsya.
Baryas ma buk farkarkor ro roi anna kam.
Snar besnonkbor kaker, imbude snonkaku ono skara ma srun awri. Mankundaw fasna faro kawasa ḇekyarsya, ro wawos bena, ro rari bena, ro saswar bena, ro ḇaḇesyowi bena ma ro saranden bena.
Rofafisu ine, isof nari yarafa, wawasya kaku ḇeri Refo faro si wadif si ma buk farkarkor faro si.
Waswarepen naḇye insa wafrur raris fakamaman wasma kwar ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, rofyor manfarkin jemaatsya sisawar dofen aw ma nabisya ssḇuk kwar faro mankundaw ro ananun Allah.
Waswarepen roi nane kam, wafrurna insa marandan bedi isnai faro kawasa kam.
Wepen mankundaw ma wepen farkarkor bena. Beasuser roi ḇeḇor kam, snar wafrur rarirya ido nari mankundaw ma kawasa ḇerowersya mkosma aski kam.
Wamsor awer mansarsya, mboi wasonek si imnis kma oso faro aw. Wasonek snonkborsya imnis naek besi,
ḇinsarsya imnis sna faro aw ma dojarusya imnis srar besi kuker saranden.
Besyowi faro ḇeḇekabom kakusya.
Ḇape rofyor kabom oso nya romawa roḇa kpu ono, iḇye simor faro kina mankunsi sena ma smunsu syowi kma ma kpu sesi, snar naiso ḇefrur marisen faro Allah.
Mboi kabom oso ḇeḇekabom kaku, ḇeyerer ro ḇinkundi, ḇerir kakyar ḇyedi faro Allah ma fyarmku ro nadi ma fararyor ro roḇ ma meser.
Ḇape kabom oso ḇekenem kuker maris ikada imar kwar rofyor isya ikenem kaker.
Buk swarepen roi ḇeradine kako faro kabom ansi insa sikenem kuker farorew ḇa.
Ḇape rofyor snon oso fyaduru kawasa ro keret ḇyedi ḇa, isyadi wer kina mankundi ḇyesi, snon ani iḇyeḇa syadi ro snonkaku ḇekyar ḇasya.
Sfasepen ḇe ḇekabomsya, isoine ḇeḇewampasi wambarek samfur riwonem kwar, ma sfakawin ḇeoser monda

ma sfasna ḇair sifrur fararur ḇeḇye, imnis sfaduru romawa, ssḇuk sim ḇeḇeryar faro dakam, suffarmyan snonkaku ḇena kakyar oser, ma sifnoḇek snonkaku ḇeyananjarsya --rarirya sifrur kaku ḇeri fararur ḇeḇyena.
Mkofasepen awer kabom ḇeḇebinkufsya. Snar rofyor nafsu sedi faro sfakawin wer, nafsu ani fyaspar sibur Kristus.
Inja sikada sor samamyai faro ḇinkunsi, snar sḇerer asas ssḇuk faro Kristus.
Osower syun-swaye ro ono ḇese rum sena, indo simyaren ḇa ma simyaren ḇaya derer mondaḇaḇoi sḇeḇindaw ma spambarḇar snonkaku ḇese wawos sena ma sikofen roi ḇenapes ḇa.
Eḇedari yamarisen fakabom ḇeḇebinkufsya sfakawin wer, insa sna romawa, ma sfaduru kina sena ma ssḇuk moḇ fambroḇ koḇesi sifrur fanor kosnosna awer.
Snar kabom ono sibor siso Ibiris kwar.
Rofyor snon roḇa bin ḇekyar ono kina sena kabom ono sisya, iḇye ifnoḇek si mboi sekamnam faro jemaat awer. Rarirya jemaat ifnoḇek monda kabom ḇena kina ḇasya.
Penetuasya manfarkin ḇefararur mnis ro jemaat, indo sisma syowi rarwan risuru, isyadi faro ḇeḇesewar kuker ardomes faḇefaya ma ḇeḇuk farkarkorsya.
Snar sfas ro Refo radine: "Swower sapiya sḇadon ḇyedi kuker pisan awer rofyor imas fasibu famorsya siḇesebur smarya," ma "Snon ḇefararur oso nari isma sasuref ḇyedi."
Safsof ro penetua oso wamnafi rofyor snon risuru roḇa kior sḇesaksi.
Snonkaku ḇefrur sasarsya sḇeḇesonek ro fababa ro ḇarpon jemaat insa eḇesesya simkak.
Ro ḇarpon Allah, Yesus Kristus ma malaikat skinfirsya yanun kaku ḇeri faro aw: insa waswarepen ananun ine kuker warkaki ḇa ma wafrur roi ḇeḇor kam mboi wafnoḇek awer ono.
Wasawsaw awer wasawardofen snonkaku oso ma wasaso awer sasar ro snonkaku ḇese. Swasor saranden mankundaw bedi.
Winem monda war awer, mboi winem anggur kenmkun ono kako imnis aryawin faro snewar, snar indo wadafdufrya.
Snonkaku ono sasar sena indo nfababa, rofyor sun na ḇeḇaḇemankara ḇaimya, ḇape ono sasar sena insape nasnai ro ḇarpurya.
Rarirya kako fararur ḇeḇyena indo nasnai fasaw ma rofyor rarirya ḇaido, nari nayokef ḇa.
Kawasa Kristen ḇeḇewomensya skara tuan sesi sisyus fasisma syowi ḇeḇor kam, insa Allah snonsnon ḇyedi ma farkarkor koḇena nḇeḇeyonef awer.

(2a) Rofyor tuan sesi snonkaku ḇeḇe-Kristen sirya, imbude soḇo semanbekanaek ro Kristus inja suffarmyan mnis siḇari, snar tuan ḇesma ḇok ro afuffarmyan ḇeḇye syadi wer, ikada naek ḇekyar ma koswar kaku. (2b) Buk farkarkor ma wanun roi nane kam.
Rofyor oso ḇyuk farkarkor eḇese ḇemnis ḇa kuker farkarkor ḇenapes ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus -- ma iso farkarkor ḇemnis kuker ḇaḇeari koḇena ḇa,
snonkaku ani imarares ḇo doḇo ifawi ḇape ifawi royoḇaḇeri. Dafduf ḇyedi isoine imarisen fyamfaḇri kuker wawos, ḇefrur masasor, anunḇesisye, anonef, warkaki ḇeḇyeḇa,
ma anunḇesisye rofandu kawasa ḇekara mnisḇa ma ḇaḇenapnapes ḇa, skara ḇaḇeari ani sun oso ḇeḇuk ḇaḇefainda.
Kakuḇaḇoi ḇaḇeari ani rofyor kofrur mnis i, ḇyuk fainda ḇeba.
Snar kun roi oso ḇesupswan ineḇa rarirya kako nari kun roi oso ḇokosasyarbur supswan ineḇa.
Rofyor roḇean ma sansun naisya, namnis kwar.
Ḇape mansei ḇemarisen ḇenana nari isapi ro fafrowes, ro denem ma ro nafsu ḇeḇor ḇeḇebei ma ḇeyun raro. Nafsu anna nafrur fasnonkakusya sfarmambriwer ma sro.
Snar ḇarḇor ḇeḇor nakam nerares ro mkaba pipiya. Snar sasewar pipi eḇedari snonkaku ono ssunkirbur kakyar sena ma sewayam mankunsi kuker ḇarop nabor.
Ḇape, aw, ne, Allah snonkaku ḇyedi, nari rwoḇandibur roi ḇeḇor nane kam, mboi swewar ḇaḇenapnapesya, ḇaḇeariya, ḇaḇefarmkuya, saswarya, ḇaḇekaḇabaḇya ma ḇaḇefafafirya.
Faḇri kada ro famfaḇri kakyar ḇenapesya insa nwa kankenem ḇekain fyoroya. Iso eḇedari beḇeyor kwar ma kwarem kwar kankarem ḇenapes ro ḇarpon saksi ḇeḇor.
Ma ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇeḇuk kankenem faro roi ḇeḇor kam ma ro Yesus Kristus ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇekarem kankarem ḇenapes ani kako ro Pontius Pilatus ḇarpon ḇyedi yaḇaryas faro mko:
Mkoḇeuser sasoser nanekam, ma mkoḇeuk awerna, isof rofafisu Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ifyaferya,
isoine fafisu Allah nari fyasnaya ma fafisu ani ifo kuker aski, Wairek robo waireksya kam ma Tuan robo tuansya kam.
Demir monda kyunem faro marmari ḇa, ḇekain ro isnai nari kofanam ba. Snonkaku osero ḇaim famyam i ma kaku ḇeri snonkakuyo nari myam i ḇa. Faroi syowi ma papoik isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
Buk swarepen faro ḇenanasya ro supswan ine insa simarares awer si ma sikyar awer roi nari ḇero imnis nana, mboi sikyar faro Allah ro nana ḇyena ḇyukma ḇeko ro roi ḇeḇor fakona na.
Buk swarepen faro si insa sifrur roi ḇeḇye, snana ro ḇaḇenapnapesya, simarisen ssḇuk ma sirarwas
ma rarirya sfanjur arasa ono imnis knam ḇeḇye faro mankunsi rofafisu nari ḇeramaya insa sisma kankenem ḇekakuya.
Ne, Timotius, faduru rosai yakofen kwar faro aw. Binkwanbur wawos ḇeḇebei ma ḇemamas ma ḇesren ḇa ma famfaḇri ḇaḇeknam ro rosai sap ḇefawawi,
snar snonkaku ono sisya ssḇuk farkarkor rona ma rarirya ssayebur kakyarya. Saswar-fakamaman ndous mko kam kada! Ro aya, Paulus
Ro Paulus, manwawan Yesus Kristus snar Allah marisen ḇyedi yaḇaryas asas ro kankenem kuker Yesus Kristus,
faro Timotius, romawa karyer ayedi: saswar-fakamaman, ḇaḇye ma aski ro Allah Kmaya ma Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi, ryous aw kada.
Yakofen kasumasa faro Allah, yuffarmyan kuker sneuser ḇesren imnis raris up ayesi sifrur kwar. Ma yaswarepen aw ḇesyakwar ro fararyor yena, ro roḇ ma meser.
Ma rofyor yaswarepen mkaru ḇena, yamarisen fayasrow aw wer kuker marisen.
Snar yaswarepen kakyar ḇesrendam bedi, isoine kakyar ḇekenem randak ro kpumi Lois ma ro snami Eunike ma yakyar naisya ro mankundaw kako.
Eḇedari yaḇuk swarepen faro aw rofyor yasawardofen aw fabaryas fakamaman Allah ḇero awya.
Snar Allah ḇyuk rur ḇemakakak maro koḇa, mboi rur ḇeḇawes samambraḇ, saswar ma ḇaḇeawnos.
Inja wamsik ma besaksi Manseren koḇedi ma wamsik kako snar aya, snon ḇesmai ro bui snar Yesus Kristus, mboi wakḇe kandera faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi kuker Allah samambraḇ ḇyedi.

Allah iso ḇeḇuk koreri ḇeko ma ḇeyor ko kuker fararyor ḇesren, ḇeḇeknam ro fararur koḇena ḇa, mboi ḇyeknam ro kakara ma saswar-fakamaman mankundi ḇyena, ḇeḇuk ḇeko kwar ro Yesus Kristus ro awarmadero ḇaimya.
Ma baboine ḇyeḇefasna snar rarama Yesus Kristus ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko, ro papoik marmari kwar ma ḇeyun kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
Snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine yaḇe ḇefasna imnis manbaryas, imnis manwawan ma imnis guru.
Eḇedari yasma kandera kukerna kam, ḇape yamai ḇa; snar yafawi manseiso yakyarya ma yakyar nari ipok fyaduru rosai ikyar kwar maḇeaya isof ro Ras Ḇepupesya.
Waserepen roi ḇeḇor wamnaf kwar ro aya imnis fasasna faro farkarkor ḇeḇye ma wafrurna kuker kakyar ma saswar snar Yesus Kristus.
Faduru arasai ḇeḇye, sikyar kwarma ḇeko, ro Rur Ḇesren ḇekain ro kosnesna.
Wafawi kwar mboi sikam ro supya mnuk Asia-Kasun si susubur aya; rarirya kako Figerus ma Hermogenes.
Manseren ḇyuk ḇaḇye ḇyedi faro Onesiforus kina ḇyesi snar rarwan riḇeso kwar ifrur sneprei aya. Imai ḇa ryakaki aya ro bui.
Fafisu aya isya ro Roma, syewar aya ma isrow aya kako kwar.
Ma ro Efesus ifnoḇek aya nabor kwar. Roi ḇeradinena wafawi kwar. Manseren fyasna ḇaḇye ḇyedi faro i ro Ras Ḇepupesya kada.
Inja, ne, romawa yedi, swambraḇ ro saswar-fakamaman ro Yesus Kristus.
Rosai wamnaf ro aya kwar ro saksi ḇeḇor, farkorna kada faro snonkaku wakyarsya, ma sifawinanem kako sakfarkor snonkaku ḇese.
Mkoso ma mkakḇekandera imnis sordade ḇeḇye ro Yesus Kristus.
Rofyor sordade oso ḇyesewar ro fararur ma ḇyefandun ḇaḇefandun mankundi ḇyena ḇa, rarirya mananir ro sarar ḇyedi imarisen.
Snonkaku oso ḇefaḇri ro farfnak syewar monda faisma wower rofyor isomnis sasoser ḇekur farfnak ani.
Manfrudo oso ḇefararur myaren ro yaf iso nari ḇeyan ḇepon pun ro ardomes ḇyena.
Waswarepen rosai yakofen nane; Manseren nari ḇyuk fawawi faro aw ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
Waswarepen: Yesus Kristus ḇekḇok kwar rofandu ḇemarsya, ḇyeḇeyaḇen kwar imnis up ro Daud, iso yaḇaryas ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ayedi.
Snar ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine eḇedari yaḇekandera, ma sewanka aya imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor oso, ḇape Allah wos ḇyedi kada ḇyeḇeḇewanka ḇa.
Eḇedari yakbaḇ ḇo yaḇarna kam faro snonkaku Allah kyinfirsya, insa si kako saksma koreri snar Yesus Kristus kuker ḇaḇebaba ḇyedi ḇekain fyoroya.
Kaku ḇeri ro wos ine: "Rofyor komar fnoḇek i, ko kako nari kokenem fnoḇek i;
Rofyor kofarmku, ko kako nari kakḇuk sasoser fnoḇek i. Rofyor ko famyun i, i kako nari dakfamyun ko.
Rofyor komkuser ko ḇa, i kada imku faswef, snar nari fyamyunepen mankundi ḇa."
Buk swarepen ma wanun nakam kuker kaku ḇeri faro si ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, insa spambarḇar wos awer, snar roi ḇeradine nefainda ḇaḇeri, isyadi naser famfaḇri faro ḇemnafsya.
Besewar insa wasyus ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi imnis snon oso ḇemai ḇa, mboi baryasbos wos ḇenapes ani.
Ḇape wamnaf awer faro wos ḇekaku ḇa ma ḇemamasna.
Wawos sena naduḇ imnis dafduf kanker: Rofandu si Himeneus ma Filetus su kako,
ḇeḇor kwar ro nyan ḇenapesya ma ḇefarkor mboi kuker ḇaḇeaḇiḇer ro bakenya isyof kwar ma rarirya skokok kakyar ro snonkaku ono.
Ḇape araref Allah ryirya idworen ma sfas ro araref ani radine: "Manseren ifawi snonkaku ḇyesi" ma "Snonkaku oser-oser ḇeyap Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi isusubur ḇarḇorna kada."
Ro rum ḇebaya dori kosma dera brawen ma sarak monda ḇa, mboi ono kako ro ai ma saprop; kona ono faro roi ḇeḇye syadi ma kona ono faro roi ḇeḇye mankenem ḇa.
Rofyor snon oso fyasren mankundi ro roi ḇeḇarḇor, nari ḇyedera ro rum ani faro roi ḇeḇye syadi, ḇyeḇefasren, ma ḇyefainda faro tuan ḇyedi ma ḇyeḇefasos faro fararur rosai ḇeḇye syadiya.
Fanam awer marasrisen ḇeḇerarmomen baken ro snonkborsya, mboi swewar ḇaḇenapnapesya, ḇaḇefarmkuya, saswar ma aski fnoḇek snonkaku ḇefararyor faro Manseren kuker sne ḇesrensya.
Fanam awer wawos ḇeḇor ro snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇasya. Snar wafawi roi ḇerarirya nbawes rakrakrok,
snar Manseren manfamyan ḇyesi nari srakrakrok ḇa, mboi sfafir faro snonkakusya kam. Ifawi ḇyuk farkarkor, ikbaḇ
ma kuker aḇaḇen fyarkin snonkaku ḇesampampumsya, snar kofawi ḇa imbude Manseren ḇyuk farosi fafisu ono fasimbror ma fyarkin si isof smamḇaḇir ḇaḇenapnapesya,
ma rarirya nari sḇaḇir wer, nari sḇeḇeperbur Ibirisya denem ḇyedi ḇeyaḇek si kwar kuker marisen ḇyena.
Mkofawi mboi ro ras ḇepupesna nari ndama kuker kandera nabor.
Snonkakusya nari siswar mankunsi ḇardi ma sewomen faro pipi. Nari sḇemandaw ma simarares mankunsi, sanonef, nari sisampum sinansya ma sifawi sikofen kasumasa ḇa, sfandun ḇar rurya ḇa,
sifawi saswar ḇa, simewer ḇaḇeaskiya, simarisen skoryae snonkaku, sfarmkuepen mankunsi ḇa, siḇarḇor, simewer roi ḇeḇyena,
simarisen sḇoḇ min sesi, skara nakwan ba ma simarares si, siso syadi rmomen-nafsu sena ro siso Allah.
Sifrur ḇaḇeari sena imnis kakara snonkaku, ḇape simewer knam ro agama ani ḇardi. Inja mkofanam awer si!
Snar rofandu si ono sisya ssun fasis ḇerum snonkaku ono bese ma sidenem bin ono ḇefo kuker sasar ma ḇefo kuker rmomen bakenya,
ma simarisen sḇeḇefarkor, ḇape smambir ḇaḇenapnapesya ḇa.
Simnisbos kaku Yanes ma Yambres ḇesampum Muses, rarirya si kako sisampum ḇaḇenapnapesya. Swaruser sena ndobur si ma kakyar sena nasusu.
Inja nari sirwuren ḇa, snar simnis raris Yanes ma Yambres, ḇaḇefawawi royoḇa sena nari nfababa faro snonkakusya kam.
Ḇape waser farkarkor yena kwar, rariso kankenem ayedi, marisen ayedi, kakyar ayedi, kaḇaḇaḇ ayedi, saswar ayedi, ma ḇaḇenamu ayedi.
Waso kwar ḇaḇekandera ḇaḇewayam ma kandera imnis yaḇekandera ro Antiokia ma ro Ikonium ma ro Listera kwar. Kandera anna kam yaḇarna ma Manseren fyaspar ayaburna kam.
Mboi snonkaku oser-oser ḇemarisen ḇekenem ro ḇaḇeari snar Yesus Kristus nari sisma ḇaḇewayam,
mboi ḇeḇarḇorsya ma ḇesararersya sikada nari sḇarḇor syadi, sfarkor ninyan ma sḇeḇeyakḇeninyan kako.
Ḇape wuf faswef ro ḇaḇenapnapes wasma kwar ma wakyar ani, ma waswarepen ḇesyakwar snonkaku ḇefarkorna kwar faro aw.
Waswarepen kako mboi rofyor wabaḇaya mambir kwar Refo ḇeḇuk fawawinanem faro aw ma ḇefarkin aw faro koreri snar kakyar faro Yesus Kristus.
Fasfas ḇeḇor ḇeramuma ro Allah nbefainda kaku fakoḇuki fyarkor, koḇuki ikofen fasna ḇaḇesasarya, koḇuki ifrur mnis rari ma koḇuki fyarkor snonkaku ro ḇaḇenapnapesya.
Rarirya Allah snonkaku ḇyesi oser-oser sḇeḇefasos faro fararur ḇeḇyeya.
Ro ḇarpon Allah ma Yesus Kristus nari bemankara snonkaku ḇekenem ma ḇemarsya, inja yanunkaku ḇeri faro aw kuker fasasna ro Allah ma Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi:
Baryas Allah wos ḇyedi, fasos rofafisu ḇeḇye roḇa fafisu ḇesamswen, fasna rosai ḇesasar, wasonek ma buk ananun kuker kaḇaḇaḇ ma farkarkor.
Snar rofafisuya nari ryama, snonkakusya nari sisma farkarkor ḇenapes werḇa, mboi nari siryur gurusya raris marisen sena fasḇuk farkarkor raris mankunsi marisen sena.
Sikada nari snos knaram senabur napnapesya ma sḇasna faro farfyar kakais monda.
Ḇape wepen mankundaw ro roi ḇeḇor kam, wakḇaḇ ro ḇaḇekandera, wafrur fararur ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, ma wafrur posa afuffarmyan bedi!
Faro mankundaya, fafisuya ryama kwar nari yamar imnis farsarser faro Allah ma kniko wer nari yabur supswan ine.
Fanandi ḇeḇyeya yafrur posai kwar, ma yasma mun ḇepupesya kwar ma rarirya yafaduru kakyarya kwar.
Ras suine wower napnapesya ḇyeḇefasosma ḇeaya kwar nari Manseren ḇyukima ḇeaya, Mankara ḇenapes, ro ras ḇepupes ḇyedi; ḇape faro yerer monda ḇa, mboi faro snonkaku kam ḇewaf raramuma ḇyedi.
Besewar insa rwamuma fasaw,
snar Demas iswar supswan ine inja ibur aya. Ryai Tesalonika kwar. Kreskes ryai Galatia kwar ma Titus ryaḇe Dalmatia.
Mboi Lukas derer i ḇekainus aya. Wun Markusi ḇo muramuma, snar afuffarmyan ḇyedi ḇyefandun kakuma ḇeaya.
Tikhikus yawan i kwar ḇe-Efesus.
Rofyor rwamuma ido wun syatu ayedi ro Troas yaburi ro Karpus rum ḇyedi ma wun kako syap ayena, isyadi kaku perkamenya (aiwan kif imnis syap ḇefasapepen).
Aleksander, kamasan kansai ani, ifrur ḇarḇor nabor kwar maro aya. Manseren nari myunsuna imnis fararur ḇyena.
Inja wepen aw, snar Aleksander isampumbosḇeri farkarkor koḇena.
Rofyor yaḇesano ro randakya snonkaku oso ifnoḇek aya ḇaḇeri, sikam sibur aya -- roi ḇeradine sikamar awerna, --
ḇape Manseren ifnoḇek aya ma ḇyuk samambraḇma ḇeaya, insa Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya yaḇaryasi faḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya sakmnaf i. Rarirya yasma faspar ro marmarya.
Ma Manseren nari fyaspar ayabur ḇarḇorna kam. I kada nari ḇyuk aksi ḇeaya isof yasun ro Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ro boiyaswa. Sanandik faro ḇaḇebaba ḇyedi fyoro-fyoro kada! Amin.
Aroo faro Priskila ma Akwila ma faro Onesiforus kina ḇyesi.
Erastus kyain ro Korintus ma Trofinus yabur i ro Miletus snar iduf. Rofafisu primya ḇaim besewar farwamuma kada.
Aroo faro aw ro Ebulus, Pudes, Linus, Klaudia ma ro naek srarsya kam.
Manseren ryous aw. Manseren ḇyeḇok naek srar mko kam kada! Ro aya, Paulus
Ro Paulus, Allah manfamyan ḇyedi ma Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyedi faḇefaduru Allah snonkaku kyinfir kwarsya kakyar sena ma fawawi ro napnapesya ḇeḇair ro ḇaḇeari koḇena,
ma ḇyeknam ro saneraro ḇekaku ḇekain fyoro rofyor awarya ḇaim Allah ḇyeasas i kwar ma Allah ipok isrer ḇa,
ma rofyor Allah imarisen, fyasna kwar ro wos ḇyedi ro ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ikyar kwar maro aya imnis Allah sasoser ḇyedi, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
Faro Titus, romawa karyer yedi ro kakyar koḇena kam: Allah Kmaya ma Yesus Kristus, saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇye ḇyedi ryous aw kada.
Yaḇur aw kwar ro Kreta kuker swaruser ine, insa wafrur rosai ḇeḇefandun ma insa wakanaw penetua-penetua ro mnuna imnis raris moḇ yanun kwar faro aw,
isoine snonkaku ḇefarorewḇa, ḇena swa oser monda, kina ḇyena sikenem kuker kakyar faro Kristus ma sisma safsof awer ro kankenem ḇeḇyeḇa mboi sikenem kuker aunos.
Snar ḇefararur ro Allah rum ḇyedi snonkaku ḇefarorewḇa, ḇemarares ḇa, ḇemasasor ḇa, ḇemasaser ḇa, mkaba pipiḇa,
mboi ḇemarisen ḇeḇuk moḇ ḇeḇeryar, ḇemarisen roi ḇeḇye, ḇefawi nanem, ḇenapes, ḇekenem nasren, ḇemkuser mankundi
ma ḇeserepen wos ḇenapes ḇemnis kuker farkarkor ḇeḇye, insa ifawi ḇyuk farkarkor faro snonkaku ro knam farkarkor anna ma ḇyenamu faḇyuk snekin faro ḇesampumisya.
Snar snonkaku sibor kwar sikenem kuker aunos ḇa, isyadi rofandu snonkaku ḇeso sasoser sofakfukya. Kuker wos ḇeḇefromo ma sfarkor ninyan snonkaku.
Snonkaku ḇerariryasya sḇadon sena neḇesisen kada, snar sfarkor ninyan kina sibor kuker farkarkor ḇemnis ḇa fasisma fainda ḇefrur mamyai.
Nabi oso ro siḇardi, ḇekain ro Kreta ikofen kako: "Kretasya indo sankarkar, sḇeaiwan ḇeḇarḇor, ḇeyanburamek ma ḇemanon."
Nabi ani wos ḇyedi kyaku. Inja wasonek pakrek kaku si insa sikyar faro Allah kuker nyan ḇenapes,
ma sikyar kaker awer farfyar kakais Yahudi ma sasoser-sasoser snonkaku ḇesasyarbur ḇaḇenapnapesya.
Faro ḇesrensya roi ḇeḇor nakam nasren; ḇape faro ḇearwaremsya ma ḇekyar ḇasya osoḇaḇeri faisren, snar kakara ma swaruser sena nmamas.
Skarem soḇo sifawi Allah, ḇape ro fararur sena sfamyun Allah. Sikada snonkaku befrur roi ḇemnis oso ḇaḇeri.
Ḇape aw Titus, baryas farkarkor ḇenapes raris Allah farkarkor ḇyena.
Snonkaku ḇeḇesinansya simkuser si, sesyowi, sifawinanem, kakyar sena nanapes, sisaswar ma senamu.
Rarirya kako ḇinsarsya, sikenem imnis snonkaku ḇesren, skoraryae ḇa, seḇinfyan faro swan ḇa, ḇape sifawi ssḇuk farkarkor ro roi ḇeḇyena
ma rarirya sfarkor inai babosya fasiswar swasesi ma romawasesi,
sikenem kuker fawawinanem ma saranden, simyaren sfaduru kina sena, sfafir ma saser faro swasesi, insa Allah wos ḇyedi snonkakusya sonef aweri.
Rarirya kako romawa babosya; wanunsi insa simkusersi ro roi ḇeḇor kam
ma mankundaw benyan ḇefasna kankenem ḇeḇye. Inja buk farkarkor kuker aunos ma kaku ḇeri,
wawos bena nanapes ma ḇaryas bena nfarorewḇa isof ḇesampum awsya simai, snar roi ḇeḇyeḇa ono naisyaḇa fasikofen ro ko.
Manfamyansya sesyowi manseren sesi ro roi ḇeḇor kam ma sisampum awer si,
ma skaraw awer, ḇape sikenem naḇye kuker awnos, insa rarirya snonkakusya sisandik Allah farkarkor ḇeḇor ḇyena kam, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
Snar Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyena ḇeḇuk koreri faro snonkakusya kam nasnai kwar.
Allah saswar ḇyedi fyarkor ko insa kobur ḇarḇorna ma rmomen supswan ine ma insa kokenem kuker fawawinanem, nanapes ma ḇaḇeari faro Allah ro supswan ine.
Ma kowaf Ras ḇepupes sanemura ro ani, ḇefo kuker aski; ro Ras ḇepupes ani nari supswan smam Yesus Kristus baba ḇyedi, isoine Allah Ḇebasyadi ma Wairek Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
Ḇeḇuk mankundi kwar maḇeko insa ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei ḇeko ro ḇarḇor nakam ma fyasren kawasa ono faro mankundi, ḇemyaren ḇefrur roi ḇeḇye.
Baryas roi ḇeḇor anna kam, ma buk ananun ma buk snekin snonkaku kuker papoik wasmana. Ma snonkaku ono smamkyof awer aw.
Buk swarepen faro si insa siso ḇaḇesasoserya ma snonkaku ḇesma papoik, sisouser ma sfasos fasifrur fararur ḇeḇye.
Sonefyae awer si, srakrok awer, iḇye sikenem kuker fafir faro snonkakusya kam.
Snar ḇeponiwara ko kako kokenem ro fawawi royoḇa: koḇeuser ḇa, koḇor, koḇemanfyan faro nafsu ḇeḇor ma rmomen, kokonem ro ḇarḇor ma kram masasor, kayinyae ko.
Ḇape Allah, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko fyasna saswar ḇyedi kwar ma ḇaḇye ḇyedi faro ko,
rofyor ani ḇyuk korerima ḇeko, snar fararur ḇeḇye koḇena ḇa, ḇape snar ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi ro masi sren ḇeyaḇen kaḇer ko snar fararur ro Allah Rur ḇyedi,
Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyukma ḇeko ro Yesus Kristus, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko,
insa komnis snonkaku ḇenapes snar saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi, ko kako kosma kankenem ḇekain fyoro, imnis raris sanemura koḇena.
Wos ine kyaku ma yamarisen insa kuker snekin swambrabser i, insa ḇekyar kwar faro Allahsya sesewar kaku ḇeri fasifrur roi ḇeḇye ma ḇeḇefainda faro kawasa kam.
Ḇape binkwanbur famfaḇri ma ḇefawiroyoḇa, ma wawos ḇekur up, kankenem ḇemnisḇa ma rakrakrok ḇekur sasoser Refo Yahudi, snar nakam nefainda ḇa ma nefromo monda.
Snonkaku ḇeḇuk farkarkor ninyan oso wasonek i ḇerarwan oser roba suru, posa wakenem awer kuker i.
Wafawi kwar ḇerariryasya siḇarḇor ma sasar sena nbuk samamyai faro mankunsi.
Yawan Artemas roba Tikhikus faro aw, ḇesewar fawasrow aya ro Nikopolis, snar yakara namuk kwar fayakain ro dia rofafisu primya.
Wafnoḇek naḇye kaku Zenas, ḇefawinanem Refo Yahudi ani, ma Apolos, ro mararan suḇedi, insa suyananjar royo awer.
Ma snonkaku koḇesi farkor si kako insa sifrur roi ḇeḇye faro fandun sena, insa kankenem sena nefromo awer.
Naek srar ḇewarpu aya rodine nkofarem aroo faro aw. Ma wakofen aroo nkoḇena faro min koḇesi ḇekyar fnoḇek ko faro Kristus. Manseren ḇyeḇok naek srar mko kam kada. Ro aya, Paulus
Ro Paulus, snon ḇesmai snar Yesus Kristus ma ro Timotius naek koḇedi, faro Filemon yaswar kaku, bati ḇefararur kayam
ma faro Apfia, srar koḇedi ma faro Arkipus, bati ro fararur koḇedi ma faro jemaat ḇefananjur ro rum ḇyedi:
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇenaḇye ro Allah, Kma koḇedi ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryous mko kada!
Rofyor yabenadi, yap snonsnon bedi ma yakofen kasumasa faro Allah yedi.
Snar yamnaf saswar bedi faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi, ma kakyar ḇena faro Manseren Yesus.
Ma yanadi, insa ḇaḇeoser koḇedi ro kakyarya iso ḇefrur fawawi ḇeḇye rofandu ko faro Kristus.
Ro saswar bena yasma kwar marasrisen ḇeba ma samambraḇ, ma Allah kawasa ḇyesi sisma sneprei snar aw.
Snar rarirya naek ḇena kakyar oser eḇedari yaḇuk sasoser faro naek aw insa wafrur rosai nari wafrurna,
ḇape yaswarepen saswar ḇena, iḇye syadi yor faro aw. Aya, Paulus, yaḇemansar kwar, ma baboine kako yasmai ro bui snar Yesus Kristus,
inja yor ro aw snar romawa yedi Onesimus yasma kwar rofafisu aya isya ro bui
-- randakya ḇyefainda faro aw ḇa, ḇape baboine ḇyefainda kaku iḇye faro aw ma aya kako.
Yawan kaḇer i faro aw -- ikada sneuser yedi. --
Yaḇe yakarwarek kaku i rodine faisadwer aw insa duffarmyan aya rofyor yasmai ro bui snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya,
ḇape rofyor wamarisen ḇaim, nari yafrur roi oso ro marisen ayedi ḇa, insa roi ḇeḇyena wafrur awerna kuker ḇaḇedafdifer mboi wafrurna kuker marisen.
Eḇedari Onesimus byinkwanbur aw resari, insape nwa i isof fyoro-fyoro,
imnis manfyan wer ḇa, mboi isyadi ro manfyan, isoine imnis naek koswar kaku, faro aya rarirya, rosai wer faro aw, iḇye faro snonkaku ma faro Manseren kako.
Rofyor kwara aya ḇemin bedi ḇena kakyar oser, nwa Onesimus imnis nwa aya.
Ma rofyor ifrur fromo faro aw roḇawer ḇyenyaki faro aw, buknama yaḇarna kam, --
aya, Paulus, yafaduru i kuker fasfas ro mankundaya: Nari yaḇakna -- insa yakofen awer: "Aw ḇeḇarna kamya!" -- snar ḇyenyaki maro aya, isoine mankundaw ḇardi.
O, naek ayedi, befaindama ḇeaya kada snar Manseren: Buk sneprei maḇe aya snar Kristus!
Yafas mufaḇe aw, snar yakyar nari beuser wos ayena. Mboi yafawi nari wafrur syadi ro fararyor ayedine.
Rofyor ani fasos kako fabuk moḇ yaḇeryar ro, snar yakyar nadi ḇena nari yakaḇer faro aw.
Aroo faro aw ro Epafras, min ayedi ḇeyaksmai fnoḇek aya ro bui snar Yesus Kristus,
ma ro Markus, Aristarkus, Demas ma Lukas, min ḇefararur kayam kuker aya.
Saswar-fakamaman Manseren Yesus Kristus ryous rur mkoḇesi kada! Ro aya, Paulus
Ro awar ḇeponiwara Allah dawawos ḇerarwan ono mufaḇe kpu koḇesi kuker nabi ḇyesya ro nyan nabor, ḇape ro awar ḇepupes ine Allah dawawos maḇeko kwar kuker Rumkun ḇyedi ḇeḇemanfanduya.
Allah ḇyeasas kwar mboi Rumkun ḇyedi i ḇena roi ḇeḇor kam. Snar Yesus Allah ifrur kwar sansoren ḇoka.

I ḇeḇeisnai ro Allah ḇaḇe baba ḇyedi; ma fanir ro Allah mankundi. Ikada fyaduru sansoren ḇoka ine kuker papoik ro wos ḇyedi. Ma fyasren snonkakusya ro sasar sena kwar, insape kyain ro karapesa sasoser fnoḇek Allah, ḇena papoik ḇekaki syadiya ro boiyaswa.
I sma kankain ḇekaki syadi ro malaikatsya, imnis raris Allah snonsnon ḇyuk faroi kako ipyum syadi ro snonsnon malaikatsya.
Snar Allah ikofen ḇaim radine faro malaikat oso: "Awkada Rumkun ayedi! ro ras ine yaḇe Kma faro aw?" ma Allah ikofen kako faro malaikat oso ḇaim, "Nari yaḇe Kma faroi, ma nari ḇyeromawaḇe aya?"
Ma rofyor Allah iwan Rumkun rak ḇyedima ḇesupswan ine, ikofen radine: "Allah malaikat ḇyesi kam sḇansuba faro i."
Faro malaikatsya, Allah ikofen radine: "Allah ifrur malaikat ḇyesi fasewamdoḇer, ma ḇeyuffarmyan besi fasimnis for ḇesber."
Ḇape Allah ikofen faro Rumkun ḇyedi: "Karapesa nasan bedi, o Allah, nari kyain fyoro-fyoro, ma ḇaḇesasoser bedikada sasoser ḇaḇenapnapes."
"Awkada wamarisen ḇaḇenapnapesya ma wayin ḇarḇorya, rarirya Allah, Allah bedi ryem aw kwar kuker mani imnis aḇyair marasrisen, isyadi ro min besi."
Allah ikofen wer: "Ro awar ḇeponiwara, aw o Allah, wafrur kwar sup ine, ma kuker ḇramin beja wafrur nanki.
Ma nari nakam napromes, ma nari nakwar imnis mar wai, ḇape awma nari farweḇa.
Nari waper sansoren ḇoka ine imnis mar ma nari wasadwerna, ḇape auma nari fadwerḇa, ma kankenem bedi kyain fyoro-fyoro."
Ma Allah ikofen ḇaim radine faro snon oso ro malaikat ḇyesi kako: "Kwain ro ḇar raku yedi, isof yafrur mbroḇ besi faskuk wepur ro ḇarpon bedi?"
Malaikat ansi kam isoine rur ḇeyuffarmyan Allah sirya, ma iwan si fasifnoḇek snonkaku nari ḇesma koreri?
Snar rarirya kufepen nako ma kodworen ro rosai komnaf kwar, insa koki awer ro kiraya.
Snar wos malaikatsya sikofen nari ndarirya faswef, ma ḇaḇeuk ono ma ḇaḇeuserḇa nari nasma munsu,
nari kokfis rariso rofyor kokara kuker awnosḇa knam ro koreri ani, randakya Manseren ikofen kwar ma kosma na ro snonkaku ḇerower kwarsya sfar pampyam maḇeko kuker nyan kokyar na,
Allah ifrur ḇaryas sena fanadworen kaku kuker aḇyair ma aḇyair kanandor ma fasasna ḇeḇor kuker papoik ḇyena ma Rur ḇyedi ḇyerarwas na imnis mankundi marisen ḇyedi.
Snar malaikatsya sisma papoik ro Allah ḇa fasḇuk sasoser ro supswan ḇebabo nari ḇeramaya, isoine sup koḇekawawos ine.
Ro Refo mnuk oso isya sfas radine: "O, Allah, snonkakusya mansesirya, isof wamarisen waswarepen si, oroḇaido rumkun snonkaku, isof ḇefandun si?
Rofafisu ḇeknampu rwun syadi i ro malaikatsya, ma buk ḇei kankain ḇepyum ma ḇaḇesyowi,
wafrur i faisma papoik ro roi ḇeborkam." Isoine roi oso kako ryobaḇ papoik snonkaku ḇa. Ḇape baboine komam ḇaim, snonkaku sisma papoik ro roi ḇeḇor anna.

Ḇape Yesus rofafisu kermkun ḇyeḇerun faryobaḇ malaikatsya, isoine Yesus komam, snar kandera marmar, ḇyeḇesiḇer kuker wower payamyum ma syowi, insa Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyena ifawi marmari faro snonkakusya kam.
Snar imnis raris Allah rari ḇyedi -- ifrur ma fyaduru roi ḇeḇor kam, -- Allah dun snonkaku sibor faro babaya, ma ḇyeimnis Yesus, faḇyemanfarkin ḇesi faro koreri, kuker ḇaḇekandera ḇyedi.
Snar Yesus fyasren ma sḇeḇefasren, sikam sḇeknam oser; eḇedari imai ḇa dap siḇe naek srar.
Yesus ikofen faro Allah: "Nari yaḇaryas snombri faro naek srar ayesi, ma yasandik aw rofandu jemaat."
Yesus ikofen wer: "Nari yarir kakyar ayedi mufaḇe Allah." Ma Yesus ikofen wer: "Kaku ḇeri, aya isoine ma romawa Allah ḇyuk maḇe aya kwarsya."

Snar snonkaku dap ḇeromawa ansi, sikada kankenem snonkaku, nari ḇemar, inja Yesus mankundi imnis kuker si ma ikenem ro rari snonkaku imnis si. Ifrur rarirya insa marmar ḇyedi kyakok Ibiris, ḇesma papoik ro marmari,
ma kuker nyan ḇerarirya ḇyuk ḇaḇemakakei faro snonkaku ro kankenem sena ḇesiper sisya ro ḇaḇewomen snar simkak faro marmari.
Snar kaku ḇeri, malaikatsya si iswarsya ḇa, ḇape Abraham kpu ḇyesi iswar si.
Snar rarirya ro roi ḇeḇor kam imnisbos naek srar ḇyesi, insa ḇye Imam Ḇeba ḇena saswarya ma ḇeḇeuser faro Allah ma ḇyuk aski faro ersya kam ro sasar sena.
Kuker nyan ine mankundi isma kwar kandera ma fafrowes, insa ifnoḇek snonkaku ḇesma fafrowes sya.
Inja, naek srar Allah kawasa ḇesren ḇyesi, ḇesma rarwas ma fararyor ro boiyaswa, mkomam faro Manwawan ma Imam Ḇeba kokarem ani, isoine Yesus,
Yesus iso ḇeḇeuser Allah ḇekinfir i kwar, imnis Moses kako ḇeponya ḇeḇeuser ḇefrur mnis rum ḇesiper ḇyedi.
Yesus isma ḇaḇesyowi ḇeba syadi ro Moses, imnis snon ḇefawinananem ḇaḇawes rum ḇyesyowi syadi i ro rum sḇawesya.
Snar snon oso ḇefawinananem ḇaḇawes rum ḇape snon ḇefawinananem ḇaḇawes roi ḇeborkam isoine Allah.
Moses ikada ḇyeuser Allah rum ḇyedi ḇesiper imnis manfamyan ḇaḇesaksi roi kam Allah fyasna faroi nari ḇerama na.
Ḇape Kristus ikada ḇyeuser imnis Rumkun nari ḇeḇeḇru ro Allah rum ḇyedi; ma Allah rum ḇyedi isoine koine, rofyor koisya ro papupesya kuf nako ro kakyar ma saneraro ro rosai komsik kukerya.
Snar rarirya, imnis raris Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen: "Ro ras ine, rofyor Allah mkaren ḇyedi,
mkosnemna npakrek awer imnis kpu mkoḇesi spakrek, rofafisu sisma fafrowes ro sup ḇeursba.
Rodiwa kpu mkoḇesi smam fararur ayena kwar, ro wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak, ḇape sifrowes sas aya kuker nyan simnasen aya.
Rarirya yamsor si, ma yakofen: 'Sikada indo sankarkar, ma ssmambaḇir nyan ayena ḇa.'
Isof yamsorḇo yafores: 'Nari saksun ro moḇ mananai ayedi ḇa.' "
Naek srar, mkepen mko, insa rofandu mko snon oso iḇarḇor awer ma ikyarḇa awer ma isusubur Allah ḇekenemya.
Inja rasras mkofarkor yae mko, rofafisu sapḇe "Ras Ine," imnis ono rofandu mko sisnesna npakrek, snar ankarkar sararer ro sasarya.
Snar kosma kwar rarwas ro Kristus, inja kuf nadworen ro kakyar ḇepon koḇena isof ras ḇepupesya.
Ine kada sfasi ro Refo: "Ro ras ine rofyor mkorower Allah mkaren ḇyedi, mkosnemna npakrek awer, imnis kpu mkoḇesi spakrek rofafisu sisampum Allah."
Inja, snonkaku mansesiso ḇerower Allah mkaren ḇyedi raimnai ḇesampum i? Sikada kawasa kam Moses dun faḇesasyarbur sup Masir inke?
Manseren Allah imsor ro wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak? Faro si ḇefrur sasar ma ḇesapi ḇemar ro sup ḇeursḇa?
Mansesiso Allah fyoreswas nari ḇeyaksun ḇa romoḇ mananai ḇyedi? Mansesiso Allah ikofen wersya? Sikada snonkaku besampum Allah inke?
Rarirya komam kada, mboi sima saksun ḇa snar ḇaḇekakyar ḇa sena.
Inja, iḇye kepen ko, insa oso isya rofandu mko skara iḇe ḇesusu awer, snar Allah asas ḇyedi nari kosun ro ḇaḇemananai ḇyedi isya kaker.
Snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye sḇaryas ani ssḇuki kwar maroko imnis raris faro si, ḇaryas ani ḇyefainda faro siḇa, snar rofafisu simnafya, sna na kuker kakyar ḇa.

Mboi ḇekyar koya kada, nari kosun ḇemoḇ mananaiya raris wos ḇyedi: "Yamsor ma yaforeswas: Mboi sikada nari saksun ḇemoḇ mananai yedi ḇaḇeri!" Allah ikofen rarirya, ḇape fararur ḇyedi imnai kwar ro randak supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur kwarya.
Snar ro ras ḇeḇefikya sfas kwar ro Refo radine: "Ro ras ḇeḇefikya Allah imnai ro fararur ḇeḇor ḇyena."
Ma ro mnuk ani sfas radine wer: "Nari saksun ḇemoḇ mananai ayedi ḇaḇeri."
Inja ḇemnaf ḇepon ḇaryas ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani, ssḇuk moḇ mananai ḇesi ḇa, snar sikyar ḇari.

Ḇape Allah fyasna ḇepon kwar ras oso, sapḇe "Ras Ine," rofafisu ikofenbadir fyoro ḇepon kwar faro Daud imnis sikofen ro diasne radine: "Ro ras ine, rofafisu mkorower mkaren ḇyedi ido, mkoḇe mkosnemna fanpakrek awer!"
Snar imnis raris Yosua dun snonkaku ansi fasun kwar ḇemoḇ mananai ani, nari Allah dawawos ro ḇarpurya ro ras ḇese nari ḇeramuma werya ḇa.
Inja ras mananai oso isya ḇyeḇefasos, faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi, imnis Allah imnai ro ras ḇeḇefikya.
Snar mansei ḇesun ḇemoḇ mananai Allah ḇyuk faro i kwar, nari imnai kwar ro fararur ḇeḇor ḇyena imnis raris Allah imnai ro fararur ḇyena.
Inja mkorama koḇesasewar kaku ḇeri fakosun ḇemoḇ manai ani ro Allah. Imbude komindi oso isapiri imnis si roḇepon, snar sikyar faro Allah ḇa.

Snar Allah wos ḇyena wos ḇekenem ma ḇepok isar syadi ro sumber ḇesar raḇandiḇar. Wos ani kyuk randum ḇyerwas rur ma kankenem, faswisew ma korkor kuker sorem na; isof ifrur fakakara ma swaruser ro kosnesna nbaḇer kam.
Ma roi ḇekenem oso kako iyokef ḇa ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, snar roi ḇeḇor kam nbas ma nbaḇer ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi. Ma nari kokarem faro i.
Baboine kona Imam Ḇeba kaku ḇesun isof ro ḇarpon Allah ḇyedi, isoine, Yesus Kristus, Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, inja kuf nako ro kakyar koḇedi kada.
Imam Ḇeba koḇedi, imam ḇemam monda ko ro raryar ḇa koḇena, snar mankundi kako isma kwar faraurowes sas ḇeḇor kwar imnis ko, mboi dakfrur sasar ḇa.
Rarirya komkak ḇa kora faro Allah ḇeḇuk sasoser kuker snemura. Nari Allah iswar ko ma ḇyeḇok ko ma kosma fafnoḇek, rofafisu koḇefandunya.
Snar imam ḇeba oser-oser, skinfir rofandu snonkaku, sikanow faḇeḇeḇru ḇeyuffarmyan Allah, fararur ḇyedi isoine ḇyuk farsarser faro Allah ro rosai ssḇuk fasna ḇesom snar sasar sena.
Imam ḇeba ani mankundi syambraḇ ḇa ro roi nabor, rarirya ikḇaḇ snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa ma ḇembran sasarsya,
mankundi syambraḇ ḇa kako, inja ḇyuk farsarser som snar sasar kawasa sena monda ḇa, ḇape faro mankundi kako.
Ma snonkaku osoḇa kako dun ḇaḇesyowi ani faro mankundi ḇardi, ḇape Allah dori faro nasan ani imnis raris Harun.
Kristus kako rarirya, ikanow mankundi ḇa faḇye Imam Ḇeba, Allah, mankundi ḇekanow i, Allah ikofen faro i: "Awkada Rumkun ayedi! Ro ras ine yaḇe Kma faro aw."
Allah ikofen kako ro mnuk oso ḇese: "Awkada nari be Imam ro fyoro-fyoro, imnis raris rarwas imam Melkisedek."
Rofyor Yesus ikenem imnis snonkaku, ḇyenadi kwar ma dor kuker kankanes faro Allah, ḇepok ḇefaspar i bur marmari, ma snar kyunem faro Allah inja Allah imnaf i.
Yesus ikada Rumkun Allah, ḇape isouser rosai isma kandera kukerya kwar,
ma isma payamyum ḇyedi kwar, ḇyeknam ro koreri ḇekain fyoro faro snonkaku ḇesouser i sya,
ma Allah fyasna i fabye Imam Ḇeba ro rarwas imnis imam Melkisedek.
Ro Yesus ḇaḇenasan ḇyedi imnis Imam Ḇeba, roi nabor nkoḇenkoḇaryas faro mko, ḇape nsamswen faneḇekofen snar nari mkofawi fasaw na ḇa.
Fafisu mkoḇedi imnis kwar fa mkoḇe guru, ḇape mkofandun kaku snonkaku ono ḇese fasḇuk farkarkor ḇemko ro Allah fasasna ḇyena moḇ neknam raya ma nari mkosma roḇean ḇepnas ḇa mboi mkinem sus monda.
Snar mansei ḇeḇefandun ḇeyinem sus kaker, ḇyewombrek kaker, ifawi ḇaim roi ḇekaku ma roi ḇesasar na.
Roḇean ḇepnas kada faro ḇebasya, snar sima sifawi smambir kwar roi ḇeḇye ma roi ḇeḇarḇor.
Snar rarirya mkorama komnai ro koḇuk farkarkor araref ḇepon ro ḇaḇe Kristen, ma iḇyekada kombrar ro farkarkor ḇemnis, isoine snonkaku simnai ro sifrur roi ḇeḇefromo, mboi sikyar faro Allah,
isoine farkarkor ḇeḇeararef ro masi sren, kanow ḇramin ro snonkaku siḇrus na, kaḇakḇok ro ḇemarsya ma ḇaḇesamamyai ḇekain fyoroya.
Roi nanekam, Allah imarisen ido, nari kofrur na. (Inja kokara awer roi kofrur ma kokyar na naiso ḇefnai koreri maḇeko naba, mboi snar Yesus iso ḇefnai fakosma koreriya.)
Snar sisya ḇepon kwar ro Allah isna ḇyedi, ma san kwar ḇaḇeḇok ḇeḇye ro boiyaswa, ma sisma rarwas ro Rur Ḇesrenya,
ma san Allah wos ḇeḇye ḇyena ma fakamaman awar nari ḇeramaya,
ḇape sfamyun wer, rariso nari kokfin kaḇer si fasimbror ro sasar sena, snar mankunsi spaiepen Allah Rumkun ḇyedi wer ma sfafirek i ro fababa.
Snar saprop ḇesosef nanek ḇemyun roi, ḇyuk mamarem rokaker ḇeḇefainda faro snonkaku ḇefrurisya, sisma Allah ḇaḇeḇok ḇyena.
Ḇape rofyor saprop ani ḇyuksur rokaker ḇemarem ḇemanuk, ma kaḇrai borek, saprop ani ḇyefainda ḇa ma nari Allah ifrasi, ma ḇarpurya ḇyeḇekun.
Ḇape naek srar yaswar kaku, nkokofen wos ḇeḇuk kandera nemirḇa, mboi yafawi kaku ḇeri rariso nari mkokfisbur na, snar mkona roi ḇeba syadi ro kandera anna, isoine koreri.
Snar Allah inapes, isof nari fyanander ḇa fararur mkoḇena faro i ro fafnoḇek mkoḇena mkofrur faro kawasa ḇese ḇeḇe Kristensya, mkofnoḇek isof ro baboine kako.
Nkomarisen insa mko oser-oser fyasna kaku ḇeri roi ikyarya isoine koreri isof isma i ro ḇarpurya,
ma mkomyaren ḇa awer, ḇape nkomarisen mkoso si snar kakyar ma kaḇaḇaḇ sisma rarwas ro Allah ḇaḇeasas ḇyedi mkowaf ani.
Snar rofafisu Allah ḇyuk asas ḇyedi faro Abraham, Allah ḇyuk mankundi fyores warek, snar oso ikaki syadiḇa ro i,
doḇe: "Kaku ḇeri nari yaḇeḇok aw ma yafrur fawaryewen."
Abraham iwaf kuker kaḇaḇaḇ ma rarirya isma rosai sḇeasas faroi.
Snar snonkaku indo sfafores kuker snonkaku mansei ḇekaki syadi, isma samambraḇ ro fafores ani, ma isma fafnoḇek.
Allah imarisen kawasa ḇesma asas ḇyedi ani, insa sikyar kaku, eḇedari ḇyuk mankundi fyores,
insa fasasna risuru ansuya susadwer ḇa, isoine asas ma fafores, Allah fyes mankundi kuker fafores ani, Allah isrer ḇa, inja ḇesewar fafnoḇek koya, idif ko fakufnako kakyar ḇero ḇarpon koḇena.
Kakyar ani kada yor ḇesambraḇ moḇ kufepen ko ma kankenem koḇena naknon, snar ḇyeḇemsawer isof ro sorenya ropukya, knamya isya ro sim ḇesren ro Allah rum ḇyedi ro boiyaswa.
Yesus syun fapyon ko kwar, rofafisu iso rarwas Melkisedek, ḇye Imam Ḇeba isof fyoro-fyoro.
Melkisedek ine Allah Ḇekaki Syadi imam ḇyedirya ḇye wairek ro Salem; fafisu Abraham ḇyeembroḇ waireksya ma kyafyo si, Melkisedek ryama isrow i ma ḇyeḇoki.
Abraham ḇyuk faro Melkisedek rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro rosai dun ro embroḇ ani. (Snonsnon Melkisedek ḇeponya "Wairek Ḇenapes"; wairek ro Salem, "Wairek Aski".)
Melkisedek ine sikofen ḇadir snariḇa, kmariḇa ma ḇarpur ḇyediḇa, sikofen ḇadir ras saḇeniya ma ras imarya ḇa. Imnis raris Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, ḇyeimam isof fyoro-fyoro.
Komam Melkisedek ine iba syadi isof Abraham kpu koḇedi, ḇyuk rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur faroi ro rosai ḇeḇye syadi dun ro embroḇ.
Lewi kpu ḇyesi sisma nasan imam, imnis sasoser Refo Yahudi, insa sor rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro er Israel, isoine ro naek sesi, snar sikako seknam ro Abraham.
Melkisedek ḇyekpu ro siḇa, ḇape isma rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro Abraham ma ḇyeḇoki, snar Allah ḇyuk asas faroi.
Rarirya sisampumḇa ḇeba syadiya ḇyuk ḇok faro ḇebaḇaya.
Imamsya ḇesma ḇaḇyak rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ani sikada snonkaku monda nari ḇemar, ḇape Refoya doḇo: Melkisedek ḇesma ḇar rarwas ḇeḇesamfur ani ikada snonkaku ḇekenem.
Inja kofawi Lewi mankundi ḇyeknam kako ro Abraham isma ḇaḇyak ḇar rarwas ḇeḇesamfur ro kawasa Israel -- ḇyak kako faro Melkisedek ḇar rarwas ḇeḇesamfur ani ro Abraham.
Fafisu Melkisedek isrow Abraham, Lewi ḇyeḇeaḇen ḇaim, ḇape ḇyeknam ro Abraham.

Rofafisu imam Lewisya ssḇuk sasoser agama Yahudi faro kawasa Israel. Snar imam Lewisya sifrur mnisḇa ro roi sifrurna, inja fandun kaku imam ḇese, ro rarwas imam Melkisedek, mboi rarwas imam Harun werḇa.
Snar rofyor nasan imam ḇyeḇefadwer rarirya, nari sasoser Refo Yahudi ani ḇyeḇefadwer kako.
Manseren koḇani iso sikofen rodineya, ikada ḇye Manseren faro er ḇese, ma er ḇyedi kada snon oso ifrur fararur imnis imam ḇaim.
Snonkaku sikam sifawi Manseren koḇedi ḇyeknam ro er Yehuda; ma Moses dap er aniḇa rofyor iwawos ro imamsya.
Roi siwos ine isnai syadi wer, kuker imam oso ḇese dores imnis Melkisedek.
Sikanow i faḇyeimam, snar ḇarpur ḇyediḇa, ḇape snar papoik ro kankenem ḇyedi ma nari imar ḇa.
Snar ro Refo sikofen: "Nari au beimam fyoro-fyoro, imnis nasan imam rarwas Melkisedek."
Inja, baboine sasoser ḇekwar sisusu na, snar samambraḇ ḇa nbefainda ḇa,
-- snar kaser sasoser Refo Yahudiya nari ḇyuk koreri ḇaḇeri -- inja baboine ssḇuk ḇeko kakyar ḇeḇye syadi oso; rarirya kofanam Allah.
Ma roi ḇeradine ndarirya kuker fafores ḇa. Rofafisu imam ḇesesya sikanow si faseimam, Allah iso kuker fafores ḇa.
Ḇape Yesus ḇyeḇekanow faḇyeimam, syun ro fafores, rofafisu Allah ikofen faroi: "Manseren fyores kwar, ma nari syadwer marisen ḇyedi ḇa: 'Au kada beimam fyoro-fyoro,' "
rarirya kako Yesus ḇyefafnoḇek oso ro asas ḇeḇye syadi.
Ma imam-imam ḇeḇor ḇese ansi, snar oseroser imar isof sifararur pdef ro nasan sedi ḇa.
Yesus kada ikenem fyoro-fyoro, inja nasan imam ḇyedi ssḇuki faro snonkaku ḇese ḇa.
Rarirya Yesus ḇyuk aski fyoro-fyoro faro kawasa ḇerama faro Allah snar i. Yesus ifrur rarirya snar ikenem fyoro-fyoro fadun fararyor kawasa sena faro Allah.
Yesus ikada Imam Ḇeba kofandun kaku. Ima isren, kosma ḇaḇesasar oso ro iḇa roḇaido sasar rosai wer kako. Skinfir i kwarbur snonkaku ḇesasarsya, ma ḇyeḇekanow ḇemoḇ ḇekaki syadi kam ro nanki.

Ima imnis imam-imam ḇeba ḇesesya ḇa, insa rasras ssḇuk farsarser som snar mankunsi sasar sena ḇepon, posa insape kawasa sasar sena, Yesus ḇyuk farsarser som ḇerarwan oser monda rofyor ḇyuk mankundi ḇefarsarser somya.
Sasoser Refo Yahudi ikanow snonkaku ḇemnis ḇa fasḇe Imam Ḇeba, ḇape ḇarpur ro sasoser Refo Yahudi, Allah ifrur asas kuker soar, ikanow faḇeḇe Imam Ḇeba, isoine Rumkun ḇemnis kwar isof fyoro-fyoro.
Knam ro wos ḇeḇor nane isoine: kosma Imam Ḇeba ḇerarirya, ḇekain ro Allah Ḇeba syadi ḇar raku ro karapesa nasan ḇyedi ro boiyaswa,
ma ḇeyuf fararur imnis Imam Ḇeba ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi, ro Rum kruḇen Ḇaḇeari ḇekaku, Manseren ifrurya ma snonkaku oso ifruri ḇa.
Imam ḇeba oseroser ḇyeḇekanow insa ḇyuk farsarser roḇa som faro Allah: Rarirya kako Imam Ḇeba koḇedi, nari isma roi ono fanya ḇefarsarser.
Imnis raris isya ro supswan inekada, nari ḇyeimam ḇa, snar imam sisya kwar fasḇuk farsarser som siso sasoser Refo Yahudi.

Fararur sifrur imnis imam ani ḇyefanir ma nin ro rosai isya ro boiyaswa, Allah ikofen ḇadir ḇepon faro Moses kwar rofafisu nari ḇyawes Rum kruḇen faseari roya. Allah ikofen radine faro Moses: "Waswarepen! Wafrur nakam imnis raris sfasna faro au ro bonya bori kwar."

Ḇape baboine Yesus isma nasan imam ḇeba syadi, ro fararur imam sifrur na. Snar asas ḇeyaḇek epen ḇyeḇefrur rofandu Allah kuker snonkaku, ikada imnis Manfandu ro ḇaḇeasas ḇeḇye syadi, snar roi ḇeradine neknam ro asas ḇekaki syadi.
Snar rofyor asas ḇeyaḇek ḇepon ani fyarorewḇa kada, nari faindaḇa fakofrur asas ḇeyaḇek ḇeḇesuruya.
Ḇape Allah isrow farorew ani ro kawasa ḇyesi, isof ikofen: "Mkoswarepen nari fafisu iyama, nari yafrur asas ḇebabo kuker kawasa yesi Israel, ma kawasa Yehuda.
Asas ani imnis kuker asas yafrur kwar kuker kpu sesiḇa rofafisu yakfin si fasisasyarbur sup Masir. Sḇeuser asas yafrur faro siyaḇa, rarirya yafandun siḇa.

Ḇape baboine, asas yafrur faro kawasa Israel ro rasras nari ḇerama, rarirya Manseren ikofen: Nari yaker sasoser ayena ro kakara sena, ma neḇefas ro sisnesna. Nari yaḇe Allah ḇesi, ma nari sḇekawasa ḇeaya.
Ma osoḇa rofandu si fyandun ḇyuk farkarkor faro kina min ḇyesi, robaido ifkai faro naek byesi: 'Mkofawi Manseren kada!' Snar sikam, ḇeba kasun, nari sifawi aya.
Nari yapyos sasar sena, ma yafanander na."
Snar ifkaiḇair asas ḇebabo oso, Allah ifrur asas ḇepon ḇekwar ani faipromes fasaw.
Asas ḇeyaḇekepen ḇepon isma sasoser ḇaḇeari, ma isma kako moḇ ḇaḇeari snonkaku sifrur na.
Sifrur rum kruḇen oser ḇarpondi sniriḇe Moḇ Ḇesren. Rodia isya paramrom ma meja kuker mamami ssḇuki fyarsarser faro Allah.
Roḇarpur kruḇen ḇeḇesuru ḇepandwas sim ḇesren ma sim Ḇesren Syadiya.

Ro sim Ḇesren Syadi ani isya rokef ḇekun mamboḇo, sifruri ro brawen, ma isya kako Burua Asas soweri kam kuker brawen. Ro Burua ani dori isya sek brawen ḇeser mamami (manna), Harun ankyon ḇyedi ḇekpirew kwar, ma karufas risuru sḇukfasepen Allah sasoser samfur ḇyena.

Ro Burua ani sosef ḇyedi isya fanir malaikat risuru roi ḇekenem ḇeḇeprer ḇekakopḇair Allah isya. Prer ro fanir malaikat ansu skambreres robo moḇ snepek rik, ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar. Ḇape fafisu ine nari kawos roi ḇeḇor anna kamba.
Rarirya srir roi ḇeḇor anna ro moḇ ḇesren ani. Ma rasras kam imamsya ssun ro rum kruḇen ani sim ḇero ḇarponya fasḇeari.

Ro sim ḇeḇesuru ro rum kruḇen ani imam ḇebaya derer i ḇesunya. Ifararur rodia ḇerarwan oser monda ro wampasi wambarek oser, ma ifararur rodia dun rik ḇyukfarser warek faro Allah snar mankundi sasar ḇyena ma snar kawasa ḇyesi sasar sena sifrur ḇo sḇaḇirḇana.
Kuker sasoser ine, Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk farkarkor isnai ḇeko, rofyor sim ḇepon ro rum kruḇen ani ḇarpon ḇyedi isya kaker, nyan kosunyoḇ Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ani nari syeḇen ḇaim.
Ine ḇyewos peper ro awar baboine. Isoine farsarser ma aiwan sikun ḇesom faro Allah, nari nafrur mnis ḇeḇuk farsarser ansi sisnesnaḇa.
Snar nakam nun monda marisen ḇeroḇean, aninem ma farsarser syoso-syoso, nama sasoser faro kankenem baken, nari ndarirya rawoo isof fafisu Allah ifrur ḇaḇebaboya.

Ḇape Kristus ryama kwar, imnis Imam Ḇeba ro roi ḇeḇye ḇerama kwar: Rum kruḇen moḇ ḇaḇeari ifrur fararur ḇyeja roya imnis Imam Ḇeba ikada, Rum kruḇen ḇeba syadi ma ḇemnis syadi, snonkaku sifrur ḇa, --isoine ḇeḇeknam ro supswan ineḇa, --

Kristus syun ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ani ḇerarawan oser ma imnis isof fyoro-fyoro. Rofafisu ani dun domba som ono rik senaḇa roḇaido lembu mkuno rik ḇyenaḇa faḇyukfarser, ḇape ḇyuk mankundi rik ḇyena, rarirya ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei ḇekain fyoro-fyoro ḇeko.
Snar rofyor domba snon oso rik ḇyena ma lembu snon oso rik ḇyena fnoḇek oref ro lembu mkun sikun ḇesom, snepekna faro ḇearwaremsya isof sisren ro baken monda,

ḇape Kristus rik ḇyena nasyadi ro Rur ḇekain fyoro, Kristus ḇyuk mankundi fyarserḇe Allah kwar raris som ḇefarorewḇa, rik ḇyena nfasren kosnesna ro fararur kankenem ḇekaku ḇaya insa koḇeari faro Allah ḇekenemya.

Snar rarirya, ro Kristus, Allah ifrur asas ḇeyabekepen babo oso insa ḇesma fararyor kwar ro Allah sisma ḇok ḇekain fyoro Allah ḇyeasas kwarya. Nakam ndarirya snar oso imar kwar, isoine Kristus ma marmar ḇyedi ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku, sasar sifrur rofafisu asas ḇeyaḇekepen ḇepon ani isya kaker.
Rofafisu syap romowi isya, rodia sikofen ḇadir snonkaku ḇefrur romowi ani imar kwar.
Snar syap romowi ani kyaku ḇa, rofyor ḇefruriya isya ikenem. Syap ani kyaku rofyor ḇefruriya imar kwar.
Rarirya snaro asas ḇeyaḇekepen ḇepon ani ḇyeḇekarem namuk kuker rikḇa.

Randakya Moses ikofen ḇadir kam sasoser Refo Yahudi faro er Israel ḇesiper; posa kwar Moses dun lembu mkun rik ḇyena ma domba snon rik ḇyena, irḇaren na kuker war, ḇarpurya nyepek na ro syap Allah ma er Israel ḇesiper kuker dombabur ḇeafuk ma hisop (ajumek ram),
ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Inekada rik ḇeḇeasas ḇeyabek epen Allah ifrur ḇemko."
Ḇarpurya Moses nyepek rik anna kako ro Rum kruḇen ḇaḇeari ma roi ḇeḇor ssḇuki isyom Allah na.
Rarirya siso sasoser Refo Yahudi, roi ḇeḇor kam neḇefasren kuker rik; inja sasar nasma payasyos rofyor rikya isbawer.
Kuker nyan ḇeradine roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇekakop ro roi ḇeḇesya nane ro boiyaswa, neḇefasren. Ḇape roi ḇeḇor ro boiyaswa ḇardi nefandun som ḇeḇye syadi.
Snar Moḇ Ḇesren Kristus syun roya moḇ snonkaku sifrur risyaḇa. Moḇ ani ḇyekakop monda ro Moḇ Ḇesren ḇekakuya. Kristus mankundi syun ro boiyaswa isrow Allah fadawawos fandun koḇena.
Imam Ḇeba Yahudi wampasi wambarek nakam syun ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dun rik ro aiwan oso. Ḇape Kristus syun faḇyuk mankundi fyarser kaḇer ḇesya kwar ḇa.
Snar rarirya ido, randak supswan ine ḇyeḇefrurya, isma kandera ḇesya kwar. Ḇape kofawi baboine ro awar ḇepupes ine, ryama ḇerarwan oser monda faipyos sasar kuker ḇyuk mankundi ḇefarsarser.
Allah ikofen kwar mboi snonkaku simar ḇerarwan oser munda, posa kwar Allah kyakara si.
Rarirya kako Kristus ḇyefarsarser ḇerarwan oser monda imnis som ḇepyos sasar snonkaku sibor. Nari ryama wer ḇerarwan ḇeḇesuruya ḇyar sasar werḇa, mboi ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇewaf rarama ḇyedi.

Ro sasoser Refo Yahudiya ḇyuk monda nin ro koreri nari ḇeramaya, ḇape nin ro koreri ḇardiḇa. Wampasi wambarek nakam samsom ssḇuk ḇefarsarser namnis ḇesyakwar monda. Inja rariso sasoser Refo Yahudi ma samsom ḇerarirya nbuk manasnis faro snonkaku ḇerama ḇesyom Allahsyake?
Ma snonkaku ḇesyom Allah seḇefasren kaku kwar ro sasar, nari sḇaḇir sḇesasar wer ḇa, ma nari simnai ro ssḇuk som.
Ḇape samsom ro wampasi wambarek nakam nḇuk swarepen faro snonkaku sasar sena.
Snar lembu snon rik ḇyena ma domba snon rik ḇyena nari napyos sasar ḇa.
Rarirya rofafisu Kristus syun ḇesupswan ine, ikofen faro Allah: "Aw wamarisen ḇa som ma farsarser ḇape fasos kwar baken oso ḇeaya.
Wamarisen ḇa som aiwan ḇekun imnis farsarser oroḇaido samsom ssḇuk farser faḇepyos sasar.
Inja yakofen: 'Ayaisoine, o Allah! Yarama insa yafrur marisen bedi, imnis fasfas ḇekur aya ro syap ḇeniw ine.' "

Randakya Kristus ikofen: "Wamarisen ḇa som ma farsarser; wamarisen ḇa som aiwan ḇekun imnis farsarser ma samsom ḇepyos sasar." Kristus ikofen rarirya, ḇape som ḇeḇor anna ssḇuk farser siso sasoser Refo Yahudi.
Ma ḇarpurya Kristus ikofen: "Aya isoine, o Allah! Yarama insa yafrur marisen bedi." Rarirya Allah ipyos som-som ḇekwar ḇeḇor anna kam, isadwer na kuker Kristus raris som ḇebabo.
Ma snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, Yesus Kristus fyasren ko kam ro sasar kuker som ro Yesus mankundi ḇyeḇefarser ḇerarwan oser monda isof fyoro-fyoro.
Imam Yahudi oser-oser ifrur fararur ḇyedi ro ras oser-oser, ma fyarser kaḇer ḇesyakwar som ḇemnis nari ḇepyos sasar ḇa.
Kristus ḇyuk farsarser som oser monda snar sasar, som ani kyain rawo isof fyoro-fyoro. Posa kwar Kristus kyain ro Allah ḇar raku ḇyedi ma ḇyuk sasoser fnoḇek Allah.
Ma baboine Kristus iwaf isof Allah ifrur mbroḇ ḇyesi faskafyo faroi.
Snar kuker som oser monda, Kristus ifrur snonkaku ḇesma ḇaḇefasren ro sasar, fasinapes isof fyoro-fyoro.
Ma roi ḇeḇesya ani Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇeko. Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen:
" 'Ine kada asas nari yafrur faro si ro rasras nari ḇerama,' Manseren ikofen, 'Nari yarir sasoser yena ro sisnesna, ma yaker na ro kakara sena.'
'Nari yafanander sasar ma ḇarḇor sena.' "
Inja, sasar ma ḇarḇor anna neḇepyos kwar fandun fasḇuk som ḇaḇepayasyos sasar wer ḇa.
Inja naek srar, baboine kuker marmar Yesus ani ḇyuk makakei fakosun ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ani,
snar Yesus syeḇen kwar nyan babo oso ḇeko, isoine nyan ḇeḇuk kankenem. Nyan ani dunuk kruḇen eruk, isoine Yesus mankundi baken ḇyedi,
ma kona snon oso ḇeḇe Imam Ḇeba ḇeḇeḇru ro Allah Rum ḇyedi.
Inja, mkorama kofanam Allah kuker sne ḇenapes ma kakyar ḇekaku beri, snar kosnesna neḇeḇan sren ro ḇaḇaḇir sasar, ma ḇaken koḇena neḇeḇan sren kwar kuker war ḇesren.
Mkorama kufnako ro rosai kokarem imnis raris kakyar koḇedi, snar kokyar Allah nari ḇyuk raris asas ḇyedi.
Mkorama kokarayaye insa kodifyae ko, insa kofrur roi ḇeḇye ma kofasna saswarya.
Koḇinkwanbur awer fananjur kayam ro ḇaḇeari koḇena, imnis snonkaku ono sifrur kwar, ḇape mkorama kanun yaeko, snar kofawi mboi fyoroḇa wer nari Manseren ryama.
Snar rofyor Allah ḇaryas ḇyedi sikofen i kwar maḇeko, ḇape kofrur sasar ḇesyakwar, kuker famamyun nari som oso isyaḇa faipyos sasar koḇena.
Ḇape isya faroko isoine kofanam Allah kakara ḇenapes ḇyedi ma for masasor Allah nari ḇekunpres snonkaku ḇesampum isya.
Ro ḇeponiwara ḇesampum sasoser Moses ḇyuknasya nari sisma payasyos ro sasar senaḇa mboi sisma samamyai ma marmar, rofyor saksi risuru roḇa kior sesaksi snonkaku ani ḇyesasar kaku ḇeri.
Rariso samamyai ḇemarḇak ssḇuk faro snonkaku ḇekoryae Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, snonkaku ḇekofen rik asas ḇefasreni darwarem, ma snonkaku ḇekoryae saswar-fakamaman Rurya?
Snar kofawi mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo: "Nari ayaiso ḇemunsuya. Ma kakuḇaḇoi nari mankundayaiso ḇemunsu na." Ma ikofen wer ḇo doḇo: "Nari Manseren ḇyemankara faro kawasa ḇyesi."
Ḇayesi ḇeyonef ansi nari simkak namsinḇaḇeri, rofyor sisapi ro Allah ḇekenemya ḇramin ḇyesuya.
Mkoswarepen fafisu ḇesyof. Rofyor ani mkosma kandera ḇemaḇak, ḇape snar mkosma Allah isna ḇyedi kwar inja mkofaḇri ma mkosusuḇa,
fafisu ono skoryae naek srar ma sifrur iḇyeḇa ro fababa. Fafisu ono kako mkun ḇar fnoḇek ḇesma kandera ansya.

Fafisu ono mkun kwar ḇar ro kandera samamyai snonkaku ma fafisu ono papus mkoḇena sfasyar na, mkosma roi ḇeḇesya nane kuker marisen monda, snar mkofawi nari mkona arasai ḇeḇye syadi ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya.
Rarirya mkorir awer kakyar mkoḇena, snar sasuref ḇeba isya iwaf.
Mkofandun kaku kaḇaḇaḇi insa mkofrur Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma rarirya nari mkosma rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar faro mko.
Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Knikmkun monda wer, sfasna faḇerama ani, nari ryama; ma nari isusu rarama ḇyediḇa.
Ḇape snonkaku yesi ḇenapes nari ikenem; snar kakyar ḇyedi faro aya, ḇape rofyor fandusi ono sisusu, nari yamarisen siḇa."
Ḇape nkoine nkoḇeoser kuker ḇaḇeoserya ma ḇeḇorḇa, mboi nkoine kawasa ḇekyar faro Allah ma ḇesma kankenem.
Ḇaḇe kakyar ḇyeknam ro roi ḇeḇor kokyar ma bon ro roi ḇeḇor komam ḇaim na.
Snar kakyarya, sikofen ḇadir kwar kuker ḇaḇesaksi faro kpu koḇesi ro awar madero.
Snar kakyarya, kofawi mboi sansoren ḇoka ḇyeḇefrur kuker rosai Allah ikofen, isof rosai komam na ndarirya ro rosai komam ḇaim na.

Snar kakyarya, Habel ḇyuk farsarser kwar faro Allah kuker samsom ḇeḇye syadi ro samsom Kain ḇyena. Snar kakyar ḇyedi Allah nya Habel imnis snonkaku ḇenapes, snar Allah imarisen farsarser ḇyena. Habel imar kwar, ḇape snar kakyar ḇyedi, isya iwawos wer.

Snar kakyarya, Henokh imarḇa, mboi ḇyeḇekanow ma ḇyeḇeyun faro Allah. Snonkaku oso isrow iḇa kako, snar Allah i kanowi kwar. Sfas ro Refo mboi rofyor Henokh ḇyeḇekanow ḇaim, isma ḇaḇesaksi, ifrur marisen Allah ḇyedi kwar.
Kakyar isyaḇa, snonkaku osoḇa kako ifrur Allah marisen ḇyedi. Snar snonkaku ḇerama faro Allah, ikyar Allah isya, ma Allah myunsu faro ḇesewar kaku isya.

Snar kakyarya, Nuh isma swarapepen Allah ḇyuk faroi roi nari ḇerama ro ḇarpurya, ḇyeḇemam ḇaim ma snar Nuh ḇyesyowi Allah isof ifrur wai oso faḇyuk ḇeaski faro kina ḇyena; papupesya ssḇuk samamyai faro supswan, ḇape rofyor ani Allah fyasnai Nuh mankundi ḇeḇenapes snar kakyar ḇyedi.
Snar kakyarya, Abraham ḇyesyowi Allah rofafisu Allah dori ma iwani farya ḇemnu Allah ḇyeasas faroi, raimnai Abraham rya ḇoi ifawi moḇ iḇe ryayoḇya ḇa.
Kuker kakyar faro Allah, Abraham kyain ro mnu Allah ḇyeasas faroi ani imnis mandaman. Abraham kyain rodia ro rum kruḇen kuker Ishak ma Yakub, ḇeyaksma asas ani kako ro Allah.
Snar Abraham ikyar nari iḇe kyain ro mnu Allah dawya ma ḇyawes kuker araref ḇesambraḇ.
Snar kakyarya, Abraham ma Sara suyaḇen romawa kpu, rofyor Abraham ḇyemansar kaku kwar ma Sara ḇinkundi pyansnasem. Abraham ikyar nari Allah ifrur namnis asas ḇyedi.
Fafisu ani Abraham syambraḇ ḇa fanya romawa, ḇape romankundi daḇen kpu up sibor, dandonek sedi kokor napok siba-- simnis dandonek maksya ro nanki ma karyen mor ro swan andirya.

Sikam snonkaku ḇekyar faswef, isof rofafisu simar, ḇape sakmam ḇaim rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar, sikada smam mura rona monda ḇoi srar na kuker kakyar ro sisnesna, ma rarirya sfasna, sikada mandaman ma snon dakam ro supswan ine.
Snonkaku ḇekofen rarirya sfasnaibos mboi simarisen ssewar mnu kaku sedi.
Ḇape mnu seknam ro ma sibur kwar ani skaraya ḇa. Snar rarirya ido sisma fafisu kwar faskaḇer ḇemnu ani wer.
Ḇape baboine simarisen mnu oso ḇeḇye syadi, isoine mnu ro boiyaswa. Rarirya Allah imai ḇa sap iḇe Allah sedi, snar Allah fyasos mnu oso faro si kwar.

Snar kakyar kako, fafisu Allah imnasenpan Abraham, Abraham ḇyuk Ishak, romawa ḇyedi faḇyefarsarser som. Romawa Allah ḇyeasas ani ḇyuki faro Abraham kwar; ma romawa ani Allah ikofen kwar, "Ro Ishak inekada nari wasma kpu-up yaḇeasas faro aw." Rariryano Abraham imarisen ḇyuk romawa oser ḇyani kako.
Snar Abraham kyara Allah ipok ḇyuk kaḇer kankenem faro Ishak ro marmar ḇyedi -- inja kokofen raris Abraham isma kaḇer Ishak kwar ro marmar.
Snar kakyar, Ishak ḇyeasas ḇok-ḇok faro Yakub ma Esau ro ḇarpuriyama.
Snar kakyar, rofafisu Yakub imar ḇaim -- ikasandem ro ankyon ḇyedi ḇo ḇyansuba faro Allah -- Yakub ḇyuk ḇok ḇyena faro Yusuf romawa ḇyesuya.
Snar kakyar, Yusuf -- rofafisu fanam imar -- iwawos ro kawasa Israel nari sisasyarbur sup Masir. Raimnai kwar Yusuf ḇyuk ananun insa sfaduru rombronbyesya.
Snar kakyar, Moses sinan ḇyesuya suyokef i ḇepaik rikior rofyor Moses ḇyeḇeyaḇenya. Sumam romawa snon ani ipyum kaku, ma sumkak ḇa fasusampum wairek sasoser ḇyena.
Snar kakyar, Moses iba kwar imewer sap i ḇeromawa ro imboki wairek Masir.
Imarisen syadi ḇyekandera kuker Allah kawasa ḇyesi rofafisu kermkun ikenem ro marisen kankenem ḇesasar.
Moses ḇyaḇir maeja ḇesyadiya isma anonef kuker Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri Allah ḇyeasas ani ro isma arasai ḇeḇor ro mnu Masir; snar Moses ikyar sasuref ro ras ḇarpurya.
Snar kakyar, Moses ibur Masir kwar ma imkak ḇa wairek masasor ḇyedi. Moses imbran pdef ḇemoḇ ryayoḇya imnis raris myam kwar, Allah komam ḇaim ani.
Snar kakyar, Moses ifrur munara Paskah ma isasyar sasoser fakawasa Israel snepek rik ro rum sena ro kedwa na insa Malaikat Marmari myun awer romawa rak sesi.
Snar kakyar, kawasa Israel ssunuk Soren Ḇerik, raris simbran ro saprop ḇesyor, ma rofyor kawasa Masir sakunuksas kako ḇape soren ani doren si.
Snar kakyar, kawasa Israel simbran yaryar ayar karui Yerikho ras rifik, ma ayar karui ani imbroḇen.
Snar kakyar kako, Rakhab, bin ḇefrur farbuk ani sakmun iḇa fnoḇek kawasa ḇeḇeankarkar, snar fyaduru manpaf ro Israelsya.
O, yaḇe yawos pdef ḇape fafisu yena nabor ḇa, rofyor yamarisen yafarfyar ro Gideon, Barak, Simson, Yefta, Daud, Semuel ma nabisya.
Snar kakyarya, sḇefainda ro embroḇ kuker ḇaḇesasosersya. Sifrur rosai ḇenapes, isof sisma rosai Allah ḇyeasas faro si. Spanoser singasya sisḇasna,
sfasye for ḇeba. Sikfis kwar ro sumber ḇemamun. Sambraḇ ro raryarḇa sena; sambraḇ syadi ro embroḇ isof sifrur kafyo sararsya ro er mandaman.
Snar kakyar, bin-binsya sisma kaḇer kawasa ḇemar kwar sesi. Ḇape ono simarisen sisma kandera isof simar, simewer sisma mkei, snar simarisen sisma kaḇer kankenem ḇeḇye syadiya.
Kawasa ono kako sḇeḇekoryae, siprersi, sewanka si ma sesifa ssun ro bui.
Ssosi kuker karui isof simar, sisyoḇuksi, smunsi kuker sumber. Sinarbur kuker famamar ro domba kif roḇa kambing kif; ssabarar ma sifrur kandera si.
Supswan ine isyusḇa farosi. Sinarbur ro supḇeursḇa ma ro bon na, skain ro abyaḇ na ma ner ro saprop.
Fainda ḇeba kaku faro snonkaku sine snar kakyar sena! Ḇape sisma ḇaim rosai Allah ḇyeasas faro si.
Snar Allah fyasos kwar faro ko roi ḇemnis syadi; koisya ḇa ido nari sisma manasnisya ḇa.
Snar kona saksisya sibor ḇesiryaryar ko raris mandepna, eḇedari mkoramuma kosawen roi ḇemarḇakna ma sasar ḇekrof roko ma mkorama kofarmku koso famfaḇri sḇukma ḇeko.

Mkorama komam monda faro Yesus, snar i ḇefnoḇek ko faro ḇaḇekakyarya faro i ro randakya isof papupesya! Ḇyefandun ḇa imar ro apropya imnis roi oso ḇefrur mamyai. Iswarepen monda marisen nari ḇyaḇir ro ḇarpurya. Baboine ḇyuk sasoser fnoḇek Allah ro ḇar raku karapesa nasanya.
Mko karasas rariso Yesus kandera ḇyedi ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇesasar ḇesampum i. Rarirya mkosambraḇ ma kakyar mkoḇena namuk awer.
Snar mkofaḇri mkosampum sasar, isof ro mkosasyar rik ḇaim.

Ma mkosampum awer Allah ananun ḇyena faro mko imnis kma oso dawawos kuker romawa ḇyesi! Allah ikofen, "Ne, rumkun yedi, kwara nabye rofyor Manseren fyarkor aw, ma kakyar mkoḇena namuk awer rofyor imsor mko.
Snar Manseren fyarkor snonkaku saneraro ḇyesi, ma iprer snonkaku kyarem imnis romawa ḇyesi."
Rofyor mkosma aprer ro Allah imnis raris farkarkor ro kma oso. Snar rariso romawa oso isma aprer ro kmari ḇa?
Rofyor mkoso aprer ḇyena ḇa imnis romawa fyarkor, mkoḇeromawa kaku ḇa, mboi mkoḇeromawa daḇyor.
Kosma kma ro supswan ine. Kosma farkarkor ro kma ani, ma nari koḇesyowi i. Rarirya kako faro kma rur koḇedi ro boiyaswa, kokenem syadi faroi insa kosma kankenem.
Sinan koḇesi ro supswan ine ssḇuk farkarkor rofyor ḇeknampu monda, ro rosai skara ḇeḇye. Ḇape Allah fyarkor ko faro ḇaḇye mankun koḇena, insa kosren fnoḇek i.
Rofyor sfarkor ko, aprer anna nbuk marisen ro kosnesna ḇa. Ḇape ro ḇarpurya, sfarkor kwar koya, koso kankenem Allah imarisen na, isof nbuk bon ḇeḇaḇir aski maro ko.
Snar rarirya swambraḇser ḇramin ḇemor bedi ma wepur ḇeradadai bedi.
Wambran ro nyan ḇepyom insa wemin ḇeryarḇa bedi ryosdis awer mboi iprei.
Besewar wakenem kuker aski faro kawasa kam, ma faḇri fawakenem nasren kuker Manseren, snar kuker nyan ine ḇa snonkaku osoḇa nari myam Manseren.
Mkowaren insa snon oso ḇaḇeri isasyarbur awer Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi, insa ono simnis awer rokaker ḇemamur rofandu naek srar isof nḇuk rakrakrok ma makakok snonkaku ḇeḇor kuker mamur ḇyedi.
Mkowaren insa mkokenem ro farḇuk awer roḇaido mkofandunḇa rosai ḇesren, imnis raris Esau, ḇyoḇ nasan romawa rawer ḇyedi kuker roḇean ben oser monda.
Snar mkofawi mboi ro ḇarpurya Esau imarisen isma ḇok ani ro kmari, ḇape ḇyeḇepampum. Esau dor kuker kankanes, ḇape isma fafisu osoḇa fa fyadwer sasar ḇyena.
Snar mkaksrow roi oso ḇaim imnis er Israel fyoriwara sisrow kwar. Sisrow bon span roya, isoine Bon Sinai kuker for ḇesber ḇyena; sisrow ḇaḇepampan, fnureḇ ma wam doḇer,
sisrow kḇur ḇerok, ma mkaren ḇerok nababos. Rofafisu kawasa Israel ansi srower mkaren ani, sor insa mkaren ani dawawos kaker faro si awer.
Snar ssambraḇ srower mkaren ani ḇa ro sasoser ḇyuk na. Snar mkaren ani ikofen, "Rofyor aiwanke roḇa manseirya wer kako, ḇefanam bon ine, nari ḇyeḇeso kuker karui isof imar."
Ma rosai kawasa Israel smam ani dun nyawa isof Moses ikofen, "Yamkak ma yaradai!"
Ḇape mkora kwar ḇe Bon Sion Allah mnu ḇekenem ḇyedi, isoine Yerusalem ro boiyaswa kuker malaikat syaran-syaran ḇyesi.

Ma mkorower raryaḇ fananjur oso--fananjur Allah rumkun rak ḇyesi, snonsnon sena neḇefas epen ro boiyaswa. Mkorower Allah, Mankara ro snonkaku kam. Mkosrow snonkaku ḇeḇye rur sesi sifrur faḇemnis kwar.
Ma mkosrow Yesus manfandu ḇeyun asas ḇebabo ḇeyaḇek epen ani; mkosrow rik ḇesepek ḇefaduru roi ḇeḇye syadiya ro fadaduru Habel rik ḇyedi.

Rarirya mkepen mko imbude ḇeyawawos ani mkomewer mkorower indi. Rofyor simewer simnafi, ḇefkai ḇayir Allah wos ḇyedi ro sup ine, nari sikfisbur ḇa, isyadi wer koine ḇemnaf i ḇeyawawos ro boiyaswa ani! Rofyor komewer komnaf i, rariso nari kokfisbur i?
Rofafisu ani mkaren ḇyedi imkiker sup ine. Ḇape baboine ḇyuk asas kwar, "Nari yamkiker ḇerarwan oser wer, sup ine derer monda ḇa mboi nanki kako."
Wos "ḇerarwan oser wer" fyasna roi ḇeḇor kam sifrur faḇemkiker kwar anna, nari sena fanakrenbur insa ḇemkiker ḇa na nkain faswef.

Inja kokofen kasumasa faro Allah, snar kosma kwar ro Allah ḇaḇesasoser oso nari ḇemarmer ḇa. Inja kokofen kasumasa ma koḇeari kuker kakyar faro Allah kuker syowi ma makakak, imnis raris Allah mankundi marisen ḇyedi.
Snar Allah koḇedi imnis for ḇekun.
Inja mkoswaryae mko imnis raris kawasa Kristen ḇeḇemanbekanaek.
Mkofanander awer mkoḇuk moḇ ḇeḇeryar faro snonkaku, snar fararur ḇorarirya snonkaku ono kuker fawawi ḇa sedakam malaikat ono kwar.
Mkoswarepen snonkaku ḇesma samamyai ro bui, imnis mkoisya kuker si ro bui kako. Ma snonkaku sifrur mnis ḇa, mkoswarepen si imnis mko kako sakfrur mko rarirya.
Mko kam mkoḇesyowi fakawawinya, eḇedari imbeswasya sesyowiyae si. Snar ḇefrur farḇuk ma ḇefrur ḇarḇor nari Allah ḇyuk samamyai faro si.
Mkormomen pipi awer, mboi mkokenem imnis kuker rosai isya faro mko. Snar Allah ikofen kwar, "Nari yarir aw ḇa ma nari yabur aw ḇa."
Rarirya kuker kakyar kokofen: "Manseren ifnoḇek aya, inja nari yamkak ḇa. Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ifrur roi oso maḇe aya!"
Mkofanander awer manfarkin mkoḇesi, ḇefkai ḇair Allah wos ḇyedi faro mko kwar. Mkoswarepen kankenem ḇepupes sena ma mkokyar faro Allah ma mkofrur farari kakyar ma fararur sena.
Yesus Kristus fyarwe ḇa, ro ḇeponiwara, baboine, isof fyoro-fyoro.

Mkomam monda awer farkarkor syoso-syoso ḇeḇor ḇefarkor ninyan mko. Allah ḇaḇye ḇyedi ifrur mkosnemna fanamku, mboi sasoser ro roḇean ḇa. Snar kawasa ḇepon ansi sisouser sasoser anna ḇape sisma fainda oso ḇa.
Kona rokef farsarser oso fakobuk farsarser som faro Allah. Ma imamsya ḇeyuffarmyan ro rum kruḇen ḇaḇeariya nari san rosai isyaro rokef farsarser ani ḇaḇeri.
Aiwan rik ssḇuk farsarser imnis som ḇepyos sasar, Imam ḇebaya dun iḇe Moḇ Ḇesren Syadiya ro rum kruḇen ani dori; ḇape aiwan kraf ani kada ḇyeḇerap ro rum kruḇen ani ḇandiri.
Rarirya Yesus kako imar ro kedwai ḇeba ro mnuya ḇandiri faipyos kawasa ḇyesi sasar sena kuker rik mankundi ḇyedi.
Snar rarirya mkorama kora faro i ro rum kruḇen ani ḇandiri ma kosma anonef kuker i.
Snar ro sup ine moḇ ḇekain fyoro oso faro koḇa; inja kosewar mnu nari ḇeramumaya.
Rarirya kuker Yesus mkorama kosandik Allah ḇesya kwar; ine imnis som kasumasa koḇena faroi, isoine sanandik ro sḇadon koḇena faro snonsnon ḇyedi.
Mkofanander awer mkofrur roi ḇeḇye ma mkofnoḇekyae mko, snar Allah i marisen samsom ḇerarirya.

Mkoḇeuser manfarkin-manfarkin mkoḇesi, ma mkoḇesyowi faro sikada, snar siwaren ḇesya kwar rur mkoḇesi ma skarem faro Allah. Rofyor mkoḇeuser si, nari sifararur kuker marisen; rofyor rarirya ḇa, nari sifararur kuker fafafko, snar roi ḇerarirya nbuk fainda osoḇa faro mko.
Mkonadiwarek ḇesya kwar faro nko; snar nkokyar nkosnesna nasren, snar nkomarisen nkofrur roi ḇenapes ḇesya kwar.
Yor faro mkerer, mkonadiwarek aya, insa Allah dun kaḇer aya fasaw faro mko.
Allah ḇyawes kwar Manseren koḇedi Yesus ro marmar. Snar marmar ḇyedi, baboine ḇye Manfarandous Ḇeba maro ko imnis domba-domba ḇyesi. Marmar ḇyedi kako ḇyuk kaku ro Allah asas ḇyedi ḇekain fyoroya.

Allah knam askiya fyasos mko kuker roi ḇeḇye kada, mkofandun famkofrur imnis marisen ḇyedi. Kuker Yesus Kristus manfandu Allah, ifrur maro ko rosai imarisenya. Sanandik fyoro-fyoro faro Kristus! Amin.
Yor ro mko, naek srar, insa mkokara wos ananun ayenane kuker kaḇaḇaḇ kada, snar syap ayedine ikwan mankenem ḇa.
Mkofawi naek koḇani Timotius sisasyar i kwar ro bui. Rofyor ryama kwar ro moḇ ayedine, nari yuni rofyor yaḇe yarakaki mko.
Mkokofen ḇadir aroo ayedi faro manfarkin mkoḇesi kam ma faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam. Naek srar ro Italia kako sfarem aroo faro mko kam.
Manseren ḇyebok naek srar mko kam kada.
Ro aya, Yakobus, Allah ma Manseren Yesus Kristus manfamyan suḇedi yafarem aroo faro keret samfur seser risuru ḇekakek ro supswan ine.
Naek srar ayesi, rofyor mkosapi ro fafrowes ḇeḇor, mkokarana imnis aski oso,
snar mkofawi, mboi manasnasen ḇekur kakyar mkoḇena nbuk ḇaḇenamu faro mko.
Ma ḇaḇenamu ani ḇyuk bon ḇemku, insa mkomnis ma mkosiper ma mkananjar awer roi ono kako kada.
Ḇape rofyor rofandu mko ono sisya smamkarkir mnis ḇa ido, sor mamkarkir ani ro Allah kada, ḇeḇuk faro snonkaku kam kuker sanemura ma ḇeyor kaḇerna ḇa,-- inja roi anna nari neḇeḇuk faroi.
Inja dorna kuker kakyar, ma ḇyeḇirḇar awer, snar ḇeḇeḇirḇar simnis kuker ḇak ro soren, wamya dun mura-muma.
Snonkaku ḇerarirya kyara awer nari isma roi oso ro Manseren.
Snar snonkaku ḇeḇesnemandu nari iknon ro kenem ḇyedi ḇa.
Kawasa Kristen ḇesaḇarar siryaḇ kada rofyor Allah ikanow si.
Ma kawasa Kristen ḇeḇekayan siryaḇ kako kada, rofyor Allah ryun si. Snar snonkaku ḇeḇekayan nari sipromes imnis aḇris pampen.
Snar ori dek kuker samsam ḇeyosuk ma ḇefrur maryoi aḇris ansi, isof pampen sesi skapaf ma sananai ḇepyum sena ndo. Rarirya kako kuker ḇeḇekayansya; rofandu ḇaḇesewar ḇeḇor sena nari napromes.
Aski faro snonkaku ḇedworen ro fafrowesna, ma dores nako kwar ro manasnasen ido, nari isma wower kankenem Allah ḇyeasas faro mansei ḇeswar Allah.
Rofyor snonkaku oso isma fafrowes ido ikofen awer: "Fafrowes ine ryama ro Allah!" Snar ḇarḇorya ipok ifrowes Allah ḇa, ma Allah mankundi ifrowespan manseirya ḇa kako.
Ḇape snonkaku oser-oser isma fafrowespan snar mankundi rmomen baken ḇyena, nasmeri ma nadenemi.
Ma ḇaḇermomen baken ani ḇyebon kwar daḇen sasar; ma rofyor sasar imku kwar, daḇen marmari.
Naek srar yaswar kaku, mkoḇor awer!
Roi ḇeḇye ma ḇemnis kosmana ndamaker boiyaswa, Allah ḇyena fanado, i ḇefrur isnai ḇeḇor kam ro nanki.
Kuker marisen ḇyedi i frur ko kwar kuker wos ḇenapes ḇyedi, insa kosma moḇ ḇepon fakoḇe romawa rak rofandu roi ḇekenem kam ifrurna.
Ne, naek srar yaswar kaku, mkoswarepen: Mko kam mkosamberen famkomnaf, ḇape mkowawos ma mkomasasor fasaw awer kako;
snar masasor snonkaku nafrur roi ḇenapes ono ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇa.
Inja mkosawen roi ḇemamasna kam ma ḇarḇor ḇeborna kam ma kuker randun sne mkona Allah wos ḇyedi kyer kwar ro mkosnemna, nari ḇeḇuk koreri faro rur mkoḇesi.
Ḇape mkuffarmyan wos ani ma mkorower monda awer; snar rarirya ḇaido mkoḇeankar mankun mko.
Snar snon oso imnaf monda wosya ma ifrur ḇaido, imnis kuker snon oso ḇemam mankundi ro kansinai.
Kniko fasaw myam mankundi, raimnai rya ma ḇyeprobos moḇ isnairaya.

Ḇape mansei ḇekukeḇ sasoser ḇemnis anna isoine sasoser ḇeḇuk ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku, ma ḇyenamu faḇyeuserna, inja ryower monda ma fyananderna ḇa, ḇape ifrur kakuḇerina, nari isma aski ro fararur ḇyena.
Rofyor snon oso kyara mankundiḇe ḇeḇeari nasrawen, ḇape fyarmku ramar ḇyedi ḇa, ḇyeankar mankundi, ma ḇaḇeari ḇyena nefromo.
Ḇaḇeari ḇekaku ma ḇefarorewḇa ro Allah, Kma koḇedi ḇarpon ḇyedi, isoine ryakaki awak param ma kabomsya ro ananjar sena, ma ḇyesasor mankundi insa supswan ine ifrur mamas aweri.
Naek srar ayesi, imnis snonkaku ḇekyar faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi ḇepoksyadi, kakyar ani mkofrur i kuker mkomam karyer awer.
