Snar, rofyor snon oso syun ro fananjur mkoḇedi kuker iwur kawin brawen ma syansun sansun ḇepyum ma snon ḇesaḇarar oso kako ryama daksun kuker sansun ḇepyum ba,

ma nari mkoḇesyowi snonkaku ḇesansun-sansun ḇepyum ani ma mkokofen faroi: "Tuan kwain ro moḇ ḇeḇye ine!" -- mboi faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar ani mkokofen: "Wores rodiwa!" roḇa: "Kwain rosop fanam wemin ayesi!"
Mkofawiḇake mkofrur kwar ḇaḇemambaḇir ro mkosnemna ma mkofrur imnis mankara kuker kakara ḇeḇarḇor?
Mkomnaf naḇye, ne naek srar yaswar kaku! Mkofawiḇake Allah kyinfir snonkaku supswan ine skaraḇe ḇesaḇarar fasekayan ro kakyar ma sepusaka ro ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇyeasas kwar faro mansei ḇeswarisya?
Ḇape mkokoryae snonkaku ḇesabararsya kwar. Mkofawiḇake snonkaku ḇeḇekayan siso ḇeḇewayam mko ma ḇesmer mko ḇekankain karkara ḇenapes?
Mkofawiḇake siso ḇeyonef snonsnon ḇesma syowi syadi, eḇedari Allah nya mko?
Ḇape, rofyor mkofruruser sasoser ḇepon sfas ro Refo: "Waswar snonkaku min besi imnis waswar mankundaw."
Ḇape, mkomam karyer ido, mkofrur sasar, ma mkoḇeyuk Allah sasoser ḇyena.
Snar mansei ḇeḇeuser sasoser ḇeḇor anna kam, ḇape ḇyeuser mnuk osoḇa rona, ḇyesasar farona kam.
Snar ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo: "Wafrur farbuk awer," Ikofen kako: "Mamun awer." Inja mkofrur farbuk ḇa ḇape mkomamun, rarirya mkoḇeyuk sasoserna kako.
Mkawos ma mkofrur imnis snonkaku nari ḇesun ro ḇaḇemankara kuker sasoser ḇeḇuk makakei faro snonkaku.
Snar ḇaḇemankara ḇena saswari isyaḇa nari ryarirya faro ḇesaswar ḇasya. Ḇape saswari nari ḇyuk fainda faro mankaraya.
Fainda rosai, naek srar ayesi, rofyor oso ikofen, ikada nya kakyarya, ḇape fyasna ro rari fararur ḇyena ḇa? Nari kakyar berarirya ḇyuk koreri faroike?
Rofyor naek oso roḇa srar oso isma sansun ḇa ma dananjar roḇean ro ras-ras,
ma snonkaku oso rofandu mko ikofen: "Parperoo, swabusum maramuk ma wanan rao warbor!" -- ḇape ḇyuk rosai ḇeḇefandun faroiḇa, fainda rosai ro wos anna?
Rarirya kako kuker kakyarya: Kakyarya ifnoḇek farararur ḇa, kakyar ani imar.

Ḇape nari snonkaku ono sisya sikofen: "Faro aw kakyarya isya ma faro aya fararurya isya," nari yakarem faroi: "Fasna maro aya kakyar bedi fnoḇek fararur ḇa, ma nari yafasna faro aw kakyar ayedi kuker fararurna."
Wakyare, snar Allah oser monda isya. Ḇape rodursya kako sikyar rarirya ma sradai.
Ne, snonkaku ḇefawiroyoḇa, wamarisen fakwarem ro knikine, mboi kakyar kuker fararur ḇa irya kakyar ḇeḇefainda ḇa?
Mkofawiḇake Abraham kma koḇedi, ssḇuk napnapes faroi snar fararur ḇyena, rofyor ḇyuk romawa ḇyedi Ishak ḇefarsarser, ro rokef farsarserya?
Mkomam, mboi kakyarya fyasna ifararur kayam kuker fararurya rarirya kakyar ani imnis.
Rarirya mnuk ro Refo ḇekofen: "Abraham ikyar faro Allah, ma Allah kyori ḇeḇenapes." Eḇedari Abraham sapiḇe: "Allah bati ḇyedi."
Inja mkomam, mboi snonkakusya sisma napnapesya snar fararur sena ma snar kakyar monda ḇa.
Mkofawiḇake Rakhab, bin befrur farbuk ani kako, isma napnapes snar fararur ḇyena, rofyor iyokef manpaf Israel ro rum ḇyedi, raimnai fyaspar si ro nyan oso ḇese?
Snar imnis baken ḇena rur ḇa irya kakyar ḇemar rirya, rarirya kako kakyar fnoḇek fararur ḇa irya kakyar ḇemar rirya kako.
Naek srar ayesi, rofandu mko sibor simarisen seguru awer; snar kofawi, mboi ḇaḇeguruya nari kosma mankara imnis warnkyara ḇemarḇak syadi.
Snar kokam kosasar ro roi nabor; mansei ḇesasar ḇa kuker wos ḇyena, ikada snonkaku ḇenapes, ma nari fyara baken ḇesiper ḇyedi kako.
Korir pisan ro kudaya sḇadon ḇyedi, insa iso marisen koḇena, kuker nyan ḇerarirya kako koḇuki fyara baken ḇesiper ḇyedi.
Ma komam monda faro jawarana, naba rariso wer ma wamdoḇerna nmunna rariso, ḇape neḇefara kuker remis kasun imnis manfaraya marisen ḇyedi.
Rarirya ramarya kako, ḇyekina ḇeba ḇa ro baken, ḇesyaḇo imararesi kuker roi ḇebana. Mkomam for ḇeba ḇa kako wer, ḇape ikun supna mnuk ḇesiper.
Ramarya imnis for kako. Ro baken koḇeja ramar ani ḇyeknam ro ḇarḇor fakyakek ḇarḇorya ro baken ḇesiper koḇedi. Kuker for ḇeḇeknam ro for ḇembrerḇa, for ani ikun kankenem ḇesiper koḇedi.
Aiwan ḇeḇor ḇekafdirsya kam, isoine: mansya, aiwan ḇeyanawer, ma insya snonkakusya sḇesi fasfafir kwar.
Ḇape snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ipok faḇye ramarya fafyafir; ramar ani roi oso ḇeyan ḇepek, ma kopok i ḇa, ma ifo kuker inamer ḇeḇuk marmar.
Kuker ramarya kosandik Manseren. Kma koḇedi; ma kuker ramarya kofras snonkaku Allah fyanir faḇemnis mankundi,
ro sḇadon oser ani isasyar ḇaḇok ma fafras. Inja naek srar ayesi roi ḇeradine ndarirya awer.
Isyake war ḇeprim ma war ḇesarmar susasyar ro war sun oser?
Naek srar ayesi, isyake imyui knam imarem ḇeawai bon ma isyake ur knam imarem ḇesrai bon? Rarirya kako sun ḇemasmasen nari ḇyuk war ḇeprim ba.
Mansei rofandu mko ḇefawinanem ma ḇena fawawi? Kuker kankenem ḇeḇye fyasna fararur ḇyena ro mamamkarkir ma ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ kada.
Rofyor mkokram masasor ma mkofandun mankun mko, mkomarares mankun mko awer ma mkankarkar ḇo mkosampum awer ḇaḇenapnapesya!
Inja irya ido fawawi nanem ḇerama ro boiyaswa ḇa, mboi ro supswan, ro snonkaku nafsu-rmomen sena, ro rudur ḇemaḇak.
Inja ro moḇ kokram masasor ma kofandun mankun ko rodia isya anunḇesisye ma fararur ḇeḇor ḇeḇarḇorna naisya.
Ḇape fawawinanem ḇerama ro boiyaswa ikada kyaku, ma ḇyuk aski, fyafir, iso asuser, ifo kuker saswar ma ḇyuk bon ḇeḇye, iwaira mun osoḇa ma dankarkar ḇa.
Ḇape ḇaḇenapnapesya irya bon ro askiya ma snonkaku beswar askiya siso benaisya.
Mamunmun ma rakrakrok rofandu mko ndama kero? Mkofawiḇake ndama ro rmomen-nafsu ḇefamfaḇriyae ro baken mkoḇena?
Mkormomen roi oso, ḇape mkosma i ḇa, inja mkomamun; mkokram masasor, ḇape marisen mkoḇena mkosmana ḇa, inja mkorakrakrok ma mko mamunmun. Mkosma roi oso ḇa snar mkoḇenadi ḇa.
Roḇa mkoḇenadi kako, ḇape mkosma roi oso ḇa, snar mkonadi sasar, snar roi mkorna faro marisen mankun mko ḇardi.
Ne mko, snonkaku ḇefarmku ḇa! Mkofawiḇake, ḇaḇebati kuker supswan ine, mko ḇeembroḇ kuker Allah?
Mko kara awer, mboi Refoya ḇyeknam ba faikofen: "Rur Allah ḇyukma ḇeko marisen ḇyedi syambraḇ kaku!"
Ḇape saswar-fakamaman, Allah ḇyukma ḇeko, syambraḇ syadi ro marisen rur koḇesi. Rarirya ikofen: "Allah isampum ḇemarares, ḇape iswar ḇerun sisnesna."
Eḇedari mkokunem faro Allah, ma kosampum Ibiris, rarirya nari ifrarbur mko!
Mkofanam faro Allah, ma nari Allah fyanam faro mko. Wafrur sren ḇramsi, ne snonkaku ḇesasar! ma wafrur sren snembri, ne mko ḇeḇesnemandu!
Mkofawi ḇaḇekandera mkoḇenaḇae, mkoḇarop ma mkokanes; marafrif mkoḇena neḇesadwer kuker kankanes ma raryaḇ mkoḇena kuker barop.
Mkorun mko ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi, ma nari ikanow mko.

Naek srar ayesi, mkonefyae awer mko! Mansei ḇeyonef naek ḇyedi roḇa ḇyemankara i, kyoryae Allah sasoser ḇyena; ma rofyor bemankara Allah sasoser ḇyena, rarirya ido waser sasoser anna ḇa mboi bemankarana.
Oser monda i Ḇeḇuk sasoser ma Ḇeḇemankara. Isoine Allah ḇepok ḇeḇuk koreri ma ḇeḇuk raro. Ḇape aw ido, isof wamarisen bemankara faro min besi?
Inja knikine, ne ḇekofen mkoya: "Ras Ine roḇa meser nkora ḇemnu oso, ma rodiwa nari nkokain wampasi wambarek oser ma nko farḇaḇyan ma nkosma fainda,"
rofyor ani nari mkofawi roi ḇekur mko ro meserdiya ḇa. Mankun mko kako mkofawi ḇa. Kankenem mkoḇena namnis raris kamayow ḇeḇair knik monda raimnai ipromes.
Iḇye mkokofen radine: "Manseren imarisen ido, nari nkokenem ma nkofrur ine roḇa iwa."
Ḇape knikine mkomarares ma mkofakḇun mko, ma marares ḇeḇor ḇerarirya nsasar.
Inja snonkaku oso ifawi rariso nari ifrur ḇaḇye, ḇape ifrurna ḇa, ikada, ḇyesasar.
Inja knikine ḇeḇekayan mkoya, mkoḇarop ma mkokanes snar kandera nari ḇekur mko!
Kayan mkoḇena nari ndo ma sansun mkoḇena nari opsya sanna kwar!
Sarak ma brawen mkoḇena napraf kwar, ma praf anna nesaksi faro mko ma nari nan mko imnis for. Mkofanjur kwar arasa ro rasras ḇefanam rofyor ras papupesya.
Kaku ḇeri fararar ḇeba neḇemnaf kwar, snar mkoḇak sasuref ro ḇefararur ro yaf mkoḇenasya ḇa, ma fararar anna, Manseren ḇefrur sansoren ḇoka ḇena ma ḇepoik nakam imnafna kwar.
Ro marares mkoḇena mkokenem mkan ma mkomarisen isof mkosyopen ro supswan ine, faro ras kawakwukya.
Mkoḇuk samamyai kwar, mboi mkomun snonkaku ḇenapes ḇepok ḇesampum mko ḇasya.
Rarirya, naek srar, mkokḇaḇ isof Manseren ryama! Kaku ḇeri manfrudo siwaf bon ḇeḇemaeja ro yaf sena ma sikḇaḇ isof awar mekemya isabu ma awar mekem ḇeḇuk kakyeiya.
Mko kako mkokḇaḇ ma mkofarmku, snar Manseren raramuma ḇyedi fyanam kwar!
Naek srar, mkosurem awer mko ma mkoḇuk safsofyae, insa Allah ḇyuk samamyai awer faro mko. Kaku ḇeri Mankaraya dores kwar ro kedwaya fyasos faryama.
Naek srar, mkoso nyan kandera ma ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ nabisya ḇewawos kwar kuker Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi.
Kaku ḇeri nkap si ḇeḇeaski, isoine si ḇefarmku kwar; ma mkomnaf kwar ro Ayub farmku ḇyena ma mkofawi ro ḇarpurya rosai Manseren fyasos faro i kwar, snar Manseren saswar ḇyedi iba ma ifo kuker saneso.

Ḇape ḇepon kakuya, naek srar, mko soar awer kuker boiyaswa, kako wer kuker supswan roḇa kuker roi ḇese. Inja, mboi ido mkokofen monda mboi ma roroḇa ido, mkokofen monda roroḇa, insa mkosma samamyai awer.
Rofyor snon oso rofandu mko dananjar ido ḇyenadi! Rofyor snon oso iryaḇ ido idisen!
Rofyor snon oso rofandu mko iduf ido dor penetua jemaat kada insa sinadiwarek i ma sipyosi kuker mani ro Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi.
Ma nadi ḇesasyar ro kakyar nari ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf ani ma Manseren nari ḇyawes i; ma ifrur sasar kwar, nari sasar ḇyena neḇepyos.
Eḇedari mko karemyae sasar mkoḇena kwar ido mko nadiwarekyae mko kada, insa mkoprei. Nadi ro snonkaku ḇenapes, rofyor senadi kuker snekin, nadi ani papoik ḇyedi iba kaku.
Elia snonkaku monda ḇemnis kuker ko, ma ḇyenadi kaku ḇeri kwar, insa mekemya imyun awer, ma mekemya imyun ro supya ḇa isof wampasi wambarek rikior ma paik riwonem.
Raimnai ḇyenadi wer ma nanki ḇyuk mekem ma supya kako ḇyuk bon ḇyena.
Naek srar ayesi, rofandu mko oso isasyarbur ḇaḇenapnapesya ido ma snon oso dun siḇer i,
mkofawi, mboi mansei ḇeyun kaḇer snon ḇesasar ani ro nyan ḇeḇorya, nari ḇyuk koreri faro snon ani rur ḇyedi ro marmar ma ifrur fasasar ḇeḇor ḇyena neḇepyos ma neḇefanander. Ro aya, Yakobus
Ro Petrus, Yesus Kristus wawan ḇyedi, faro kawasa Kristen ḇefamakmok ro sup Pontus, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia-Kasun ma Bitinia,

isoine kawasa skinfir, imnis kuker Allah, Kma koḇedi, aw ḇyedi ma Rurya fyasren kwar, insa sisouser faro Yesus Kristus ma ḇesma fasasren kuker rik ḇyedi. Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇye ro Allah fyarsbawer syadi faro mko kada.
Sanandik faro Allah ma Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, snar ḇaḇye ḇyedi daḇen kaḇer ko kwar snar Yesus Kristus aḇiḇer ḇyedi rofandu ḇemarsya, faro kankenem oso ḇefo kuker saneraro,
insa kosma rarwas oso nari ḇero ḇa, ḇemamas ḇa ma ḇemaryoi ḇa, ḇekram ro boiyaswa faro mko.
Isoine mko, Allah fyaduru kuker samambraḇ ḇyedi snar kakyar mkoḇena rofafisu mkowaf koreri ḇefasos kwar fanari ḇyeḇefasnai ro awar ḇepupesya.
Mkoryaḇ, mboi fafisu ine mko ḇekandera snar mkosma farawrowes nabor.

Nakam ndarirya fanfasnaḇair kakyar ḇekaku bedi -- ḇeḇemaeja syadi ro brawen nari ḇero, simnasen kakaku ḇyedi kuker for -- isof mkosma sanandik kanawnow ma ḇaḇesyowi ro ras Yesus Kristus fyasnai mankundiya.
Mko mam ḇeponi ḇaim, ḇape mkoswar i. Knikine mko mam i ḇaimo ḇape mkokyar faro i. Mkoryaḇ kuker raryaḇ ḇeba syadi.
Snar mkosma bon kwar ro kakyar mkoḇena, isoine koreri faro rur mko ḇesi.
Koreri iso nabisya skukeḇ kuker aunos, ma sḇardi kwar ro saswar-fakamaman Allah ḇyuk faro mko.

Ma skukeḇ rariso fafisu rosai koreri nari ryamaya, imnis kakara Kristus Rur ḇyedi ḇekenem ro si. Rofafisu ani Rur ḇyedi ḇyardi faro si ro kandera-kandera Kristus nari ismana ma ro baba ḇyedi nari ḇeyom ro ḇarpurya.

Fasasnaya isya kwar faro si, mboi suffarmyan mankunsi ḇardi ḇa, ḇape suffarmyan mko kuker roi ḇeḇor kam baboine sḇaryas kwar faro mko rofandu si, kuker Rur Ḇesren, ḇewanker boiyaswa, faḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro mko, ma malaikatsya simarisen fasifawi rosai sḇaryas ani kako.
Eḇedari wepen aw, ma waswaruser naḇye insa rwir saneraro ḇena kam faro saswar-fakamaman nari ssḇuk faro aw rofyor Yesus Kristus kyaḇerma werya.
Mko kenem imnis romawa ḇeḇeuser ma mkoso awer rmomen nafsu ro ḇeponiwara rofyor ḇaḇefawawi ḇa mkoḇena,
ḇape kankenem mkoḇena kam nasren imnis raris Yesus Kristus saranden ḇyedi, ḇeyor mko kwar ani kada,
snar sfas ro Refo radine: Mkosren snar aya ine yasren.
Ma rofyor mkap Allah ḇe-Kma, isoine Allah ḇemamkaryer ḇa mboi ḇeḇemankara faro snonkaku kam imnis fararur ḇyena inja mkokenem kuker araryof rofyor mkoisya ro supswan ine.
Snar mkofawi, mko ḇeḇeḇak namuk kwar ro kankenem ḇeḇefromo kpu mkoḇesi sḇefa ḇeḇewaris faro mko. Ḇaḇyak ani roi oso nari ḇeroḇa imnis sarak roḇa brawen,
mboi kuker Kristus rik ḇyedi, ḇekakur kaku, ḇemnis raris rik domba mkun ḇemamas ḇa ma ḇefarorew ḇa.
Allah kyinfir Kristus kwar rofyor supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya, ma rofyor awar ḇepupes ine, ryama ḇesupswan ine insa ḇyuk koreri faro mko.
Kuker i mkokyar faro Allah ḇeḇawes i kwar rofandu ḇemarsya ma ḇeḇuk baba faro i isof kakyar ma saneraro mkoḇena faro Allah.
Snar mkofasren mankun mko kwar kuker ḇaḇeuser faro napnapesya, isof mkoswar faro naek srar mkoḇesi kuker napnapes, inja kaku ḇeri mkoswaryae mko kuker sne ḇesiper.
Snar mko ḇeḇeyaḇen kaḇer kwar famkobabo kuker Allah wos ḇekenem ma ḇekain fyoro ḇyedi mboi mko ḇeḇeyaḇen ro ḇaḇesnonkaku ḇa, mboi ro Kma ḇekain fyoroya.
Snar ro Refo sfas radine: "Snonkakusya kam simnis aḇris, ma baba sena kam namnis aḇris pampen. Aḇrisya myaryoi, ma pampenya kako kyapaf,
ḇape Manseren wos ḇyedi kyain faswef isof fyoro-fyoro." Ine kada Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyuk faro mko.
Eḇedari mkosawen ḇarḇor ḇeḇor kam, ankarkar ḇeḇor kam ma roi ḇeḇyeḇa kam, kram masasor ma anonef.
Ma mkomnis wombrek ḇeaḇen babo, ḇemarisen ḇeyinem sus ro Rur ḇekaku, insa mkosur ma mkosma askiya.
Rofyor mkoḇaḇir Manseren ḇaḇye ḇyedi kaku ḇeri.
Ma mkora faro Manseren, karui ḇekenem ani, snonkakusya sisawen i, ḇape Allah kyinfir i imnis karui ḇeḇemaeja.
Ma mko kako mkomnis karui ḇekenem faro ḇaḇawes rum rur oso, imnis imam-imam ḇesren, faḇeḇuk farsarser rur, snar Yesus Kristus ḇeḇuk marisen faro Allah.
Snar sfas ro Refo radine: "Kaku ḇeri, yarir karui ḇekinfir oso ro Sion, karui dopir ḇekakur oso, ma mansei ḇekyar faroi, nari sifrur mamyai i ḇa."
Eḇedari faro ḇekyar mkoya, karui dopir ani kyakur, boi faro ḇekyar basya: "Karui kamasan ḇaḇawessya sisawen kwar, ḇyekarui dopir kwar ma ḇyekarui karkar kako kwar ma karui warki oso."
Siwarki snar sikyar Allah wos ḇyena ḇa; rarirya Allah fyasna kwar faro si.
Ḇape mko kada er ḇekinfir, imnis imam ḇeḇewairek, er ḇesren; Allah kawasa mankundi ḇyesi, insa mkoḇaryas Allah fararur ḇeba ḇyena, ḇeyor mko kwar famkosasyarbur pampanya faro isnai ḇyedi ḇedameserya:
Mko, Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro randakya ḇa, ḇape knikine, mko ḇekawasa ḇyesi kwar mko ḇeḇeswar ro randakya ḇa ḇape knikine mkosma saswar saneso kwar.
Naek srar yaswar kaku! Yaḇuk swarepen faro mko mkomnis mandaman ḇeḇeryar ro supswan ine, mkoso awer rmomen-nafsu ro snonkaku ḇefamfaḇri ḇesampum rurya.
Kankenem mkoḇena naḇye rofandu er-er ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya, insa rofyor sonef mko imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, nari smam fararur ḇeḇye mkoḇena ma sisandik Allah ro ras raramuma ḇyedi.
Kuker snonsnon Manseren, mkokunem faro snonkaku ḇesma papoiksya; iḇye faro Kaisar ḇesma papoik ḇekakiya,
iḇye kako faro gubernur, Kaisar fyasna kwar faḇeḇuk samamyai faro ḇeḇarḇor ma syowi faro ḇefrur roi ḇeḇyesya.
Snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, mkofrur roi ḇeḇye insa mko panos sḇadon ro ḇewosḇo ḇefawi royoḇasya.
Mkokenem imnis snonkaku ḇemkei, ma mkomnis awer snonkaku ḇeyokef ḇarḇorsena kuker ḇaḇemkeiya mboi mkokenem imnis Allah manfamyan ḇyesi.
Mko ḇesyowi snonkaku kam, mkoswar naek srar mkoḇesi, mkomkak Allah, mkoḇesyowi waireksya!
Ne, ḇeyuffarmyan, mkokunem kuker makakak faro manseren mkoḇesi, ḇefafir ma ḇeḇenaḇyesya serer ḇa, mboi faro ḇemasasorsya kako.
Snar saswar-fakamaman naisya, rofyor snon oso ifawi Allah marisen ḇyedi inja ikbaḇ ḇyar kandera ḇenapes ḇana.
Nari mkosma sanandik rariso, rofyor mkosma kandera snar sasar mko frurna? Ḇape rofyor mkofrur roi ḇeḇye raimnai mkosma kandera, nari Allah ḇyeḇok mko.
Snar faro roi ḇerarirya eḇedari mko ḇeḇeyor, snar Kristus ḇyekandera faro mko kwar ma ḇyuk fasasna faro mko kwar insa mkoso wewur ḇyena.
Ikada ifrur sasar ḇa, ma dankarkar ḇa.
Rofyor sonef-sifyaki, ima dakonef-dakfyak ḇa; rofyor isma kandera, iḇriwarek iḇa, ḇape ḇyuk mankundi faro Allah, Mankara ḇenapesya.
Mankundi ḇyar sasar koḇena kwar ro ai apropya, insa koine, ḇemar faro sasar kwar ko kenem faro ḇaḇenapnapesya. Snar amborew ḇyena kosma pararei kwar.
Snar ḇeponiwara koḇor imnis domba, ḇape baboine kokaḇer kwar faro Manfarandows Ḇefaduru Rur koḇesi.
Rarirya kako mko ne, bin ḇefakawin kwar mkoya, mkokunem faro swa mkoḇesi, insa ono ro mko seuser Allah wos ḇyedi ḇa, mkokofen roi oso faro si awer mboi rari mkoḇena nafrur fasikyar kako,
rofyor smam, kankenem ḇekaku ma ḇesren ro swa sesi.
Karamas bena, karamas ro kankenem monda awer imnis raris famankor ofur, famankor ro brawen roḇa mkosansun sansun ḇepyum,
mboi karamas ḇena nek ro sne ḇeyokef kuker karamas nari ḇero ḇa ḇeḇeknam ro rur ḇefafir ma ḇeknon, ḇeḇemaeja kaku ro Allah mamam ḇyedi.
Snar ḇeponiwara bin ḇesrensya sfamankor si rarirya, isoine bin ḇena saneraro faro Allah; skunem faro swa sesi,
imnis raris Sara ḇyesyowi Abraham ma nyiri ḇetuan ḇyedi. Ma mko kada mko ḇeromawa faroi, rofyor mkofrur roi ḇeḇye ido mkomkak awer faro rosairyawer kako:

Rarirya kako mko, ne snon ḇefakawin kwar mkoya, mkokenem kuker fawawi faro swa mkoḇesi, imnis snonkaku ḇesambraḇ ḇa syadi! Mko ḇesyowi si snar mko kam nari mkosma saswar-fakamaman ro Allah, isoine kankenem, insa nadi mkoḇena royo idwarekna ḇa.
Ma ḇarpurya, mko kam mkona wos oser, ḇaḇaḇir oser, mkoswaryae mko imnis manḇekanaek ma ḇerun sne,
ma mkomunsu awer ḇarḇor kuker ḇarḇor, roḇa anonef-fanfadak kuker anonef-fanfadak, mboi mko kaḇer kuker mkor ḇaḇok ro Allah. Snar Allah dor mko insa mkosma ḇaḇok ro i.
Ro Refo sfas radine, "Mansei ḇeswar kankenem ma bemarisen bemam ras ḇeḇye, depen sḇadon ḇyedi insa dawos roi ḇeḇye ḇa awer ma ikofen awer roi ḇeḇeankarkar.
Ḇyinkwanbur roi ḇeḇarḇor ma ifrur roi ḇeḇye, syewar ḇaḇeaski isof isma i.
Snar Manseren myamepen ḇeso marisen ḇyenasya, ma Manseren imnaf nadi sena; ḇape Manseren isampum ḇefrur ḇarḇorsya."
Ma mansei nari ḇefrur ḇarḇor faro mko, rofyor mkomyaren mkofrur roi ḇeḇye?
Ḇape mkosma kandera rariso wer kako snar ḇaḇenapnapes, nari mkosma aski. Inja mkomkak awer faro manseiryawer kako ma mkoradai awer.
Ḇape mko ḇesyowi Yesus ro mkosnemna imnis Manseren! Rofafisuna kam mkofasos insa mkoḇuk kankarem faro mansei ḇefuken saneraro mkoḇena, ḇape iḇye kada kuker fawawi ma syowi,
ma kuker sneuser ḇesren kaku insa rofyor ḇeyonef mko smam kankenem ḇeḇye mkoḇena imnis ḇeso Kristus, nari ḇeyonef ansi simai ro mankun si.
Iḇye syadi koḇekandera snar kofrur roi ḇeḇye rofyor Allah imarisen roi ḇerarirya, ro kofrur ḇarḇor.

Snar Kristus mankundi imar ḇeoser isof fyoro-fyoro snar snonkakusya sasar sena -- snonkaku oser ḇesasar ḇa imar sadwer ḇefrur sasarsya. Kristus ifrur rarirya insa dun ko faro Allah; smuni kwar imnis ḇaḇesnonkaku, ḇape ḇyeḇeḇawes kaḇer kwar imnis ḇaḇerurya.
Ma Kristus Rur ḇyedi kako rya ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro rur-rur ḇero buisya,
isoine rur snonkaku ḇeḇeuser Allah ḇa ro awar Nuh, rofafisu ani Allah ikḇaḇ ma iwaf Nuh fasasos jawara ḇyedi, faro snonkaku riwar monda ḇekenem ro faḇruḇ ani.
Baboine mko kako mkosma kankenem snar sarḇer ani, isoine masi sren -- ḇeḇuk fasasren mamas ro baken ḇa, mboi faro fararyor sneuser ḇeḇye faro Allah -- snar kaḇaḇaḇ Yesus Kristus,
ḇekain ro Allah ḇar raku ḇyedi, rofyor ḇyeḇekanow ḇeboiyaswa kwar ḇyuk sasoser faro malaikatsya kam, papoikna kam ma samambraḇna kam nkunem faroi.
Inja, Kristus isma kandera kwar imnis kandera ḇaḇesnonkaku, rarirya mko kako mkofasos romamun mkoḇena kuker kakara ḇeradine, -- snar mansesi ḇesma kandera ḇaḇesnonkaku, imnai kwar ro ifrur sasar, --
insa fafisu ḇedawerya mkoḇuki ifrur awer marisen ḇaḇesnonkakuya, mboi mkoso Allah marisen ḇyedi.
Snar fafisu nabor kwar mkoḇuki ifrur marisen snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇasya. Mkokenem kwar ro rmomen-nafsu, ḇaḇemasaser, munara ḇefnak pipi, farandinem ma syom karwar ḇeyarwarem.
Rarirya si kandor snar mkoso si famkaksun ro aner raris kankenem sena ḇa, eḇedari sonef mko.
Ḇape nari skarem faro Allah, ḇefasos kwar faḇeḇemankara faro ḇekenem ma ḇemarsya.

Eḇedari Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ḇyeḇeḇaryas kako faro ḇemarsya, insa sḇemankara si kwar kako ro ḇaḇesnonkaku -- imnis raris nari snonkakusya kam semankara si -- insa sikenem imnis ḇaḇerurya, siso Allah marisen ḇyedi.
Fafisu ḇepupesya ro roi ḇeḇor kam fyanam kwar. Inja mkepen mko ma mkoknon, ḇo mkoḇenadi.
Ḇape ḇepon kakuya: mkoswaryae mko kaku ḇeri, snar saswarya ikawef sasar nabor kaku.
Mkoḇuk moḇ ḇaḇeryaryae faro mko kuker sasurem ḇa.
Mkuffarmyanyae mko, imnis raris fakamaman snonkaku oser-oser isma kwar imnis manfarkin ḇeḇye ro Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyena.

Rofyor snonkaku ono sawawos ido, sawos imnis ḇeḇuk Allah wos ḇyedi; rofyor snonkaku ono suffarmyan ido, sifrurna kuker samambraḇ Allah ḇyukna, insa Allah isma baba ro roi ḇeḇor kam snar Yesus Kristus. I ḇesma papoik ma babaya isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
Naek srar yaswar kaku, mko kandor awer for ḇesber ḇerama ḇefrur kandera mko imnis manasnasen, imnis roi ḇeba oso isya kyur mko.
Mkoryaḇ syadi, imnis kuker rarwas mkosma ro Kristus kandera ḇyedi, insa mko kako mkoryaḇ ma mkomarisen naba rofyor Kristus fyasna baba ḇyedi.
Fainda faro mko, rofyor mkosma anonef snar Kristus snonsnon ḇyedi, snar Rur ḇeḇye, isoine Allah Rur ḇyedi isya ro mko.
Snonkaku oso kako rofandu mko ḇyekandera awer snar myamun, roḇa kyaraw, roḇa ḇyarḇor, roba snar ifrur arubiru, snonkaku ḇese wos sena.
Ḇape, rofyor isma kandera imnis snonkaku Kristen, imai awer, mboi isandik Allah snar snonsnon Kristus ani.

Snar fafisuya ryama kwar fa-Allah ḇyemankara supswan ine. Ma Allah mankundi kawasa ḇyesiso nari ḇyemankara ḇepon kakusya. Ma rofyor ḇaḇemankara ani irandak maro ko, rariso kuker snonkaku ḇekyar ḇa faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah ani?
Ro Refo sfas radine: "Rofyor ḇenapessya kermkuno kada sisma koreri ḇa, nari rariso kuker ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇesasarsya?"
Eḇedari iḇye kako ḇesma kandera snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, ssḇuk rur sesi, ma sifrur roi ḇeḇye ḇesya kwar faro Ḇefrur siya.
Yaḇuk swarepen faro penetua-penetua rofandu mko, aya imnis min penetua ma saksi ḇaḇekandera Kristus, nari ḇesma kako rarwas ro baba, rofyor Kristus baba ḇyedi ḇyeḇefasna faro snonkakusya.
Inja mkofarandows domba nai Allah ḇyesi ḇero mkororisya, kuker dafdifer awer, ḇape kuker sneḇemarisen imnis Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma mkosewar awer ḇaḇefainda, mboi mkuffarmyan kaku ḇeri.
Mkofrur imnis awer raris mkomarisen mkoḇuk sasoser faro Allah domba ḇyesi ikyar faro mko kwar, ḇape mkoḇefasasna faro domba ansi.
Ma rofyor Manfarandows Ḇebasyadi ani ryama, nari mkosma wower ḇesnaper fyoroya.
Rarirya kako, ne, snonkbor mko, mkokunem faro mansarsya. Ma mkorunyae mko, snar sfas ro Refo radine: "Allah isampum ḇemararessya, ḇape iswar ḇerun snesya."
Eḇedari rwun mankundaw faro Manseren ḇramin ḇesambraḇ ḇyesuya, insa ikanow mko rofafisu ḇyedi.
Mkoḇuk makakwarek mkoḇena kam faro Allah, snar i ḇefaduru mko.
Mkoḇaḇir ma mkepen mko! Snar mbroḇ mkoḇedi, Ibiris, imbran yar mura muma imnis raris singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) ḇeaur ma ḇesewar snonkaku fadoren ḇepek.
Kosampum i kuker kakyar ḇedworen, snar mkofawi, naek srar Kristen kam ro supswan ine ḇesiper sḇar kandera ḇemnis kam.
Ma Allah knam ro saswar-fakamaman nakam, ḇeyor mko kwar snar Kristus baba ḇyena ḇekain fyoroya nari fyasos ma isonem, ma ḇyuk samambraḇ ma syoser mko, rofyor mkosma kandera knik monda kwar.
I ḇena papoik isof fyoro-fyoroya! Amin.

Yafas syap ḇeknampu yedine faro mko kuker fafnoḇek ro Silwanus (Silas), yakara i ḇesnon Kristen oso ḇeḇeuser. Yamarisen yadif ma yaḇuk snekin faro mko mboi ine kada fakamaman Allah ḇenapes. Inja mkufepen fakamaman ani nadworen.
Bati ḇena jemaat oser ro Babilon, Allah kyinfir si kako, sfarem aroo faro mko, rarirya kako romawa saswar ayedi Markus.
Mkokofen arooyae faro mko kuker saswar imnis snon Kristen. Manseren ḇyuk aski faro mko kam ḇena Kristus i kada! Amin. Ro aya, Petrus
Ro Simon Petrus, manfamyan ma wawan Yesus Kristus, faro si ḇefnoḇek kuker nko ḇesma kakyar snar Allah ḇenapes ma Yesus Kristus Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski nabor faro mko ḇemamḇaḇir Allah ma Yesus, Manseren koḇedi.
Snar Allah papoik ro ḇaḇe-Manseren ḇyena ḇyukma ḇeko kwar roi ḇeḇefandun nabor faro kankenem ḇesren snar mamamḇaḇir koḇena faro i, ḇeyor ko kwar snar papoik baba ma ḇaḇye ḇyedi.
Kuker nyan ani ḇyuk maro ko kwar ḇaḇeasas ḇeḇemaeja ḇeba kaku, insa kukerna mkun rarwas ro papoik ḇaḇe-Manseren, ma mkokfisbur rmomen-nafsu supswan ḇeḇuk raro faro mko.
Rarirya mkoḇesewar kaku ḇeri famkofamfon kakyar ḇeḇye mkoḇena, ma faro fawawi ḇeḇye,
ma faro fawawi farmkuwarek mankun, faro ḇriwarek farmku mankun, ma faro ḇaḇenamu sarandenya,
sarandenya isoine mkokenem kuker ḇeḇeuser Allah marisen ḇyedi ma mko ḇeḇefasos kuker saswar faro naek srar min Kristensya. Saswar mkoḇedi faro min Kristen fnoḇek kuker saswar faro snonkaku kam.
Snar rofyor roi ḇeḇor nane kam naisya ro mko, nari nafrur famkomyaren ma mkoḇuk bon mamamḇaḇir faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
Ḇape mansei ḇeyakna roi ḇeḇor nane kam ḇasya, sipraf ma siḇor, ma sepro mboi sasar ḇepon sena neḇepyos kwar.
Eḇedari naek srar ayesi, mkoḇesewar kaku ḇeri, insa fararyor ma kankinfir mkoḇena nadworen syadi. Snar rofyor mkofrurna, nari mko karkar ḇa.
Rarirya nari ssḇuk syadi faro mko nyan famkaksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser ḇekain fyoroya, isoine Manseren Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ma Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko, isoine Yesus Kristus.
Inja yakara ḇesyakwar fayaḇuk swarepen faro mko ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam, mboi mkofawina kwar ma mkodworen ro napnapes mkosma kwar.
Rofyor yakenem kaker, yakara fararur ayedi fayaḇuk swarapepen faro mko ro roi kokofen nane.
Snar yafawi, nari fyoro ḇa yabur supswan ine, snar Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ikofen kwar maḇe aya.
Ḇape nari yaḇesewar, insa yabur kwar ido mkoswarepen nakam ḇesya kwar.
Snar nkoso farfyar kakais fararur snonkaku ḇa, rofafisu nko ḇaryas faro mko baba ma rarama Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus. Baba Kristus ani nkomam i kwar.
Nkoḇesaksi, rariso isma ḇaḇesyowi ma baba ro Allah Kmaya, rofafisu mkaren ryama faro i ro Allah mankundi, ḇekofen: "Ine kada Rumkun yedi yaswar kaku, yamarisen kuker i."
Mkaren nkomnaf ryamaker boiyaswa, rofyor nkowarpu i ro bon ḇesrenya bori.

Rarirya nkosma samambraḇ syadi wer ro Allah wos ḇyedi nabisya sḇaryas kwarna. Mkoswarepenna imnis raris mkoswarepen paramrom ḇesnai ro moḇ ḇepampan isof dorekna nakpef ma mak meser dek faisna mkosnemna kada.
Roi mkofawi ḇepon kakuya, isoine ḇardadi ro Refo ḇyeḇeper imnis marisen snonkaku ḇa,
snar ḇardadi anna neḇeḇaryas ro marisen snonkaku ḇa, ḇape kuker dafdif ro Rur Ḇesren snonkaku sawos kuker snonsnon Allah.

Ro ḇeponiwara nabi ḇekakuḇasya ssun rofandu Allah kawasa ḇyesi, rarirya kako rofandu mko nari guru ḇekakuḇa ono sisya. Nari ssḇuk farkarkor ninyan ḇeḇuk raro, ma nari sfamyun Ḇesma papoik ḇeḇaknamuk si kwar ma kuker nyan ḇerarirya ssun mankunsi fasaw faro raroya.
Kawasa sibor nari siso kankenem guru-guru ḇekaku ḇa ansi ḇefo kuker rmomen-nafsu sena, ma guru ansi fararur sena nari nafrur fakawasa sibor sonef Nyan Ḇenapes Allah ḇyukna.

Snar sfaḇri mankun si, inja guru ḇekakuḇa ansi nari sfarfyar faro mko farfyar sun ro mankun si fasiksma ḇaḇefainda ro mko. Ḇape faro fararur sena samamyai isya fyasos fyoro kwar ma raroya isya iwaf si.
Snar rofyor Allah iswar malaikat ḇefrur sasarsya ḇa, ḇape isawen si ro for ḇembrer ḇa ma rarirya ḇyuk si faro aḇyaḇ ḇepampan faikram si isof ras mankaraya;
ma rofyor Allah iswar supswan ḇepon ani ḇa, mboi myuni kuker faḇruḇ ḇape ḇyuk aski faro Nuh munda, manḇaryas napnapes ani, kuker snonkaku ḇese rifik;
ma rofyor Allah myun mnu Sodom ma Gomora kuker for, ma rarirya myunpres si ma ifrur swarapepen oso faro ḇekenem kuker ḇarḇor ro ḇarpursya,
ḇape ḇyuk aski faro Lot, snonkaku ḇenapes, ḇekenem pdef kuker kandera snar kankenem snonkaku ḇefawi sasoser ḇa ma ḇeso monda rmomen-nafsu sena,
snar snonkaku ḇenapes sine sikenem rofandu si ma ro rasras smam ma simnaf fararur ḇarḇor sena, isof rur ḇenapes sesi sisma kandera --
inja Manseren ifawi rariso ḇyuk aski faro snonkaku ḇesouser marisen ḇyena rofyor sisma fafrowes. Ma Manseren ifawi rariso ikram snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor faro kandera ro Ras Ḇaḇemankaraya,
ḇeponya snonkaku ḇeso rmomen-nafsu sena ḇemamas ma ḇeyonef Allah papoik ḇyedi. Guru ḇekakuḇa ansi sararyof ḇa mboi simarares si isof skormararu ḇa fasonef roi ḇekenem ma ḇepyum ro boiyaswa kako!
Mboi malaikatsya ḇesambraḇ ma ḇesma papoik syadi ro guru-guru ḇekakuḇa ansi ḇesyaḇo, sakkofen wos anonef faro roi ḇekenem ma ḇepyum ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇa.

Guru ansi simnis aiwan ḇena swaruser ḇa, simnis kuker aiwan sikapar faseḇefor ma seḇemun kam monda. Sonef rosai sifawi ḇa, isof kuker fararur ḇeḇarḇor sena nari mankunsi simar kukerna imnis aiwan ḇekafdir,

ma nari sisma kankenem ḇeḇyeḇa imnis sasuref ro ḇarḇor sena. Sifrur marisen sisnesna kuker rosairya monda ro meserna, fanafrur syopen rmomen-nafsu baken sena. Rofyor skain warpu mko ro munara nanan, simnis mamas ḇefrur ayin snar simser kuker rmomen-nafsu.

Mamam sena nafo kuker rmomen-nafsu ḇaḇefarḇuk ma simnai ḇa ro sifrur sasar. Sidenem snonkaku kakyar ḇedworen ḇasya fasiso kakara sena. Sisnesna nebefari kwar kuker faḇri mankun. Sikada snonkaku ḇesma fafras!
Snar sibur nyan ḇenapesya kwar, inja siḇor, ḇo siso Bileam, Beor mandaḇendi nyan ḇyedi ḇemarisen ḇena sasuref ro fararur ḇeḇarḇor.
Ḇape Bileam isma swarapepen ḇepakrek snar ḇarḇor ḇyena, rofyor keledai ḇeḇeawer dawos imnis mkaren snonkaku ma idwarek nabi ḇefawiroyoḇa ani.
Guru ḇekakuḇa ansi simnis war sun ḇesyor, simnis mandep doḇerya isopum; sfasos kwar faro si moḇ ḇepampan ḇeyun nyawa.
Snar sikofen wos marares ḇeḇebei ma sifrur rmomen-nafsu farḇakḇuk fasidenem snonkaku ḇesusu babobur kankenem ḇeḇor.
Guru ḇekakuḇa ansi sḇeasas ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku ansi mboi mankun sikada sḇewomen faro kankenem nari ḇero -- snar roi oso ḇefrur kafyo snonkaku, ikada ḇyewomen faro roi ḇefrur kafyo iya.
Ma smamḇaḇir Manseren ma Yesus Kristus, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko, fyaspar mankundi kwar ro arwarem supswan, ḇape kyaḇer faro nawer, isof ḇarpurya kankenem sena naḇyeḇa syadi wer ro randakya.
Eḇedari iḇye syadi smamḇaḇir awer napnapesya, snar rofyor ssmambaḇir i, ḇape ḇarpurya skaḇerbur Allah sasoser ḇyuk faro siya.
Wos peper ine kyaku fafyasna rosai sifrurna, "Rofanya kyaḇer fadan ḇayorem ḇyena," ma "Randip simasi kwar, nari kyaḇer fadaner i ro aner ḇyedi."
Naek srar yaswar kaku, ine syap ḇeḇesuru yafas faro mko. Ro syap ansuya yaḇesewar fayaḇawes kakara ḇekaku ro mko,
insa mkoswarepen Allah nabi ḇyesi wos sikofen ro ḇeponiwara ma mkoswarepen Manseren sasoser ḇyena, Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri, wawan mkoḇesi sikofen ḇadir faro mko kwar.
Roi mkoswarepen ḇepon kakuya isoine, ro ras awar ḇepupesya nari snonkaku ḇekenem ma ḇeso rmomen-nafsu nari sikḇawes fasonef mko.
Sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Asas Manseren iḇe ryamumaya isyaro? Snar kma ma up nkoḇesi simar kwar, ḇape roi ḇeḇor kam namnis raris ro randakya rofafisu supswan ḇyeḇefrurya!"
Sikada sifrur ḇeḇefawi ḇa, mboi snar Allah ikofen nanki isya kwar ro ḇepon ma supswan kako ḇeḇeknam ro warya ma snar warya,
ma snar war ani, supswan ḇepon ani ryo kwar kuker faḇruḇya.
Ḇape kuker wos ani kako nanki ma supswan ro baboine ḇyeḇefaduru ro for ma ḇyeḇekram isof ras ḇaḇemankara ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya sro.

Ḇape naek srar yaswar kaku, roi oser ine mkofanander awer i, isoine mboi ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ras oser imnis raris wampasi wambarek syaran oser ma wampasi wambarek syaran oser imnis raris ras oser.
Manseren nari isusu asas ḇyedi ḇa, mboi snonkaku ono sisya skara rarirya, ḇape ikḇaḇ faro mko, snar imewer oso ryo, mboi insa snonkaku kam simbror ma skaḇer.

Ḇape Manseren Ras raramuma ḇyedi imnis ḇekaraw. Ro ras ani nari nanki ipromes kuker rakrok maum ḇeyun nyawa ma roi ḇeḇor ro supswan nari narus ro for ḇesberya, ma supswan kuker roi ḇeḇor ḇeroina nari napromes.
Inja, roi ḇeḇor anna kam nemompraf rarirya, iḇye mkokenem nasren
isoine mko ḇewaf ma ḇeswarmura ro Manseren Ras raramuma ḇyedi. Ro ras ani nari nanki inanem kuker for ma roi ḇeḇor ro supswan nari najaren snar saksak forya.
Ḇape kowaf rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar, isoine nanki ḇebabo ma supswan ḇebabo, ro moḇ kosma ḇaḇenapnapesya.
Inja, naek srar yaswar kaku, rofafisu mkowafwaf roi ḇeḇor nane kam, iḇye syadi mkoḇesewar, insa sisma mkofarorewḇa ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi kuker ḇaḇeaski ro Allah.
Kwara Manseren koḇedi ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ ḇyedi imnis fafisu famkosma aski, imnis Paulus kako, naek koswar ani, fyas faro mko kwar iso mamkarkir Allah ḇyuk faro iya.

Paulus syap ḇeḇor ḇyena fyas ḇesya kwar roi ḇeḇor nane. Kaku roi ono naisya nsamswen isof sifawina ḇa ro syap anna. Ma ḇefawina ḇasya ma kakyar ḇedworen ḇasya, siwararye rosai Paulus fyasna. Mnuk ḇese ro Refo siwararyena rarirya kako. Nane nari neknam raro faro mankun si.
Ḇape mko naek srar yaswar kaku, mkofawi ḇepon roi ḇeḇor nane kwar. Inja mkepen mko, imbude mkosaso snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇefawi sasoser ḇa isof mkosapibur moḇ ḇeknonya.
Iḇye kada mkofawi kaku Manseren ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyena, Wairek Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko isoine Yesus Kristus, ma mko kako mkofawi kaku i. Sanandik faro i, ro baboine isof fyoro-fyoro kada! Amin. Ro aya, Petrus
Syap ine kyur Wos ḇeḇuk kankenem, isoine Wosya isya kwar roawar madero. Nkomnaf i kwar, ma nkomam i kwar, kuker nkomkasna. Nkomami kwar ma nkuf i kwar kuker nkoḇrasna.
Rofafisu kankenem ani ḇyeḇefasnai, ma nkomami kwar. Rarirya nkoḇesaksi i ma nkoḇaryas faro mko kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoro, isya fnoḇek Kmaya, ma sfasnai kwar faro nko.
Rosai nkomam kwar ma nkorower, ikada nkokofen ḇadir faro mko kako, insa mkoḇeoser kuker nko ma koso Kmaya ma Rumkun ḇyedi, Yesus Kristus.
Ma nkofasna kam faro mko, insa kosnesna namarisen kaku ḇeri.
Wos nkosma kwar ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ma nkoḇuk faro mko isoine: Allah ikada isnai, ma pampanya isya ro iḇaḇeri.
Rofyor kokofen ḇo koḇo, mboi koḇeoser kuker i, ḇape kokenem ro pampan, koḇeankar iḇye ro wos ma fararur koḇena kako.
Ḇape rofyor kokenem ro isnai imnis raris Allah isya ro isnai kako, nari kosma ḇaḇeoser kuker snonkaku ḇesesya, ma Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, Yesus rik ḇyena, nfasren sasar ḇeḇor koḇena kam.
Rofyor kokofen ḇo koḇo, kosasar ḇa, koḇeankar mankun ko ma napnapesya isya ro koḇa.
Mboi rofyor kokarem sasar koḇena faro Allah, nari ḇyuk raris asas ḇyedi ma ifrur rosai ḇenapes. Nari ipyos sasar koḇena ma fyasren ko ro ḇarḇor ḇeḇor koḇena.
Ḇape rofyor kokofen ḇo koḇo, kosasar ḇa, kofrur Allah imnis raris ḇeḇeankarkar; isoine kokram Allah wos ḇyena ro kosnesna ḇa.
Romawayesi! Yafas roi nane faro mko insa mkofrur sasar awer. Ḇape rofyor ono sifrur sasar, ḇefnoḇek ko isoine Yesus Kristus, ḇenapes ani; nari iwos fandun koḇena ro ḇarpon Kmaya.
Kuker fafnoḇek Yesus Kristus ani kosma ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar koḇena. Ma kerer kosma payasyos ro sasar koḇena ḇa, mboi sasar ro kawasa kam ro supswan ine kako.
Rofyor koḇeuser Allah sasoser ḇyena, irya kofawi Allah.
Mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, "Yafawi Allah," ḇape ḇyeuser Allah sasoser ḇyena ḇa, snon ani dankar, ma Allah wos ḇekaku ḇyedi isya ro sne ḇyedi ḇa.
Ḇape mansei ḇeḇeuser Allah wos ḇyena ido, iswar kaku Allah. Ine fyasna koḇeoser ma kokenem kuker Allah kwar.
Mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, ḇyeoser ma ikenem kuker Allah, kankenem ḇyedi imnis raris Yesus kada.
Naek srar yaswar kaku! Roi yafas nane sasoser ḇebabo naisya ḇa. Mboi sasoser ḇekwar ro randakya sikofen faro mko isoine wos mkorower ro Allah kwar.
Ma roi yafas nane sasoser babo nairya kako; sasoser anna nfasna Yesus mankundi ma faro mankun mko kako; snar rofyor pampanya ipromes ma isnaiya iyar kwar.
Mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, ima isya ro isnaya dori, ḇape dayin naek ḇyedi, ikada isya ro pampanya isof baboine.
Mansei ḇeswar naek ḇyedi, ikada ikenem ro isnaiya, snar roi oso isya ro iḇa ḇefrur fanari snonkaku ḇese sifrur sasar.
Ḇape mansei ḇeayin naek ḇyedi, ikada isya ro pampan, imbran ro pampanya, ma ifawi moḇ iḇe ryaḇeya ḇa, snar pampanya ifrur famyam ba.
Yafas faro mko kam, ne, romawa yesi, snar sasar mkoḇena Kristus ipyos na kwar.
Yafas faro mko kam, ne, kma yesi, snar mkofawi Allah, isya kwar ro awar madero. Yafas faro mko, ne, snonkbor mkoya, snar mkokafyo ḇarḇor Ibirisya kwar.

Yafas faro mko kam, ne, romawa yesi, snar mkofawi Kmaya kwar. Yafas faro mko kam, ne, kma yesi, snar mko kam mkofawi wos ma ro awar madero isya kwar. Yafas faro mko kam, ne, snonkbor mkoya, snar mkosambraḇ ma Allah wos ḇyedi isya ro mkosnemna, inja mkokafyo Ibirisya kwar.
Mkoswar awer supswan ine, roḇa rosai isya ro supswan ine. Rofyor mkoswar supswan ine, nari mkoswar Kmaya ḇa.

Roi ḇeḇor ro supswan ine kawasa ḇesasarsya sirmomen na -- isoine roi ḇeḇor ḇeyun sne, isof sirmomen sna na, ma roi ḇeḇor sirmomen na insa ssḇuki darer mankunsi -- nane neknam ro Kmaya ḇa, mboi ro supswan ine.
Supswan ine ma roi ḇeḇor kawasa sirmomen ro ina nari napromes. Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyena, ikenem faswef isof fyoro-fyoro.

Romawa yesi mko, awar papupesya fyanam kwar! Ma imnis raris sikofen ḇadir faro mko kwar, Kristus mbroḇ ḇyesi nari srama, rarirya baboine Kristus mbroḇ ḇyesi sikḇok kwar. Ine aḇyair ḇeko rofafisu Ras Ḇepupesya fyanam kwarya.
Mbroḇ Kristus ḇyesi snonkaku ḇebur ko kwar, inja snonkaku koḇesisya ḇa. Snar sun ro rarwas koḇedi ido nari sisya kuker ko. Ḇape sisasyarbur ko, fyasnai oso ro si snonkaku koḇedisya ḇa.
Ḇape Yesus Kristus ḇyuk Allah Rur ḇyedi fabyepoik mko kwar. Ma rarirya mko kam mkofawi Allah ḇenapesya.
Inja yafas ine faro mko snar mkofawi Allah kwar, ma mkofawi Allah ḇenapes dankar ḇaim.
Mansei ḇeḇeankarkar ani? Ḇeḇeankarkar isoine snonkaku ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, Yesus Wairek Ḇeyun koreri raris Allah asas ḇyedi ḇa. Snonkaku ani Kristus mbroḇ ḇyedirya; ikada kyarem Kmaya ma Rumkunya ḇa.
Mansei ḇekarem Rumkun ani ḇa, ikako nya Kmaya ḇa kako. Mansei ḇekarem Rumkun ani, ikada nya Kmaya kako.
Snar rarirya ḇyaryas mkomnaf kwar ro randakya mkokara naḇye i ro mkosnemna. Rofyor mkokarai naḇye ḇaryas ani, nari mko ḇeoser kuker Rumkun ani ma Kmaya.
Ma inekada Kristus mankundi ḇyeasas maroko isoine: Kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoro.
Rosai yafas nane kam nkur snonkaku ḇeḇesasewar ḇefarkor ninyan mkosya.

Ḇape mankun mko ḇardi, Kristus isbawer Rur ḇyedi kwar faro mko. Ma rofyor Rur ḇyedi isya ro mko, inja fandunḇa fasnonkaku sfarkor mko. Snar Rur ḇyedi fyarkor mko ro roi ḇeḇor kam; ma rosai fyarkor na nkaku, ma nasrer ḇa. Rarirya, mkomarisen ma mkoḇesyowi Rurya rosai fyarkor na, ma mkomarisen mkoḇeoser kuker Kristus.
Inja, romawa yena mko, mko ḇeoser kuker Kristus, insa rofafisu ryama, kuker kakyar nari komku ro ḇarpon ḇyedi, ma koḇaḇir komai ḇa.
Mkofawi kwar Kristus ikenem ma iso Allah marisen ḇyedi. Snar rarirya mkofawi kako snon oso ikenem ma iso Allah marisen ḇyedi, ikada Allah romawa ḇyedirya.
Mkomame! Allah iswar ko rarirya isof sap ko ḇeromawa ḇyesi; ma rarirya -- koine Allah romawa ḇyesi. Rarirya supswan ḇeḇarḇor ine sifawi koḇa, snar supswan sifawi Allah ḇa.
Naek srar yaswar kaku! Baboine koine Allah romawa ḇyesi ko, ḇape rariso kuker ko, ima ḇyeḇefasnai ḇaim maro ko. Mboi kofawi rofyor Kristus ryama nari komnis i, snar nari komam kaku i.
Snonkaku kam ḇena kakyar ine faro Kristus, iwaren mankundi insa isren kaku ḇeri ro sasar, imnis Kristus kako isren ro sasar.
Mansei ḇefrur sasar, ḇyeuk Allah sasoser ḇyena; snar sasar ikada ḇaḇeuk Allah sasoser ḇyena.
Ma mkofawi Kristus ryama faipyos snonkakusya sasar sena, ḇape ima dakḇesasar ḇa.
Snar snonkaku kam ḇekenem ma ḇeḇeoser kuker Kristus, ifrur sawawek sasar ḇa. Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur sawawek sasar, isrow Kristus ḇaim roḇaido ifawi Kristus ḇaim.
Romawa yesi mko, mkomam monda awer ḇo manseirya kako ḇyeninyan awer mko. Mansei ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi, ḇyeknam ro Allah, imnis Kristus ḇyeknam ro Allah kako.
Mansei ḇefrur sawawek sasar ikada Ibirisya romawa ḇyedirya, snar Ibiris ifrur sasar ro randakya. Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ryama ḇesupswan ine insa kyakok Ibirisya fararur ḇyena.
Snonkaku oser-oser ḇeḇeromawa faro Allah kwar, ifrur sawawek sasar ḇa, snar Allah papoik ḇyedi isya roi. Ma snar Kma ḇyedi Allah, inja ifrur sawawek sasar ḇa.
Inekada aḇyair rofandu Allah romawa ḇyesi kuker Ibirisya romawa ḇyesi: Mansei ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi ḇa, roḇaido iswar naek ḇyesi ḇa, ḇyeromawa Allah ḇaim.
Snar ro randakya sḇair ḇaryas ine faro mko kwar: isoine mkoswaryae mko.
Ma komnis awer Kain, ḇeḇeknam ro Ibiris isof myun ḇedar ḇyedi. Snaro Kain myun ḇedar ḇyedi? Snar roi ifrur na nsasar, ma roi ḇedar ḇyedi ifrur na nakada nanapes.
Rarirya, naek srar yesi, mkokandor awer rofyor snonkaku ro supswan ine siyin mko.
Kofawi kosasyar kwar ro marmar, ma baboine kokenem. Kofawi snar koswar naek koḇesi. Mansei ḇesaswar ḇa, ikada isya ro papoik marmarya.
Mansei ḇeayin naek ḇyedi, ikada snon mamun, ma mkofawi snon oso myamun ikada nya kankenem ḇekain fyoroya ḇa.
Rarirya kofawi Kristus saswar ḇyedi, isoine ḇyuk kankenem ḇyedi faro ko kwar; ma ko kako koḇuk kankenem koḇena faro naek srar koḇesi!
Rofyor snon oso nya papus ro supswan ine, ma myam naek ḇyedi isma namnis ḇa, ḇape imewer fyasna fafnoḇek faro naek ḇyedi, rariso snon ani ikofen ḇo doḇo, iswar Allah?
Romawa yena mko! Koswar monda awer kuker sḇadon roḇaido wawos. Ḇape koswar kuker saswar ḇekaku, kofasna ro fararur koḇena.
Rarirya kofawi koḇeknam ro Allah, isof koknon ro ḇarpon Allah.
Ma rofyor kosnesna nbaḇir kosasar, kofawi Allah ibasyadi ro kosnesna ma ifawi roi ḇeḇor kam.
Inja naek srar ayesi yaswar kaku, rofyor kosnesna nbaḇir kosasar ḇa, kora faro Allah kuker kakyar.
Ma rosai kor roi kosmana, snar koso sasoser ḇyena kam ma kofrur rosai imarisen na.
Roi syoser maroko isoine: Kokyar faro Rumkun ḇyedi Yesus Kristus; ma koswaryae ko, imnis raris sasoser Kristus faro ko.
Mansei ḇeḇesyowi Allah sasoser ḇyena, ḇyeoser kuker Allah, ma Allah ḇyeoser kuker si. Ma kofawi Allah ḇyeoser kuker ko snar Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuki faro ko kwar.

Naek srar yesi yaswar kaku! Mkokyar awer faro snonkaku ḇekarem ḇo ḇeyoḇo, ḇena Allah Rur ḇyedisya, ḇape mkomnasen ḇepon si famkofawi rur rosai isya ro si ḇyeknam ro Allahke roḇa. Snar nabi sararer sibor sikḇok ḇo sraḇe supswan ḇesiper.
Rarirya kofawi Allah Rur ḇyedi: snonkaku ḇekarem Yesus Kristus ryama ḇesupswan ine imnis snonkaku, snon ani nya Rur ḇerama ro Allah.
Ma snonkaku ḇekarem Yesus ḇa, nya Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇa. Snon ani nya rur ḇeḇembroḇ Kristus. Rur ani sikofen ḇadir faro mko kwar nari ryama. Baboine isya ro supswan ine kwar.
Ḇape romawa ayesi, mko kada Allah romawa ḇyesi. Mko kada mkokafyo nabi-nabi sararer ansi kwar, snar Rur ani isya ro mko ipok syadi ro rur ḇero snonkaku ḇeḇeknam ro supswan ine.
Nabi sararer ansya sowawos ro roiḇero supswan, ma supswan simnaf wos sena, snar si seknam ro supswan ine.

Ḇape ko kada Allah romawa ḇyesi; ma snonkaku ḇemambaḇir Allah, simnaf wawos koḇena kako. Snonkaku ḇeḇeromawa Allah ḇa, simnaf wos koḇena ḇa. Rarirya aḇyair ine kofawi rofandu Rur ḇekfin snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ma rur ḇefarkor ninyan snonkaku.
Naek srar yaswar kaku! Mkorama koswaryae ko, snar saswar ḇyeknam ro Allah. Snonkaku ḇesaswar, ikada Allah romawa ḇyedi ma ifawi Allah.
Mansei ḇesaswar ḇa, ikada myambaḇir Allah ḇa, snar Allah ikada isaswar.
Allah fyasna saswar ḇyedi ro kosnesna snar iwan Rumkun oser ḇyedi ḇesupswan ine insa kuker Rumkun ḇyedi kosma kankenem.
Inekada saswar: Koi ḇeswar kwar Allah i ḇa, ḇape Allah i ḇeswar ko kwar, inja iwan Rumkun ḇyedi insa kuker i kosma ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar koḇena.
Naek srar yaswar kaku, rofyor Allah iswar ko rarirya, ko kako koswaryae ko.
Snon osoḇa kako ḇemam Allah kwar, ḇape Allah ḇyeoser kuker ko ma saswar ḇyedi imnis maro ko, rofyor koswaryae ko.
Rarirya Allah ḇyuk kwar maro ko Rur ḇyedi, inja kofawi koḇeoser kwar kuker Allah ma Allah ḇyeoser kuker ko.
Mankun nko nkomam kwar Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ma nkoḇaryas faro snonkaku ḇese mboi Kmaya iwan i kwar faḇye Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri faro supswan ine.
Mansei ḇekarem Yesus ani Allah Rumkun ḇyedirya, Allah ḇyeoser kuker snonkaku ani, ma snonkaku ani kako ḇyeoser kuker Allah.
Ko ḇardi kofawi ma kokyar Allah saswar ḇyedi maḇeko. Allah ikada isaswar. Snonkaku Allah saswar ḇyedi ḇyepoiksya, snon ani ḇyeoser kuker Allah, ma Allah ḇyeoser kukeri.
Saswarya ḇyeḇefrur faimnis maḇe ko, insa komkak ḇa kora faro Allah ro Ras Mankaraya. Nari komkak ḇa, snar kokenem imnis raris Kristus, koisya kokenem ro supswan ine.
Mansei ḇesaswar, snonkaku ani imkak ḇa; snar saswar ḇemnis iyaw ḇaḇaḇir makakakya. Rarirya, saswar ani ḇyeḇefrur mnis ḇaim ro snonkaku ḇemkak ani, snar makakak dun samamyai.
Kosaswar snar Allah iswar syadi ko ḇepon kwar.
Rofyor snonkaku oso ikofen ḇo doḇo, "Yaswar Allah," ḇape dayin naek ḇyedi, snonkaku ani isararer. Snar snonkaku ḇeayin naek ḇyedi myam faroya, nari rariso iswar Allah myam ḇaimya.
Ma inekada sasoser Kristus ḇyuk maḇe ko: Mansei ḇeswar Allah, dakswar naek ḇyedi kako.
Snonkaku ḇekyar Yesus ikada Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri, Allah ḇyeasas kwar, snonkaku ani kada Allah romawa ḇyedirya. Ma snonkaku ḇeswar Kmaya, iswar Kmaya Rumkun ḇyedi kako.
Nari kofawi koswar Allah romawa ḇyesi, rofyor koswar Allah ma koḇesyowi sasoser ḇyena.
Snar, koswar Allah inja koḇeuser sasoser ḇyena. Ma sasoser ḇyena nmarḇak maro ko ḇa,
snar Allah romawa ḇyesi sambraḇ sifrurkafyo supswan ḇeḇarḇor ine. Ma kofrurkafyo supswan kuker kakyar koḇena.
Mansei ḇefrurkafyo supswan kuker ḇarḇor ḇyena? Derer monda snonkaku ḇekyar Yesus ikada Allah Rumkun ḇyedi.

Yesus Kristus ryama ḇesupswan kuker masisren ḇyedi ma kuker rik marmar ḇyedi. Ryama kuker war monda ḇa, ḇape kuker war ma rik kako. Ma Allah Rur ḇyedi mankundi ḇeḇesaksi mboi inekada kyaku, snar Rur anikada inapes.
Snar saksi rikior isya [ro boiyaswa: Kmaya, Wosya ma Rur Ḇesrenya; sko kam skoḇeoser.
Ma saksi rikior skoḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ro supswan ine]: Rurya, warya ma rikya, skokam skoḇeoser.
Kokyar ḇaḇesaksi ro snonkaku, ḇape ḇaḇesaksi ro Allah syambraḇ syadi wer. Ma inekada ḇaḇesaksi Allah ḇyuk kwar ro Rumkun ḇyedi.
Mansei ḇekyar faro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, isma kwar ḇaḇesaksi ani ro mankundi; ḇape mansei ḇekyar Allah ḇa, ifrur kwar Allah ḇe ḇeḇeankarkar, snar ikyar ḇa rosai Allah ḇyesaksi kwar ro Rumkun ḇyedi.
Ḇaḇesaksi ani isoine: Allah ḇyuk kwar ḇeko kankenem ḇekain fyoroya; ma Rumkun ḇyedi ḇeḇeknam kankenem ḇekain fyoro ani.
Ma mansei ḇena Rumkun ani, nari nya kankenem ḇekain fyoro ani; ma mansei ḇena Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ḇa, nari nya kankenem ani ḇa.
Faro ḇekyar Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, yafas nane kam insa mkofawi mkona kankenem ḇekain fyoroya kwar.
Ma komsik ḇo kora faro Allah, snar kokyar imnaf fararyor koḇena, rofyor kor rosairya wer imnis kuker marisen ḇyedi.
Ma rofyor kofawi imnaf fararyor koḇena ma kofawi kako nari ḇyuk rosai kor kwar faroi na.

Rofyor snon Kristen koḇesi oso ifrur sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar ḇa, mkonadi warek i faro Allah; ma nari Allah ḇyuk kankenem faro snon ani. Ine kyur ḇefrur sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar ḇa. Ḇape isya sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar, ima yakofen ḇa insa mkonadi warek faro Allah ro sasar ani.
Fararur ḇeḇor ḇeḇarḇor, sasarnairya, ḇape isya sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar ḇa.
Kofawi snonkaku ḇeḇeromawa Allah, sifrur sasar sawawek ḇa, snar Allah Rumkun ḇyedi fyadiren si, ma Ibirisya ifrur roi oso faro si ḇa.
Kofawi koine koḇeknam ro Allah, ma supswan ḇesiper ine isya ro papoik Ibirisya.

Kofawi Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ryama kwar ma ḇyuk ḇeko fawawi kwar, insa kofawi Allah Ḇenapesya. Kankenem koḇena neoser kuker Allah Ḇenapes ani ma koḇeoser kuker Rumkun ḇyedi Yesus Kristus. Ikada Allah Ḇenapes, ma ikada kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoroya.
Romawa ayesi, mkoḇinkwanbur amfyanir ḇeḇor kam!
Syap ine ro aya, manfarkin jemaat, faro Sna Allah kyinfir ma romawa ḇyesi yaswar kaku ḇeri. Yerer monda ḇa, ḇape snonkakusya kam ḇefawi wos ḇenapes ro Allah, ḇeswar mko kako,
snar Allah ḇenapes kyain ro kosnesna, ma nari isya ḇesya kwar kuker ko isof fyoro-fyoro.
Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ro Allah Kmaya, ma ro Yesus Kristus, Kmaya Rumkun ḇyedi nari ifnoḇek ko kuker napnapes ma saswarya.
Yamarisen kaku yafawi mboi romawa besi ono sisya sikenem siso napnapes ro Allah raris Kmaya syoser faro ko kwar.
Snar rarirya, yor kaku ḇeri, faro awin au, insa kokam koswaryae ko. Roi yafas nane sasoser ḇebabo oso irya ḇa; sasoser ine ssḇuki faro ko kwar ro randakya.
Mkosaswar isoine mkokenem mkoso Allah sasoser ḇyena. Ma sasoser mkomnaf kwar ro randakya isoine mkoswaryae mko.
Ḇesararer sibor sisasyar kwar ḇesupswan ḇesiper. Sima snonkaku ḇekarem ḇa Yesus Kristus ryama ḇesupswan imnis raris snonkaku. Snonkaku ḇerarirya sikada ḇesararer ma mbroḇ Kristus ḇyesirya.
Inja mkowaren imbude rosai koḇesewar faro mko ryobur mkondi. Mkoḇesewar insa mkosma sasuref mkoḇena kam.

Mansei ḇeso Kristus farkarkor ḇyena ḇa, mboi isasyarbur rosai Kristus fyarkor na, snonkaku ani ḇyeoser kuker Allah ḇa. Mansei ḇekain nako ro Kristus farkarkor ḇyena, nari ḇyeoser kuker Kmaya ma kuker Rumkunya kako.
Rofyor snonkaku oso ryama faro mko ma ḇyuk farkarkor Kristus ḇyuk na ḇa, mkosrow i ro rum mkoḇena awer; ma mkokofen awer aroo faro i.
Snar mansei ḇekofen aroo faro snonkaku ḇerarirya, iso kako snon ani ḇo sufrur fararur ḇeḇarḇor ani.
Roi nabor kaku ḇeḇefandun yaḇe yakofen ḇadir faro mko, ḇape yaḇaḇir iḇye syadi yafas awer na ro syap ine. Yakyar nari yarakaki mko ma mankundaya yawawos kuker mko, insa kosnesna namarisen kaku ḇeri.
Romawasya ro naek Sna koswar ro dine sfarem aroo faro Sna ro diya.
Gayus, naek yedi yaswar kaku! Aya, manfarkin jemaat, yaswar kaku ḇeri naek aw.
Yaḇenadiwarek insa nakam naḇye kuker aw ma wasma pararei imnis raris rur bedi iḇye kako.
Yaryaḇ kaku rofyor naek Kristen ono srama ma sikofen ḇadir ma beya ḇaḇeuser bedi ro ḇaryas ḇenapes ro Allah, snar wakenem ma wasouser ḇaryas ḇenapes ani.
Roi oso ḇa ḇefrur fayaryaḇ syadi ro yamnaf romawa yesi sikenem imnis ḇaryas ro Allah.
Naek yedi! Sasoasuser naek bedi komam fyasna ro rosai naek wafrurya faro naek Kristensya; ma naek wafawi ḇaimsya kako wuffarmyan si.
Sikofen ḇadir kwar faro jemaat ro dine ro saswar bedi. Wafnoḇek si insa simbran pdef ro mararan sedi. Wafrur rarirya imnis raris Allah marisen ḇyedi,
snar naek ansi mararan seja suffarmyan faro Kristus. Sifararur ma sisma fafnoḇek rosai ḇa kako ro kawasa ḇekyar faro Kristus ḇa.
Rarirya kawasa Kristen ko kofnoḇek min Kristen koḇesi imnis raris sine, insa koso si ro ḇaḇesewar sedi fakoḇaryas ḇemoḇ nakam ro Allah ḇekakuya wos ḇenapes ḇyedi.
Yafas kwar syap ḇeknampu faro jemaat, ḇape Diotrefes ḇemarisen ḇeḇe manfarkin ro jemaat, imewer iso aya.

Nari rofyor yarafa, yawos ro rosai ifrur kwar, isoine ro roi ḇarḇor ma sararer ikofen ro inkoya! Ḇape nakam namnis ḇaim faroi. Rofyor naek Kristen koḇesi srama faro i, imewer isrow si. Isyadi wer myunwarek kawasa ḇemarisen ḇesrow naek srar ansi, ma iwan fasisasyarbur jemaat!
Naek ayedi yaswar kaku, waso awer rosai ḇeḇye ḇa. Mboi waso rosai ḇeḇye. Mansei ḇefrur roi ḇeḇye, ḇyeknam ro Allah. Ma mansei ḇefrur roi ḇarḇor, isoine isrow Allah ḇaim.
Kawasa kam sisandik Demetrius. Ma ro ḇaryas ḇekaku ro Allah kako, sisandik i. Inko kako inkosandik i, ma mkofawi sanandik inkoḇena nkaku.
Roi nabor ḇeḇefandun yaḇe yakofen faro mko, ḇape yaḇaḇir iḇye syadi kuker syap awer.
Yakyar fyoro ḇa nari yasrow mko wer, ma nari kowawos ro ḇarpon kuker ḇarpon.
Aski faro aw! Min koḇesi ro dine sfarem aroo faro naek aw. Wakofen ḇadir aroo yena faro min kobansi kam.
Naek srar ḇesma fararyor kwar ro Allah Kmaya, iswar kaku ma mkoḇeḇewaren faro Yesus Kristus. Aya -- Yudas -- naek ro Yakobus, ḇeḇemanwawan ro Yesus Kristus;
yakyar Allah ḇyeḇok mko ma ḇyuk ḇemko ḇaḇye ma aski nabor kada.

Naek srar yaswar kaku! Kaku ḇeri yakara yafas syap faro mko ro ḇaḇeaski kokam kofawi kwar ani. Ḇape baboine yaḇaḇir yasma dafdif fayaḇuk ananun faro mko kuker syap ine insa mkofaḇri ro Allah kakyar ḇyuk ḇeoser kwar monda isof fyoro-fyoro faro kawasa ḇyesi.

Snar fawawi ḇa, mboi snonkaku ono sisya ssun yokef rofandu mko. Si snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ḇeḇeninyan ḇaryas ro Allah koḇedi ḇaḇye ḇyena fasḇuk ifrur nafsu-rmomen sena. Ma sfamyunepen Yesus Kristus, Manpapoik oser monda isoine Manseren koḇedi. Ro awar ḇeponya samamyai sedi ḇyeḇeḇaryas ro Refo kwar.
Nane kam mkofawina kwar. Mboi yamarisen yaḇuk swarepen faro mko rariso Manseren ḇyuk aski faro Israelsya ro sup Masir, ḇape ḇarpurya myun ḇekyar ḇa sya.

Mkoswarepen malaikat-malaikat ḇeyunuk yawek papoik sedi, isof sisasyarbur moḇ kankain sena. Malaikat ansi Allah ḇyewanka si kuker wanka ḇekain fyoro ro moḇ ḇepampan. Ro diwa sidwarek pdef si isof ssḇuk samamyai faro si ro Ras ḇebaya.

Mkoswarepen kako mnu Sodom ma Gomora fnoḇek mnumnu ḇefanami na, kawasa ḇekain ro mnu anna sakfrur roi ḇarḇor imnis malaikat ansi sifrur na. Sifrur farḇuk ma ḇarḇor, isof sisma kandera kuker samamyai ro for ḇekain fyoro, insa neswarapepen faro kawasasya kam.
Rarirya kako kawasa ḇemafu isof sifrur mamas faro baken mankunsi sena. Smam kyof Allah papoik ḇyena ma sonef roi ḇekenem ḇepyum ro boiyaswa.

Mikhael mankundi ḇeḇeḇru ro malaikatsya, rofyor fyamfaḇri ryakrakrok kuker Ibiris ro mansei nari ḇesrow Moses kekḇa ḇyedi, Mikhael ipok ḇyemankara faro Ibiris kuker wos anonef ḇa. Mikhael ikofen monda, "Manseren nari isonek aw!"
Ḇape snonkaku ansi sisampum ma sonef roi ḇeḇor sifawi ḇana. Sikada simnis raris aiwan ḇena swaruser ḇa, ma ḇefawi roi ḇeḇor kuker kakara sena. Ḇape snar roi ḇeradine nafrur farmambriwer si.
Raro faro si, snar siso Kain nyan ḇyena. Insa sisma pipi, simbran nyan ḇeḇor imnis raris Bileam. Ma si kako sroe snar sisampum imnis raris Korakh.

Rofyor mkofrur munara nanan, snonkaku ansi sifrur mamas rofandu mko, snar simai ḇa sanan kuker masaḇsoḇ, ma sfandun mankunsi monda. Sikada simnis mandep wamya iwufpum, ḇape ssḇuk mekem ḇa. Sikada simnis ai knam ḇemarem ḇa rofyor mamaremya; ai knam spas rares na kwar inja nmasbos kaku.

Simnis raris risen ḇekaḇaḇus ḇemun ro soren, rarirya kako sḇayorem fararur ḇeḇyeḇa sena ḇefrur mamyai. Sikada simnis kumsya ḇewayan mura-muma ma Allah fyasos moḇ ḇepampan syadi ḇekain fyoro faro si kwar.
Henokh, ḇeḇeḇarpur ro Adam ro syos ḇeḇefikya, ḇyaryar snonkaku sine ro ḇepon kwar ḇo doḇo, "Mkomam, Manseren nari ryama kuker malaikat syaran-syaran ḇesren ḇyesya,

fasḇuk kakara faro snonkaku kam. Manseren nari ḇyuk samamyai faro fararur ḇeḇarḇor ro ḇefawi i ḇasya. Ma nari ḇyuk samamyai kako faro wos anonef ro kawasa ḇesasar ma ḇeḇeankarkar sikofen faro i kwar."
Snonkaku ansi sisurem ma sfafayaf ḇesya kwar. Sikenem imnis marisen-rmomen ḇesasar sena. Sisandik mankun si, ma skara snonkaku nari sisma fainda rosya.
Ḇape naek srar yesi mko, mkoswarepen rosai Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyesi sikofen ro ḇepon kwar.
Sikofen ḇadir ḇepon faro mko kwar, mboi kowaf Ras Ḇepupesya, nari snonkaku ḇeyonef mko sikḇawes isoine snonkaku ḇekenem imnis marisen nafsu-rmomen ḇarḇor sena.
Sikada snonkaku ḇefrur anun ḇesisya ma sisma papoik ro rarmomen rari supswan. Sikada snonkaku ḇena Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇa.
Ḇape mko kam, naek srar ayesi, mko kada mkokfin mankun mko ro kankenem kakyarya kada; kakyar mkoḇena nasren kaku; ma mkonadi kuker papoik Allah Rur ḇyedi,
ma mkokenem ḇesya kwar ro fadadiren Allah saswar ḇyedi rofyor mkowaf ḇaḇye ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, nari ḇeḇuk kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoroya faro mko.
Faro snonkaku ḇeḇeḇirḇarsya mkofasna mkoswar si kada.
Mkosmer sibur for insa sisma aski. Faro ḇesesya iḇye mkofasna saswar kuker makakak, ḇape mkayin mar sena ḇemamas kuker nafsu-rmomen ḇesasar sena.
Allah, ḇesma papoikya i waren insa mkosapi ḇa, ma papoik ani ḇeyun mko ḇeḇarpon baba ḇyedi kuker raryaḇ ḇefarorew ḇa,
ikada Allah oser monda Ḇeḇuk koreri faro ko ro Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi. Ikada Allah ḇepyum, ḇeba, ḇesma papoik ma samambraḇ ro awar ḇepon isof baboine ma fyoroya! Amin.

Syap ine kyur rosai Allah ikofen ḇadir faro Yesus Kristus insa fyasna na faro Allah manfamyan ḇyesi rosai nari ḇerama fasaw na. Kristus iwan malaekat ḇyedi faro manfamyan ḇyedi. Yohanes, insa ikofen ḇadir roi anna faroi.
Yohanes fyarfyar roi myam anna kam; ma ḇaḇesaksi ḇyedi ḇekur Allah wos ḇyena ḇyuk faro Yesus Kristus.
Fainda faro snonkaku ḇewasya ma ḇerower ḇaryas ḇardadi syap ine roi ikofen ḇadir na ma isouser rosai sfas roi na. Snar fyoroḇa wer nari nakam ndama.

Naek srar ḇekain ro jemaat rifik ro supya mnuk Asia! Aya, Yohanes, yakyar naek srar mkosma ro Allah, ḇaḇye ma aski --isoine i sya, ma i sya kwar, ma nari ryama -- ma rur rifik sisya ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi kako,

ma ro Yesus Kristus, Saksi ḇeḇeuser. I sḇawes kaḇer ḇepon ro marmar ma ikada isma papoik ḇesyadi ro wairek-wairek ro sup ine. Yesus iswar ko, ma kuker marmar ḇyedi fyaspar ko ro sasar koḇena kuker rikḇyena --
ḇarpurya ifrur ko fakoḇe er oser, koḇe imam-imam ḇeyuffarmyan Allah, Kma ḇyedi. Yesus Kristus iba syadi ma ḇena papoik isof fyoro-fyoro. Amin!
Mkomam, ryama kuker mandep! Kawasa kam nari smam i, ḇewan i kuker bomsya kako. Ersya kam ro supna nari skanes snar i. O, Amin.
"Aya kada ḇeponyama ḇepupesya, Manseren Allah ikofen, isya, isya kwar, ma nari ryama, Ḇesma Papoik syadiya."

Aya Yohanes, naek mkoḇedi bemnis kuker mko ḇeḇekandera imnis manfamyan oser-oser ḇeso Kristus. Kofarmku ro kandera imnis kawasa ḇyesi. Sisawen aya ro myos Patmos snar yaḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, Yesus ḇyuk na.
Ro Manseren ras ḇyedi, Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyepoik aya, inja yarower mkaren ḇeba oso -- imnis kḇur ḇerok -- dawos ro dokor ayedi.
Mkaren ani ikofen, "Fas rosai mam na, ma farem syap ine faro jemaat rifik nane: Efesus, Smirna, Pergamus, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia ma Laodikia."
Yaknenef ḇedokor fayamam mansei ḇewawos faro aya. Ma yamam padamara ḇeḇewemin rifik ḇeḇemarom sifrur naro brawen.
Rofandu padamara wemin anna yamam snon oso dores imnis snonkaku. Syansun syatu ḇekwan isof ro wemin ḇyesi. Ro andersi isron sarei brawen.
Snonburyam ḇyena napyoper imnis manwarefbur, payapyoper mankum. Mka ḇyesi sisak imnis for;
wemin ḇyesi sinyar imnis kansai sikun ro for. Mkaren ḇyedi imnis sriḇwar ḇesobir ḇerok maum.
Dufepen kum rifik ro ḇramin ḇyedi ḇar rakuya, ma sumber ḇesar raḇanḇar isya ro sḇadon ḇyedi. Ḇarpon ḇyedi isna imnis ori ro orkok pandaf.
Rofyor yamam i, yakain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇyedi imnis snonkaku ḇemar kwar. Ḇape ryir ḇramin raku ḇyedi ro aya ma ikofen, "Wamkak awer! Aya kada ḇeponya ma ḇepupesya.
Aya kada ḇekenem! Yamar kwar, ḇape mam kada, yakenem isof fyoro-fyoro. Yasma papoik syadi ro marmarya ma mun aiḇui.
Rarirya, fas rosai mam na, isoine rosai naisya ro baboine, ma rosai nari ḇerama na.

Inekada kankunes ro kum rifik mam ro ḇramin ḇar raku yedi, ma ro padamara ḇeḇewemin rifik ro brawen anna. Kum rifik ansi isoine malaikatsya ro jemaat rifik, ma padamara ḇeḇewemin rifik anna isoine jemaat rifik anna."
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Efesus, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇeyufepen kum rifik ro ḇramin ḇar raku ḇyedi, ma ḇembran rofandu padamara brawen ḇeḇewemin rifik anna.

Yafawi roi mkofrurna: mko fararur sambraḇ ma mkosnemna nadworen kaku. Yafawi mkomewer mkoso ḇeḇarḇorsya. Ma snonkaku ḇekarem mankun si ḇemanwawan ḇape roḇa, iḇye mkomnasen si, insa mkofawi wawan sisyaḇa, mboi sankarkar.
Ma mkoknon mboi mkoḇekandera snar aya, ma mkofawi mkomor ḇa.
Ḇape yasampum mko: Snar saswar ḇepon mkobani maro aya isyaḇa kwar.
Rarirya mkoswarepen mkosapi ḇinkwan kaku! Mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena, ma mkofrur rosai mkofrur ro ḇepon kwar ani. Rarirya ḇaido, nari yarama ma yapas padamara wemin mkoḇanibur moḇ ḇyedi.
Ḇape roi ḇeḇye oso isya ro mko isoine: Mkayin fararur ro ḇeso Nikolaus sya, aya kako yayin si.
Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat! Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yaḇuk fadan bon ro ai knam kankenem ḇesur ro Allah yaf ḇyedi."
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Smirna, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇeponya ma ḇepupesya -- ḇemar kwar ma ḇekḇok kaḇer.
Yafawi kandera mkoḇena; yafawi mkosaḇarar -- ḇape mkoḇekayan kaku ḇeri! Yafawi anonef ro kawasa ḇekarem mankun siḇe Yahudi, ḇape rarirya ḇa; sikada Ibiris kawasa ḇyesiri!

Mkomkak awer kandera nari fyoro ḇa mkosma na. Mkoswarepen, Ibiris nari ḇyeono ro mko fassun ro bui faifrowes sas mko. Nari mkosma kandera ras samfur. Iḇyesyadi mkofarmku nako faro aya isof mkomar, nari yaḇuk faro mko wower ḇekakuya.
Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat! Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari ismaḇaḇeri kandera marmar ḇeḇesuruya."
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Pergamus, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇeyuf sumber ḇesar raḇanḇar.

Yafawi moḇ mkokain rona. Mkokain ro moḇ karapesa ḇaḇesasoser Ibirisya. Mkofarmku nako faro aya. Rofafisu Antipas, saksi ḇeḇeuser ayedi, ḇyeḇemun rofandu mko, ro ayar mamun. Ibirisya kyain roya, rofyor ani kako mkofamyun kakyar mkoḇena ḇa faro aya.

Ma rariryano roi ono naisya yamarisen naba ro mko: Rofandu mko ono sisya siso farkarkor rosai Bileam ḇyukna. Bileam ḇyuk farkarkor faro Balak insa ḇyeninyan kawasa Israel, fasifrur sasar; ḇyeḇuk si fasan roḇean ḇefarser kwar faro amfyanir ma sifrur farbuk.
Rarirya kako rofandu mko snonkaku ono sisya siso farkarkor ro ḇeso Nikolaus.
Snar rarirya mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena! Mkofrur rarirya ḇaido, kniko nari yarama faro mko wer ma yaḇe embroḇ snonkaku ansi kuker sumber ḇero sḇadon ayedi.

Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat! Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yaḇuk fadan mamami (manna) ḇeyokef, ma nari oser-oser isma ro aya karui ḇepyoper oser. Ro karui ani sfas snonsnon babo oso, manseirya wer kako ifawi ḇa, mboi snonkaku ḇesma iya derer."
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Tiatira, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, mka ḇyesi sisak imnis for, ma wemin ḇyesu sumnis kansai ḇenyar sikun ro for.
Yafawi roi ḇeḇor mkofrur na -- yafawi mkosaswar, mkosouser, mkofararur, ma mkofarmku ro kandera. Yafawi baboine mkofararur nabor syadi ro ḇeponiwara.

Ḇape yasampum mko: Snar mkoḇuk mkosnemna faro Izebel kwar, bin ḇekarem ḇinkundiḇe Allah wawan ḇyedi. Manfamyan ayesi sibor kwar isrer si ma fyarkor si fasifrur farḇuk ma san roḇean sḇukfarser kwar faro amfyanirsya.
Yaḇuk fafisu kwar faro si fasimbror ro sasar sena, ḇape simarisen simnai ḇa rofararur farḇuk.

Mkoswarepen! Nari yapyasbos i isof iduf ro kamboi ḇyedi. Rodia i kuker snonkaku ḇefrur farḇuk fnoḇek isya nari sisma kandera ḇeba. Nakam nari yafrurna ro baboine -- mboi rofyor simnai ro sifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor fnoḇek kuker iḇa.
Ma ḇeso isya nari yamun si kako insa jemaat sifawi kam aya kada yafawi snonkakusya swaruser sena. Nari yamunsu faro mko kam imnis oser-oser fararur ḇyedi.
Ḇape eḇesesya ro Tiatira ḇeyakso farkarkor ḇeḇarḇor ani ḇa, ma ḇefarkor fawawi Ibiris ani ḇa. Yakofen nari yaḇuk kamnam ḇemarḇak faro mko ḇa.
Ḇape isof rofyor nari yaramumaya, iḇyesyadi mkoso faswef rosai mkosma kwar.

Mansei ḇeḇefainda, ma ḇefararur pdef isof ro papupesya ḇefrur rosai yamarisen, nari yaḇuk papoik faroi imnis yasma ro Kma yedi. Nari sisma papoik ro aya fasḇuk sasoser faro er-er kuker ankyon mankarmomen, ma ḇyuki ryaḇdiwer er-er ansi isof semommom imnis uren saprop.
Nari sisma kum mesri ro aya.
Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Sardis, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇena Allah Rur rifik ḇyesi ma kum rifik ansi. Yafawi rosai mkofrurna. Soḇeda mkokenem ḇape mkomar kwar!
Inja, mkokḇok, ma mkosambraḇser rosai isya kaker faro mko ḇepon ro nakam namar ḇaimya. Snar yasma mboi rosai mkofrurna, oso imnis ḇaim ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.

Inja, mkoswarepen kaḇer wer rosai sfarkor ḇepon kwar faro mko ma rosai mkomnaf kwar. Mkofrurna ma mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena. Rofyor mkombror ḇa, nari yarama faro mko imnis raris ḇekaraw; ma nari mkofawi ḇa fafisu yaramaya.
Ma rofandu mko ro Sardis snonkaku ono sisya siwaren sansun sena insa nasren faswef. Sima nari simbran fnoḇek aya kuker ssun sansun ḇepyoper, snar sikada sisyus.
Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari ssḇuk fasyun sansun ḇepyoper. Snonsnon sena nari yapyosna ḇa ro syap kawasa ḇekenem. Ma roḇarpon Kma yedi ma malaikat ḇyesya nari yakarem si ḇekawasa ayesi.
Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Filadelfia, fas radine: Inekada ananun roi Ḇesren, Ḇenapes. Ikada dufepen asyopder Daud ḇyedi; rofyor syeḇen, oso fakyeni ḇa, ma rofyor kyeni, oso fasyeḇeni ḇa kako.
Yafawi rosai mkofrurna. Yafawi mkosambraḇ mankun ḇa; mkoso farkarkor ayena kwar ma mkoḇeuser faro aya. Yaseḇen kedwai oso faro mko kwar, oso fakyeni ḇa kako.
Mkoswarepen ine: Mansei ḇeḇekawasa Ibiris ani, ḇeḇeankarkar ḇekarem mankundiḇe Yahudi, mboi sima roḇa. Nari yafrur fasrama sḇansuba ro ḇarpon mkoḇena. Ma nari sifawi mboi yaswar mko.
Snar mkoso sasoser ayena kwar ma mkofarmku kwar, aya kako nari yafadiren mko rofafisu kandera nari ḇemun supswan ḇesiper ine. Roi ḇeradine nari ndama nefarawrowes faro kawasa kam ro supna.
Nari yarama fasaw! Mkowaren naḇye rosai mkona kwar, insa oso fadun awer wower ḇeḇefainda mkoḇedi ḇa.

Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yafrur faimnis adir ro Allah yedi rum ḇesren ḇyedi, ma nari isasyar ro moḇ ani wer ḇa. Snonsnon Allah yedi, ma snonsnon mnu Allah yedi -- isoine Yerusalem babo nari ḇesabu roboiyaswa, ro Allah yedi -- nari yafas i ro snonkaku ani mankundi. Snonsnon babo yedi kako nari yafas i ro mankundi.
Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Laodikia, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇenirḇe Amin (Yesus) saksi ḇeḇeuser ma ḇenapes, knam ḇedafdif roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ifrurna.
Yafawi rosai mkofrurna; Yafawi mkoprim ba ma mkosam ba kako. Iḇyekada mkoprim roḇa mkosam!
Ḇape mkofarmandin; mkosam ba ma mkoprim ba kako. Rarirya nari yaḇayorem mko.
Rofyor mkokofen, 'Nko ḇekayan ma nana nko ḇena namnis; nkananjar royo ḇa.' Ḇape mkofawi ḇa mkosaḇarar ma mkofrur saneso mankun mko! Mkosaḇarar, mkoḇaḇer, ma mkoparyaref.

Inja yanun faro mko insa mkokoḇes brawen ro aya, isoine brawen ḇekaku, insa mkoḇekayan. Mkokoḇes ro aya sansun ḇepyoper kako famkosansunwarek baken ḇeḇaḇer mkoḇena ḇefrur mamyai. Ma mkokoḇes aryawin kako fasḇuki isfu mka mkoḇesi insa mkomam.
Snonkaku yaswarsya si yasonek ma yaprersya. Inja mkomarisen ido mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena.
Mkomam! Yores ro kedwaya ḇarpondi ma yanuk. Rofyor oso ryower mkaren yedi, ma syeḇen kedwai, nari yasun fayasrowi; nari yanan fnoḇek i ma dakanan fnoḇek aya.
Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yaḇuk fakyain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ayedi fnoḇek aya. Snar mankun daya kako yaḇefainda kwar ma baboine yakain fnoḇek Kma yedi ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"

Posa kwar yasma mamam oso wer. Yamam kedwai oso ro boiyaswa ḇyeḇeseḇen. Ḇarpurya yarower wer mkaren randakya ḇewawos kwar maro aya imnis rakrok kḇur. Mkaren ani ikofen, "Rwama wekmumyas. Nari yafasna faro aw rosai nari ḇeramana."
Fasaw kaku yasma papoik ro Allah Rur ḇyedi. Ma yamam ro boiyaswa karapesa ḇaḇesasoser oso, ma snon oso kyain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani.

Snon ani ḇarpon ḇyedi isna imnis permata baiduri pandan (karui ḇekakur sananai ḇyedi ryumek) ma permata delima (karui ḇekakur sananai ḇyedi irik). Saseḇi oso isnai ḇezamrud (karui ḇekakur kaku, sananai ḇyedi ryumek), ḇeparek yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani.
Karapesa ḇaḇesasoser samfur risuru seser rifiak ḇese nkainyar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani. Rodia manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak skain rona ssansun sansun ḇepyoper ma sisaswo wower brawen.
Karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani isasyar arḇeḇer ma karadu ḇerok ḇeruru. Ma roḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani paramrom rifik naisya nasnai; nakada Allah Rur rifik ḇyenairya.

Ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani kosma roi oso komam imnis soren fanin, isren imnis kristal, (fanin sanana ḇyedi isren). Ma roi ḇekenem rifiak nores snefer yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ro ḇarpon, ma dokorya nafo kuker mka ro kum.
Roi ḇekenem ḇepon ani komam imnis singa, (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek). Ḇeḇesuruya, imnis sapi snon. Ḇeḇekiorya ḇarpon ḇyedi imnis snonkaku. Ḇeḇefiakya, komam imnis mankankan ḇeroḇ.

Roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi, oser-oser ḇyeprer riwonem, ḇandiri ma dori nafo kuker mka ro kum, nkain yari. Roḇ meser roi ḇekenem ansi sidisen ḇesyakwar, "Sren, sren, Manseren isren, Allah ḇepik syadi; isya, isya kwar, ma nari ḇeramumaya."
Roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi sidisen, dow sanandik, jow ma kasumasa faro i ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, isoine i ḇekenem isof fyoro-fyoro. Ma rofyor roi ḇekenem ansi sidisen,

ma manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak ansi skain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, raimnai sḇan suba faro i ḇekenem isof fyoro-fyoro ani. Ḇarpurya srir wower sena ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani ma sikofen,
"O, Manseren, o, Allah nkobedi! Aw monda kada wasyus fawasma sanandik, syowi ma papik. Snar aw ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor kam, ma snar marisen ḇedi kako roi ḇeḇor anna neḇefrur kwar ma nakenem."
Ma ḇarpurya yamam ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ro ḇramin ḇyeja syap oso isya, syap ḇeniw. Syap ani ifo kuker fasfas ro ḇanḇar. Syap ḇeniw ani ḇyeḇekakop kuker kakop rifik.
Raimnai yamam malaikat ḇesambraḇ oso, kyaru naba, "Mansei ḇesyus faḇeḇas kakop ma syap ḇeniw ine?"
Ḇape snon oso ḇa iḇye ro boiyaswa, ma sup ine, roḇa ro sup ine baḇdi osoḇa faḇyas syap ani, ma myam rodori.
Inja yakanes rawo yamarpapyoi, snar snon oso isya ḇa kako isyus faḇyas syap ani, ma myam rodori.

Raimnai snon oso ro manfamyan ansi ikofen maro aya, "Kwanes awer! Mame! Singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) ro er Yehuda, ḇeḇeḇarpur ro Daud ḇeba ani, ḇyefainda kwar. I ḇesyus faḇeḇas kakop rifik ma syap ḇeniw ani."

Ma yamam Rumkun Domba oso dores rofandu karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ma roi ḇekenem rifik kuker manfarkin-manfarkin ansi sores yar i. Rumkun Domba ani imnis raris ḇyeḇekauk kwar. Ḇyeknapur rifik ma mka rifik: isoine Rur rifik ro Allah, iwan kwar ḇesupna ḇesiper.
Ḇarpurya Rumkun Domba ani rya dun syap ḇeniw ani ro ḇramin ḇar raku ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani.

Ro fafisu Rumkun Domba ani dun syap ḇeniw ani, roi ḇekenem rifiak ma manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak ansi skain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇyedi. Manfarkin ansi oser-oser duf sonker ma sek brawen ḇeser mamboḇo, isoine Allah kawasa ḇyesi nadi sena.
Ma sidisen mkaren dow ḇaḇo oso: "Aw kada wasyus fawun syap ani, ma bas kakop ḇyena. Snar beḇemun kwar, ma kuker marmar ḇedi, snonkaku ro keret kam, wos, kawasa ma er bak namuk si kwar faro Allah.
Wafrur si fase er oser seimam-imam, insa suffarmyan Allah koḇedi, ma ssḇuk sasoser imnis wairek ro supna."
Ḇarpurya yamam wer ma yarower mkaren malaikat sibor sesyaran-syaran ma syaran samfur-risamfur! Sores yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma roi ḇekenem rifiak ma manfarkin ansya.
Sidisen kuker mkaren ḇeba, "Rumkun Domba skawuk kwar ani, isyus faisma papoik, ḇaḇekayan, ḇaḇefawawi ma ḇaḇesamambraḇ; i syus fasesyowi i, isma baba ma sisandik i!"

Ma yarower roi ḇekenem ro nanki, ro supna, ro supna baḇna, ro sorenya dori -- roi ḇekenem ḇeḇor kam ro farsyos sansoren ine -- nadisen, "I ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, ma Rumkun Domba ani, ikada isma sanandik ma syowi ma baba ma ḇaḇepapoik isof fyoro-fyoro!"
Ma roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi skarem: "Amin!" Ma manfarkin ansi kako skain wepur ma sḇan suba.
Posa kwar yamam Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeponya rofandu kakop rifik anna. Ma yarower roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi oso ikofen, "Rwama!" Mkaren ḇyedi ryok imnis rakrok karadu.
Raimnai yamam, kuda ḇepyoper oso ḇeyekroiya duf saren oser, ma ssḇuk faroi wower oser. Ma rya imnis snon oser ḇesma fainda faḇefaḇri ḇaḇefaindaya.
Ma ḇarpurya Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇesuruya, ma yarower roi ḇekenem ḇeḇesuruya ikofen, "Rwama!"
Inja kuda ḇese oser isasyar wer. Kuda ani irik ma dafuk. Ḇeyekiya ssḇuk papoik fadun askibur supna ḇesiper, insa snonkaku smunyae si. Ma ssḇuk faroi sumber ḇeba oser.
Raimnai Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇekiorya. Ma yarower roi ḇekenem ḇeḇekiorya ikofen, "Rwama!" Yamam, kuda ḇepaisem oser. Ḇeyekiya duf warnkyara risuru ro ḇraminya.

Ma yarower imnis mkaren rofandu roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi ḇekofen, "Sasuref ras oser fasibu amek oser, ḇyepipi sarak dinar oser; ma sasuref ras oser katera amek rikior, ḇyepipi sarak dinar oser. Ḇape mkokaruk awer zaitun knam ma anggur knam anna."
Raimnai Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇefiakya. Ma yarower roi ḇekenem ḇeḇefiakya ikofen, "Rwama!"

Wakmam kada kuda oser sanana ḇyedi ryumek-nyanyar. Ḇeyekiya snonsnon ḇyedi Marmari. Ma mun aiḇui duserfaku ro dokor ḇyedi. Ssḇuk faro si mun ḇeḇefiak ro supna faro papoik sedi, insa smamun kuker ḇaḇe embroḇ, kuker fafisu basbiser, kuker dafduf ma kuker aiwan ḇeḇarḇor.
Raimnai Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇerimya. Ma yamam ro rokef farsarserya baḇdi rur snonkaku smun faḇemar kwar ansya, snar sḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi kuker ḇaḇesaksi sena.
Ma sfararar kuker mkaren ḇeba, "O, Manseren Ḇepoik syadi, ḇesren ma ḇenapes! Fafisu rosai wer insape kwukeḇ kankain supna ma ḇuk samamyai faro si snar smun inko kwar?"
Ḇarpurya ssḇuk faro si oser-oser syatu ḇepyoper oser. Ma siwan si fasimnaisu fafisu knik wer, isof dandonek sedi imnis min sesi ḇeyuffarmyan ma naek srar sesi nari sḇeḇemun imnis si kako.
Raimnai yamam Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇewonemya. Ma rim ḇeba ḇeyun nyawa myun. Ori pyaisem imnis sanampuru, ma paikya fyanandik imnis rik.
Maksya sfarbrubru ro nanki ḇesupna imnis imyui bon ḇekamur ḇerwu ro knamya rofafisu wam doḇerya kyiker.
Ma nanki ipromes imnis syap ḇeniw, bon ma aimandoi (myos) nakam neḇekanowbur moḇ nena.
Ma waireksya ro supna, ḇebararasya, mambrisya, kawasa ḇeḇekayan ma kawasa ḇesma papoik, ma kawasa ḇesesya, fnoḇek manfyan ma snonkaku ḇemkei, sikam siyokef ro aḇyaḇ ma ro bon karuina swaf-swafna.
Ma sfararar faro bon ma karui anna, "Mkomsiserepen inko! Mkoyokef inko ro mamam ḇyedi ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, snar masasor ro Rumkun Domba ani!
Snar ras ḇeba ḇeyun nyawa ryama kwar, baboine sfasna masasor sena ma snonkaku oso ḇa kako fyarmku ro ḇarpon sena!"
Ḇarpurya, yamam malaikat rifiak sores ro dopir rifiak ro supna. Ma sidwarek wam rifiak ro supna insa wamo iso awer roḇande, roḇa rosoren, roḇa ro ai knamna.
Raimnai yamam malaikat oso ḇese isasyar ro ḇar ori dek. Dun Allah kakop ḇekenem ḇyedi. Ma kuker mkaren ḇeba malaikat ani dor malaikat rifiak ḇesma Allah papoik ḇyedi faḇemkok ḇande ma soren.
Malaikat ani ikofen, "Mkomkok ḇepon awer ḇandeya, roḇa sorenya, roḇa ai knam na, rofyor koḇuk kakop aḇyair ro Allah koḇedi faro manfamyan ḇyesya andar sena ḇaim."
Raimnai ikofen ḇadir maro aya, snonkaku ssḇuk kakop aḇyair Allah ro andar sena, dandonek seja syaran utin oser samfur rifiak seser rifiak. Snonkaku sine sunsi ro er Israel keret samfur seser risuru;
ro keret oser-oser syaran samfur oser seser risuru. Isoine ro keret ma er: Yehuda, Ruben, Gad,
Asyer, Naftali, Manasye,
Simeon, Lewi, Isakhar,
Zebulon, Yusuf ma Benyamin.

Ḇarpurya yamam, snonkaku sibor syadi wer -- isof snon oso nari kyor dandonek sejaḇa! Sikada snonkaku ro ersya kam, keret, kawasa ma wosna. Ssansun syatu ḇepyoper ma suf srai ram, snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sores roḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma roḇarpon Rumkun Domba ani.
Raimnai skaru kuker mkaren ḇeba, "Korer koḇeja ryama ro Allah koḇedi, ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, ma ro Rumkun Domba ani!"
Malaikatsya kam sores yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma manfarkinsya kuker roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi. Malaikat ansi skain wepur roḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma sḇansuba faro Allah.
Skaru kam, "Amin! Allah koḇeja ikada Allah ḇesma sanandik, baba ma ḇefawinananem. Ko kofen kasumasa nabor kaku faro Allah ma ḇaḇesyowi. I Allah ḇepoik ma ḇesambraḇ isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin."
Ma snon oso ro manfarkin ansi ifuken aya, "Snonkaku ḇesun syatu ḇepyoper sine, mansesirya ma sramakero?"

Yakarem, "Yafawi ḇa, tuan. Tuan mankundaw wafawi." Inja ikofen maro aya, "Sinekada snonkaku ḇesma koreri kwar, posa ro sisasyarbur kandera ḇeba. Spap syatu sena kwar ma sifrurna fanapyoper kuker Rumkun Domba ani rik ḇyena.
Rarirya sores ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser Allah, ma ssesyowi faro Allah roḇ meser ro Allah rum ḇesren ḇyedi. Ma i ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani nari iso si fafyadiren si.
Nari sibiser ma simbrow wer ḇa; samsam ori nari myun si wer ḇa,
snar Rumkun Domba ḇekain rofandu karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani nari ḇyemanfarandows faro si. Nari fyarkin si ḇewar baken ḇeḇuk kankenem. Ma nari Allah ipyos mkaru senabur simkasna."
Rofafisu Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇefikya, boiyaswa ḇyeusḇa isof indokada oras muno.
Raimnai yamam malaikat rifik sores ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, ma ssḇuk kḇur rifik faro si.

Malaikat oso ḇese, dun ben brawen ḇeser farsarser ḇekun, ḇo ryama dores ro ḇarpon meja farsarser. Ssḇuk faroi kwar ben brawen ḇeser mamboḇo nabor kaku insa ḇyuk nfarser fnoḇek Allah kawasa ḇyesi nadi sena kam ro rokef brawen farsarser ani ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoserya.
Mamboḇo paw ma Allah kawasa ḇyesi nadi sena, nek ro malaikat ḇeyores ani ḇramin ḇyedi ro ḇarpon Allah.
Ḇarpurya malaikat ani dun ben brawen ḇeser farsarser ḇekun ani ma iseri kuker for ro rokef farsarser, posa isawen na ḇesupna. Ma karadu nḇeruru ma arḇeḇer ma rim.
Posa kwar, malaikat rifik ḇeyuf kḇur rifik ansi sfasos fasiḇe siwuf.
Malaikat ḇeponya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma mekem karui ma for irḇaren rik nasapi ḇesupna. Ma mun rikior ro supna nananem ranaḇro; rarirya kako mun rikior ro ai knam ma aḇrisna.
Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇesuruya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma roi oso imnis bon ḇeba isber, ḇyeḇesawen ḇesoren. Ma mun rikior ro soren fyarwe ḇerik,
ma mun rikior ro roi ḇekenem ḇeḇor ro soren simar; rarirya kako mun rikior ro jawasina namsawer.
Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇekiorya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma kum ḇeba oso, isber imnis paramrom, isapi ro nanki, ma myun munrikior ro warna ma war sunna.
(Kum ani snonsnon ḇyedi "Apsintus" = "Sarmar".) Ma mun rikior ro warna nsarmar, ma snonkaku sibor simar snar sinem war ḇesarmar anna.

Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇefiakya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi. Ma mun rikior ro ori, mun rikior ro paiki, ma mun rikior ro kumsya seḇeprer isof mun rikior ro sambraḇ sena napromes. Ma mun rikior ro meserya pyampan ma rarirya kako mun rikior ro roḇya.
Raimnai yamam, ma yarower mankankan oso iroḇ ro sansoren ḇoka ḇo kyaru, "Raro! Raro! Rarokada faro snonkaku kam ro supna, nari rofafisu mkorower malaikat rikior ḇese ansko skowuf kḇur skoḇesi!"
Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇerimya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma yamam kum oso isapi ro nanki ḇesupna. Ssḇuk faro kum ani asyopder mun aiḇui.
Ma kum ani syeḇen mun aiḇui; ma paw nasasyar roi imnis paw ro apen ḇeba. Ori ma sansoren ḇoka pyampan, snar paw ro mun aiḇui.
Raimnai kampam sisasyar ro paw ani sisabu ḇesupna. Ssḇuk papoik faro kampam ansi imnis raris ssḇuk faro manora (aiwan ḇeyarek sayaryur).
Sidwarek si fasan awer aḇris roḇa ai knam, roḇa rokaker ḇesena. Mboi smun monda snonkaku ḇesma kakop aḇyair ro Allah ḇa ro andar sena.
Kampam ansi sidwarek si insa smun awer snonkaku ansi, mboi sifrur kandera monda si paik ririm. Sayaryur ani imnis kandera manora, ḇeyarek, rofyor darek snonkaku.
Paik ririm ani, snonkaku ssḇesasewar insa simar, ḇape nari simar ḇa; simarisen simar mura, ḇape marmarya ḇyinkwanbur si.
Kampam ansi komam simnis kuda-kuda ḇefasos faḇeḇe embroḇ. Ro ḇrusena roi oso komam imnis wower brawen. Ḇarpon sena namnis snonkaku.
Snonburyam sena namnis snonburyam bine, ma nakor sena namnis singa nakor. (Aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek.)
Sisosefwarek sianderna kuker adai sansun mankarmomen. Prer sena ndok imnis rakrok dandonek kuda kareta ḇeḇeḇeyoper ḇe embroḇ.
Sḇepurai ma sarek sayaryur imnis manora. Ma ropurai sena sisma samambraḇ fasifrur kandera snonkaku isof paik ririm.
Sisma wairek ḇesasoser si, wairek ani isoine malaikat ḇekarem ro munaiḇui. Snonsnon ḇyedi ro wos Ibrani Abadon; ma ro wos Yunani Apolion (isoine "Ḇefrur makakok").
Raro ḇeponya isyonde kwar. Posa kwar nari raro risuru surama wer.
Ḇarpurya malaikat ḇeḇewonemya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi. Ma yarower mkaren oso ryok ro dopir rifiak ro rokef farsarser brawen ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.
Mkaren ani ikofen faro malaikat ḇeḇewonem ani, "Per malaikat rifiak siyaḇek fanam war Efratsya!"
Raimnai sper malaikat ansya, snar sfasos si kwar faḇe oras, ras, paik, ma wampasi wambarek anna fasmun mun rikior ro kawasa kam.
Sikofen maro aya mboi dandonek sarar ḇeyek kudasya sesyaran-risyaran utin risuru.

Ma ro mamam, yamam kuda ansi ma ḇeyeksisya ssun sansun mankarmomen ḇefanandik ḇesak, ḇerumek imnis batu nilam, (karui ḇemnis for ḇerumek) ma nnanyar ḇebelerang (roi ḇesak ḇesam kaku ḇenanyar). Kudasya siḇrusna namnis singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) siḇrusna, ma ro sisḇasna nasasyar for, paw, ma belerang.
For, paw, ma belerang ḇesasyar ro kuda ansi sisḇasna nmun kawasa mun rikior kuker kandera rikior anna.
